doc: ['Spatiotemporal pattern and mechanism of street vending from the social sensing perspective : A comparison between law-enforcement reported and resident complain event .', 'Street vending is an important part of the urban informal economy , especially in developing country .', 'How to control its negative externality while augmenting its positive role in the urban socio-economic system poses challenge to urban planning and governance .', 'Existing study have insufficiently addressed the issue largely due to the lack of high-frequent observation data for street vending event .', "By introducing socially sensed big data from the smart urban governance platform , as well as record from the “ 12345 ” urban problem complaint hotline of Jiangbei District , Ningbo , China , this paper examines and compares the spatiotemporal pattern and occurrence mechanism of street vending event from both the urban manager ' “ top-down ” and the urban resident ' “ bottom-up ” point of view .", 'Statistical and machine learning model show that the distribution of street vending activity as sensed by the two subject does not overlap .', 'The former concentrate in central urban area and work time , while the latter is scattered distributed in everyday life-related place and time .', 'The finding reaffirm the existence of perception bias in social sensing data and show the potential for utilizing such bias to nudge better urban governance practice .', 'Theoretically and empirically , this research has contributed to promoting the people-oriented transformation of urban governance .', "Detecting individual ' spatial familiarity with urban environment using eye movement data .", 'The spatial familiarity of environment is an important high-level user context for location-based service ( LBS ) .', "Knowing user ' familiarity level of environment is helpful for enabling context-aware LBS that can automatically adapt information service according to user ' familiarity with the environment .", "Unlike state-of-the-art study that used questionnaire , sketch map , mobile phone positioning ( GPS ) data , and social medium data to measure spatial familiarity , this study explored the potential of a new type of sensory data - eye movement data - to infer user ' spatial familiarity of environment using a machine learning approach .", "We collected 38 participant ' eye movement data when they were performing map-based navigation task in familiar and unfamiliar urban environment .", 'We trained and cross-validated a random forest classifier to infer whether the user were familiar or unfamiliar with the environment ( i.e.', ', binary classification ) .', 'By combining basic statistical feature and fixation semantic feature , we achieved a best accuracy of 81 % in a 10-fold classification and 70 % in the leave-one-task-out ( LOTO ) classification .', "We found that the pupil diameter , fixation dispersion , saccade duration , fixation count and duration on the map were the most important feature for detecting user ' spatial familiarity .", "Our result indicate that detecting user ' spatial familiarity from eye tracking data is feasible in map-based navigation and only a few second ( e.g.", ', 5 s ) of eye movement data is sufficient for such detection .', "These result could be used to develop context-aware LBS that adapt their service to user ' familiarity with the environment .", 'Designing Data Validation Framework for Crowd-Sourced Road Monitoring Applications .', 'With the wide availability of smartphone sensing and the Internet connection , mobile crowd sourcing ( MCS ) has become a promising paradigm for collecting opinion and providing service to the citizen .', 'In the smart city context , crowd data , both in the form of their opinion and in the form of sensing data from their smartphones are very useful for scalable monitoring of resource demand and planning .', 'Since these device are portable , it is carried by almost every citizen , thus making them ubiquitous .', 'However , the main bottleneck of such crowd intelligence-based service is data validation as opinion can be biased , influenced by some factor not relevant to the problem in focus .', 'So , in this paper , a data validation framework utilizing machine learning technique for mobile crowdsourcing application is proposed .', 'It is focused on MCS-based road monitoring application .', 'The idea of crowdsourced urban area road monitoring application ( CURMA ) presented in the paper is implemented and result show the crucial need for such data validation framework .', 'GCN2CDD : A Commercial District Discovery Framework via Embedding Space Clustering on Graph Convolution Networks .', 'Modern enterprises attach much attention to the selection of commercial location .', 'With the rapid development of urban data and machine learning , we can discover the pattern of human mobility with these data and technology to guide commercial district discovery .', 'In this article , we propose an unsupervised commercial district discovery framework via embedding space clustering on graph convolution network to solve the problem of commercial district discovery .', 'Specifically , the proposed framework aggregates human mobility feature according to geographic similarity by graph convolution network .', 'Based on the graph convolution network embedding space , we apply hierarchical clustering to mine the latent functional region hidden in different human pattern .', 'Then , with the kernel density estimation , we can obtain the semantic label for the clustering result to discover commercial district .', 'Finally , we analyze the multisource data of the Xiaoshan District and Chengdu City , and experiment verify the effectiveness of our framework .', 'Multistep Traffic Speed Prediction from Spatial-Temporal Dependencies Using Graph Neural Networks .', 'Accurate traffic forecasting on citywide network is one of the crucial urban data mining application that accurately provide congestion warning and transportation scheduling .', 'While previous work has made significant effort to learn traffic temporal dynamic and spatial dependency , two key limitation exist in current model : ( 1 ) most existing approach solely capture spatial correlation among neighbor on predefined graph structure , and genuine relation may be missing due to the incomplete graph connection ; and ( 2 ) existing method are defective to capture the temporal trend because the recurrent and stacking structure employed in these method suffers from the long-range temporal dependency vanquish problem .', 'To overcome the difficulty in multistep prediction and further capture the dynamic spatialoral dependency of traffic flow , we propose a new traffic speed prediction framework for multiscale graph attention network ( MS-GATNs ) .', 'In particular , MS-GATNs is a hierarchically structured graph neural architecture that learns not only the local region-wise geographical dependency but also the spatial semantics from a global perspective .', 'Furthermore , a multiheads attention mechanism is introduced to empower our model with the capability of capturing complex nonstationary temporal dynamic .', 'Experiment on real-world traffic data set demonstrate that MS-GATNs outperforms the state-of-the-art baseline in long-term forecasting .', 'A machine learning-based approach for classifying tourist and local using geotagged photo : the case of Tokyo .', 'In tourism-dependent city , investigating the spatiotemporal distribution and dynamic of tourist flow is crucial for better urban planning in both steady and perturbed state .', 'In recent year , researcher have started relying more on photo-based , geotagged social data , which offer insight about tourist , popular hotspot , and mobility pattern .', 'However , distinguishing between tourist and local from this data is problematic since residence information is often not provided .', 'While previous study rely on heuristic ( e.g.', ', period of stay ) and probabilistic ( Shannon entropy ) approach , this paper proposes a method for classifying tourist and resident based on machine learning ( ML ) algorithms and considering parameter that could explain the variability between the two ( e.g.', ', weather , mobility , and photo content ) .', 'This approach was applied to Flickr user ’ geotagged photo taken in Tokyo ’ s 23 special ward from July 2008 to December 2019 .', 'The result show that stacked ensemble ( SE ) model are superior to model based on five supervised-learning algorithms , including gradient boosting machine ( GBM ) , generalized linear model ( GLM ) , distributed random forest ( DRF ) , deep learning ( DL ) , and extremely randomized tree ( XRT ) .', 'Temporal entropy ( TEN ) , mobility on workday , and frequent visit to amusement venue and crowded place influenced how user were classified .', 'While temporal distribution showed similar monthly/hourly pattern , spatial distribution varied .', 'The proposed approach might pave the way for scholar to carry out future tourism research on different topic and subsequently support policymakers in the decision-making process , specifically in urban setting .', 'A Novel Methodology for Automating Spatio-Temporal Data Classification in Basketball Using Active Learning .', 'The use of machine learning on spatio-temporal datasets has generated significant interest in a range of application , including vehicular traffic modelling and urban planning .', 'One of the most prolific application domain is sport analytics due to the availability of real-world multi-agent datasets , where such technique are used to recognize and predict offensive and defensive strategy in a range of team sport .', 'However , the use of advanced machine learning technique requires the large datasets to be annotated by domain expert , which is a time-consuming task .', 'Active learning is a methodology that significantly cuts down the data-annotation time on large datasets .', 'In this paper , we investigate active learning strategy to annotate spatio-temporal datasets for the purpose of classification model building .', "The proposed algorithms are demonstrated on a dataset obtained from professional basketball game to classify an offensive strategy known as 'Pick-and-Roll ' .", 'Several neural network architecture are investigated for the classification of more than 900 segment of basketball play .', 'The result obtained suggest that the proposed , preferred , methodology is well suited for annotating large spatio-temporal datasets and has the potential to be applicable across a range of team sport and non-sports usage scenario .', 'Urban trip generation forecasting based on gradient boosting algorithm .', 'The four-step transportation model plays an important role in urban planning .', 'The quality of the first phase , i.e .', 'trip generation , determines the performance of the global course .', 'The majority of trip generation forecasting model highly rely on mathematical derivation and have many predictor variable during the prediction , which leads to low accuracy of result and requires laboriously hand-crafted design of input vector .', 'This paper is the first to introduce the gradient boosting decision tree ( GBDT ) algorithm for trip generation prediction , and harmonizes such a powerful machine learning method with traditional urban planning requirement to achieve better prediction performance .', 'Unlike the commonly used linear regression method , GBDT can automatically perform feature selection and model the non-linear relationship between input and output variable .', 'Experimental result on real-world residential travel census in Beijing prove that the GBDT model significantly outperforms the baseline and can forecast the trip generation more accurately .', 'MetaStore : A task-adaptative meta-learning model for optimal store placement with multi-city knowledge transfer .', "Optimal store placement aims to identify the optimal location for a new brick-and-mortar store that can maximize its sale by analyzing and mining user ' preference from large-scale urban data .", 'In recent year , the expansion of chain enterprise in new city brings some challenge because of two aspect : ( 1 ) data scarcity in new city , so most existing model tend to not work ( i.e.', ', overfitting ) , because the superior performance of these work is conditioned on large-scale training sample ; ( 2 ) data distribution discrepancy among different city , so knowledge learned from other city can not be utilized directly in new city .', 'In this article , we propose a task-adaptative model-agnostic meta-learning framework , namely , MetaStore , to tackle these two challenge and improve the prediction performance in new city with insufficient data for optimal store placement , by transferring prior knowledge learned from multiple data-rich city .', 'Specifically , we develop a task-adaptative meta-learning algorithm to learn city-specific prior initialization from multiple city , which is capable of handling the multimodal data distribution and accelerating the adaptation in new city compared to other method .', 'In addition , we design an effective learning strategy for MetaStore to promote faster convergence and optimization by sampling high-quality data for each training batch in view of noisy data in practical application .', 'The extensive experimental result demonstrate that our proposed method leads to state-of-the-art performance compared with various baseline .', 'Interpretation of contextual influence with explanatory tool : Travel mode likelihood mapping using GPS trajectory .', 'Past study have failed to address the spatially and temporally varying impact of environmental factor regarding the uncertain geographic context problem .', "This study seeks to provide an innovative framework to facilitate the understanding of spatially and temporally varying impact of multiple contexts on individual ' travel mode using GIS and machine learning technique .", 'It adopts machine learning technique to create likelihood map to predict the spatiotemporal pattern of individual travel behavior and uses explanatory tool to explore the spatially and temporally varying impact .', 'The most notable change at a local level in the spatial dimension was that assault and offenses involving child turned out to be important in two selected community in Chicago .', 'Regarding the temporally varying impact , battery , other offense , and robbery showed negative association with the walking prediction to some extent at the afternoon peak ( 5–7:59 p.m. ) during weekday .', 'The proposed approach will enable meaningful interpretation of complex interaction between multiple environmental factor and individual travel behavior to suggest policy in urban planning and design .', 'Graph input representation for machine learning application in urban network analysis .', 'Understanding and learning the characteristic of network path has been of particular interest for decade and has led to several successful application .', 'Such analysis becomes challenging for urban network as their size and complexity are significantly higher compared to other network .', 'The state-of-the-art machine learning technique allow us to detect hidden pattern and , thus , infer the feature associated with them .', 'However , very little is known about the impact on the performance of such predictive model by the use of different input representation .', 'In this paper , we design and evaluate six different graph input representation ( i.e .', 'representation of the network path ) , by considering the network ’ s topological and temporal characteristic , for being used as input for machine learning model to learn the behavior of urban network path .', 'The representation are validated and then tested with a real-world taxi journey dataset predicting the tip of using a road network of New York .', 'Our result demonstrate that the input representation that use temporal information help the model to achieve the highest accuracy ( root mean-squared error of 1.42 $ ) .', 'Research on urban anti-terrorism intelligence perception system from the perspective of Internet of thing application .', 'Objective/significance : Based on the urgent need of the status quo of urban anti-terrorism , combining the present situation of intelligent city construction , we carry out the research on the key problem such as the collection and analysis of counter-terrorism information for urban environment .', 'This paper puts forward a kind of city anti-terrorism information perception system based on the Internet of thing , and realizes to improve the level of surveillance and early warning of terrorist activity facing the urban environment .', "Method/Process : The system collect and merges the heterogeneous information of terrorism , which is based on the information perception layer , the intelligence identification layer and the intelligence inference layer , which is based on the city 's focal area .", 'To filter suspicious information by constructing a semantic database of terrorist action signal Combined with complex event processing and machine learning technology , real-time monitoring and mining prediction of mass event flow , using the comparison between historical data of terrorist attack and real-time data , increased the area of counter-terrorism intelligence .', 'Results/conclusions : We hope to provide a better model and an exploratory study on the construction of the counter-terrorism early warning for the urban environment .', 'Applying machine learning and geolocation technique to social medium data ( Twitter ) to develop a resource for urban planning .', 'With all the recent attention focused on big data , it is easy to overlook that basic vital statistic remain difficult to obtain in most of the world .', 'What makes this frustrating is that private company hold potentially useful data , but it is not accessible by the people who can use it to track poverty , reduce disease , or build urban infrastructure .', 'This project set out to test whether we can transform an openly available dataset ( Twitter ) into a resource for urban planning and development .', 'We test our hypothesis by creating road traffic crash location data , which is scarce in most resource-poor environment but essential for addressing the number one cause of mortality for child over five and young adult .', 'The research project scraped 874,588 traffic related tweet in Nairobi , Kenya , applied a machine learning model to capture the occurrence of a crash , and developed an improved geoparsing algorithm to identify its location .', 'We geolocate 32,991 crash report in Twitter for 2012–2020 and cluster them into 22,872 unique crash during this period .', 'For a subset of crash reported on Twitter , a motorcycle delivery service was dispatched in real-time to verify the crash and its location ; the result show 92 % accuracy .', 'To our knowledge this is the first geolocated dataset of crash for the city and allowed us to produce the first crash map for Nairobi .', 'Using a spatial clustering algorithm , we are able to locate portion of the road network ( < 1 % ) where 50 % of the crash identified occurred .', 'Even with limitation in the representativeness of the data , the result can provide urban planner with useful information that can be used to target road safety improvement where resource are limited .', 'The work shows how twitter data might be used to create other type of essential data for urban planning in resource poor environment .', 'This is an open access article distributed under the term of the Creative Commons Attribution License , which permits unrestricted use , distribution , and reproduction in any medium , provided the original author and source are credited .', 'Intelligent image labeling system for recognizing traffic violation .', 'The article examines the problem of traffic violation and possible change in the city , including in the road infrastructure , based on their analysis .', 'A conclusion is made about the applicability of machine learning method for preparing and marking image for solving the problem .', 'The article describes in detail the algorithms for automatic marking of image for recognizing traffic violation in order to create a comfortable urban environment .', 'The existing information system that solve this problem are analyzed , with an indication of their strength and weakness .', 'The description of an intelligent system developed by the author and combining manual and automatic object recognition is given .', 'The system development tool are described , including the library used .', 'The experimental part contains the result of testing the system , incl .', 'neural network training .', 'Information on the number of image and object on them is given , as well as information on the percentage of correctly detected object for the automatic image labeling .', 'Human Origin-Destination Flow Prediction Based on Large Scale Mobile Signal Data .', 'The human origin-destination ( OD ) flow prediction is of great significance for urban safety control , stampede prevention , disease transmission control , urban planning , and many other aspect .', 'Most of the existing method generally divide the urban area into grid and use vehicle GPS trajectory and metrocard check-in data , combined with machine learning or deep learning model to predict human OD flow .', 'However , these kind of method are challenging to capture fine-grained human mobility pattern .', 'Moreover , these method usually deviate from the actual human OD transfer pattern on a citywide scale due to the particularity of different datasets .', 'To this end , in this paper , we use large-scale mobile phone signal data to achieve human OD flow prediction between the coverage of varying signal base station .', "Many signal base station are distributed in urban geographical space , collecting all the mobile phone user 's location information to obtain large-scale fine-grained unbiased human OD flow data .", 'Due to the lack of natural topology structure between base station , this paper adopts a TGCN model combined with a graph fusion module to pretrain the dynamic population distribution prediction task .', 'The parameter of the graph fusion module are employed to capture the different semantic information in the proposed hybrid machine learning method and finally achieve citywide human OD flow prediction .', 'Extensive experiment on the real-world signal datasets in Changchun , China , demonstrate the effectiveness of our model .', 'AVI 2020 Workshop on Road Mapping Infrastructures for Artificial Intelligence Supporting Advanced Visual Big Data Analysis , AVI-BDA 2020 and 2nd Italian Workshop on Visualization and Visual Analytics , ITAVIS 2020 .', 'The proceeding contain 14 paper .', 'The special focus in this conference is on Road Mapping Infrastructures for Artificial Intelligence Supporting Advanced Visual Big Data Analysis .', 'The topic include : An Experience on Cooperative Development of Interactive Visualizations for the Analysis of Urban Data ; Explaining AI Through Critical Reflection Artifacts : On the Role of Communication Design Within XAI ; Information Visualization and Visual Analytics at IVU Lab ; visual Analytics for Financial Crime Detection at the University of Perugia ; a Visual Analytics Technique to Compare the Performance of Predictive Models ; affective Analytics and Visualization for Ensemble Event-Driven Stock Market Forecasting ; understanding the Role of ( Advanced ) Machine Learning in Metagenomic Workflows ; intelligent Advanced User Interfaces for Monitoring Mental Health Wellbeing ; Towards Explainable Artificial Intelligence and Explanation User Interfaces to Open the ‘ Black Box ’ of Automated ECG Interpretation ; recognition and Visualization of Facial Expression and Emotion in Healthcare ; machine Learning in Healthcare : Breast Cancer and Diabetes Cases ; AI2VIS4BigData : Qualitative Evaluation of an AI-Based Big Data Analysis and Visualization Reference Model .', 'From PIace2Vec to Multi-Scale Built-Environment Representation : A General-Purpose Distributional Embedding for Urban Data Analysis .', 'Built environment like city , road , community are rich source of urban data .', 'Many downstream application require comprehensive analysis like geographic information retrieval , recommender system , geographic knowledge graphs , and in general , understanding urban space [ 28 ] .', 'Point of Interest ( POI ) , as one of the most researched aspect of urban data , has been successfully modeled using concept borrowed from Machine Learning ( ML ) and Natural Language Processing ( NLP ) .', 'In the work of Place2Vec [ 28 ] , a Word2Vec-like statistical model is proposed to represent spatial adjacency with a continuous embedding space .', 'This method successfully model the functional semantics of POIs with regard to several human-assessment based evaluation .', 'However , though the Place2Vec model addresses the distributional heterogeneity within a given spatial context with ITDL augmentation , it does not address the spatial heterogeneity among different region .', 'To solve this problem , we propose to introduce a hierarchical , density-based , self-adjusting clustering mechanism .', 'The boundary of relatedness and unrelatedness is learned from the given context , where denser area have tighter bound while sparser area have looser one .', 'We train our model on both the baseline Yelp hierarchical dataset [ 28 ] and our OpenStreetMap dataset .', 'We demonstrate that 1 ) our model significantly improves the performance on 2 of the 3 baseline task and the stability of training , and 2 ) our model generalizes excellently across 112 city of radically different scale ( minimum 1725 POIs , maximum 2694070 POIs ) , region ( North America , Europe , Asia , Africa ) and type ( commercial , touristy , industrial , etc . )', 'without the need of adjusting or tuning any hyperparameters .', 'We also demonstrate that our model can be used to discover interesting fact about city like inter-city semantic analogy and intra-city connectivity , which can be very useful in urban planning , social computing and public policy making .', 'Machine learning technology for sustainability in smart city in the post-covid era .', 'The unprecedented urban growth of recent year requires improved urban planning and management to make urban space more inclusive , safe , resilient and sustainable .', 'Additionally , humanity faces the COVID pandemic , which especially complicates the management of Smart Cities .', 'A possible solution to address these two problem ( environmental and health ) in Smart Cities may be the use of Machine Learning technique .', 'One of the objective of our work is to thoroughly analyze the link between the concept of Smart Cities , Machine Learning technique and their applicability .', 'In this work , an exhaustive study of the relationship between Smart Cities and the applicability of Machine Learning ( ML ) technique is carried out with the aim of optimizing sustainability .', 'For this , the ML model , analyzed from the point of view of the model , technique and application , are studied .', 'The area and dimension of sustainability addressed are analyzed , and the Sustainable Development Goals ( SDGs ) are discussed .', 'The main objective is to propose a model ( EARLY ) that allows us to tackle these problem in the future .', 'An inclusive perspective on applicability , sustainability scope and dimension , SDGs , tool , data type and Machine Learning technique is provided .', 'Finally , a case study applied to an Andalusian city is presented .', 'Identifying the Structure of City by Clustering Using a New Similarity Measure Based on Smart Card Data .', 'Identifying the structure of city has long been studied in urban planning and traffic modeling .', 'This study presents a reliable method that reveals the structure of city mainly based on clustering analysis using a new similarity measure .', 'Several previous study have used well-known clustering algorithms in machine learning field , such as k-means clustering based on temporal mobility pattern of region , whereas other study have applied community detection algorithms on network that depict traffic flows .', "However , the former does not reflect spatial interaction among place or area , and the latter group ' place or area with different land uses into the same cluster .", 'To address these issue in existing approach , this study proposes a new similarity method that considers not only temporal mobility pattern of area but also spatial interaction with other area .', 'Moreover , the study combines spectral clustering repeated several time with hierarchical clustering to obtain a reliable structure that keeps the contiguity of cluster and determine the hierarchy of different areal unit .', 'The application of the proposed method to the data for Seoul , South Korea , reveals that the proposed clustering process divides a city into relatively homogeneous area in term of land us .', 'The flow map based on the clustering result also revealed the spatial interaction between different area and identify the polycentric structure of Seoul .', 'Smart urban future : Outlining the smart city planning project .', 'City are constantly evolving complex system , and ongoing digitalization is making them even more complex .', 'The toolkit for urban scientist is expanding with computational method from AI to machine learning , data mining and advanced spatial analysis .', 'Together with vast amount of data of urban phenomenon and new lifestyle emerging from virtuality and cybernetic system , this ‘ smartification ’ makes the planning and analyses more challenging while providing new tool to respond to them .', 'In this article I propose a project for better understanding and guiding the future smart city based on dynamic urban theory such as those studying complex adaptive system , urban morphology , urban economy and mobility system .', 'I argue that we need to carry out empirical research on ongoing change to learn about novel , becoming spatial and functional pattern in the city , and apply both theory and imaginary vision to be able to grasp the likely qualitative transition in human ’ life following the ubiquitous use of technology .', 'The project is built around three coupled module , urban space , mobility and urban economics , and it will be carried out in the city of Tallinn , Estonia .', 'The expected result would help planner , decision maker , urban scientist and developer to better understand the transition we are facing , to be able to support the change and steer it towards better social and economic outcome .', 'Learning geo-contextual embeddings for commuting flow prediction .', 'Predicting commuting flow based on infrastructure and land-use information is critical for urban planning and public policy development .', 'However , it is a challenging task given the complex pattern of commuting flow .', 'Conventional model , such as gravity model , are mainly derived from physic principle and limited by their predictive power in real-world scenario where many factor need to be considered .', 'Meanwhile , most existing machine learning-based method ignore the spatial correlation and fail to model the influence of nearby region .', 'To address these issue , we propose Geocontextual Multitask Embedding Learner ( GMEL ) , a model that captures the spatial correlation from geographic contextual information for commuting flow prediction .', 'Specifically , we first construct a geo-adjacency network containing the geographic contextual information .', 'Then , an attention mechanism is proposed based on the framework of graph attention network ( GAT ) to capture the spatial correlation and encode geographic contextual information to embedding space .', 'Two separate GATs are used to model supply and demand characteristic .', 'To enhance the effectiveness of the embedding representation , a multitask learning framework is used to introduce stronger restriction , forcing the embeddings to encapsulate effective representation for flow prediction .', 'Finally , a gradient boosting machine is trained based on the learned embeddings to predict commuting flow .', 'We evaluate our model using real-world dataset from New York City and the experimental result demonstrate the effectiveness of our proposed method against the state of the art .', 'Recognition of implicit geographic movement in text .', 'Analyzing the geographic movement of human , animal , and other phenomena is a growing field of research .', 'This research has benefited urban planning , logistics , animal migration understanding , and much more .', 'Typically , the movement is captured as precise geographic coordinate and time stamp with Global Positioning Systems ( GPS ) .', 'Although some research uses computational technique to take advantage of implicit movement in description of route direction , hiking path , and historical exploration route , innovation would accelerate with a large and diverse corpus .', 'We created a corpus of sentence labeled as describing geographic movement or not and including the type of entity moving .', 'Creating this corpus proved difficult without any comparable corpora to start with , high human labeling cost , and since movement can at time be interpreted differently .', 'To overcome these challenge , we developed an iterative process employing hand labeling , crowd voting for confirmation , and machine learning to predict more label .', 'By merging advance in word embeddings with traditional machine learning model and model ensembling , prediction accuracy is at an acceptable level to produce a large silver-standard corpus despite the small gold-standard corpus training set .', 'Our corpus will likely benefit computational processing of geography in text and spatial cognition , in addition to detection of movement .', 'Harnessing Social Interactions on Twitter for Smart Transportation Using Machine Learning .', 'Twitter is generating a large amount of real-time data in the form of microblogs that has potential knowledge for various application like traffic incident analysis and urban planning .', 'Social medium data represents the unbiased actual insight of citizen ’ concern that may be mined in making city smarter .', 'In this study , a computational framework has been proposed using word embedding and machine learning model to detect traffic incident using social medium data .', 'The study includes the feasibility of using machine learning algorithms with different feature extraction and representation model for the identification of traffic incident from the Twitter interaction .', 'The comprehensive proposed approach is the combination of following four step .', 'In the first phase , a dictionary of traffic-related keywords is formed .', 'Secondly , real-time Twitter data has been collected using the dictionary of identified traffic related keywords .', 'In the third step , collected tweet have been pre-processed , and the feature generation model is applied to convert the dataset eligible for a machine learning classifier .', 'Further , a machine learning model is trained and tested to identify the tweet containing traffic incident .', 'The result of the study show that machine learning model built on top of right feature extraction strategy is very promising to identify the tweet containing traffic incident from micro-blogs .', '4th Future Technologies Conference , FTC 2019 .', 'The proceeding contain 73 paper .', 'The special focus in this conference is on Future Technologies .', 'The topic include : Efficient Bayesian Expert Models for Fever in Neutropenia and Fever in Neutropenia with Bacteremia ; preventing Overfitting by Training Derivatives ; machine Learning for the Identification and Classification of Key Phrases from Clinical Document in Spanish ; automatic Grasping Using Tactile Sensing and Deep Calibration ; an Emotion-Based Search Engine ; internet Meme : A Novel Approach to Distinguish Human and Bots for Authentication ; estimating the Ground Temperature Around Energy Piles Using Artificial Neural Networks ; emerging Technology of Man ’ s Life-Long Partnership with Artificial Intelligence ; making Food with the Mind : Integrating Brain-Computer Interface and 3D Food Fabrication ; AI Embedded Transparent Health and Medicine System ; neuroscience of Creativity in Human Computer Interaction ; optimal Mapping Function for Predictions of the Subjective Quality Evaluation Using Artificial Intelligence ; negative Log Likelihood Ratio Loss for Deep Neural Network Classification ; when Inclusion Means Smart City : Urban Planning Against Poverty ; AntiOD : A Smart City Initiative to Fight the Opioid Crisis ; common Data Format in Visual Assembling Guidance Using Augmented Reality ; determining a Framework for the Generation and Evaluation of Ambient Intelligent Agent System Designs ; virtual Reality Rendered Video Precognition with Deep Learning for Crowd Management ; Food , Energy and Water ( FEW ) Nexus Modeling Framework ; End-to-End Drive By-Wire PID Lateral Control of an Autonomous Vehicle ; image Segmentation Based on Cumulative Residual Entropy ; cryptography in Quantum Computing ; a Stealth Migration Approach to Moving Target Defense in Cloud Computing ; low Power High Performance Computing on Arm System-on-Chip in Astrophysics .', 'Automatic identification of the social function of area of interest ( AOIS ) using the standard hour-day-spectrum approach .', 'The social function of area of interest ( AOIs ) is crucial to the identification of urban functional zoning and land use classification , which has been a hot topic in various field such as urban planning and smart city field .', 'Most existing study on urban functional zoning and land use classification either largely rely on low-frequency remote sensing image , which are constrained to the block level due to their spatial scale limitation , or suffer from low accuracy and high uncertainty when using dynamic data , such as social medium and traffic data .', 'This paper proposes an hour-day-spectrum ( HDS ) approach for generating six type of distribution waveform of taxi pick-up and drop-off point which serve as interpretation indicator of the social function of AOIs .', 'To achieve this goal , we first performed fine-grained cleaning of the drop-off point to eliminate the spatial error caused by taxi driver .', 'Next , buffer and spatial clustering were integrated to explore the association between travel behavior and AOIs .', 'Third , the identification of AOI type was made by using the standard HDS method combined with the k-nearest neighbor ( KNN ) algorithm .', 'Finally , some matching test were carried out by similarity index of a standard HDS and sample HDS , i.e.', ', the Gaussian kernel function and Pearson coefficient , to ensure matching accuracy .', 'The experiment was conducted in the Chongchuan and Gangzha Districts , Nantong , Jiangsu Province , China .', 'By training 50 AOI sample , six type of standard HDS of residential district , school , hospital , and shopping mall were obtained .', 'Then , 108 AOI sample were tested , and the overall accuracy was found to be 90.74 % .', 'This approach generates value-added service of the taxi trajectory and provides a continuous update and fine-grained supplementary method for the identification of land use type .', 'In addition , the approach is object-oriented and based on AOIs , and can be combined with image interpretation and other method to improve the identification effect .', 'Utilizing Big Data for Enhancing Passenger Safety in Railway Stations .', 'In light of the increasing demand and capacity in the railway industry , it is imperative to maintain safety in relation to the complexity of the substantial railway station .', 'Thus , it is important to take note of the time where investment in new technology directed at the safety of the railway enable safety and protection in this area .', 'Novel technological technique such as big data analysis ( BDA ) , data mining or machine learning ( ML ) have been developed and applied in many area such as sale , banking and healthcare .', 'The development of such method has important benefit within the context of railway safety , however , these new method need to be implemented and developed with consideration of whether these operational model can help to solve the various difficulty that currently exist in the risk analysis of railway station .', 'Moreover , as the adoption of the Internet of thing ( IoT ) grows , it is expected that analytical need for handling data will also increase .', 'It has been shown that the progression towards automation and applying such innovative new technology such as BDA may be a powerful tool for integration in the future of transportation in general and the railway industry in particular , whereby analytical prediction can aid in the development of safer railway station which have greater potential for ensuring the safety of passenger .', 'In this paper a Bow Tie ( BT ) framework model has been created to combine BDA into the risk assessment process .', 'The BDA can be beneficial to the risk assessment , support the decision maker in real time , and reduce human error .', 'This method can be fully integrated into passenger data and the business model for the railway station .', 'Employing the existing safety record utilizing BDA is expected to mitigate risk , predict hazard , raise safety and security efficiency and reduce the cost .', 'Combining design pattern and topic modeling to discover region that support particular functionality .', 'The problem of discovering region that support particular functionality in an urban setting has been approached in literature using two general methodology : top-down , encoding expert knowledge on urban planning and design and discovering region that conform to that knowledge ; and bottom-up , using data to train machine learning model , which can discover similar region .', 'Both methodology face limitation , with knowledge-based approach being criticized for scalability and transferability issue and data-driven approach for lacking interpretability and depending heavily on data quality .', 'To mitigate these disadvantage , we propose a novel framework that fuses a knowledge-based approach using design pattern and a data-driven approach using latent Dirichlet allocation ( LDA ) topic modeling in three different way : Functional region discovered using either approach are evaluated against each other to identify case of significant agreement or disagreement ; knowledge from pattern is used to adjust topic probability in the learning model ; and topic probability are used to adjust pattern-based result .', 'The proposed methodology are demonstrated through the use case of identifying shopping-related region in the Los Angeles metropolitan area .', 'Result show that the combination of pattern-based discovery and topic modeling extraction helps uncover discrepancy between the two approach and smooth inaccuracy caused by the limitation of each approach .', 'Unveiling Topic from Scientific Literature on the Subject of Self-driving Cars using Latent Dirichlet Allocation .', 'Self-driving car are becoming popular topic in academia .', 'Consumer of self-driving car and vehicle have different concern , for example , safety and security , to name a few .', 'Also , the public sector has interest in self-driving car such as amending policy to enable the management of self-driving vehicle in city , urban planning , traffic management and , etc .', 'In this paper , more than 2700 corpus are extracted from literature from several subject area to identify latent ( hidden ) topic of self-driving car .', 'Latent Dirichlet Allocation ( LDA ) is used for topic identification .', 'The result of this study shows that topic identified are valid research area such as urban planning , driver car ( computer ) interaction , self-driving control and system design , ethic in self-driving car , safety and risk assessment , training dataset quality and machine learning in self-driving car are among the topic identified .', 'Furthermore , the network visualization of association graph of term show that the most frequently discussed concept reveal that control of self-driving car is based on algorithms , data , design , method , and model .', 'The method used in this study and the result can be used as decision tool , if carefully applied , in diverse discipline that are disrupted by the introduction of self-driving car .', 'For future study , we plan to extend this study with a larger dataset and other data mining technique .', 'Multi-GCN : Graph convolutional network for multi-view network , with application to global poverty .', 'With the rapid expansion of mobile phone network in developing country , large-scale graph machine learning has gained sudden relevance in the study of global poverty .', 'Recent application range from humanitarian response and poverty estimation to urban planning and epidemic containment .', 'Yet the vast majority of computational tool and algorithm used in these application do not account for the multi-view nature of social network : people are related in myriad way , but most graph learning model treat relation as binary .', 'In this paper , we develop a graph-based convolutional network for learning on multi-view network .', 'We show that this method outperforms state-of-the-art semi-supervised learning algorithms on three different prediction task using mobile phone datasets from three different developing country .', 'We also show that , while designed specifically for use in poverty research , the algorithm also outperforms existing benchmark on a broader set of learning task on multi-view network , including node labelling in citation network .', 'Mining large-scale human mobility data for long-term crime prediction .', 'Traditional crime prediction model based on census data are limited , as they fail to capture the complexity and dynamic of human activity .', 'With the rise of ubiquitous computing , there is the opportunity to improve such model with data that make for better proxy of human presence in city .', 'In this paper , we leverage large human mobility data to craft an extensive set of feature for crime prediction , as informed by theory in criminology and urban study .', 'We employ averaging and boosting ensemble technique from machine learning , to investigate their power in predicting yearly count for different type of crime occurring in New York City at census tract level .', 'Our study shows that spatial and spatio-temporal feature derived from Foursquare venue and checkins , subway ride , and taxi ride , improve the baseline model relying on census and POI data .', 'The proposed model achieve absolute R2 metric of up to 65 % ( on a geographical out-of-sample test set ) and up to 89 % ( on a temporal out-of-sample test set ) .', 'This proves that , next to the residential population of an area , the ambient population there is strongly predictive of the area ’ s crime level .', 'We deep-dive into the main crime category , and find that the predictive gain of the human dynamic feature varies across crime type : such feature bring the biggest boost in case of grand larceny , whereas assault are already well predicted by the census feature .', 'Furthermore , we identify and discuss top predictive feature for the main crime category .', 'These result offer valuable insight for those responsible for urban policy or law enforcement .', 'Data mining technique for smart mobility—a survey .', 'With the rapid increase in urbanization , there is essence for making urban area smart .', 'There are assorted field of computer science liable for development of a city to make it smart and intelligent .', 'Some of these field include data mining , sensor network , Internet of thing , web of thing , cloud computing technique and machine learning .', 'Smart city is an umbrella term that encompasses smart mobility , smart governance , smart planning , smart environment and others .', 'Smart mobility is one of the crucial aspect of smart city addressing efficient movement of people and good from one place to another .', 'This work is an extensive survey of research work related to application of data mining technique for smart mobility .', 'A comparative study of major work done in the aforementioned field is outlined in this paper .', 'Multiscale spatio-temporal data aggregation and mapping for urban data exploration .', 'Maps seem the most intuitive way to visualize massive urban data but they also raise some well-known graphical problem ( such as visual clutter , etc . )', '.', 'This paper focuses on processing massive spatiotemporal data in order to ease multi-scale exploration .', 'To this end , we describe a preprocessing tool that enables the automatic creation of a multi-resolution grid from a high resolution grid of spatio-temporal data in a format compatible with webmapping application ( vector tile ) .', 'The use of this tool is exemplified through a prototype that offers the possibility to navigate into a massive itinerary request dataset collected in the Ile-de- France region .', 'Data mining tourism pattern .', 'In this study we show how Call Detail Record ( CDR ) can be used to better understand the travel pattern of visitor .', 'We show how Origin-Destination ( OD ) Interactive Maps can provide transportation information through CDR .', 'We then use aggregation of CDR to show the difference between the travel pattern of visitor from different country and of different length of stay .', 'We also show that visitor move differently during event period and non-event period , reflecting the importance of real-time data available by CDR .', 'From CDR , we can gain more detailed and complete information about how tourist move compared to traditional survey , which can be used to aid smarter transportation system and urban resource planning .', 'Automated urban travel interpretation : A bottom-up approach for trajectory segmentation .', 'Understanding travel behavior is critical for an effective urban planning as well as for enabling various context-aware service provision to support mobility as a service ( MaaS ) .', 'Both application rely on the sensor trace generated by traveller ’ smartphones .', 'These trace can be used to interpret travel mode , both for generating automated travel diary as well as for real-time travel mode detection .', 'Current approach segment a trajectory by certain criterion , e.g.', ', drop in speed .', 'However , these criterion are heuristic , and , thus , existing approach are subjective and involve significant vagueness and uncertainty in activity transition in space and time .', 'Also , segmentation approach are not suited for real time interpretation of open-ended segment , and can not cope with the frequent gap in the location trace .', 'In order to address all these challenges a novel , state based bottom-up approach is proposed .', 'This approach assumes a fixed atomic segment of a homogeneous state , instead of an event-based segment , and a progressive iteration until a new state is found .', 'The research investigates how an atomic state-based approach can be developed in such a way that can work in real time , near-real time and offline mode and in different environmental condition with their varying quality of sensor trace .', 'The result show the proposed bottom-up model outperforms the existing event-based segmentation model in term of adaptivity , flexibility , accuracy and richness in information delivery pertinent to automated travel behavior interpretation .', 'Using abstraction to solve opportunistic crime security game at scale .', 'In this paper , we aim to deter urban crime by recommending optimal police patrol strategy against opportunistic criminal in large scale urban problem .', "While previous work has tried to learn criminal ' behavior from real world data and generate patrol strategy against opportunistic crime , it can not scale up to large-scale urban problem .", 'Our first contribution is a game abstraction framework that can handle opportunistic crime in large-scale urban area .', 'In this game abstraction framework , we model the interaction between officer and opportunistic criminal as a game with discrete target .', 'By merging similar target , we obtain an abstract game with fewer total target .', 'We use real world data to learn and plan against opportunistic criminal in this abstract game , and then propagate the result of this abstract game back to the original game .', 'Our second contribution is the layer-generating algorithm used to merge target as described in the framework above .', 'This algorithm applies a mixed integer linear program ( MILP ) to merge similar and geographically neighboring target in the large scale problem .', 'As our third contribution , we propose a planning algorithm that recommends a mixed strategy against opportunistic criminal .', 'Finally , our fourth contribution is a heuristic propagation model to handle the problem of limited data we occasionally encounter in large-scale problem .', 'As part of our collaboration with local police department , we apply our model in two large scale urban problem : a university campus and a city .', 'Our approach provides high prediction accuracy in the real datasets ; furthermore , we project significant crime rate reduction using our planning strategy compared to current police strategy .', 'European Conference on Machine Learning and Knowledge Discovery in Databases , ECML PKDD 2016 .', 'The proceeding contain 39 paper .', 'The special focus in this conference is on Demo Track Contributions , Industrial Track Contributions and Nectar Track Contributions .', 'The topic include : A tool for subjective and interactive visual data exploration ; a web-based visualization tool for biclustering of multivariate time series ; dynamic trafficmanagement using heterogeneous urban data ; coordinate transformation for characterization and cluster analysis of spatial configuration in football ; leveraging spatial abstraction in traffic analysis and forecasting with visual analytics ; the SPMF open-source data mining library version 2 ; dynamic attributed network with community structure generator ; real-time story tracking via social tag ; learning language model from image with ReGLL ; exploratory analysis of text collection through visualization and hybrid biclustering ; pattern-based mining of satellite image time series ; finding incident-related social medium message for emergency awareness ; exploratory monitoring of twitter stream for the 2016 U.S. presidential election cycle ; using social medium to promote STEM education ; a real time system for crowd flow prediction at metropolitan subway station ; finding dynamic co-evolving zone in spatial-temporal time series data ; ECG monitoring in wearable device by sparse model ; intelligent urban data monitoring for smart city ; automatic detection of non-biological artifact in ECGs acquired during cardiac computed tomography ; active learning with rationale for identifying operationally significant anomaly in aviation ; engine misfire detection with pervasive mobile audio ; a KDD process for discrimination discovery ; personality-based user modeling for music recommender system and resource-aware steel production through data mining .', 'A reasoning approach for modelling and predicting terroristic attack in urban environment .', 'During the last decade the world has witnessed a number of terroristic attack and security incident exposing numerous vulnerability of the urban environment .', 'Hence the ability to proactively detect and even predict potential threat related to terrorist attack is crucial for supporting government agency in order to timely react ( pro-act ) to potentially alarming terrorist attack .', 'The work described in this paper is part of an overall larger effort in developing a framework for early identification and prediction of terrorist action ( the PROACTIVE project-http : //www.fp7-proactive.eu/ ) .', 'The paper focuses on a near real-time reasoning layer designed around a number of reasoning capability for transforming raw and symbolic event into meaningful alert .', 'The reasoning layer was designed to process information source at different abstraction level ( e.g .', 'sensor information , police patrol input , external semantic crafted data source ) and simulates various expert user role indicated as crucial in the intelligence analyst work flow ( i.e .', 'operational , tactical and strategic user role ) .', 'Additionally a special focus was given to support functional requirement of the overall terrorist attack prediction system , as producing near real-time detection of threat event by relying on reliable model regarding terrorist action and predicting sensitive threat event .', 'Hence the overall designed build on top of approach as event driven architecture , complex event processing system , and machine learning technique .', 'A prototype implementation of layer is presented in a simulated validation scenario .', 'The prototype allows an expert user to monitor threat probability for different physical environment , and influence the sensitivity of these environment in real-time as well as and provide feedback for adapting the machine learning model .']

['Predicting and mapping neighborhood-scale health outcome : A machine learning approach .', 'Estimating health outcome at a neighborhood scale is important for promoting urban health , yet costly and time-consuming .', 'In this paper , we present a machine-learning-enabled approach to predicting the prevalence of six common non-communicable chronic disease at the census tract level .', 'We apply our approach to the City of Austin and show that our method can yield fairly accurate prediction .', 'In searching for the best predictive model , we experiment with eight different machine learning algorithms and 60 predictor variable that characterize the social environment , the physical environment , and the aspect and degree of neighborhood disorder .', "Our analysis suggests that ( a ) the sociodemographic and socioeconomic variable are the strongest predictor for tract-level health outcome and ( b ) the historical record of 311 service request can be a useful complementary data source as the information distilled from the 311 data often helps improve the model ' performance .", 'The machine learning model yielded from this study can help the public and city official evaluate future scenario and understand how change in the neighborhood condition can lead to change in the health outcome .', 'By analyzing where the most significant discrepancy between the predicted and the actual value are , we will also be ready to identify area of best practice and area in need of greater investment or policy intervention .', 'Using Social Media to Understand City-wide Movement Patterns and Behaviours .', 'Geospatially located social medium data is increasingly used to understand human behaviour .', 'This flow of social activity can offer a real time understanding of city and provide insight into many issue such as estimation of crowd size , urban planning or even criminal activity .', 'In this paper we combine a multitude of social medium data from diverse social medium platform to explore population movement pattern and activity in two major city in Australia ( Melbourne and Sydney ) .', 'We provide a framework for the identification of cluster of activity and explore different temporal pattern and compare them with historical average in order to distinguish anomalous activity .', 'We also utilize natural language processing of the geo-textual data as well as supervised machine learning to classify the use of location based on cluster of activity .', 'Collectively these analysis offer insight into urban human activity to provide a city pulse .', 'Automated classification of social network message into Smart Cities dimension .', 'A Smart City can be defined as a high-tech city with several public and private service capable to strategically solve ( or mitigate ) problem normally generated by rapid urbanization .', 'Different model of indicator have been developed to follow city ’ evolution to become a Smart City .', 'An example of such model is the standard 37120 from the International Organization for Standardization ( ISO ) that proposes a set of dimension and indicator ( e.g .', 'Transportation , Recreation , Solid Waste ) for service and quality of life for sustainable city and community .', 'It has been common to find official social network profile of organization and governmental entity related to the service they provide or are responsible for ( water , waste , transportation , cultural event , etc . )', 'and that are used by citizen as a gateway to directly interact and communicate their complains and problem about those service .', 'The present paper proposes to apply machine learning algorithms over the urban data generated by social network in order to create classifier to automatically categorize citizen message according to the different city service dimension .', 'For that , two distinct text datasets in Portuguese were collected from two social network : Twitter ( 1,950 tweet ) and Colab.re ( 65,066 post ) .', 'The texts were mapped according to the different ISO 37120 category , preprocessed and mined through the use of 8 algorithm implemented in Scikit-Learn .', 'Initial result pointed out the feasibility of the proposal with model achieving average F1-measures around 55 % for F1-macro and 78 % for F1-micro when using Linear Vector Classification , Logistic Regression , Decision Tree and Complement Naive Bayes .', 'However , as the datasets were highly unbalanced , the performance of the model vary significantly for each ISO category , with the best result occurring for Wastewater , Water & Sanitation , Energy and Transportation .', "The classifier generated here can be integrated on a number of different city service and system such as : governmental support decision system , customer complain system , community dashboard , police office , transportation 's company , cultural producer , environmental agency , and recyclers ’ company .", 'Region2vec : An Approach for Urban Land Use Detection by Fusing multiple Feature .', 'With the advancement of urbanization , urban land use detection has become a research hotspot .', 'Numerous method have been proposed to identify urban land use , in which point of interest ( POI ) data is widely used , and sometimes other data source like GPS trajectory is incorporated .', 'However , previous work have hardly fully utilized the global spatial information contained in the POI data , or ignored correlation between feature when integrating multiple data source , so resulting in information loss .', 'In this study , we propose an integrated framework titled Region2vec to detect urban land use type by combining POI and mobile phone data .', 'First , POI-based region embeddings are generated by applying Glove model and LDA model to mine the global spatial information and land use topic distribution respectively .', 'The mobile phone data is utilized to generate human activity pattern-based embeddings .', 'Then a similarity matrix is constructed according to POI-based and activity pattern-based embeddings .', 'Finally , the similarity measure are regarded as clustering feature to extract the urban land use result .', 'Experiment are implemented and compared with other urban land use algorithm based on data in Sanya , China .', 'The result demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed framework .', 'This research can provide effective information support for urban planning .', 'Kadaster knowledge graph : Beyond the fifth star of open data .', 'After more than a decade , the supply-driven approach to publishing public ( open ) data has resulted in an ever-growing number of data silo .', 'Hundred of thousand of datasets have been catalogued and can be accessed at data portal at different administrative level .', 'However , usually , user do not think in term of datasets when they search for information .', 'Instead , they are interested in information that is most likely scattered across several datasets .', 'In the world of proprietary incompany data , organization invest heavily in connecting data in knowledge graphs and/or store data in data lake with the intention of having an integrated view of the data for analysis .', 'With the rise of machine learning , it is a common belief that government can improve their service , for example , by allowing citizen to get answer related to government information from virtual assistant like Alexa or Siri .', 'To provide high-quality answer , these system need to be fed with knowledge graphs .', 'In this paper , we share our experience of constructing and using the first open government knowledge graph in the Netherlands .', 'Based on the developed demonstrator , we elaborate on the value of having such a graph and demonstrate its use in the context of improved data browsing , multicriteria analysis for urban planning , and the development of location-aware chat bot .', 'Mining heterogeneous urban data for retail store placement .', 'Retail store placement problem has been extensively studied in both academic and industry as it decides the retail success of a business .', 'Existing method exploited either consumer study ( e.g.', ', consultant-based solution ) or geographic feature ( e.g.', ', point of interest ) to settle it .', 'However , due to the limitation of data source ( i.e.', ', costly in time and labor ) , none of these method could provide an accurate and timely solution .', 'In this paper , we rethink retail store placement problem by mining heterogeneous urban data .', 'In particular , unlike existing work which only used geographic feature or consumer study solely , we extract three category of feature ( i.e.', ', human movement feature , commercial area feature and geographic feature ) from heterogeneous urban data , and integrate them into various machine learning model to predict the popularity of a prospective retail store in the candidate area .', 'We conduct a case study with real data in Shenzhen to demonstrate the predictive power of our proposal .', 'Nonnegative coupled matrix tensor factorization for smart city spatiotemporal pattern mining .', 'With the advancement in smartphones and inbuilt sensor , the day-to-day spatiotemporal activity of people can be recorded .', 'With this available information , the automated extraction of spatiotemporal pattern is crucial to understand the people ’ s mobility .', 'These pattern can assist in improving the smart city environment like traffic control , urban planning , and transportation facility .', 'The smartphone generated spatiotemporal data is enriched with multiple contexts and efficiently utilizing them in a Machine Learning process is still a challenging task .', 'In this paper , we propose a Nonnegative Coupled Matrix Tensor Factorization ( CMTF ) model to integrate and analyze additional contexts with spatiotemporal data to generate meaningful pattern .', 'We also propose an efficient factorization algorithm based on variable selection to solve the Nonnegative CMTF model that yields accurate spatiotemporal pattern .', 'Our empirical analysis highlight the efficiency of the proposed CMTF model in term of accuracy and factor goodness .', 'Analyzing Objective and Subjective Data in Social Sciences : Implication for Smart Cities .', 'The ease of deployment of digital technology and the Internet of Things gives us the opportunity to carry out large-scale social study and to collect vast amount of data from our city .', 'In this paper , we investigate a novel way of analyzing data from social science study by employing machine learning and data science technique .', 'This enables us to maximize the insight gained from this type of study by fusing both objective ( sensor information ) and subjective data ( direct input from the user ) .', 'The pilot study is concerned with better understanding the interaction between citizen and urban green space .', 'A field experiment was carried out in Sheffield , U.K. , involving 1870 participant for two different time period ( 7 and 30 day ) .', 'With the help of a smartphone app , both objective and subjective data were collected .', 'Location tracking was recorded as people entered any of the publicly accessible green space .', 'This was complemented by textual and photographic information that user could insert spontaneously or when prompted ( when entering a green space ) .', 'By employing data science and machine learning technique , we identify the main feature observed by the citizen through both text and image .', 'Furthermore , we analyze the time spent by people in park as well as the top interaction area .', 'This paper allows us to gain an overview of certain pattern and the behavior of the citizen within their surroundings and it proves the capability of integrating technology into large-scale social study .', 'Where to go and what to do : Extracting leisure activity potential from Web data on urban space .', 'Web data is the most prominent source of information for deciding where to go and what to do .', 'Exploiting this source for geographic analysis , however , does not come without difficulty .', 'First , in recent year , the amount and diversity of available Web information about urban space have exploded , and it is therefore increasingly difficult to overview and exploit .', 'Second , the bulk of information is in an unstructured form which is difficult to process and interpret by computer .', 'Third , semi-structured source , such as Web ranking , geolocated tag , check-in , or mobile sensor data , do not fully reflect the more subtle quality of a place , including the particular function that make it attractive .', 'In this article , we explore a method to capture leisure activity potential from Web data on urban space using semantic topic model .', 'We test three supervised multi-label machine learning strategy exploiting geolocated webtexts and place tag to estimate whether a given type of leisure activity is afforded or not .', 'We train and validate these model on a manually curated dataset labeled with leisure ontology class for the city of Zwolle , and discuss their potential for urban leisure and tourism research and related city policy and planning .', 'We found that multi-label affordance estimation is not straightforward but can be made to work using both official webtexts and user-generated content on a medium semantic level .', 'This opens up new opportunity for data-driven approach to urban leisure and tourism study .', 'Why do people move ?', 'Enhancing human mobility prediction using local function based on public record and SNS data .', 'The quality of life for people in urban region can be improved by predicting urban human mobility and adjusting urban planning accordingly .', 'In this study , we compared several possible variable to verify whether a gravity model ( a human mobility prediction model borrowed from Newtonian mechanic ) worked as well in inner-city region as it did in intra-city region .', 'We reviewed the resident population , the number of employee , and the number of SNS post as variable for generating mass value for an urban traffic gravity model .', 'We also compared the straight-line distance , travel distance , and the impact of time as possible distance value .', 'We defined the function of urban region on the basis of public record and SNS data to reflect the diverse social factor in urban region .', 'In this process , we conducted a dimension reduction method for the public record data and used a machine learning-based clustering algorithm for the SNS data .', 'In doing so , we found that functional distance could be defined as the Euclidean distance between social function vector in urban region .', 'Finally , we examined whether the functional distance was a variable that had a significant impact on urban human mobility .', 'This is an open access article distributed under the term of the Creative Commons Attribution License , which permits unrestricted use , distribution , and reproduction in any medium , provided the original author and source are credited .', 'Ballparking the Urban placeness : A case study of analyzing starbucks post on instagram .', 'Placeness or the “ sense of a place ” plays a vital role in urban design and planning .', 'Research on placeness in the past has been conducted via conventional method like survey to reveal essential insight for urban planner and architect .', 'For taking a glimpse into placeness by analyzing common factor across geography , we choose Instagram post from Starbucks as a case study , owing to its the-next-door coffee shop psychological construct .', 'We conduct our research by first adopting a flexible ontological framework to organize the concept governing placeness .', 'Next , we curate a dataset of community generated Instagram post from Starbucks in three major metropolitan city of the world : New York , Seoul , and Tokyo .', 'The curated dataset is then automatically enriched with contextual attribute such as activity , visitor demographic , and time via machine learning technique .', 'We finally analyze and validate the quantitative variation in contextual information with finding from well-accepted cross-cultural case study .', 'Our result show that placeness mined from Starbucks , a prominent urban third-place , can be reliably utilized to discover surrounding urban placeness .', 'Structure of 311 service request as a signature of urban location .', 'While urban system demonstrate high spatial heterogeneity , many urban planning , economic and political decision heavily rely on a deep understanding of local neighborhood contexts .', 'We show that the structure of 311 Service Requests enables one possible way of building a unique signature of the local urban context , thus being able to serve as a low-cost decision support tool for urban stakeholder .', 'Considering example of New York City , Boston and Chicago , we demonstrate how 311 Service Request recorded and categorized by type in each neighborhood can be utilized to generate a meaningful classification of location across the city , based on distinctive socioeconomic profile .', 'Moreover , the 311-based classification of urban neighborhood can present sufficient information to model various socioeconomic feature .', 'Finally , we show that these characteristic are capable of predicting future trend in comparative local real estate price .', 'We demonstrate 311 Service Requests data can be used to monitor and predict socioeconomic performance of urban neighborhood , allowing urban stakeholder to quantify the impact of their intervention .', 'This is an open access article distributed under the term of the Creative Commons Attribution License , which permits unrestricted use , distribution , and reproduction in any medium , provided the original author and source are credited .', 'Transparency in practice : Using visualization to enhance the interpretability of open data .', 'Urban data is gradually being opened to the public .', 'Tool for exploitation , analysis and discovery of new knowledge in large data set are the key to enable citizen to make sense of such large amount of data .', 'The purpose of this work is to analyze how data analysis associated with visualization technique in different level can lead to the improvement of the interpretability of open data .', 'With the support of machine learning technique , these visualization may improve pattern identification in urban data set .', 'To guide our discussion , a case study was conducted analyzing socioeconomic data released by the Chicago city government .', 'We discussed the use of different visualization in this scenario , tailored for univariate , bivariate and multivariate analysis .', 'We also performed an evaluation of the different form of visualization proposed in this work .', 'We could observe that allowing the user to explore open urban data using some specific visualization may lead to more effective data interpretation .', 'How should urban planner be trained to handle big data ?', '.', 'Historically urban planner have been educated and trained to work in a data poor environment .', 'Urban planning student take course in statistic , survey research and projection and estimation that are designed to fill in the gap in this environment .', 'For decade they have learned how to use census data , which is comprehensive on several basic variable , but is only conducted once per decade so is almost always out of date .', 'More detailed population characteristic are based on a sample and are only available in aggregated form for larger geographic area .', 'But new data source , including distributed sensor , infrastructure monitoring , remote sensing , social medium and cell phone tracking record , can provide much more detailed , individual , real time data at disaggregated level that can be used at a variety of scale .', 'We have entered a data rich environment , where we can have data on system and behavior for more frequent time increment and with a greater number of observation on a greater number of factor ( The Age of Big Data , The New York Times , 2012 ; Now you see it : simple visualization technique for quantitative analysis , Berkeley , 2009 ) .', 'Planner are still being trained in method that are suitable for a data poor environment ( J Plan Educ Res 6:10–21 , 1986 ; Analytics over large-scale multidimensional data : the big data revolution !', ', 101–104 , 2011 ; J Plan Educ Res 15:17–33 , 1995 ) .', 'In this paper we suggest that visualization , simulation , data mining and machine learning are the appropriate tool to use in this new environment and we discuss how planning education can adapt to this new data rich landscape .', 'We will discuss how these method can be integrated into the planning curriculum as well as planning practice .', '1st Asia-Pacific Web and Web-Age Information Management Joint Conference on Web and Big Data , conference is on Web and Web-Age Information Management .', 'The topic include : Smooth representation clustering based on kernelized random walk ; a joint model for water scarcity evaluation ;
