based on submodular ; collaborative heterogeneous information embedding for recommender system and comparative research for social recommendation on VK .', 'Characterization of behavioral pattern exploiting description of geographical area .', 'The enormous amount of recently available mobile phone data is providing unprecedented direct measurement of human behavior .', 'Early recognition and prediction of behavioral pattern are of great importance in many societal application like urban planning , transportation optimization , and health-care .', 'Understanding the relationship between human behavior and location ’ s context is an emerging interest for understanding human-environmental dynamic .', 'Growing availability of Web 2.0 , i.e .', 'the increasing amount of website with mainly user created content and social platform opens up an opportunity to study such location ’ s contexts .', 'This paper investigates relationship existing between human behavior and location context , by analyzing log mobile phone data record .', 'First an advanced approach to categorize area in a city based on the presence and distribution of category of human activity ( e.g.', ', eating , working , and shopping ) found across the area , is proposed .', 'The proposed classification is then evaluated through its comparison with the pattern of temporal variation of mobile phone activity and applying machine learning technique to predict a timeline type of communication activity in a given location based on the knowledge of the obtained category vs. land-use type of the location area .', 'The proposed classification turns out to be more consistent with the temporal variation of human communication activity , being a better predictor for those compared to the official land use classification .', 'A business zone recommender system based on facebook and urban planning data .', 'We present ZoneRec-a zone recommendation system for physical business in an urban city , which uses both public business data from Facebook and urban planning data .', 'The system consists of machine learning algorithms that take in a business ’ metadata and outputs a list of recommended zone to establish the business in .', 'We evaluate our system using data of food business in Singapore and assess the contribution of different feature group to the recommendation quality .', 'Cyber City : Social Media as a Tool for Understanding City .', '‘ Big ’ urban data are increasingly becoming accessible for scientific research and policy use .', 'They may enhance the intelligence that is needed for understanding and mapping out social connectivity phenomena ( in the sense of Jane Jacobs ) in modern smart city .', 'The present paper aims to highlight and demonstrate the rich potential of information based on digital technology in modern city .', 'As a case study example of the power of social medium data as a support tool in smart city , we consider Twitter data in the municipality of Amsterdam .', 'We use machine learning technique to identify temporal pattern that we then relate back to their spatial dimension , effectively connecting the digital with physical aspect of city .', 'We also show that analysis of geo-referenced tweet can shed significant light on physical aspect of the city and on the spatial distribution of urban function .', '2nd International Workshop on Mining Urban Data ( Preface ) .', 'This paper presents an overview of the second International Workshop on Mining Urban Data ( MUD2 ) .', 'The MUD2 workshop was held in conjunction with the 32nd International Conference on Machine Learning ( ICML 2015 ) in Lille , France , July 11 , 2015 .', 'Predictive analytics can facilitate proactive property vacancy policy for city .', 'Is it possible for a city to understand , analyze , predict , and therefore prevent vacant property ?', 'In this paper , we demonstrate the feasibility of using technique from machine learning and data mining to determine the future vacancy risk for individual property and for neighborhood using a variety of structural , demographic , socioeconomic , and city activity features with high accuracy .', "Within a larger systems-of-systems framework that we develop , these predictive analytics will allow a city to move from decision-making based on 'educated anecdote ' and reactive strategy aimed at the most urgent need , to policy development based on informed , holistic insight and proactive intervention that prevent and reverse decline .", 'A demonstration of the use of predictive analytics within the sociotechnical system is provided using data from Syracuse , New York .', 'Temporal decomposition and semantic enrichment of mobility flow .', 'Mobility data has increasingly grown in volume over the past decade as localisation technology for capturing mobility flow have become ubiquitous .', 'Novel analytical approach for understanding and structuring mobility data are now required to support the backend of a new generation of space-time GIS system .', 'It is increasingly important as GIS is becoming a decision support platform for operation in fleet management , urban data analysis and related application .', 'This paper applies the machine learning method of probabilistic topic modelling for semantic enrichment of mobility data recorded in term of trip count by using geo-referenced social medium data .', 'It further explores the question of causality and correlation , as well as predictability of the obtained semantic decomposition of mobility flow on a real dataset from a bike sharing network .', 'Exploiting foursquare and cellular data to infer user activity in urban environment .', 'Inferring the type of activity in neighborhood of urban center may be helpful in a number of contexts including urban planning , content delivery and activity recommendation for mobile web user or may even yield to a deeper understanding of the geographical evolution of social life in the city .', 'During the past few year , the analysis of mobile phone usage pattern , or of social medium with longitudinal attribute , have aided the automatic characterization of the dynamic of the urban environment .', 'In this work , we combine a dataset sourced from a telecommunication provider in Spain with a database of million of geo-tagged venue from Foursquare and we formulate the problem of urban activity inference in a supervised learning framework .', 'In particular , we exploit user communication pattern observed at the base station level in order to predict the activity of Foursquare user who checkin-in at nearby venue .', 'First , we mine a set of machine learning feature that allow us to encode the input telecommunication signal of a tower .', 'Subsequently , we evaluate a diverse set of supervised learning algorithms using label extracted from Foursquare place category and we consider two application scenario .', 'Initially , we assess how hard it is to predict specific urban activity of an area , showing that Nightlife and Entertainment spot are those easier to infer , whereas College and Shopping area are those featuring the lowest accuracy rate .', 'Then , considering a candidate set of activity type in a geographic area , we aim to elect the most prominent one .', 'We demonstrate how the difficulty of the problem increases with the number of class incorporated in the prediction task , yet the classifier achieve a considerably better performance compared to a random guess even when the set of candidate class increases .', 'Automated urban location annotation on mobile record .', 'Location information is becoming much more important than ever before , especially in mobile service .', 'Being widespread , less cost of energy and almost free for collecting data make mobile phone a perfect location sensor probe .', 'Meaningful location name rather than digital coordinate could provide much more valuable information .', "In this paper , we develop a location semantic predicting method referred to Location Annotation ( LA ) which can automatically annotate meaningful base station of phone user with semantic tag such as 'home ' , 'work place ' and 'club ' .", 'We extract several explicit feature from phone record and spatial-temporal pattern of mobile phone user to build an annotation model based on Maximum Entropy Model .', 'Then a machine learning method is presented to estimate the best configuration of parameter in the model .', 'Finally , comprehensive experiment demonstrate good performance of our method .', 'Overall accuracy is about 90 % which outperforms simple and traditional classification method by 10+ % .', 'Semantic location name are valuable to urban planning and optimization , transportation management and land use planning .', 'Urban computing and smart city : Opportunity and challenge in modelling large-scale aggregated human behavior .', 'City-wide urban infrastructure are increasingly reliant on networked technology to improve and expand their service .', 'As a side effect of this digitalization , large amount of data -digital footprints- can be sensed and analyzed to uncover pattern of human urban behavior and to augment the city experience of its citizen .', 'In my talk , I will introduce the main concept , opportunity and challenge in the emerging area of urban computing/smart city , which focuses on improving the quality of life of an urban environment by understanding the city dynamic through the data provided by ubiquitous technology .', 'This is a human-centric , data-rich area that spans multiple discipline , including sociology , computer science and urban planning .', 'From a computer science perspective , there are challenge in a variety of domain , including data visualization , storage , security , privacy , machine learning , data mining and pattern recognition .', 'Some of the application of smart city include traffic forecasting , modeling of the spread of biological virus , urban and transportation design and location-based service .']

['A Support Vector Machine Implementation for Traffic Assignment Problem .', 'Simulating urban mobility scenario is a useful tool for researcher in multiple field like Urban Planning , Traffic Optimization , CO $ ^2 $ Emission Analysis , Performance Evaluation of Protocols for Connected Vehicles , among others .', 'SUMO handles microscopic traffic simulation and allows communication to Python language through an API which is also shared by VEINS .', 'This communication channel lets researcher interact with the simulation on-live , facilitating the implementation of state-of-the-art algorithms from Machine Learning ( ML ) and Artificial Intelligence ( AI ) .', 'On the other hand , OMNeT++ is a framework to manage and analyze communication protocol of mobile network .', 'We experimentally evaluated the training of a Support Vector Machine ( SVM ) in the SUMO-VEINS-OMNeT++ framework .', 'Our experiment show the best classification model for a particular traffic light assignment scenario .', 'The Application of Virtual Reality Technology on Intelligent Traffic Construction and Decision Support in Smart Cities .', 'The core of smart city is to build intelligent transportation system .', 'An intelligent transportation system can analyze the traffic data with time and space characteristic in the city and acquire rich and valuable knowledge , and it is of great significance to realize intelligent traffic scheduling and urban planning .', 'This article specifically introduces the extensive application of urban transportation infrastructure data in the construction and development of smart city .', 'This article first explains the related concept of big data and intelligent transportation system and uses big data to illustrate the operation of intelligent transportation system in the construction of smart city .', 'Based on the machine learning and deep learning method , this paper is aimed at the passenger flow and traffic flow in the smart city transportation system .', 'This paper deeply excavates the time , space , and other hidden feature .', 'In this paper , the traffic volume of the random section in the city is predicted by using the graph convolutional neural network ( GCNN ) model , and the data are compared with the other five model ( VAR , FNN , GCGRU , STGCN , and DGCNN ) .', 'The experimental result show that compared with the other 4 model , the GCNN model has an increase of 8 % to 10 % accuracy and 15 % fault tolerance .', 'In forecasting morning and evening peak traffic flow , the accuracy of the GCNN model is higher than that of other model , and its trend is basically consistent with the actual traffic volume , the predicted result can reflect the actual traffic flow data well .', 'Aimed at the application of intelligent transportation in an intelligent city , this paper proposes a machine learning prediction model based on big data , and this is of great significance for studying the mechanical learning of such problem .', 'Therefore , the research of this paper has a good implementation prospect and academic value .', 'Dynamic spatial-temporal feature optimization with ERI big data for Short-term traffic flow prediction .', 'Accurate short-term traffic flow prediction is an important basis of intelligent transportation system ( ITS ) such as transportation operation and urban planning application .', 'However , due to the lack of complete directly measured data on urban traffic flow , existing study can not adequately mine the dynamic spatial-temporal correlation characterizing traffic flow in urban road network .', 'Electronic registration identification ( ERI ) , which is an emerging technology for uniquely identifying a vehicle , can help collect the travel record of all vehicle .', 'This inspires us to employ ERI big data for traffic flow prediction .', 'In this paper , we propose a dynamic spatial-temporal feature optimization method with ERI big data for short-term traffic flow prediction based on a gradient–boosted regression tree , called DSTO-GBRT .', 'Firstly , the framework of DSTO-GBRT is built .', 'Secondly , we analyze the dynamic spatial-temporal correlation among the current prediction point and upstream correlative point using the Pearson correlation coefficient ( PCC ) .', 'Thirdly , to eliminate the linear correlation among feature , we exploit principal component analysis ( PCA ) to optimize the original training data and obtain optimized training data .', 'In the experiment , real-world ERI big data from Chongqing are employed for the proposed DSTO-GBRT method .', 'Compared with ST-GBRT , ARIMA , DSTO-BPNN and DSTO-SVM , the result demonstrate that DSTO-GBRT can provide timely and adaptive prediction even in rush hour , when traffic condition change rapidly .', 'Furthermore , compared with DSO-GBRT and DTO-GBRT , the result show that the proposed DSTO-GBRT method is more accurate .', 'Taxi Demand Prediction using an LSTM-Based Deep Sequence Model and Point of Interest .', 'Nowadays , urban mobility plays an important role in modern city for city planning , navigation , and other mobility service .', 'Taxicab are vital public service in large city that are taken by passenger thousand of time every day .', "Reducing the number of vacant vehicle on the street will help service provider to raise driver ' income , reduce energy consumption , optimize traffic efficiency , and control air pollution problem in large city .", 'Since driver do not have enough information about the location of passenger and other taxis , most of them might drive to the same area .', 'Due to the lack of passenger information , they often end up without picking up any passenger while there are highly demanded area in their neighborhood .', 'To address these issue , machine learning technique can be applied to analyze mobility data acquired from the IoT sensor and help company to organize the taxi fleet or minimize the wait-time for both passenger and driver in the city .', 'In this paper , an LSTM-based deep sequence learning model is applied to forecast taxi-demand in a particular urban area in a smart city .', 'For this purpose , point of interest ( POIs ) in the city are extracted from Google Maps and integrated with the mobility data source .', 'Given a real-world dataset and two evaluation metric , we observed that taxi-demand in each urban area can be influenced by external factor such as neighborhood location and the POIs located in that area .', 'The result show that the proposed method outperforms the vanilla LSTM model and has less average error than baseline method in term of the Mean Squared Error ( MSE ) and Symmetric Mean Absolute Percentage Error ( SMAPE ) .', 'Spatiotemporal Variation of Taxi Demand .', 'The growth of urban area has made taxi service become increasingly more popular due to its ubiquity and flexibility when compared with , more rigid , public transportation mode .', 'However , in big city taxi service is still unbalanced , resulting in inefficiency such as long waiting time and excessive vacant trip .', 'This paper presents an exploratory taxi fleet service analysis and compares two forecast model aimed at predicting the spatiotemporal variation of short-term taxi demand .', "For this paper , we used a large sample with more than 1 million trip between 2014 and 2017 , representing roughly 10 % of Lisbon 's fleet .", 'We analysed the spatiotemporal variation between pick-up and drop-off location and how they are affected by weather condition and point of interest .', 'More , based on historic data , we built two model to predict the demand , ARIMA and Artificial Neural Network ( ANN ) , and evaluated and compared the performance of both model .', 'This study not only allows the direct comparison of a linear statistical model with a machine learning one , but also leads to a better comprehension of complex interaction surrounding different urban data source using the taxi service as a probe to better understand urban mobility-on-demand and its need .', 'Published by Elsevier B.V .', 'A comparison of machine learning method for the prediction of traffic speed in Urban place .', 'Rising interest in the field of Intelligent Transportation Systems combined with the increased availability of collected data allows the study of different method for prevention of traffic congestion in city .', 'A common need in all of these method is the use of traffic prediction for supporting planning and operation of the traffic light and traffic management scheme .', 'This paper focuses on comparing the forecasting effectiveness of three machine learning model , namely Random Forest , Support Vector Regression , and Multilayer Perceptron-in addition to Multiple Linear Regression-using probe data collected from the road network of Thessaloniki , Greece .', 'The comparison was conducted with multiple test clustered in three type of scenario .', 'The first scenario tests the algorithms on specific randomly selected date on different randomly selected road .', 'The second scenario tests the algorithms on randomly selected road over eight consecutive 15 min interval ; the third scenario tests the algorithms on random road for the duration of a whole day .', 'The experimental result show that while the Support Vector Regression model performs best at stable condition with minor variation , the Multilayer Perceptron model adapts better to circumstance with greater variation , in addition to having the most near-zero error .', 'ADMSv2 : A modern architecture for transportation data management and analysis .', 'This paper presents ADMSv2 , an end-to-end data-driven system that enables real-time and historical data analytics and machine learning task over big , streaming , spatiotemporal data .', 'ADMSv2 employs a unified multi-layered architecture that integrates several open-source framework to collect , store , manage , and analyze a variety of data source , including massive traffic sensor data , bus trajectory data , transportation network data , and traffic incident data .', 'ADMSv2 enables numerous application in intelligent transportation , urban planning , public policy , and emergency response , all of which are critical for city resilience .', 'Here , we demonstrate three application scenario running on top of ADMSv2 to showcase the efficiency of its capability of query processing on real-world streaming and historical data as well as real-time data analysis using deep learning for traffic forecasting .', 'Data-driven next destination prediction and ETA improvement for urban delivery fleet .', 'In an urban logistics system , prediction of the next destination and estimated time of arrival ( ETA ) are of paramount importance for efficient resource planning of delivery fleet and for providing a satisfactory client experience .', 'The quality of prediction is limited by the information accessible to individual logistics business entity , and further complicated by the complex urban road system .', 'Data collection under the auspex of smart city initiative worldwide provides exciting new opportunity to overcome these limitation .', "In this study , the author identify two area of improvement through data-driven approach , including a next destination predictor , based on the delivery fleet 's historical global positioning system trajectory data using a non-linear autoregressive neural network , and a road incident detector for real-time ETA improvement .", 'By comparing a range of machine learning classification algorithms for incident detection , XGBoost has been found to be the most practical choice , due to its performance and efficiency .', 'The proposed framework can be utilised by government authority who possess such data for better urban planning and providing advanced infrastructure , so as to improve the operational efficiency of the logistics industry .', 'Trajectory clustering of road traffic in urban environment using incremental machine learning in combination with hyperdimensional computing .', 'Road traffic congestion in urban environment poses an increasingly complex challenge of detection , profiling and prediction .', 'Although public policy promotes transport alternative and new infrastructure , traffic congestion is highly prevalent and continues to be the lead cause for numerous social , economic and environmental issue .', 'Although a significant volume of research has been reported on road traffic prediction , profiling of traffic has received much less attention .', 'In this paper we address two key problem in traffic profiling by proposing a novel unsupervised incremental learning approach for road traffic congestion detection and profiling , dynamically over time .', 'This approach uses ( a ) hyperdimensional computing to enable capture variable-length trajectory of commuter trip represented as vehicular movement across intersection , and ( b ) transforms these into feature vector that can be incrementally learned over time by the Incremental Knowledge Acquiring Self-Learning ( IKASL ) algorithm .', 'The proposed approach was tested and evaluated on a dataset consisting of approximately 190 million vehicular movement record obtained from 1,400 Bluetooth identifier placed at the intersection of the arterial road network in the State of Victoria , Australia .', 'Enhanced urban clustering in VANETs using online machine learning .', 'Clustering in Vehicular Ad-Hoc Networks ( VANETs ) is essential to mitigate different challenge and meet the required quality of communication .', 'However , most of the available clustering protocol were designed for highway , and thus become unstable in realistic urban environment with many intersection .', 'In this paper , a Clustering Adaptation Near Intersection ( CANI ) approach is proposed to ensure clustering stability at intersection .', 'This approach exploits Online Sequential Extreme Learning Machine ( OS-ELM ) to predict the behavior of the vehicle near an intersection and adapt the cluster accordingly .', 'The main advantage of the developed OS-ELM prediction model is its ability to continuously learn and update in real time .', 'After being validated , the proposed adaptation approach is included in a highway clustering scheme .', 'The resultant clustering protocol is compared to other scheme in a realistic urban environment , and shows significant stability and efficiency performance improvement .', 'Attention based stack resnet for citywide traffic accident prediction .', 'The fine-grained citywide traffic accident prediction is of great significance for urban traffic management .', 'Existing approach mainly apply classic machine learning method based on historical accident record .', 'Thus they failed to involve the cross-domain data , which contains spatial and temporal dependency .', 'Recently , with more cross-domain urban data available , leveraging the cross-domain data by deep learning algorithms to predict fine-grained accident becomes possible , we propose an attention based ResNet framework to model the sophisticated correlation between urban data .', 'Toward Transportation Mode Recognition Using Deep Convolutional and Long Short-Term Memory Recurrent Neural Networks .', 'With the rapid development of mobile Internet technique , using the sensor-rich smartphones to sense various contexts attracts much attention , such as transportation mode recognition .', 'The transportation mode information can help to improve urban planning , traffic management and journey planning .', 'Though much work has been done on the transportation mode recognition using classic machine learning algorithms , the performance of these method is not reasonable and heavily relies on the effectiveness of handcrafted feature .', 'In this paper , we leverage the strong representation ability of deep learning method and present a deep-learning-based algorithm for transportation mode recognition , namely CL-TRANSMODE , which is capable of accurately detecting multiple transportation mode .', 'The algorithm first uses a convolutional neural network ( CNN ) to learn appropriate and robust feature representation for transportation mode recognition .', 'Then , an LSTM network performs a further learning of the temporal dependency characteristic on the feature vector of CNN output .', 'To further enhance the accuracy of transportation mode recognition , several artificial segment and peak feature are extracted from the raw sensor measurement .', 'These feature characterize the transportation modes over a much long period of time ( minute or hour ) .', 'By combining the CNN-extracted feature and handcrafted feature , our proposed CL-TRANSMODE transportation mode recognition algorithm can accurately differentiate eight transportation mode , i.e.', ', walking , running , bicycling , driving a car , riding a bus , taking a metro , taking a train , or being stationary .', 'Extensive experiment on both the SHL and HTC datasets demonstrate that use our proposed CL-TRANSMODE transportation mode recognition algorithm which outperforms the state-of-the-art comparative algorithms .', 'On the SHL dataset , which contain barometric data , the accuracy using the CL-TRANSMODE algorithm can reaches 98.1 % .', 'Smart mobile crowdsensing with urban vehicle : A deep reinforcement learning perspective .', 'Mobile crowdsensing ( MCS ) is a promising sensing paradigm based on the mobile node which provides the solution with cost-effectiveness to perform urban data collection .', 'To monitor the urban environment and facilitate the municipal administration , more and more application adopt vehicle as participant to carry out MCS task .', 'The performance of the application highly depends on the sensing data which is influenced by the recruiting strategy on vehicle .', 'In this paper , we propose a novel vehicle selection algorithm to maximize the sensing range with limited cost while the vehicle selection problem was proved to be NP-complete .', 'Specifically , we modeled the interaction between MCS server and candidate vehicle as a Markov decision process and formulated the maximum spatial temporal coverage ( STC ) optimization as a deep reinforcement learning process .', 'The performance of our deep reinforcement learning-based vehicle selection ( i.e.', ', DRLVS ) algorithm is evaluated with real trajectory dataset .', 'The numerical result indicates that the proposed algorithm achieves an optimal solution and maximizes the STC .', 'Highway traffic volume prediction via stacking KNN , SVR , MLP , RNN .', 'Highway traffic volume prediction is critical for urban planning and relieving traffic stress .', 'In recent year , many research have been focusing on it by using machine learning algorithm .', 'However , different prediction methodology are required for different evaluation metric and the prediction performance of single machine learning model is limited .', 'In this paper , we present our model which are respectively inspired from KNN , SVR , MLP and RNN , to predict highway traffic volume , aiming at different evaluation metric .', 'Based on the revised model , model stacking is used which can boost predictive accuracy by combining the prediction of multiple machine learning model .', 'The experiment show that , when the metric are specified , the revised model outperform the traditional one .', 'Moreover , one single model is not always superior to the others and each of them can have encouraging result in certain condition .', 'By stacking these model , significant improvement can be achieved .', 'Detecting Transportation Modes Based on LightGBM Classifier from GPS Trajectory Data .', 'Human travel behavior can be obtained from the trajectory data generated by GPS device , which can be reflected in different transportation mode and provide useful information for trajectory prediction , urban planning and traffic monitoring .', 'In this article , we proposed transportation mode classification method based on Light Gradient Boosting Machine ( LightGBM ) to discover seven kind of transportation mode from GPS trajectory data , including walking , cycling , taking a bus , taking a taxi , driving a car , taking the subway and taking a train .', 'First , the original trajectory must be divided into some sub trajectory .', 'There is only one transportation mode label in each sub trajectory .', 'Second , the feature vector of sub trajectory is computed including eight basic and three advanced feature .', 'These basic feature are distance feature , five velocity-related feature and two acceleration-related feature .', 'Three advanced feature are heading change rate ( hcr ) , stop rate ( sr ) and velocity change rate ( vcr ) , Final , the LightGBM classifier is used to detect the transportation modes automatically .', 'The eXtreme Gradient Boosting ( XGBoost ) and decision tree are also used to verify the efficiency of our method .', 'The experiment data are Geolife provided by Microsoft Research Asia .', 'The result show that the LightGBM and XGBoost method are more accurate than decision tree method and the LightGBM is better than XGBoost at the classification of car , subway and train .', 'Urban traffic flow analysis based on deep learning car detection from cctv image series .', 'Traffic flow analysis is fundamental for urban planning and management of road traffic infrastructure .', 'Automatic number plate recognition ( ANPR ) system are conventional method for vehicle detection and travel time estimation .', 'However , such system are specifically focused on car plate , providing a limited extent of road user .', 'The advance of open-source deep learning convolutional neural network ( CNN ) in combination with freely-available closed-circuit television ( CCTV ) datasets have offered the opportunity for detection and classification of various road user .', 'The research , presented here , aims to analyse traffic flow pattern through fine-tuning pre-trained CNN model on domain-specific low quality imagery , as captured in various weather condition and season of the year 2018 .', 'Such imagery is collected from the North East Combined Authority ( NECA ) Travel and Transport Data , Newcastle upon Tyne , UK .', 'Result show that the fine-tuned MobileNet model with 98.2 % precision , 58.5 % recall and 73.4 % harmonic mean could potentially be used for a real time traffic monitoring application with big data , due to its fast performance .', 'Compared to MobileNet , the fine-tuned Faster region proposal R-CNN model , providing a better harmonic mean ( 80.4 % ) , recall ( 68.8 % ) and more accurate estimation of car unit , could be used for traffic analysis application that demand higher accuracy than speed .', 'This research ultimately exploits machine learning alogrithms for a wider understanding of traffic congestion and disruption under social event and extreme weather condition .', 'Citywide Traffic Volume Estimation Using Trajectory Data .', 'Traffic volume estimation at the city scale is an important problem useful to many transportation operation and urban application .', 'This paper proposes a hybrid framework that integrates both state-of-art machine learning technique and well-established traffic flow theory to estimate citywide traffic volume .', 'In addition to typical urban context feature extracted from multiple source , we extract a special set of feature from GPS trajectory based on the implication of traffic flow theory , which provide extra information on the speed-flow relationship .', 'Using the network-wide speed information estimated from a travel speed estimation model , a volume related high level feature is first learned using an unsupervised graphical model .', 'A volume re-interpretation model is then introduced to map the volume related high level feature to the predicted volume using a small amount of ground truth data for training .', 'The framework is evaluated using a GPS trajectory dataset from 33,000 Beijing taxis and volume ground truth data obtained from 4,980 video clip .', 'The result demonstrate effectiveness and potential of the proposed framework in citywide traffic volume estimation .', 'Joint prediction of road-Traffic and parking occupancy over a city with representation learning .', 'As journey planning service begins to include real time traffic forecast feature in order to compute more accurate routing along the journey , adaptive traffic control system can also benefit from this prediction so as to minimize traffic congestion .', 'But these two system dedicated to end user and road traffic management authority could also benefit from other information , and particularly from parking availability prediction since cruising for parking spot represents a significant part of urban traffic : When looking for a parking , driver must guess where to go , and if they are wrong , may face long distance to find the next location , resulting in considerable time loss and a worsening of traffic congestion .', 'We focus on the simultaneous prediction of traffic and parking availability .', 'Our approach relay on machine learning technique and more precisely on representation learning method : Each road and car-park is represented by a vector in a common large dimensional space which captures both structural and dynamical information about the observed phenomenon .', 'Such a model is thus able to jointly capture the spatio-Temporal correlation between parking and traffic resulting in a high performance prediction system .', 'The result of our experiment on the Grand Lyon ( France ) urban area show the effectiveness of our approach compared to state of the art method .', 'Intelligent driver assist system for urban driving .', 'Driving in an urban environment is hectic and often adventurous .', 'Getting accurate routing instruction , finding parking spot , receiving customized information that helps individual driver reach their destination will significantly reduce the stress of driving , save fuel and reduce unnecessary delay and pollution level .', 'In this paper we present a system that combines smart navigation with intelligent parking assist and driver diagnostics to considerably improve driving comfort , safety and mobility in an urban environment .', 'The smart navigation employs an on line traffic simulator which provides traffic prediction and improves the accuracy of existing navigation system which rely on limited traffic data .', 'The intelligent parking assist system predicts the availability of parking at the start of the journey and these prediction get updated as the destination is approached .', 'The system uses machine learning to understand the habit and preference of the individual driver so that the preferred parking availability information is presented to the driver .', 'The driver diagnostics part learns the driving characteristic of the driver i.e .', 'whether aggressive , semi aggressive or passive , reaction time , following distance etc .', 'and provides this information to the smart navigation and parking assist system for better estimation of travel time .', 'In addition , it can be used to support collision warning and other driver assist device .', 'The proposed system has been successfully demonstrated using an AUDI vehicle in the area of Los Angeles and San Francisco .', 'A note on the square root law for urban police travel time .', 'The classical Square Root Law formula for emergency travel time consists of one observable component , the density of patrol coverage , and one unknown component that must be estimated empirically , the effective travel speed .', 'The effective travel speed is typically assumed to be an empirical constant .', 'We test whether this simplifying assumption is justified empirically .', 'We propose a modern machine-learning approach and a Least Absolute Shrinkage and Selection Operator regression to incorporate into a travel speed model various exogenous factor such as call type , incident location , weather condition and traffic congestion .', 'The value of the proposed analytical approach and some practical implication are demonstrated using operational data from a large urban police jurisdiction based in British Columbia , Canada .', 'Although the analysis is framed within the context of urban emergency police operation , the proposed approach has the potential to be useful for other emergency service or roving business unit that deal with unscheduled service call .', 'Urban human mobility data mining : An overview .', 'Understanding urban human mobility is crucial for epidemic control , urban planning , traffic forecasting system and , more recently , various mobile and network application .', 'Nowadays , a variety of urban human mobility data have been gathered and published .', 'Pervasive GPS data can be collected by mobile phone .', "A mobile operator can track people 's movement in city based on their cellular network location .", 'This urban human mobility data contains rich knowledge about location and can help in addressing many urban challenge such as traffic congestion or air pollution problem .', 'In this article , we survey recent literature on urban human mobility from a data mining view : from the data collection and cleaning , to the mobility model and the application .', 'First , we summarize recent public urban human mobility data set and how to clean and preprocess such data .', 'Second , we describe recent urban human mobility model and predictor , e.g.', ', the deep learning predictor , for predicting urban human mobility .', 'Third , we describe how to evaluate the model and predictor .', 'We conclude by considering how application can utilize the mobility model and predictive tool for addressing city challenge .', "A comparison among various classification algorithms for travel mode detection using sensor ' data collected by smartphones .", 'Nowadays , machine learning is used widely for the purpose of detecting the mode of transportation from data collected by sensor embedded in smartphones like GPS , accelerometer and gyroscope .', 'A lot of different classification algorithm are applied for this purpose .', 'This study provides a comprehensive comparison among various classification algorithms on the basis of accuracy of result and computational time .', 'The data used was collected in Kobe city , Japan using smartphones and cover seven transport mode .', 'After feature extraction , the data was applied to algo-rithms namely Support Vector Ma-chine , Neural Network , Decision Tree , Boosted Decision Tree , Random Forest and Naïve Bayes .', 'Result indicat-ed that boosted decision tree gives highest accuracy but random forest is much quicker with accuracy slightly lower than that of boosted decision tree .', 'Therefore , for the purpose of travel mode detection , random forest is most suitable .', '51st Annual Transportation Research Forum 2010 .', 'The proceeding contain 52 paper .', 'The special focus in this conference is on Transportation Research .', "The topic include : Analysis of factor affect high speed train ridership in the United States - ['Machine learning for next-generation intelligent transportation system : A survey .', 'Intelligent transportation system , or ITS for short , includes a variety of service and application such as road traffic management , traveler information system , public transit system management , and autonomous vehicle , to name a few .', 'It are expected to be an integral part of urban planning and future smart city , contributing to improved road and traffic safety , transportation and transit efficiency , as well as to increased energy efficiency and reduced environmental pollution .', 'On the other hand , ITS pose a variety of challenge due to its scalability and diverse quality-of-service need , as well as the massive amount of data it will generate .', 'In this survey , we explore the use of machine learning ( ML ) , which has recently gained significant traction , to enable ITS .', 'We provide a thorough survey of the current state-of-the-art of how ML technology has been applied to a broad range of ITS application and service , such as cooperative driving and road hazard warning , and identify future direction for how ITS can further use and benefit from ML technology .', 'Transaction on Emerging Telecommunications Technologies published by John Wiley & Sons , Ltd .', 'Smart city and a data-driven response to COVID-19 .', 'This commentary describes the rapid development of a COVID-19 data dashboard utilising existing Urban Observatory Internet of Things ( IoT ) data and analytics infrastructure .', 'Existing data capture system were rapidly repurposed to provide real-time insight into the impact of lockdown policy on urban governance .', 'Algorithmic Urban IoT Context and Convergence of Services Sensing and Planning Units ( PUs ) .', 'Urban planning is a domain of visualizing various aspect of social and physical matter concerning the habitat .', 'These are centered towards better living of social group in a physical infrastructure momentum that is always dynamic with reference to delivering the betterment ever , thus requiring a well synchronized synergy between planning and delivery through plan management .', 'The context of an urban scenario is always around supply dynamic of service infrastructure to the urban density .', 'The situation of balanced supply of these service to spatial status of demand needing an efficient delivery system that can manage the service guarantee .', 'Well-orchestrated service infrastructure enabled by IoT as a delivery mechanism with synchronized functioning for the planned and occasional dynamic of citizen support system must evolve through bidirectional data sharing between the delivery system and urban planning , thus opening a new domain of math programming and algorithms to solve some of the pertinent issue concerning the synthesis .', '5th EAI International Smart City 360 Summit , 2019 .', 'The proceeding contain 38 paper .', 'The special focus in this conference is on Smart City 360 Summit .', 'The topic include : On the use of smartphone sensor for developing advanced driver assistance system ; characterizing air quality in urban area with mobile measurement and high resolution open spatial data : Comparison of different machine-learning approach using a visual interface ; neuralio : Indoor outdoor detection via multimodal sensor data fusion on smartphones ; a low-cost video-based solution for city-wide bicycle counting in starter city ; assessing urban critical infrastructure using online gis and ann : An empirical study of bucharest city ( romania ) ; a unified reference model for smart city ; a review of measure to evaluate smart sustainable city ; well-being index - privileged tool for smart city governance ; implementation of gdpr : Learning with a local administration case study ; megasense : 5g and ai for air quality monitoring ; a paired conceptual framework integrating information system research and democracy theory ; an investigation of citizen ’ s e-participation within oman ’ s police department facebook page ; cognitive system for urban planning : A literature review ; analysis of building management system to ensure optimal working environment ; context-based analysis of urban air quality using an opportunistic mobile sensor network ; real-time monitoring of electric motor for detection of operating anomaly and predictive maintenance ; a cost-effective real-time monitoring system for water quality management based on internet of thing ; person tracking in heavy industry environment with camera image ; yet a smarter irrigation system ; robot creativity : Humanlike behaviour in the robot-robot interaction ; potentiality of the internet of thing in the health area in brazil .', 'Secure blockchain-based traffic load balancing using edge computing and reinforcement learning .', 'Congestion represents one of the major problem in constantly growing city , and the expansion and modernization of the traffic system are a major priority to all government infrastructure .', 'In effect , more efficient traffic represents a more efficient economy .', 'Solving the issue of congestion by increasing the number of road is not always the most cost-effective solution as it represents massive change in city infrastructure that have been present for decade .', 'Urban planning shapes the environment around us but fails to address specifically the future traffic clogging .', 'Our research tackles the problem of traffic congestion by proposing a system for vehicle detection , identification , and count , allied with reinforcement learning for traffic congestion anticipation and prediction .', 'The need for a real-time and efficient system led us to push the research and development onto an Edge Computing platform using IoT and secure transaction using Hyperledger Fabric blockchain .', 'Blockchain intervenes as a security protocol in the proposed system .', 'The native form of Internet of Things does not include security protocol which are important to a large scale implementation .', 'Ensuring the security of transaction and permanent access control is the main reason why blockchain is rooted in our system architecture .', 'Our project aims to reduce the traffic load on road experiencing significant congestion , and improve overall city traffic system without costly investment into new communication infrastructure and city planning .', 'Internet of thing and statistical analysis .', 'Internet of Things ( IoT ) creates a world where physical object are integrated into information network .', 'IoT refers to the connection of device that transforms a wide range of field .', 'In medicine , for instance , connected device can assist medical professional in monitoring patient inside and outside of hospital .', 'Practitioner adjust treatment and improve patient outcome using the produced data .', 'Another field in which a transformation occurs is urban planning .', 'Sensor with an IP address are placed under a busy street , so driver can be alerted about upcoming delay or accident .', 'The explosive growth in the number of device connected to the IoT and the exponential increase in data consumption only reflect how the growth of large data set is perfectly overlapping with that of IoT .', 'In addition to increased volume , the IoT-generated large data set exhibit a mixture of multiple modality and varying data quality .', 'Intelligent processing and analysis of these data set is the key to developing smart IoT application .', 'Since IoT will be among the greatest source of new data , data science is used to make IoT application more intelligent .', 'Analysis of these data set , in practice , is done using various data science technique .', 'Data science is the compounding of different discipline of science that uses data mining , machine learning , and other technique to get form and fresh insight from data .', 'The different algorithm are applied to the information in order to draw out higher-level information from IoT data set .', 'These technique include a wide scope of algorithms applied in different domain and comprise both unsupervised and supervised method .', 'The procedure of applying data analytic method to particular area involves data model such as neural network , classification , clustering method , and applying efficient algorithms that fit with the data characteristic .', 'In this article , we focus on statistical analysis of the collected data set and look at the similarity and difference of data mining and statistical method for IoT system .', 'By explaining the need for both descriptive and inferential statistical method , we show the inadequacy of using only unsupervised data mining technique for IoT data set .', 'We then concentrate on statistical inference approach , such as the design-based and model-based inference , and discuss the role of explanatory versus forecasting statistical model in an IoT environment .', 'Lastly , we demonstrate the danger of making forecast using only unsupervised technique by revealing open challenge as future research direction .', '15th European Conference on Ambient Intelligence , AmI 2019 .', 'The proceeding contain 30 paper .', 'The special focus in this conference is on Ambient Intelligence .', 'The topic include : Enabling machine learning across heterogeneous sensor network with graph autoencoders ; development of an acoustically adaptive modular system for near real-time clarity-enhancement ; Experience from using lora and ; data-driven intrusion detection for ambient intelligence ; spoken language identification using convnets ; Indoor air quality and wellbeing - Enabling awareness and sensitivity with ambient IOT display ; ATHsENSe : An experiment in translating urban data to multisensory immersive artistic experience in public space ; power efficient clock synchronization in bluetooth-based mesh network ; characterization of individual mobility for non-routine scenario from crowd sensing and clustered data ; a flexible and scalable architecture for human-robot interaction ; toward supporting food skill using kinematic sensor ; UAQE : Urban air quality evaluator ; enhancing an eco-driving gamification platform through wearable and vehicle sensor data integration ; a distributed multi-agent system ( mas ) application for continuous and integrated big data processing ; human activity recognition using accelerometer and gyroscope ; towards habit recognition in smart home for people with dementia ; classifying teacher ’ self-reported productivity , stress and indoor environmental quality using environmental sensor ; Ambient explanation : ambient intelligence and explainable AI ; user requirement for the design of smart home : dimension and goal .', 'Proceeding of the 1st ACM SIGSPATIAL International Workshop on Advances in Resilient and Intelligent Cities , ARIC 2018 .', 'The proceeding contain 8 paper .', 'The topic discussed include : multiple evaluation in future population distribution for sustainable city ; detecting street sign in city based on object recognition with machine learning and GIS spatial analysis ; D-record : disaster response and relief coordination pipeline ; analysis , integration and visualization of urban data from multiple heterogeneous source ; SCOUTS : a smart community centric urban heat monitoring framework ; real-time traffic light detection from videos with inertial sensor fusion ; and an integrated visual analytics framework for spatiotemporal data .', 'Citizen-centered big data analysis-driven governance intelligence framework for smart city .', 'Sensor and system within rapidly expanding smart city produce citizen-centered big data which have potential value to support citizen-centered urban governance decision-making .', 'There exists a wealth of extant conceptual study , however , further operational study are needed to establish a specific path towards implementation of such data to governance decision-making with analytical algorithms that are appropriate for each step of the path .', 'This paper proposes a framework for the use of citizen-centered big data analysis to drive governance intelligence in smart city from two perspective : urban governance issue and data-analysis algorithms .', 'The framework consists of three layer : 1 ) A data-merging layer , which builds a citizen-centered panoramic data set for each citizen by merging citizen-related big data from multiple source in collaborative urban governance via similarity calculation and conflict resolution ; 2 ) a knowledge-discovery layer , which plots the citizen profile and citizen persona at both individual and group level in term of urban public service delivery and citizen participation via simple statistical analysis technique , machine learning , and econometrics method ; and 3 ) a decision-making layer , which uses ontology model to standardize urban governance-related attribute , persona , and association to support governance decision-making via data mining and Bayesian Net technique .', 'Finally , the proposed framework is validated in a case study on blood donation governance in China .', 'This research highlights the value of citizen-centered big data , push data-to-decision research from conceptual to operational , synthesizes previously published framework for citizen-centered big data analysis in smart city , and enhances the mutual supplement cross multiple disciplinaries .', 'Inference of vehicular traffic in smart city using machine learning with the internet of thing .', 'A rapidly increasing world population is not only directly related with increased urban mobility but also traffic delay , loss in fuel , air and noise pollution as well as physiological and psychological problem in the population .', 'Traffic control has been shown to be a means of maintaining road serviceability with a key input being traffic inference .', 'The harvesting of sufficiently large data set for traffic inference has thus far been a challenge examined by the scientific community .', 'A modelling , interactive design approach to the harvesting and preprocessing of vehicular data can be used to bridge the gap for traffic control to be autonomously implementable in an urban context .', 'With this consideration , this paper explores the implementation of an internet of thing multiagent system , in a network and equipped with sensor , distributed along the roadway to collect and share this vehicular data among its node and then process the data using a machine learning algorithm for learning and subsequent inference of vehicular type .', 'An interactive design approach is used in the creation of a reduced model of knowledge from each node ’ s bulk harvested data , which is then easily stored or deployed and which also facilitates post-processing of data .', 'Considering the smart city as a product , the interactive approach to product engineering permits the implementation of these mathematical model as part of an interactive traffic control system , to ensure the city ’ s adaptability to the ever-changing need of its inhabitant .', 'In this paper , we present the analysis of the trivial case of the detection of presence and absence of a class A type vehicle .', 'In the introductory section , we examine the problem of transportation in urban expansion .', 'In section two , we examine the solution provided by the Smart Cities with respect to transport service .', 'Further problem which appear within these transport service and their respective solution in machine learning and the internet of thing are discussed in this section on these disruptive technology .', 'Section three examines the bibliography for success achieved with similar research and also demonstrates the basis for classification by support vector machine .', 'Section four to six explain how the experiment is set up to test the hypothesis that over 99 % accuracy in vehicular detection can be achieved with the proposed system when cross-referenced with the actual acoustic , magnetic and video presence and absence of a test vehicle .', 'Processing , mining and visualizing massive urban data .', 'The development of smart technology and the advent of new observation capability have increased the availability of massive urban datasets that can greatly benefit urban study .', 'For example , a large amount of urban data is collected by various sensor , such as smart meter , or provided by GSM , Wi-Fi or Bluetooth record , ticketing data , geo- tagged post on social network , etc .', 'Analysis of such digital record can help to build decision-making tool ( for analytical , forecasting and display purpose ) with a view to better understanding the operating of urban system , to enable urban stakeholder to plan better when extending infrastructure and to provide better service to citizen in order to assist the development of the city and improve quality of life .', 'This paper will focus on three main domain of application : Transportation and mobility , water and energy .', 'Semantic framework of internet of thing for smart city : Case study .', 'In recent year , the advancement of sensor technology has led to the generation of heterogeneous Internet-of-things ( IoT ) data by smart city .', 'Thus , the development and deployment of various aspect of IoT-based application are necessary to mine the potential value of data to the benefit of people and their life .', 'However , the variety , volume , heterogeneity , and real-time nature of data obtained from smart city pose considerable challenge .', 'In this paper , we propose a semantic framework that integrates the IoT with machine learning for smart city .', 'The proposed framework retrieves and model urban data for certain kind of IoT application based on semantic and machine-learning technology .', 'Moreover , we propose two case study : pollution detection from vehicle and traffic pattern detection .', 'The experimental result show that our system is scalable and capable of accommodating a large number of urban region with different type of IoT application .']

['Research on the big data of traditional taxi and online car-hailing : A systematic review .', 'The purpose of this paper is to provide a summary of a quick overview of the latest development and unprecedented opportunity for scholar who want to set foot in the field of traditional taxi and online car-hailing ( TTOC ) .', 'From the perspective of people ( e.g.', ", passenger , driver , and policymaker ) , vehicle , road , and environment , this paper describes the current research status of TTOC 's big data in six hot topic , including the ridership factor , spatio-temporal distribution and travel behavior , cruising strategy and passenger service market partition , route planning , transportation emission and new-energy , and TTOC 's data extensional application .", 'These topic were included in five mainstream as follows : ( 1 ) abundant study often focus only on determinant analysis on given transportation ( taxi , transit , online car-hailing ) ; the exploration of ridership pattern for a multi-modal transportation mode is rare ; furthermore , multiple aspect of factor were not considered synchronously in a wide time span ; ( 2 ) travel behavior research mainly concentrates on the commuting trip and distribution pattern of various travel index ( e.g.', ", distance , displacement , time ) ; ( 3 ) the taxi driver-searching strategy can be divided into autopsychic cruising and system dispatching ; ( 4 ) the spatio-temporal distribution character of TTOC 's fuel consumption ( FC ) and greenhouse gas ( GHG ) emissions has become a hotspot recently , and there has been a recommendation for electric taxi ( ET ) in urban city to decrease transportation congestion is proposed ; and ( 5 ) based on TTOC and point of interest ( POI ) multi-source data , many machine learning algorithm were used to predict travel condition index , land use , and travel behavior .", 'Then , the main bottleneck and research direction that can be explored in the future are discussed .', "We hope this result can provide an overview of current fundamental aspect of TTOC 's utilization in the urban area .", 'Learning Semantic Relationships of Geographical Areas based on Trajectory .', 'Mining trajectory data to find interesting pattern is of increasing research interest due to a broad range of useful application , including analysis of transportation system , location-based social network , and crowd behavior .', 'The primary focus of this research is to leverage the abundance of trajectory data to automatically and accurately learn latent semantic relationship between different geographical area ( e.g.', ', semantically correlated neighborhood of a city ) as revealed by pattern of moving object over time .', 'While previous study have utilized trajectory for this type of analysis at the level of a single geographical area , the result can not be easily generalized to inform comparative analysis of different geographical area .', 'In this paper , we study this problem systematically .', 'First , we present a method that utilizes trajectory to learn low-dimensional representation of geographical area in an embedded space .', 'Then , we develop a statistical method that allows to quantify the degree to which real trajectory deviate from a theoretical null model .', 'The method allows to ( a ) distinguish geographical proximity to semantic proximity , and ( b ) inform a comparative analysis of two ( or more ) model obtained by trajectory defined on different geographical area .', 'This deep analysis can improve our understanding of how space is perceived by individual and inform better decision of urban planning .', 'Our experimental evaluation aim to demonstrate the effectiveness and usefulness of the proposed statistical method in two large-scale real-world data set coming from the New York City and the city of Porto , Portugal , respectively .', 'The method we present are generic and can be utilized to inform a number of useful application , ranging from location-based service , such as point-of-interest recommendation , to finding semantic relationship between different city .', 'Crosstown traffic - supervised prediction of impact of planned special event on urban traffic .', 'Large-scale planned special event in city including concert , football game and fair can significantly impact urban mobility .', 'The lack of reliable model for understanding and predicting mobility need during urban event causes issue for mobility service user , provider as well as urban planner .', 'In this article , we tackle the problem of building reliable supervised model for predicting the spatial and temporal impact of planned special event with respect to road traffic .', 'We adopt a supervised machine learning approach to predict event impact from historical data and analyse effectiveness of a variety of feature , covering , for instance , feature of the event as well as mobility- and infrastructure-related feature .', 'Our evaluation result on real-world event data containing event from several venue in the Hannover region in Germany demonstrate that the proposed combination of event- , mobility- and infrastructure-related feature show the best performance and are able to accurately predict spatial and temporal impact on road traffic in the event context in this region .', 'In particular , a comparison with both event-based and event-agnostic baseline shows superior capacity of our model to predict impact of planned special event on urban traffic .', 'Transaction-Driven Mobility Analysis for Travel Mode Choices .', 'Urban planning can benefit tremendously from a better understanding of where , when , why , how people travel .', 'Through advance in technology , detailed data on the travel behavior of individual has become available .', 'This data can be leveraged to understand why one prefers one mode of transportation over another one .', 'In this paper , we analyze a unique dataset through which we can address this question .', 'We show that the travel behavior in our dataset is highly predictable , with an accuracy of 97 % .', 'The main predictor are reachability feature , more so than specific travel time .', 'Moreover , the travel type ( commute or personal ) has a considerable influence on travel mode choice .', 'Integrating geovisual analytics with machine learning for human mobility pattern discovery .', 'Understanding human movement pattern is of fundamental importance in transportation planning and management .', 'We propose to examine complex public transit travel pattern over a large-scale transit network , which is challenging since it involves thousand of transit passenger and massive data from heterogeneous source .', 'Additionally , efficient representation and visualization of discovered travel pattern is difficult given a large number of transit trip .', 'To address these challenge , this study leverages advanced machine learning method to identify time-varying mobility pattern based on smart card data and other urban data .', 'The proposed approach delivers a comprehensive solution to pre-process , analyze , and visualize complex public transit travel pattern .', 'This approach first fuses smart card data with other urban data to reconstruct original transit trips.We use two machine learning method , including a clustering algorithm to extract transit corridor to represent primarymobility connection between different region and a graph-embedding algorithmto discover hierarchical mobility community structures.We also devise compact and effective multi-scale visualization form to represent the discovered travel behavior dynamic .', 'An interactive web-based mapping prototype is developed to integrate advanced machine learning method with specific visualization to characterize transit travel behavior pattern and to enable visual exploration of transit mobility pattern at different scale and resolution over space and time .', 'The proposed approach is evaluated using multi-source big transit data ( e.g.', ', smart card data , transit network data , and bus trajectory data ) collected in Shenzhen City , China .', 'Evaluation of our prototype demonstrates that the proposed visual analytics approach offers a scalable and effective solution for discovering meaningful travel pattern across large metropolitan area .', 'Reversed urbanism : Inferring urban performance through behavioral pattern in temporal telecom data .', 'A fundamental aspect of well performing city is successful public space .', 'For century , understanding these place has been limited to sporadic observation and laborious data collection .', 'This study proposes a novel methodology to analyze citywide , discrete urban space using highly accurate anonymized telecom data and machine learning algorithms .', 'Through superposition of human dynamic and urban feature , this work aims to expose clear correlation between the design of the city and the behavioral pattern of its user .', 'Geolocated telecom data , obtained for the state of Andorra , were initially analyzed to identify “ stay-points ” —events in which cellular device remain within a certain roaming distance for a given length of time .', 'These stay-points were then further analyzed to find cluster of activity characterized in term of their size , persistence , and diversity .', 'Multivariate linear regression model were used to identify association between the formation of these cluster and various urban feature such as urban morphology or land-use within a 25–50 meter resolution .', 'Some of the urban feature that were found to be highly related to the creation of large , diverse and long-lasting cluster were the presence of service and entertainment amenity , natural water feature , and the betweenness centrality of the road network ; others , such as educational and park amenity were shown to have a negative impact .', 'Ultimately , this study suggests a “ reversed urbanism ” methodology : an evidence-based approach to urban design , planning , and decision making , in which human behavioral pattern are instilled as a foundational design tool for inferring the success rate of highly performative urban place .', 'Fine-grained dynamic population mapping method based on large-scale sparse mobile phone data .', 'The dynamic nature of urban population distribution plays a key role in urban planning , emergency management and public travel information service .', 'Currently , the widespread use of mobile phone data provides the opportunity to support fine-scale population study .', 'However , the data sparsity problem of mobile phone data has been a huge handicap .', 'To overcome this , we proposed a comprehensive approach to achieve fine-grained dynamic population distribution and high-resolution population map based on large-scale sparse mobile phone data .', 'First , we developed an anchor-point-based trajectory reconstruction method to improve the spatiotemporal granularity of mobile phone trajectory .', 'Then , a rapid and efficient automation population mapping method was proposed with the support of reconstructed high spatiotemporal resolution of human movement .', 'Finally , we analyze spatiotemporal characteristic of population distribution and spatial-Temporal interaction of human movement .', 'Using a real mobile phone dataset in the city of Shanghai as a case study , we evaluated the performance of our method .', 'Result indicated that our method improved the precision and reliability of population distribution estimation and could be utilized for quantitatively analyzing the spatiotemporal characteristic of population distribution and migration .', 'We argue that this study is useful for understanding the highly dynamic human movement state and supporting advanced urban application .', 'Uncovering the relationship between point-of-interests-related human mobility and socioeconomic status .', 'In a city or region , understanding the relationship between human mobility and socioeconomic status is critical to public policy formulation , urban design and marketing strategy development .', 'Based on the available massive geo-located human data , existing study focused almost exclusively on the position attributes ( i.e .', 'coordinate ) of the location visited by people to explore the relationship , however , they ignored the category attributes ( e.g .', 'restaurant or supermarket ) of these location which imply the purpose ( e.g .', 'eating or shopping ) behind human movement .', 'A location with coordinate and category information is usually referred to as a point-of-interest ( POI ) .', 'In this paper , we study the relationship between POIs-related human mobility and socioeconomic status at city level .', 'Starting from the location-based social network ( i.e .', 'Foursquare ) dataset , we find that the check-in number of location category are correlated with socioeconomic indicator , either positively or negatively .', 'To further validate these correlation , we develop and test a multi-task prediction framework based on POIs-related human mobility for forecasting socioeconomic indicator .', 'Extensive experiment on the Foursquare dataset show that the socioeconomic indicator can be well predicted by our proposed framework .', 'Our finding and method are helpful for modeling human mobility and assessing socioeconomic status .', 'Analyzing large-scale human mobility data : a survey of machine learning method and application .', 'Human mobility pattern reflect many aspect of life , from the global spread of infectious disease to urban planning and daily commute pattern .', 'In recent year , the prevalence of positioning method and technology , such as the global positioning system , cellular radio tower geo-positioning , and WiFi positioning system , has driven effort to collect human mobility data and to mine pattern of interest within these data in order to promote the development of location-based service and application .', 'The effort to mine significant pattern within large-scale , high-dimensional mobility data have solicited use of advanced analysis technique , usually based on machine learning method , and therefore , in this paper , we survey and assess different approach and model that analyze and learn human mobility pattern using mainly machine learning method .', 'We categorize these approach and model in a taxonomy based on their positioning characteristic , the scale of analysis , the property of the modeling approach , and the class of application they can serve .', 'We find that these application can be categorized into three class : user modeling , place modeling , and trajectory modeling , each class with its characteristic .', 'Finally , we analyze the short-term trend and future challenge of human mobility analysis .', 'Latent Flow Patterns Discovery by Dockless Bike Trajectory Data for Demand Analysis .', 'The dockless shared bike flourish as a new concept in recent year .', 'It allows user to find bike anywhere via a GPS-based mobile application , and flexible cycling and parking the bike in the same way .', 'From the bike trajectory data produced by User , we can extract bike flow pattern for better urban planning and Point-of-Interest ( POI ) recommendation .', 'In this paper , through conducting the spatio-temporal representation of bike activity acquired from bike trajectory log , we first design a graph clustering model With sparsity constraint that combine time information to explore potential pattern of bike flow .', 'Next , by comparing historical trajectory log and POI information with the flow pattern , we dig out several typical category of bike flow pattern , which can give suggestion for further urban planning and POI recommendation .', 'Further , our experiment via Mobike trajectory data demonstrate the effectiveness of bike flow pattern discovery .', 'Dimensionality Reduction to Reveal Urban Truck Driver Activity Patterns .', 'This paper study the activity profile of truck driver in urban area .', 'Finding repeating dynamical pattern is important in understanding freight behavior , and aid freight-friendly planning .', 'In the digital age , data on truck driver is becoming more available with heterogeneous demographic and work profile .', 'By synthesizing such pervasive data and applying machine learning concept , this paper proposes to identify signature travel activity patterns via dimensionality reduction .', 'Based on driver survey data , truck driver ’ behavior are represented as longitudinal activity sequence .', 'Dimensionality reduction and activity reconstruction via principal component analysis ( PCA ) , logistic PCA , and autoencoder were conducted to reveal fundamental activity feature and approximate the underlying data-generating function .', 'In the driver survey dataset , 243 truck driver in Singapore reported their daily activity for 1,099 weekday .', 'This study found that PCA produced the most faithful reconstruction of driver ’ activity .', 'When projecting the input data down from 2,592 to 82 dimension , PCA explained 77 % of variance with a reconstruction error of 0.99 % .', 'Logistic PCA is a useful extension of PCA to study the pattern of a single activity .', 'It captures the variation of infrequent activity such as truck queuing , which PCA fails to reconstruct .', 'Autoencoder was found to be more powerful than PCA in reconstructing activity – with 1 % of original dimension , it reconstructed the activity with an error rate of 1.24 % .', 'Moreover , when implemented as a variational autoencoder , autoencoder generated realistic-looking sample of driver activity .', 'The top three most distinctive activity pattern of Singapore truck driver are reported using PCA .', 'Quantifying place : Analyzing the driver of pedestrian activity in dense urban environment .', 'Understanding pedestrian behavior is critical for many aspect of city planning , design , and management , including transportation , public health , emergency response , and economic development .', 'This study bridges in-situ observation of pedestrian activity and urban computing by integrating high-resolution , large-scale , and heterogeneous urban datasets and analyzing both fixed attribute of the urban landscape ( e.g .', 'physical and transit infrastructure ) with dynamic environmental and socio-psychological factor , such as weather , air quality , and perceived crime risk .', 'We use local pedestrian count data collected by the New York City ( NYC ) Department of Transportation ( DOT ) and an extensive array of open datasets from NYC to test how pedestrian volume relate to land use , building density , streetscape quality , transportation infrastructure , and other factor typically associated with urban walkability .', 'We quantify , classify , and analyze place dynamic , including contextual and situational factor that influence pedestrian activity at high spatial–temporal resolution .', 'The quantification process measures the urban context by extracting rich , yet initially fragmented and siloed , urban data for individual geolocations .', 'Based on these feature , we then construct contextual indicator by selecting and combining feature relevant to pedestrian activity , and develop a typology of place to support the generalizability of our analysis .', 'Finally , we use multivariate regression model with panel-corrected standard error to estimate how specific contextual feature and time-varying situational indicator impact pedestrian activity across time of day , day of the week , season , and year .', 'The result provide insight into the key driver of local pedestrian activity and highlight the importance accounting for the immediate urban environment and socio-spatial dynamic in pedestrian behavior modeling .', 'Strategway : Web solution for building public transportation route using big geodata analysis .', 'We propose Strategway , a group of web solution for public transportation route planning based on real geo-data obtained from city resident .', "The idea behind the solution is to use collected data about city resident ' transportation need ( resident ' preference ) and to build an optimal route network minimizing total cost of ownership .", 'As transportation preference of people are represented as a large set of geoobjects , machine learning algorithm were modified to take geodata specific into account .', 'Strategway includes the analytics core for data gathering , clustering and route design based on machine learning technique .', 'These feature can be considered as contribution in smart algorithms for urban planning system .',
