'Pseudocode of main algorithms with novel addition are represented in the paper as the result of some case study .', 'Future work is declared in the end to highlight the way of contribution to the domain of analytics as a web service .', 'Iviztrans : Interactive visual learning for home and work place detection from massive public transportation data .', 'Using transport smart card transaction data to understand the homework dynamic of a city for urban planning is emerging as an alternative to traditional survey which may be conducted every few year are no longer effective and efficient for the rapidly transforming modern city .', 'As commuter travel pattern are highly diverse , existing rule-based method are not fully adequate .', 'In this paper , we present iVizTRANS - a tool which combines an interactive visual analytics ( VA ) component to aid urban planner to analyse complex travel pattern and decipher activity location for single public transport commuter .', 'It is coupled with a machine learning component that iteratively learns from the planner classification to train a classifier .', 'The classifier is then applied to the city-wide smart card data to derive the dynamic for all public transport commuter .', 'Our evaluation shows it outperforms the rule-based method in previous work .']

['Zurich like New : Analyzing Open Urban Multimodal Data .', 'Citizen-driven platform for enhancing local public service have been adopted in several country like the UK and Switzerland .', 'Local government use data collected from these platform to solve reported issue .', 'Data can also be used by government for data-driven decision-making and to improve the operation of the platform themselves .', 'In particular , as citizen report become increasingly popular , there is a need to handle them more efficiently .', 'In this paper , we present an analysis of ZüriWieNeu , a map-based website helping people in Zurich , Switzerland to report urban issue related to waste , broken streetlamps , or graffiti , among others .', 'Our contribution are two-fold .', 'First , we analyze what machine-extracted textual , visual , spatial and temporal feature reveal about the dynamic of reporting and the content of each report category .', 'This analysis provides a snapshot of the common pattern of urban issue in the Zurich area .', 'Second , we perform classification to automatically infer the category of report , achieving promising performance .', 'Our work contributes towards developing machine learning-based system to classify report category , with the ultimate goal of supporting both user and platform operation .', 'Identifying spatio-temporal hotspot of human activity that are popular non-work destination .', 'The improved temporal and spatial granularity of data now available from current information technology offers an opportunity to study previously unexplored dimension of the relationship between built environment and social outcome .', 'Within the field of urban study , an old question worth revisiting with these new technology is how to best trace the spatial boundary that circumscribe a place or location to explore non-work activity .', 'In this study , we explore a data-driven definition of place as unit of analysis that can be used to explore non-work activity in Singapore .', 'Such a definition of place characterizes an urban space in term of its concentration of activity and the topology of the built environment–features that are especially important to urban planner .', 'We utilize available smartphone data to develop a systematic framework to identify location with a concentrated human presence .', 'Using a cylinder moving over a grid representing Singapore , we scan aggregated smartphones locational request ( by time and cell ) , identifying area with atypical high concentration at a given time .', 'Our tool identified 93 place with a concentrated human presence .', 'Direct observation of six of these place at the selected time in conjunction with additional transportation and population data indicated that the topology of commercial establishment provided a strong approximation of non-work activity at a given time and place .', 'Having established the relevance of commercial establishment in approximating non-work activity , then points-of-interest data within the 93 derived place are used to propose a typology of commercial patch , based on their spatial configuration .', 'Nine metric of the geometry and topology of patch of establishment , such as compacity and their dependence on proximity to shopping mall , were developed .', 'These combined variable revealed more temporal and spatial variety within location than had previously been recognized .', 'The most popular place for non-work activity were densely configured with various commercial sub-spaces or patch appealing to different lifestyle and income group .', 'This study suggests that a location/place can be best defined as a highly detailed , multi-faceted , and always evolving area of activity rather than as a fixed location with temporal and unmovable boundary .', 'Suggesting a dynamic redefinition of location/place that builds on other recent work , this work offers potential contribution to locational model for non-work activity .', 'Towards the collaborative development of machine learning technique in planning support system – a Sydney example .', 'The rise of the term ‘ big data ’ has contributed to recent advance in computational analysis technique , such as machine learning and more broadly , artificial intelligence , which can extract pattern from large , multi-dimensional datasets .', 'In the field of urban planning , it is pertinent to understand both how such technique can advance our understanding of city , and how they can be embedded within transparent and effective digital planning tool , known as planning support system .', 'This research specifically focuses on two related contribution .', 'First , it investigates the role of planning support system in supporting a participatory data analytics approach through an iterative process of developing and evaluating a planning support system environment .', 'Second , it investigates how specifically machine learning planning support system can be co-designed by built environment practitioner and stakeholder in this environment to solve a real planning issue in Sydney , Australia .', 'This paper presents the result of applied research undertaken through the design and implementation of four workshop , involving 57 participant who were involved in a co-design process .', 'The research follows a mixed-methods approach , studying a wide array of measure related to participatory analytics , task load , perceived added value , recording and observation .', 'The result highlight recommendation regarding the design and evaluation of planning support system environment for co-design and their coupling with machine learning technique .', 'It was found that consistency and transparency are highly valued and central to the design of a planning support system in this context .', 'General attitude towards machine learning and artificial intelligence as technique for planner and developer were positive , as they were seen as both potentially transformative but also as simply another technique to assist with workflow .', "Some conceptual challenge were encountered driven by practitioner ' simultaneous need for concrete scenario for accurate prediction , paired with a desire for prediction to drive the development of these scenario .", 'Insight from this work can inform future planning support system evaluation and co-design study , in particular those aiming to support democracy enhancement , greater inclusion and more efficient resource allocation through a participatory analytics approach .', 'A framework to simplify pre-processing location-based social medium big data for sustainable urban planning and management .', 'Over the last decade , 90 % of Big Data has been generated by people living in urban area .', "With the advent of Internet of Things ( IoT ) and the increased use of the internet , Social Media has become an integral part of people 's daily life .", 'Million of unstructured data are being sent to the cloud every second , providing opinion practically on any discourse .', 'This makes microblogs such as Twitter , Instagram , WeChat , and Facebook smart instrument for urban planner to harvest ‘ big data ’ on socioeconomics , urban dynamic , transportation , land us , resilience , etc .', 'This study proposed a framework for social medium big data mining and data analytics using Twitter .', 'It demonstrated the functionality of the framework on a case study using Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning technique like Latent Dirichlet Allocation and VADER Sentiment Analysis to mine , clean , process , and validate the data .', 'The validated result from the case study showed high accuracy that Social Media Big Data can be used to study the spatiotemporal dynamism of community challenge .', 'A value of civic voice for smart city : A big data analysis of civic query posed by Seoul citizen .', 'Since urban problem are increasingly becoming complex and multifaceted due to the rapid urbanization , interest in the development of smart city as an efficient solution to such problem is growing .', 'The significance of smart city lies in not having technology itself but using technology with a novel approach to solve urban problem , enhance the quality of life for urban resident , and optimize government performance .', "Such an approach includes scientifically processing civic query ( including complaint , suggestion , and inquiry ) data about a city and planning the city such that its policy reflect its resident ' voice to ensure “ throughput legitimacy.", '” This study introduces a novel approach to analyze diverse informal civic query data for a city and plan the city in a way that its resident want .', 'By analyzing 160,000 civic query accumulated over 10 year from 2006 to 2017 from the “ Oasis of 10 Million Imagination , ” which is a civic participation platform of Seoul , this study aims to contribute to the sustainable development of Seoul so that it can plan a citizen-centric and smart city that satisfies the demand of its resident .', 'By applying Dynamic Topic Model , the author intend to specify civic demand and forecast the demand of citizen .', 'Opportunity and challenge of geospatial analysis for promoting urban livability in the era of big data and machine learning .', 'Urban system involve a multitude of closely intertwined component , which are more measurable than before due to new sensor , data collection , and spatio-temporal analysis method .', 'Turning these data into knowledge to facilitate planning effort in addressing current challenge of urban complex system requires advanced interdisciplinary analysis method , such as urban informatics or urban data science .', 'Yet , by applying a purely data-driven approach , it is too easy to get lost in the ‘ forest ’ of data , and to miss the ‘ tree ’ of successful , livable city that are the ultimate aim of urban planning .', 'This paper assesses how geospatial data , and urban analysis , using a mixed method approach , can help to better understand urban dynamic and human behavior , and how it can assist planning effort to improve livability .', 'Based on reviewing state-of-the-art research the paper goes one step further and also addresses the potential as well as limitation of new data source in urban analytics to get a better overview of the whole ‘ forest ’ of these new data source and analysis method .', 'The main discussion revolves around the reliability of using big data from social medium platform or sensor , and how information can be extracted from massive amount of data through novel analysis method , such as machine learning , for better-informed decision making aiming at urban livability improvement .', 'The big picture of city : Analysing Flickr photos of 222 city worldwide .', 'The purpose of the current research is to introduce a new method involving machine learning that can identify and analyse the city image dimension ( CIDs ) of city worldwide .', 'Unlike traditional method , this new method can rapidly identify city image dimension from large set of user-generated photo in an efficient and scalable manner , which could help city manager more effectively plan city branding strategy and city development policy .', 'Label detection with Google Cloud Vision and dimension identification ( or topic extraction ) with latent Dirichlet allocation ( LDA ) modelling were used to analyse 222,000 photo of 222 city worldwide from Flickr.com .', 'Theoretically , this study reinforces the existing literature using Big Data , present alternative way to identify CIDs , and illustrates diversity within the image dimension .', 'Topic modeling to discover the thematic structure and spatial-temporal pattern of building renovation and adaptive reuse in city .', 'Building alteration and redevelopment play a central role in the revitalization of developed city , where the scarcity of available land limits the construction of new building .', 'The adaptive reuse of existing space reflects the underlying socioeconomic dynamic of the city and can be a leading indicator of economic growth and diversification .', 'However , the collective understanding of building alteration pattern is constrained by significant barrier to data accessibility and analysis .', 'We present a data mining and knowledge discovery process for extracting , analyzing , and integrating building permit data for more than 2,500,000 alteration project from seven major U.S. city .', 'We utilize natural language processing and topic modeling to discover the thematic structure of construction activity from permit description and merge with other urban data to explore the dynamic of urban change .', 'The knowledge discovery process proceeds in three step : ( 1 ) text mining to identify popular word , popularity change , and their co-appearance likelihood ; ( 2 ) topic modeling using latent Dirichlet allocation ( LDA ) ; and ( 3 ) integrating the topic modeling output with building information and ancillary data to discover the spatial , temporal , and thematic pattern of urban redevelopment and regeneration .', 'The result demonstrate a generalizable approach that can be used to analyze unstructured text data extracted from permit record across varying database structure , permit typology , and local contexts .', 'Our machine learning methodology can assist city to better monitor building alteration activity , analyze spatiotemporal pattern of redevelopment , and more fully understand the economic , social , and environmental implication of change to the urban built environment .', "Predicting neighborhood ' socioeconomic attribute using restaurant data .", 'Accessing high-resolution timely socioeconomic data such as data on population employment and enterprise activity at the neighborhood level is critical for social scientist and policy maker to design and implement location-based policy .', 'However in many developing country or city reliable local-scale socioeconomic data remain scarce .', 'Here we show an easily accessible and timely updated location attribute-restaurant-can be used to accurately predict a range of socioeconomic attribute of urban neighborhood .', 'We merge restaurant data from an online platform with 3 microdatasets for 9 Chinese city .', 'Using feature extracted from restaurant we train machine-learning model to estimate daytime and nighttime population number of firm and consumption level at various spatial resolution .', 'The trained model can explain 90 to 95 % of the variation of those attribute across neighborhood in the test dataset .', 'We analyze the tradeoff between accuracy spatial resolution and number of training sample as well as the heterogeneity of the predicted result across different spatial location demographic and firm industry .', 'Finally we demonstrate the cross-city generality of this method by training the model in one city and then applying it directly to other city .', 'The transferability of this restaurant model can help bridge data gap between city allowing all city to enjoy big data and algorithm dividend .', 'Crowdsensed Data Learning-Driven Prediction of Local Businesses Attractiveness in Smart Cities .', 'Urban planning typically relies on experience-based solution and traditional methodology to face urbanization issue and investigate the complex dynamic of city .', 'Recently , novel data-driven approach in urban computing have emerged for researcher and company .', 'They aim to address historical urbanization issue by exploiting sensing data gathered by mobile device under the so-called mobile crowdsensing ( MCS ) paradigm .', 'This work shows how to exploit sensing data to improve traditionally experience-based approach for urban decision .', 'In particular , we apply widely known Machine Learning ( ML ) technique to achieve highly accurate result in predicting category of local business ( LBs ) ( e.g.', ', bar , restaurant ) , and their attractiveness in term of class of temporal demand ( e.g.', ', nightlife , business hour ) .', 'The performance evaluation is conducted in Luxembourg city and the city of Munich with publicly available crowdsensed datasets .', 'The result highlight that our approach does not only achieve high accuracy , but it also unveils important hidden feature of the interaction of citizen and LBs .', 'Beyond Word2vec : An approach for urban functional region extraction and identification by combining Place2vec and POIs .', 'The actual function of a region may not reflect the intent of the original zoning scheme from planner .', 'To identify the actual urban functional region , numerous method have been proposed with computational advancement .', 'Specifically , remote sensing by image recognition , geodemographic classification , social sensing with big data and geo-text mining technique have been widely applied .', 'Points-of-interest ( POIs ) are one of the most common open-access data type used to extract information pertaining to functional zone .', 'However , previous work have either lost sight or did not make full use of the spatial interaction that can be extracted from POIs due to model limitation in the context of geographical space .', 'In this research , we introduced an approach that detects functional region at the scale of a neighborhood area ( NA ) by combining POI data and a simplified Place2vec model , which is theorized from the first law of geography .', 'First , the POI-based spatial context is constructed by using the nearest neighbor approach .', 'Then , we can increase the number of training tuples ( tcenter , tcontext ) based on the weight derived from the distance between the POI tcenter and POI tcontext .', 'Next , high-dimensional characteristic vector of the POIs are extracted by using the skip-gram training framework .', 'By summarizing the POI vector at the NA level , we employ a K-means clustering model to cluster the functional region .', 'Compared with other probabilistic topic model ( PTMs ) and Word2vec , the Place2vec-based approach obtained the highest mean reciprocal rank value ( MRR-SWP=0.356 , MRR-SLC=0.401 , MRR-SJC=0.433 , and MRR-SLin=0.421 ) in term of similarity capturing performance and functional region identification accuracy ( OA=0.7424 ) .', 'The research has important implication to urban planning and governance .', 'Positive deviance , big data , and development : A systematic literature review .', 'Positive deviance is a growing approach in international development that identifies those within a population who are outperforming their peer in some way , eg , child in low-income family who are well nourished when those around them are not .', 'Analysing and then disseminating the behaviours and other factor underpinning positive deviance are demonstrably effective in delivering development result .', 'However , positive deviance faces a number of challenge that are restricting its diffusion .', 'In this paper , using a systematic literature review , we analyse the current state of positive deviance and the potential for big data to address the challenge facing positive deviance .', 'From this , we evaluate the promise of “ big data-based positive deviance ” : This would analyse typical source of big data in developing countries—mobile phone record , social medium , remote sensing data , etc—to identify both positive deviant and the factor underpinning their superior performance .', 'While big data can not solve all the challenge facing positive deviance as a development tool , they could reduce time , cost , and effort ; identify positive deviant in new or better way ; and enable positive deviance to break out of its current preoccupation with public health into domain such as agriculture , education , and urban planning .', 'In turn , positive deviance could provide a new and systematic basis for extracting real-world development impact from big data .', 'Game-based crowdsourcing to support collaborative customization of the definition of sustainability .', 'Successful adoption and management of sustainable urban system hinge on the community embracing these system .', 'Capturing citizen ’ idea , view , and assessment of the built environment will be essential to this goal .', 'In collaborative city planning , these are qualified and valued form of partial knowledge that should be collectively used to shape the decision making process of urban planning .', 'Among other tool , social medium and online social network analytics can provide mean to capture element of such a distributed knowledge .', 'While a structured definition of sustainability ( normally dictated in a top-down fashion ) may not sufficiently respond well to the pluralist nature of such knowledge acquisition ; dealing with the unstructured community input , assessment and contribution on social medium can be confusing .', 'We can detect fully relevant topics/ideas in community discussion ; but they typically suffer from lack of coherence .', 'In this paper , we advocate the use of a semi-structured approach for capturing , analyzing , and interpreting citizen ’ input .', 'Public official and professional can develop the main element ( topical aspect ) of sustainability , which can act as the skeleton of a taxonomy .', 'It is however , the community inputs/ideas ( in our case collected via social medium and parsed ) , that can shape-up that skeleton and augment those topical aspect with adding the required semantic depth .', 'In more specific term , we collected tweet for four urban infrastructure mega-projects in North America .', 'Then we used a game-with-a-purpose to crowdsource the identification of topic for a training set of tweet .', 'This was then used to train machine learning algorithm to cluster the rest of collected tweet .', 'We studied the semantic ( finding the topic ) of tweet as well as their sentiment ( in term of being opposing or supportive of a project ) .', 'Our classification tested different decision tree with different topic hierarchy .', 'We considered/extracted eight different linguistic feature in studying content of a tweet .', 'Finally , we examined the accuracy of three algorithm in classifying tweet according to the sequence in the tree , and based on the extracted feature .', 'These are : K-nearest neighbor , Naïve Bayes classifier and Support Vector Machines ( SVM ) .', 'Respective to our data set , SVM outperformed other algorithms .', 'Semantic analysis was insensitive to the depth/number of linguistic feature considered .', 'In contrast , sentiment analysis was enhanced when part of speech ( PoS ) was tracked .', 'Interestingly , our work shows that considering the topic ( semantic ) of a tweet helped enhance the accuracy of sentiment analysis : including topical class as a feature in conducting sentiment analysis result in higher accuracy .', 'This could be used as mean to detect the evolution of community opinion : that topic-based social network are evolving within the community tweeting about urban project .', 'It could also be used to identify the topic of top priority to the community or the one that have the widest spread of view .', 'In our case , these were mainly the impact of the design and engineering feature on social issue .', 'Social medium data analysis in urban e-planning .', 'Computational social medium data analysis ( SMDA ) is opening up new possibility for participatory urban planning .', 'The aim of this study is to analyse what kind of computational method can be used to analyse social medium data to inform urban planning .', 'A descriptive literature review of recent case study article reveal that in this context SMDA has been applied mainly to location based social medium data , such as geo-tagged Tweet , photographs and check-in data .', 'There were only a few study concerning the use of non-place-based data .', "Based on this review SMDA can provide planner with local knowledge about people 's opinion , experience , feeling , behaviour , and about the city structure .", 'However , integration of this knowledge in planning and decision-making has not been completely successful in any of the case .', "By way of a conclusion , a planning-led categorization of the SMDA method 's tool and analysis result is suggested .", 'Revealing functional region via joint matrix factorization based model .', 'Various function in the region are emerging with the process of urbanization , such as the residential , entertainment or hospital district , which can be indicated during the urban planning .', 'Recently , researcher try to discover the region function with the human mobility data based on machine learning and statistical model .', 'However , previous work always employs the single domain data like mobility information or district attribute to measure the function .', 'In this paper , we will address the problem by integrating multi-domain data , like human trajectory , base station information and Points-of-Interest attribute .', 'For that , we propose a joint nonnegative matrix factorization model to combine the multi-source data and extract the function distribution of each urban region , then the dominated function among the region can be uncovered based on the clustering process over the extracted distribution .', 'We also evaluate the performance of our method on the real-world dataset to demonstrate the advantage of our proposed model over the baseline method .', 'STA : A spatio-temporal thematic analytics framework for urban ground sensing .', 'Urban planning has always involved getting feedback from various stakeholder and member of public , to inform plan and evaluation of proposal .', 'A lot of rich information comes in textual form , which traditionally have to be read manually .', 'With advancement in machine learning capability , there is potential to tap on it to aid planner in synthesizing insight from large amount of textual feedback data more efficiently .', 'In this paper , we developed a more general urban-centric feedback analysis framework , which encompasses the spatio-temporal thematic of ground sensing .', 'Three essential method : geotagging , topic modeling , and trend analysis are proposed and a prototype has been implemented .', 'The result of experiment indicate that the proposed framework could not only accurately extract precise geospatial information , but also efficiently analyze the semantic theme based on a probabilistic topic modeling with Latent Dirichlet Allocation .', 'Importantly , the spatial and temporal trend of detected topic indicate the effectiveness of our proposed algorithm and then benefit domain expert in their routine work and reveal many interesting insight on ground sensing matter .']

['A Traffic Accident Risk Prediction Model Based on Spatial Gated Memory Network .', 'The prediction of traffic accident is becoming more and more important in the field of public safety , especially in travel route planning and road safety deployment .', 'Due to the development of deep learning , traffic accident prediction can evolve from traditional machine learning algorithm to neural network to predict the risk of accident in a short period of time ( hour level ) in the future .', 'However , the large urban area and sparse traffic accident sample will bring difficulty to deep learning prediction .', 'If it is not solved , it will easily lead to zero-expansion problem , leading to inaccurate prediction result .', 'In response to the above problem , this paper proposes a space-gated memory network ( SGMN ) based on deep learning .', 'The model combines real-time accident risk , real-time traffic flow , and real-time weather with multiple input to predict sub-regions with high accident risk .', 'In order to verify the performance of the model , two real data set are used to evaluate the performance of the model .', 'The result show that the performance of SGMN is better than that of commonly used memory neural network such as RNN , LSTM , GRU , Convulsion and Hereto-ConvLSTM , which validates the model .', 'Unveiling transit mobility structure towards sustainable city : An integrated graph embedding approach .', 'Detecting urban mobility structure , i.e.', ', segmenting urban area into disjoint cluster with similar mobility pattern , can facilitate our understanding of how a city is organized and how different part of a city interact with each other , which underpin informed decision-making in achieving sustainable urban transportation development and resilient society .', 'In this study , we propose to tackle a novel transit mobility structure detection problem , which hinges on high-level mobility pattern that characterize collective movement dynamic across the study region .', 'To this end , we propose a machine learning-based approach to discover meaningful urban mobility structure using big transit data .', 'We contend that both transit mobility pattern and local urban function information should be considered during the detection of transit mobility structure .', 'By integrating different source of urban data , we model the network of transit mobility as an attributed graph : local static urban function are described by attributed feature for graph node whereas travel dynamic are captured via a transit mobility pattern matrix .', 'Similarity of both attributed feature and transit mobility pattern are jointly embedded to derive compact low-dimensional vector representation via graph auto-encoder .', 'Mobility structure is then extracted using unsupervised clustering and gap statistic .', 'The proposed approach is capable of synthesizing both mobility and static information in a data-driven manner , preserving original urban topological structure and resident movement dynamic .', 'The proposed approach was evaluated using real-world transit data collected in Shenzhen City , China .', 'Experimental result and analyses demonstrate that the proposed approach has the applicability of unveiling meaningful transit mobility structure in large metropolitan area .', 'The detected mobility community maps present a holistic overview of public transit movement structure , enabling decision maker to make informed decision on sustainable urban development and transit management .', 'A generic paradigm for mining human mobility pattern based on the GPS trajectory data using complex network analysis .', 'The mining of human mobility can be exploited to support the design of traffic planning , route recommendation , urban planning , emergency management , and land use .', 'Currently , various method such as the machine learning algorithm , statistical method , and semantic analysis are widely applied to identify and extract human mobility pattern .', 'In this paper , we propose a simple and generic paradigm for mining human mobility pattern based on the GPS trajectory data using complex network analysis .', 'The essential idea behind the proposed paradigm mainly include ( 1 ) creating weighted complex network of GPS trajectory and ( 2 ) extracting the human mobility pattern by analyzing the structure and metric of the created complex network of GPS trajectory .', 'To evaluate the performance of the proposed paradigm , we design five group of experiment and identify the mobility pattern of the selected five person based on the selected five network analysis metric .', 'Experimental result indicate that ( 1 ) the proposed paradigm is effective and ( 2 ) the quite interesting potential information about the human mobility can be mined easily .', 'The proposed paradigm is simple and generic , which can be employed to rapidly identify the human mobility pattern based on the GPS trajectory data .', 'Optimal logistics transportation and route planning based on fpga processor real-time system and machine learning .', "The shared bus 's development requirement , relief of traffic congestion in urban area , and improved utilization of the road resource providing the transport mode of the excellent user experience neotype are very urgent .", 'To predict precise travel need , the key for planning a dynamic routing lie a lie of the shared bus implementation .', "However , the shared bus data 's sparse and high volatility will require a lot of resistance to predict travel accurately .", 'Based on the user experience , very different from the traditional public transportation that is far more challenging to the relatively high number of optimization goal is because passenger of the shared bus route planning and shared bus route planning .', "This article , based on the shared bus data from different audience source , travel demand prediction and dynamic route planning in `` the last mile '' , and a two-step process that consists of the shared bus dynamic routing ( sub-bus ) , proposed and your scene .", "First of all , such traffic , time , week , location , and five of the prediction function such as a bus , to analyze resident ' travel behavior to prepare the travel demand based on them precisely the machine learning model used to predict .", "Secondly , dynamically and predict the result of multiple operation bus optimal routing , designed to generate a fixed based on the shared bus destination ' operating characteristic , a dynamic programming algorithm wants below .", 'Several experiment , based on the shared subway shuttle bus of evidence that people of the data and the reality has been purchased , the sub-bus is better than the method of dynamic route planning , etc .', "for the scene of such a `` last mile '' .", 'Traffic Clustering Algorithm of Urban Data Brain Based on a Hybrid-Augmented Architecture of Quantum Annealing and Brain-Inspired Cognitive Computing .', 'In recent year , the urbanization process has brought modernity while also causing key issue , such as traffic congestion and parking conflict .', "Therefore , city need a more intelligent `` brain '' to form more intelligent and efficient transportation system .", 'At present , as a type of machine learning , the traditional clustering algorithm still has limitation .', 'K-means algorithm is widely used to solve traffic clustering problem , but it has limitation , such as sensitivity to initial point and poor robustness .', 'Therefore , based on the hybrid architecture of Quantum Annealing ( QA ) and brain-inspired cognitive computing , this study proposes QA and Brain-Inspired Clustering Algorithm ( QABICA ) to solve the problem of urban taxi-stand location .', "Based on the traffic trajectory data of Xi'an and Chengdu provided by Didi Chuxing , the clustering result of our algorithm and K-means algorithm are compared .", 'We find that the average taxi-stand location bias of the final result based on QABICA is smaller than that based on K-means , and the bias of our algorithm can effectively reduce the tradition K-means bias by approximately 42 % , up to approximately 83 % , with higher robustness .', 'QA algorithm is able to jump out of the local suboptimal solution and approach the global optimum , and brain-inspired cognitive computing provides search feedback and direction .', 'Thus , we will further consider applying our algorithm to analyze urban traffic flow , and solve traffic congestion and other key problem in intelligent transportation .', 'Development of people mass movement simulation framework based on reinforcement learning .', 'Understanding individual and crowd dynamic in urban environment is critical for numerous application , such as urban planning , traffic forecasting , and location-based service .', 'However , researcher have developed travel demand model to accomplish this task with survey data that are expensive and acquired at low frequency .', "In contrast , emerging data collection method have enabled researcher to leverage machine learning technique with a tremendous amount of mobility data for analyzing and forecasting people 's behavior .", 'In this study , we developed a reinforcement learning-based approach for modeling and simulation of people mass movement using the global positioning system ( GPS ) data .', 'Unlike traditional travel demand modeling approach , our method focuses on the problem of inferring the spatio-temporal preference of individual from the observed trajectory , and is based on inverse reinforcement learning ( IRL ) technique .', "We applied the model to the data collected from a smartphone application and attempted to replicate a large amount of the population 's daily movement by incorporating with agent-based multi-modal traffic simulation technology .", 'The simulation result indicate that agent can successfully learn and generate human-like travel activity .', 'Furthermore , the proposed model performance significantly outperforms the existing method in synthetic urban dynamic .', 'PSO-ELM : A Hybrid Learning Model for Short-Term Traffic Flow Forecasting .', 'Accurate and reliable traffic flow forecasting is of importance for urban planning and mitigation of traffic congestion , and it is also the basis for the deployment of intelligent traffic management system .', 'However , constructing a reasonable and robust forecasting model is a challenging task due to the uncertainty and nonlinear characteristic of traffic flow .', 'Aiming at the nonlinear relationship affecting traffic flow forecasting effect , a PSO-ELM model based on particle swarm optimization is proposed for short-term traffic flow forecasting , which takes the advantage of particle swarm optimization to search global optimal solution and extreme learning machine to fast deal with the nonlinear relationship .', 'The proposed model improves the accuracy of traffic flow forecasting .', "The traffic flow data from highway A1 , A2 , A4 , A8 connecting to Amsterdam 's ring road are employed for the case study .", 'The RMSEs of PSO-ELM model are respectively 252.61 , 173.75 , 200.24 , 146.05 , while the MAPEs of PSO-ELM model are respectively 11.86 % , 10.10 % , 10.74 % , 11.60 % .', 'The experimental result show that the performance of the proposal is significantly better than the performance of state-of-the-art model .', 'Safe reinforcement learning with scene decomposition for navigating complex urban environment .', 'Navigating urban environment represents a complex task for automated vehicle .', 'They must reach their goal safely and efficiently while considering a multitude of traffic participant .', 'We propose a modular decision making algorithm to autonomously navigate intersection , addressing challenge of existing rule-based and reinforcement learning ( RL ) approach .', 'We first present a safe RL algorithm relying on a model-checker to ensure safety guarantee .', 'To make the decision strategy robust to perception error and occlusion , we introduce a belief update technique using a learning based approach .', 'Finally , we use a scene decomposition approach to scale our algorithm to environment with multiple traffic participant .', 'We empirically demonstrate that our algorithm outperforms rule-based method and reinforcement learning technique on a complex intersection scenario .', 'Pedestrian Walking on Reachable Set and Manifolds .', 'It is a challenge to find safe trajectory for automated vehicle .', 'Especially in urban environment with pedestrian there exist many different situation .', 'The prediction of future movement with absolute certainty is impossible if the intention of the pedestrian is unknown .', 'This paper is intended to offer a new concept of decision-making for motion planning with vulnerable road-users in urban environment .', 'Reachability analysis is used to define spatial area based on physical constraint , where the pedestrian might go .', 'The approach is physically inspired and it can be proven for all kind of pedestrian .', 'A new approach to cluster spatial area is introduced to store specific environmental information about the pedestrian .', 'The maximum value for jerk , acceleration and velocity of the pedestrian are necessary to find reachable area .', 'A user monitoring road traffic information collection using sumo and scheme for road surveillance with deep mind analytics and human behavior tracking .', 'Road congestion and huge traffic on roads has become a big problem in many urban area .', 'Investment on planning and processing of traffic information should help to minimize congestion and pollution .', 'So here we propose a way to design our own road network as required to reduce traffic using a tool called Sumo .', 'Inorder to find the efficiency of that network , a WSN based framework is designed for the same and various routing scheme are applied on it .', 'A fuzzy logic-based traffic light control system and QOS parameter handling system is designed by extracting data available by routing scheme applied .', 'Inorder to make the road safer artificial intelligence-based security camera hoping to achieve automated recognition of people and event is planned .', 'Digital brains map the eye to analyze live video and helping responder to more easily find crime and accident on road .', 'Machine learning is employed to get considerable gain in its ability to identify object , the skill of analyzing scene , activity , and movement .', 'Simulation have shown good performance for the proposed routing scheme and fuzzy controller designed show good result to the urban traffic network .', 'Inferring Pedestrian Motion at Urban Crosswalks .', 'Robust prediction of pedestrian behavior is one of the most challenging problem for autonomous driving .', 'Particularly , predicting pedestrian crossing at crosswalk is of considerable importance for avoiding accident on the one hand and not unnecessarily slowing down traffic on the other hand .', 'Traditional model-based motion tracking and prediction approach have difficulty in capturing abrupt change in motion , as human can perform them .', 'In this paper , an approach for predicting pedestrian motion that combine established motion tracking algorithm with data-driven method is presented .', 'The approach is built upon a hierarchical structure , where first , the intent of each pedestrian is classified .', 'Then , the approach computes several qualitative metric , such as time-to-cross , for the pedestrian classified as crossing .', 'The approach is evaluated on a challenging urban data set collected for different type of crosswalk such as roundabout and straight road .', 'The evaluation also provides a thorough analysis of the generalization performance of the proposed approach .', 'A fuzzy logic based transport mode detection framework in urban environment .', 'Transport mode detection is an emerging research area in different domain such as urban planning , context-aware mobile computing , and intelligent transportation system .', 'Current approach are mostly data-driven , based on machine learning approach .', 'However , machine learning model require substantial training data and can not explain the reasoning procedure .', 'Data-driven approach also fall short while interpreting trajectory where ground truth information is limited .', 'Therefore , this paper develops a novel knowledge-based approach for interpreting smartphone global positioning system trajectory by detecting various transport mode used during travel .', 'The proposed model is based on an expert system that can work without any training , based solely on expert knowledge .', 'Core is a fuzzy multiple-input multiple-output expert system using kinematic and spatial information with a well explained fuzzy reasoning scheme through a fuzzy rule base .', 'The model can provide alternate prediction with varied certainty factor .', 'Different membership function combination have been evaluated in term of accuracy and ambiguity , and the result demonstrates that the model performs best using a Gaussian–Gaussian combination , comparable to the existing machine learning approach .', 'Knowledge-based learning for solving vehicle routing problem .', 'In this study , we have developed a method that applies machine learning in combination with an optimization heuristic algorithm such as a genetic algorithm ( GA ) for solving the vehicle routing problem ( VRP ) .', 'Further , we developed a knowledge-based algorithm for a knowledge learning system .', 'The algorithm learns to classify coordinate ( unlabeled ) into region .', 'Consequently , dividing routing calculation into region ( cluster ) provides many benefit over traditional method , and can result in an improvement in routing cost over the traditional company method by up to 25.68 % and over the classical GA by up to 8.10 % .', 'It is also shown that our proposed method can reduce traveling distance compared to previous method .', 'Finally , the prediction of future customer region has an accuracy of up to 0.72 for the predicted unlabeled customer coordinate .', 'This study can contribute toward creation of more efficient and environmentally friendly urban freight transportation system .', 'Deep neural network dynamic traffic routing system for vehicle .', 'Traffic grid have always suffered from a lack of dynamic routing and path planning algorithms and relied only on static characteristic of the road like the number of lane , distance and speed limit to avoid and resolve traffic congestion , by routing traffic to a lighter traffic path .', 'However , with the increased number of vehicle in urban area these algorithm may have reached their limitation due to the huge increase in the state space in a limited computing power and memory environment .', 'In this research we will introduce a dynamic routing system for traffic in intersection based on real-time traffic condition such as individual vehicle speed , destination and traffic light status to provide the fasted path between a source and a target point .', 'This system will exploit the recent advancement in the field of machine learning by leveraging the power of deep learning especially deep convolutional neural network .', 'Simulation shows that the proposed model result in a path that are generally fast and avoids frequent red light stop .', 'Hierarchical multi-agent control of traffic light based on collective learning .', 'Increasing traffic congestion poses significant challenge for urban planning and management in metropolitan area around the world .', 'One way to tackle the problem is to resort to the emerging technology in artificial intelligence .', 'Traffic light control is one of the most traditional and important instrument for urban traffic management .', 'The present study proposes a traffic light control system enabled by a hierarchical multi-agent modeling framework in a decentralized manner .', 'In the framework , a traffic network is decomposed into region represented by region agent .', 'Each region consists of intersection , modeled by intersection agent who coordinate with neighboring intersection agent through communication .', 'For each intersection , a collection of turning movement agent operate individually and implement optimal action according to local control policy .', 'By employing a reinforcement learning algorithm for each turning movement agent , the intersection controller are enabled with the capability to make their timing decision in a complex and dynamic environment .', 'In addition , the traffic light control operates with an advanced phase composition process dynamically combining compatible turning movement .', 'Moreover , the collective operation performed by the agent in a road network are further coordinated by varying priority setting for relevant turning movement .', 'A case study was carried out by simulation to evaluate the performance of the proposed control system while comparing it with an optimized vehicle-actuated control system .', 'The result show that the proposed traffic light system , after a collective machine learning process , not only improves the local signal operation at individual intersection but also enhances the traffic performance at the regional level through coordination of specific turning movement .', 'Robust anomaly detection in urban environment using sensor and information fusion and a camera network .', 'The paper presents a method for detection of abnormal behavior related to violent event in urban environment .', 'We have further developed a person detection method and introduced a person tracker as an intermediate stage between person detection and anomaly detection .', 'The method is presented together with result from evaluation based on real sensor data that have been recorded in a realistic urban environment .', 'Several scenario have been recorded such as normal situation , a person loitering , a person shooting and people escaping from sudden smoke development .', 'The method uses sensor data from a static video surveillance system , consisting of two visual and two thermal infrared camera .', 'The person detection method combine foreground segmentation with a trained machine learning algorithm which is based on boosting .', 'The tracker associates incoming detection to object ( i.e .', 'people ) , and generates track of world coordinate and velocity of object .', 'The anomaly detection method , which is based on the hidden Markov model ( HMM ) , fuses information that is derived from the tracker .', 'The information contains a number of person , their position and velocity .', 'The result indicate that the person detection method in combination with the tracker can produce robust and accurate observation to the HMM , which in turn provide good condition for accurate anomaly detection .']

['Subjective or objective measure of street environment , which are more effective in explaining housing price ?', '.', 'House with better street design are found to relate to a price premium .', 'Prior study mainly present the street quality using objective indicator like tree count and distance to parks with land use data , or most recently using the greenery view index extracted from street view imagery ( SVI ) .', "We argue objective indicator can not completely describe people 's sense of a place , as perception is a highly subjective process .", 'We hypothesize that subjective measure using visual survey could capture more subtle human perception , thus providing stronger predictive power to housing price .', 'However , the role of subjectively measured street design quality is less known due to the lack of large-scale perception data .', 'To test our hypothesis , we first collected designer ’ perception on five urban design quality from pairwise SVIs ranking in Shanghai with an online visual survey .', 'Unlike the mainstream of using generic image feature , we followed urban design theory and used rule-based feature , i.e.', ', about thirty streetscape element extracted from SVIs to train machine learning ( ML ) model to predict subjective perception .', 'The predictive power of five quality versus ten selected individual streetscapes on housing price were compared using the hedonic price model .', 'Besides the standard ordinary least square ( OLS ) , spatial regression and geographical weighted regression ( GWR ) were also developed to account for the spatial dependence and heterogeneity effect .', 'We found both subjectively measured design quality and objective indicator outperformed housing structural attribute in explaining housing price .', 'While the objective view index collectively explained more price variance , the five perception individually exhibited stronger strength .', 'Third , less-studied perception like “ human scale ” showed stronger strength than commonly studied “ safety ” and “ enclosure ” .', 'Fourth , less-studied view index like “ person ” and “ fence ” outperformed ubiquitous feature like tree and building .', 'Lastly , prior study might have resulted in biased estimation due to ignoring the multicollinear issue between the sky , tree and building view .', 'Our study addressed the effectiveness of incorporating subjective perception at a micro level to infer housing price .', 'correlation between subjective perception were strong while that of objective indicator were negligible , therefore subjective perception can complement the objective indicator .', 'The finding provide important reference to decision maker when selecting street quality indicator to infer urban design , city planning and community and housing development plan .', 'Mapping fine-scale visual quality distribution inside urban street using mobile LiDAR data .', 'The visual quality of urban street is of vital importance for establishing a satisfying and comfortable experience for the resident in an urban community .', 'It also has positive effect on urban vibrancy , public health , and social connection in that community .', 'Numerous study have been conducted to evaluate the visual quality at the urban street level using street view image .', 'However , the spatial distribution of fine-grained visual quality inside an urban street is rarely investigated .', 'This study presents a new approach for the evaluation of visual quality inside urban street using mobile LiDAR point cloud .', 'The semantic information of urban street was first extracted from mobile LiDAR point clouds with a Gradient Boosting classifier .', 'After that , seven well-known key design element , including the green space factor , sky view factor , enclosure rate , volume index , vehicle occurrence rate , motorization rate , and diversity , were calculated from the classified point cloud using a three-dimensional ( 3D ) visibility model .', 'Finally , the visual quality at 1 m grid resolution inside urban street was achieved automatically by using a random forest model which was trained based on perception sample .', 'This approach has been validated on two study area and the result indicated that the proposed approach is able to quantitatively examine the visual quality difference inside urban street .', 'The result generated by the proposed method also match well with the common sense of urban design expert , which are useful for architect and designer to develop best practice in the urban micro-renewal project and to refine the urban planning process .', 'Assessing bikeability with street view imagery and computer vision .', 'Study evaluating bikeability usually compute spatial indicator shaping cycling condition and conflate them in a quantitative index .', 'Much research involves site visit or conventional geospatial approach , and few study have leveraged street view imagery ( SVI ) for conducting virtual audits .', 'These have assessed a limited range of aspect , and not all have been automated using computer vision ( CV ) .', 'Furthermore , study have not yet zeroed in on gauging the usability of these technology thoroughly .', 'We investigate , with experiment at a fine spatial scale and across multiple geography ( Singapore and Tokyo ) , whether we can use SVI and CV to assess bikeability comprehensively .', 'Extending related work , we develop an exhaustive index of bikeability composed of 34 indicator .', 'The result suggest that SVI and CV are adequate to evaluate bikeability in city comprehensively .', 'As they outperformed non-SVI counterpart by a wide margin , SVI indicator are also found to be superior in assessing urban bikeability and potentially can be used independently , replacing traditional technique .', 'However , the paper exposes some limitation , suggesting that the best way forward is combining both SVI and non-SVI approach .', 'The new bikeability index presents a contribution in transportation and urban analytics , and it is scalable to assess cycling appeal widely .', 'Modeling pedestrian emotion in high-density city using visual exposure and machine learning : Tracking real-time physiology and psychology in Hong Kong .', "People 's mental health has been deteriorating as a result of urban living , which also causes disability , pain , or even death among metropolitan resident .", 'Understanding the interaction between human emotion and the built environment is therefore essential for developing strategy towards a psychologically friendly and socially resilient environment .', 'This study aims to model the pedestrian emotion in high-density urban area of Hong Kong using machine learning based on environmental visual exposure , which is one of the most significant factor affecting emotion .', 'Using ambulatory sensing and portable technology , two-dimensional emotional data from 99 pedestrian are retrieved from coupled data with respect to wearable arousal , subjective report preference , and the location at a high spatiotemporal resolution ( 4 m ) .', 'The visual environment is quantified by isovist and street view factor .', 'This study examines the impact of visual exposure using two multiple linear regression ( MLR ) model and establishes a predictive model using random forest ( RF ) ( N = 548 ) .', 'The MLR model have R2 value around 0.5 and suggest that in the high-density environment , exposure to more tree , visual volume , and drift magnitude can cause positive emotion .', 'Conversely , area with a view of sign symbol , object proportion , min-radial , and occlusivity can cause negative emotion .', 'The resultant predictive model with nine visual exposure variable can explain 79 % of the spatial variance of pedestrian emotion .', 'Furthermore , the methodological framework provides opportunity for spatial , data-driven approach to portable sensing and urban planning research .', 'The finding are also applicable to optimize the infrastructure design of outdoor environment for more psychologically friendly experience .', 'Street view imagery in urban analytics and GIS : A review .', 'Street view imagery has rapidly ascended as an important data source for geospatial data collection and urban analytics , deriving insight and supporting informed decision .', 'Such surge has been mainly catalysed by the proliferation of large-scale imagery platform , advance in computer vision and machine learning , and availability of computing resource .', 'We screened more than 600 recent paper to provide a comprehensive systematic review of the state of the art of how street-level imagery is currently used in study pertaining to the built environment .', 'The main finding are that : ( i ) street view imagery is now clearly an entrenched component of urban analytics and GIScience ; ( ii ) most of the research relies on data from Google Street View ; and ( iii ) it is used across myriad of domain with numerous application – ranging from analysing vegetation and transportation to health and socio-economic study .', 'A notable trend is crowdsourced street view imagery , facilitated by service such as Mapillary and KartaView , in some case furthering geographical coverage and temporal granularity , at a permissive licence .', 'Place for play : Understanding human perception of playability in city using street view image and deep learning .', 'Play benefit childhood development and well-being , and is a key factor in sustainable city design .', "Though previous study have examined the effect of various urban feature on how much child play and where they play , such study rely on quantitative measurement of play such as the precise location of play and the duration of play time , while people 's subjective feeling regarding the playability of their environment are overlooked .", "In this study , we capture people 's perception of place playability by employing Amazon Mechanical Turk ( MTurk ) to classify street view image .", 'A deep learning model trained on the labelled data is then used to evaluate neighborhood playability for three U.S. city : Boston , Seattle , and San Francisco .', 'Finally , multivariate and geographically weighted regression model are used to explore how various urban feature are associated with playability .', 'We find that higher traffic speed and crime rate are negatively associated with playability , while higher score for perception of beauty are positively associated with playability .', 'Interestingly , a place that is perceived as lively may not be playable .', 'Our research provides helpful insight for urban planning focused on sustainable city growth and development , as well as for research focused on creating nourishing environment for child development .', 'Panoramic street-level imagery in data-driven urban research : A comprehensive global review of application , technique , and practical consideration .', 'The release of Google Street View in 2007 inspired several new panoramic street-level imagery platform including Apple Look Around , Bing StreetSide , Baidu Total View , Tencent Street View , Naver Street View , and Yandex Panorama .', 'The ever-increasing global capture of city in 360◦ provides considerable new opportunity for data-driven urban research .', 'This paper provides the first comprehensive , state-of-the-art review on the use of street-level imagery for urban analysis in five research area : built environment and land use ; health and wellbeing ; natural environment ; urban modelling and demographic surveillance ; and area quality and reputation .', 'Panoramic street-level imagery provides advantage in comparison to remotely sensed imagery and conventional urban data source , whether manual , automated , or machine learning data extraction technique are applied .', 'Key advantage include low-cost , rapid , high-resolution , and wide-scale data capture , enhanced safety through remote presence , and a unique pedestrian/vehicle point of view for analyzing city at the scale and perspective in which they are experienced .', 'However , several limitation are evident , including limited ability to capture attribute information , unreliability for temporal analysis , limited use for depth and distance analysis , and the role of corporation as image-data gatekeeper .', 'Finding provide detailed insight for those interested in using panoramic street-level imagery for urban research .', 'Urban Perception : Can We Understand Why a Street Is Safe ?', '.', 'The importance of urban perception computing is relatively growing in machine learning , particularly in related area to Urban Planning and Urban Computing .', 'This field of study focus on developing system to analyze and map discriminant characteristic that might directly impact the city ’ s perception .', 'In other word , it seeks to identify and extract discriminant component to define the behavior of a city ’ s perception .', 'This work will perform a street-level analysis to understand safety perception based on the “ visual component ” .', 'As our result , we present our experimental evaluation regarding the influence and impact of those visual component on the safety criterion and further discuss how to properly choose confidence on safe or unsafe measure concerning the perceptional score on the city street level analysis .', 'From sonic experience to urban planning innovation .', 'It is widely accepted that personal response to soundscapes are more dependent on listener ’ emotion and attitude , than on sound or their physical feature alone .', 'Fast-growing city have catalyzed the importance of designing urban space that citizens find pleasant and homely and that support a communal style of living .', 'Unfortunately , there are no standardized method or technique to translate sonic experience into measurable and reliable data , which urban planning professional or the building industry could turn into innovation and solution .', 'Most of the data pertaining to noise pollution and city soundscapes is still based on predictive acoustic model and rarely takes any real-life experience or physical measurement into consideration .', 'This paper presents the concept of a smart and participatory approach for gathering sonic experience that could be translated into measurable value .', 'The aim is to search for data collection method to provide data to train deep learning .', 'With machine learning method , it is possible to find pattern in both desirable and undesirable urban soundscapes .', 'The aim of this concept is to create crowdsourced data collection method and improve the understanding and communication between citizen and planning process by producing more accurate and comparable experiential data .', 'Predicting human perception of the urban environment in a spatiotemporal urban setting using locally acquired street view image and audio clip .', "This study investigates people 's perception of visual and auditory landscape in a mixed-use urban environment .", 'A set of audio and visual data is collected at different interval during the day in local street with the help of an audio recorder and camera setup .', 'The High and Low-level feature from the collected audio and visual datasets are captured with the help of custom Deep Learning ( DL ) model and other standard algorithms .', 'The collected data is used in the perception survey , which included human subject ( n = 73 ) .', 'The evaluation of the individual perception is done with the help of eight and six auditory and visual perceptual attribute , respectively .', 'The result from the survey are then studied in relation to the feature extracted from algorithms .', 'Finally , a street of 10 km length is chosen within the study area where a spatiotemporal street-level visual and auditory data is collected .', 'Statistical analysis and Machine Learning modeling are performed in the surveyed dataset to predict the human perception of audio and visual scene in the chosen street .', 'The result helped in understanding specific audio and visual feature that are related to individual perception .', 'Further , these relationship are utilized to create prediction model , which helped in creating spatiotemporal visual and auditory perception map .', 'A machine learning method of predicting behavior vitality using open source data .', 'The growing popularity of machine learning has provided new opportunity to predict certain behavior precisely by utilizing big data .', 'In this research , we use an image-based neural network to explore the relationship between the built environment and the activity of bicyclist in that environment .', 'The generative model can produce heat map that can be used to predict quantitatively the cycling and running activity in a given area , and then use urban design to enhance urban vitality in that area .', 'In the machine learning model , the input image is a plan view of the built environment , and the output image is a heat map showing certain activity in the corresponding area .', 'After it is trained , the model yield output ( the predicted heat map ) at an acceptable level of accuracy .', 'The heat map shows the level and condition of the subject activity in different section of the built environment .', 'Thus , the predicted result can help identify where regional vitality can be improved .', 'Using this method , designer can not only predict the behavioral heat distribution but also examine the different interaction between behavior and aspect of the environment .', 'The extent to which factor might influence behavior is also studied by generating a heat map of the modified plan .', 'In addition to the potential application of this approach , its limitation and area for improvement are also proposed .', 'Modeling and evaluating the residential urban environment perception .', 'This article discusses the use of machine learning method for assessing and predicting the perception of urban environment by citizen .', 'The research is based on the analysis of the data collected from social survey and characteristic of the environment from open source .', 'The urban environment is seen as a complex system that can be analyzed though the point of view of the urban context .', 'The urban context is formed by the geophisical and social feature that forms citizen habitat .', 'At the same time , the perception of the urban environment by citizen depends both on the parameter of the urban environment and on the socio-demographic feature of the studied group .', "The article discusses model for predicting the citizen ' perception of the urban environment and evaluation method of such model .", 'The author propose the application of the model on the case of St. Petersburg , Russia .', 'Machine Learning Assisted Urban Filling .', 'When drawing urban scale plan , designer should always define the position and the shape of each building .', 'This process usually costs much time in the early design stage when the condition of a city has not been finally determined .', 'Thus the designer spend a lot of time working forward and backward drawing sketch for different characteristic of city .', 'Meanwhile , machine learning , as a decision-making tool , has been widely used in many field .', 'Generative Adversarial Network ( GAN ) is a model frame in machine learning , specially designed to learn and generate image data .', 'Therefore , this research aims to apply GAN in creating urban design plan , helping designer automatically generate the predicted detail of building configuration with a given condition of city .', 'Through the machine learning of image pair , the result shows the relationship between the site condition ( road , green land , and river ) and the configuration of building .', 'This automatic design tool can help release the heavy load of urban designer in the early design stage , quickly providing a preview of design solution for urban design task .', 'The analysis of different machine learning model trained by the data from different city inspires urban designer with design strategy and feature in distinct condition .', 'Measuring daily accessed street greenery : A human-scale approach for informing better urban planning practice .', 'The public benefit of visible street greenery have been well recognised in a growing literature .', 'Nevertheless , this issue was rare to be included into urban greenery and planning practice .', 'As a response to this situation , we proposed an actionable approach for quantifying the daily exposure of urban resident to eye-level street greenery by integrating high resolution measurement on both greenery and accessibility .', 'Google Street View ( GSV ) images in Singapore were collected and extracted through machine learning algorithm to achieve an accurate measurement on visible greenery .', 'Street network collected from Open Street Map ( OSM ) were analysed through spatial design network analysis ( sDNA ) to quantify the accessibility value of each street .', 'The integration of street greenery and accessibility helps to measure greenery from a human-centred perspective , and it provides a decision-support tool for urban planner to highlight area with prioritisation for planning intervention .', 'Moreover , the performance between GSV-based street greenery and the urban green cover mapped by remote sensing was compared to justify the contribution of this new measurement .', 'It suggested there was a mismatch between these two measurement , i.e.', ', existing top-down viewpoint through satellite might not be equivalent to the benefit enjoyed by city resident .', 'In short , this analytical approach contributes to a growing trend in integrating large , freely-available datasets with machine learning to inform planner , and it makes a step forward for urban planning practice through focusing on the human-scale measurement of accessed street greenery .', 'A systematic measurement of street quality through multi-sourced Urban data : A human-oriented analysis .', 'Many study have been made on street quality , physical activity and public health .', 'However , most study so far have focused on only few feature , such as street greenery or accessibility .', 'These feature fail to capture people ’ s holistic perception .', 'The potential of fine grained , multi-sourced urban data creates new research avenue for addressing multi-feature , intangible , human-oriented issue related to the built environment .', 'This study proposes a systematic , multi-factor quantitative approach for measuring street quality with the support of multi-sourced urban data taking Yangpu District in Shanghai as case study .', 'This holistic approach combine typical and new urban data in order to measure street quality with a human-oriented perspective .', 'This composite measure of street quality is based on the well-established 5Ds dimension : Density , Diversity , Design , Destination accessibility and Distance to transit .', 'They are combined as a collection of new urban data and research technique , including location-based service ( LBS ) positioning data , point of interest ( PoIs ) , element and visual quality of street-view image extraction with supervised machine learning , and accessibility metric using network science .', 'According to these quantitative measurement from the five aspect , street were classified into eight feature cluster and three type reflecting the value of street quality using a hierarchical clustering method .', 'The classification was tested with expert .', 'The analytical framework developed through this study contributes to human-oriented urban planning practice to further encourage physical activity and public health .', 'City safety perception model based on visual content of street image .', 'Safety perception measurement has been a subject of interest in many city of the world .', 'This is due to its social relevance , and to its effect on some local economic activity .', 'Even though people safety perception is a subjective topic , sometimes it is possible to find out common belief given a restricted sociocultural context .', "This paper presents an approach that makes use of image processing and machine learning technique to model citizen 's safety perception using visual information of city image .", 'The proposed method predicts how safe a given street of Bogotá City can be .', 'This is done based on people judgment of the visual appearance of a street image .', 'Result suggest that the obtained model is able to detect city street , where a visual feature is linked to an activity or street condition that has a significant influence on their associated safety perception .', 'This feature makes the proposed model an alternative tool for decision maker with regard to urban planning , safety and health public policy , as well as a collective memory associated to a particular urban environment .', 'Daily accessed street greenery and housing price : Measuring economic performance of human-scale streetscapes via new urban data .', 'The protective effect of street greenery on ecological , psychological , and behavioral phenomenon have been well recognized .', 'Nevertheless , the potential economic effect of daily accessed street greenery , i.e.', ", a human-scale and perceptual-oriented quality focusing on exposure to street greenery in people 's daily life , has not been fully studied because a quantitative measuring of this human-scale indicator is hard to achieve .", 'This study was an attempt in this direction with the help of new urban data and new analytical tool .', 'Shanghai , which has a mature real estate market , was selected for study , and the housing price of 1395 private neighborhood in its city center were collected .', 'We selected more than forty variable that were classified under five categories-location feature , distance to the closest facility , density of facility within a certain radius , housing and neighborhood feature , and daily accessed street greenery-in a hedonic pricing model .', 'The distance and density of facility were computed through a massive number of points-of-interest and a geographical information system .', 'The visible street greenery was collected from Baidu street view image and then measured via a machine-learning algorithm , while accessibility was measured through space syntax .', 'In addition to the well-recognized effect previously discovered , the result show that visible street greenery and street accessibility at global scale hold significant positive coefficient for housing price .', 'Visible street greenery even obtains the second-highest regression coefficient in the model .', 'Moreover , the combined assessment , the co-presence of local-scale accessibility and eye-level greenery , is significant for housing price as well .', 'This study provides a scientific and quantitative support for the significance of human-scale street greenery , making it an important issue in urban greening policy for urban planner and decision maker .', 'Designing with citizen : Challenge and evaluation method for crowd-sourced urban layout .', 'This paper presents analysis tool for evaluating crowdsourced geometry-based design proposal for urban planning .', 'With the Quick Urban Analysis Kit , an online platform , citizen are able to manipulate object and create a preferred layout over a case study area .', 'Given that our case study is on a meso-cale , our analysis is focused on the layout and plot configuration .', 'The proposed analysis tool range from simple counting of object type and a buffer analysis to clustering and spatial autocorrelation tool .', "Besides these form-based criterion , perception-based criterion are also proposed to link the participating subject 's assessment of the design with the layout .", 'Technique deployed include supervised machine learning method , statistical spatial test , and simple calculation of the area size and frequency of object .', 'StreetVizor : Visual Exploration of Human-Scale Urban Forms Based on Street Views .', 'Urban form at human-scale , i.e.', ', urban environment that individual can sense ( e.g.', ', sight , smell , and touch ) in their daily life , can provide unprecedented insight on a variety of application , such as urban planning and environment auditing .', 'The analysis of urban form can help planner develop high-quality urban space through evidence-based design .', 'However , such analysis is complex because of the involvement of spatial , multi-scale ( i.e.', ', city , region , and street ) , and multivariate ( e.g.', ', greenery and sky ratio ) nature of urban form .', 'In addition , current method either lack quantitative measurement or are limited to a small area .', 'The primary contribution of this work is the design of StreetVizor , an interactive visual analytics system that
