segmentation of overhead imagery .', 'We choose image semantic inpainting as a self-supervised task [ 36 ] for our experiment due to its proximity to the semantic segmentation task .', "We ( i ) show that existing approach are inefficient for semantic segmentation , ( ii ) propose architectural change towards self-supervised learning for semantic segmentation , ( iii ) propose an adversarial training scheme for self-supervised learning by increasing the pretext task 's difficulty gradually and show that it leads to learning better feature , and ( iv ) propose a unified approach for overhead scene parsing , road network extraction , and land cover estimation .", 'Our approach improves over training from scratch by more than 10 % and ImageNet pre-trained network by more than 5 % mIOU .', 'A big remote sensing data analysis using deep learning framework .', 'Spaceborne and airborne sensor deliver a huge number of Earth Observation Data every day .', 'In this context , we can easily observe the whole earth from its different side .', 'Therefore , this big data is important in remote sensing and could be exploited in several domain requiring image classification , natural hazard monitoring , global climate change , agriculture , urban planning .', 'Over the last five year , Convolutional Neural Networks ( CNN ) emerged as the most successful technique for the image classification task , as well as a number of other computer vision task .', 'However , to train million of parameter in CNN one requires a huge amount of annotated data .', 'This requirement leads to a significant challenge if the available training data is limited for a target task at hand .', 'To address this challenge , in the recent literature , researcher proposed various way to apply a technique called Transfer Learning to transfer the knowledge gained by training CNNs parameter on some large annotated dataset to the target task with limited availability of training data .', 'Most of our work in this paper was dedicated to proposing a hybrid classification of remote sensing image .', "This architecture combines Spark RDD image coding to consider image 's local region , pre-trained VGGNET-16 and UNET for image segmentation and SVM ( Support Vector Machines ) from spark Machine Learning to achieve labeling task .", 'Building extraction from LiDAR data applying deep convolutional neural network .', 'Deep learning paradigm has been shown to be a very efficient classification framework for many application scenario , including the analysis of Light Detection and Ranging ( LiDAR ) data for building detection .', 'In fact , deep learning act as a set of mathematical transformation , encoding the raw input data into appropriate form of representation that maximize the classification performance .', 'However , it is clear that mathematical computation alone , even highly nonlinear , are not adequate to model the physical property of a problem , distinguishing , for example , the building structure from vegetation .', 'In this letter , we address this difficulty by augmenting the raw LiDAR data with feature coming from a physical interpretation of the information .', 'Then , we exploit a deep learning paradigm based on a convolutional neural network model to find out the best input representation suitable for the classification .', 'As test site , three complex urban study area with various kind of building structure through the LiDAR data set of Vaihingen , Germany were selected .', "Our method has been evaluated in the context of 'ISPRS Test Project on Urban Classification and 3-D Building Reconstruction . '", 'Comparison with traditional method , such as artificial neural network and support vector machine-based classifier , indicate the outperformance of the proposed approach in term of robustness and efficiency .', 'Object-based detection of vehicle using combined optical and elevation data .', 'The detection of vehicle is an important and challenging topic that is relevant for many application .', 'In this work , we present a workflow that utilizes optical and elevation data to detect vehicle in remotely sensed urban data .', 'This workflow consists of three consecutive stage : candidate identification , classification , and single vehicle extraction .', 'Unlike in most previous approach , fusion of both data source is strongly pursued at all stage .', 'While the first stage utilizes the fact that most man-made object are rectangular in shape , the second and third stage employ machine learning technique combined with specific feature .', 'The stage are designed to handle multiple sensor input , which result in a significant improvement .', 'A detailed evaluation shows the benefit of our workflow , which includes hand-tailored feature ; even in comparison with classification approach based on Convolutional Neural Networks , which are state of the art in computer vision , we could obtain a comparable or superior performance ( F1 score of 0.96–0.94 ) .', 'Spectral-Spatial Residual Network for Hyperspectral Image Classification : A 3-D Deep Learning Framework .', 'In this paper , we designed an end-to-end spectral-spatial residual network ( SSRN ) that takes raw 3-D cube as input data without feature engineering for hyperspectral image classification .', 'In this network , the spectral and spatial residual block consecutively learn discriminative feature from abundant spectral signature and spatial contexts in hyperspectral imagery ( HSI ) .', 'The proposed SSRN is a supervised deep learning framework that alleviates the declining-accuracy phenomenon of other deep learning model .', 'Specifically , the residual block connect every other 3-D convolutional layer through identity mapping , which facilitates the backpropagation of gradient .', 'Furthermore , we impose batch normalization on every convolutional layer to regularize the learning process and improve the classification performance of trained model .', 'Quantitative and qualitative result demonstrate that the SSRN achieved the state-of-the-art HSI classification accuracy in agricultural , rural-urban , and urban data set : Indian Pines , Kennedy Space Center , and University of Pavia .', 'Building detection from orthophotos using binary feature classification .', 'Building detection in orthophotos is crucial for various application , such as urban planning and real-estate management .', 'In order to realize accurate and fast building detection , a non-interactive approach based on binary feature classification is brought forward in this paper .', 'The proposed approach includes two major stage , i.e.', ', building area detection and building contour extraction .', 'In the first stage , a sequence of intersection is obtained by superpixel segmentation in the subsampled orthophoto , and then building area is reserved roughly according to the classification of intersection .', 'In the second stage , the sequence of intersection is updated by superpixel segmentation in the building area from original orthophoto , and then building contours is extracted in accordance with the classification of intersection likewise .', 'The local feature of the intersection is descripted employing our extremely compact binary descriptor , and is classified using binary bag-of-features .', 'Experiment show that benefiting from binary description and making full use of texture detail and color channel , the proposed descriptor is not only computationally frugal , but also accurate .', 'Experiment are also conducted on orthophotos with different roof color , texture , shape , size and orientation , and demonstrate that the proposed approach are capable of achieving desirable result .', 'Understanding Historical Cityscape from Aerial Imagery Through Machine Learning .', 'Understanding cityscape using remote sensing data has been an active research field for more than two decade .', 'Meanwhile , machine learning provides generalization capability compared to hierarchical and rule-based method .', 'This paper evaluates several machine learning algorithm in order to fuse shadow detection and shadow compensation method for building detection using high resolution aerial imagery .', 'Three complex and real-life urban study area were used as test datasets with various : ( i ) kind of building structure of special architecture , ( ii ) pixel resolution and , ( iii ) type of data .', 'Objective evaluation metric have been used for assessing the compared algorithm such recall , precision and F1-score as well as rate of completeness , correctness and quality .', 'For both approach , i.e.', ', shadow detection and building detection , the computational complexity of each machine learning algorithm was examined .', 'The result indicate that deep learning scheme , such a Convolutional Neural Network ( CNN ) , provides the best classification performance in term of shadow detection and building detection .', 'Automatic semantic segmentation for change detection in remote sensing image .', 'Change detection ( CD ) mainly focuses on the extraction of change information from multispectral remote sensing image of the same geographical location for environmental monitoring , natural disaster evaluation , urban study , and deforestation monitoring .', 'While capturing the Landsat imagery , there may occur data missing issue such as occlusion of cloud , camera sensor , and aperture artifact .', 'The existing machine learning approach do not provide significant result .', 'This paper proposes a DeepLab Dilated convolutional neural network ( DL-DCNN ) for semantic segmentation with the goal to occur the change map for earth observation application .', 'Experimental result reveal that the accuracy of the proposed change detection result provides improved result as compared with the existing algorithms and maps the semantic object within the predefined class as change or no change .', 'Using convolutional network and satellite imagery to identify pattern in urban environment at a large scale .', 'Urban planning application ( energy audit , investment , etc . )', 'require an understanding of built infrastructure and its environment , i.e.', ', both low-level , physical feature ( amount of vegetation , building area and geometry etc . )', ', as well as higher-level concept such as land use class ( which encode expert understanding of socioeconomic end uses ) .', 'This kind of data is expensive and labor-intensive to obtain , which limits its availability ( particularly in developing country ) .', 'We analyze pattern in land use in urban neighborhood using large-scale satellite imagery data ( which is available worldwide from third-party provider ) and state-of-the-art computer vision technique based on deep convolutional neural network .', 'For supervision , given the limited availability of standard benchmark for remote-sensing data , we obtain ground truth land use class label carefully sampled from open-source survey , in particular the Urban Atlas land classification dataset of 20 land use classes across 300 European city .', 'We use this data to train and compare deep architecture which have recently shown good performance on standard computer vision task ( image classification and segmentation ) , including on geospatial data .', 'Furthermore , we show that the deep representation extracted from satellite imagery of urban environment can be used to compare neighborhood across several city .', 'We make our dataset available for other machine learning researcher to use for remote-sensing application .', 'Building detection from orthophotos using a machine learning approach : An empirical study on image segmentation and descriptor .', 'Building detection from aerial image has many application in field like urban planning , real-estate management , and disaster relief .', 'In the last two decade , a large variety of method on automatic building detection have been proposed in the remote sensing literature .', 'Many of these approach make use of local feature to classify each pixel or segment to an object label , therefore involving an extra step to fuse pixelwise decision .', 'This paper presents a generic framework that exploits recent advance in image segmentation and region descriptor extraction for the automatic and accurate detection of building on aerial orthophotos .', 'The proposed solution is supervised in the sense that appearance of building are learnt from example .', 'For the first time in the context of building detection , we use the matrix covariance descriptor , which proves to be very informative and compact .', 'Moreover , we introduce a principled evaluation that allows selecting the best pair segmentation algorithm-region descriptor for the task of building detection .', 'Finally , we provide a performance evaluation at pixel level using different classifier .', 'This evaluation is conducted over 200 building using different segmentation algorithms and descriptor .', 'The performance analysis quantifies the quality of both the image segmentation and the descriptor used .', 'The proposed approach presents several advantage in term of scalability , suitability and simplicity with respect to the existing method .', 'Furthermore , the proposed scheme ( detection chain and evaluation ) can be deployed for detecting multiple object category that are present in image and can be used by intelligent system requiring scene perception and parsing such as intelligent unmanned aerial vehicle navigation and automatic 3D city modeling .', 'Building detection in very high resolution multispectral data with deep learning feature .', 'The automated man-made object detection and building extraction from single satellite image is , still , one of the most challenging task for various urban planning and monitoring engineering application .', 'To this end , in this paper we propose an automated building detection framework from very high resolution remote sensing data based on deep convolutional neural network .', 'The core of the developed method is based on a supervised classification procedure employing a very large training dataset .', 'An MRF model is then responsible for obtaining the optimal label regarding the detection of scene building .', 'The experimental result and the performed quantitative validation indicate the quite promising potential of the developed approach .', 'Improving Spatial Feature Representation from Aerial Scenes by Using Convolutional Networks .', 'The performance of image classification is highly dependent on the quality of extracted feature .', 'Concerning high resolution remote image image , encoding the spatial feature in an efficient and robust fashion is the key to generating discriminatory model to classify them .', 'Even though many visual descriptor have been proposed or successfully used to encode spatial feature of remote sensing image , some application , using this sort of image , demand more specific description technique .', 'Deep Learning , an emergent machine learning approach based on neural network , is capable of learning specific feature and classifier at the same time and adjust at each step , in real time , to better fit the need of each problem .', 'For several task , such image classification , it has achieved very good result , mainly boosted by the feature learning performed which allows the method to extract specific and adaptable visual feature depending on the data .', 'In this paper , we propose a novel network capable of learning specific spatial feature from remote sensing image , with any pre-processing step or descriptor evaluation , and classify them .', 'Specifically , automatic feature learning task aim at discovering hierarchical structure from the raw data , leading to a more representative information .', 'This task not only poses interesting challenge for existing vision and recognition algorithms , but also brings huge opportunity for urban planning , crop and forest management and climate modelling .', 'The propose convolutional neural network has six layer : three convolutional , two fully-connected and one classifier layer .', 'So , the five first layer are responsible to extract visual feature while the last one is responsible to classify the image .', 'We conducted a systematic evaluation of the proposed method using two datasets : ( i ) the popular aerial image dataset UCMerced Land-use and , ( ii ) a multispectral high-resolution scene of the Brazilian Coffee Scenes .', 'The experiment show that the proposed method outperforms state-of-the-art algorithm in term of overall accuracy .']

['Automatic Target Detection from Satellite Imagery Using Machine Learning .', 'Object detection is a vital step in satellite imagery-based computer vision application such as precision agriculture , urban planning and defense application .', 'In satellite imagery , object detection is a very complicated task due to various reason including low pixel resolution of object and detection of small object in the large scale ( a single satellite image taken by Digital Globe com-prises over 240 million pixel ) satellite image .', 'Object detection in satellite image has many challenge such as class variation , multiple object pose , high variance in object size , illumination and a dense background .', 'This study aims to compare the performance of existing deep learning algorithms for object detection in satellite imagery .', 'We created the dataset of satellite imagery to perform object detection using convolutional neural network-based framework such as faster RCNN ( faster region-based convolutional neural network ) , YOLO ( you only look once ) , SSD ( single-shot detector ) and SIMRDWN ( satellite imagery multiscale rapid detection with windowed network ) .', 'In addition to that , we also performed an analysis of these approach in term of accuracy and speed using the developed dataset of satellite imagery .', 'The result showed that SIMRDWN has an accuracy of 97 % on high-resolution image , while Faster RCNN has an accuracy of 95.31 % on the standard resolution ( 1000 × 600 ) .', 'YOLOv3 has an accuracy of 94.20 % on standard resolution ( 416 416 ) while on the other hand SSD has an accuracy of 84.61 % on standard resolution ( 300 × 300 ) .', 'When it comes to speed and efficiency , YOLO is the obvious leader .', 'In real-time surveillance , SIMRDWN fails .', 'When YOLO takes 170 to 190 millisecond to perform a task , SIMRDWN takes 5 to 103 millisecond .', 'Cloud detection using an ensemble of pixel-based machine learning model incorporating unsupervised classification .', 'Remote sensing imagery , such as that provided by the United States Geological Survey ( USGS ) Landsat satellites , has been widely used to study environmental protection , hazard analysis , and urban planning for decade .', 'Cloud are a constant challenge for such imagery and , if not handled correctly , can cause a variety of issue for a wide range of remote sensing analysis .', 'Typically , cloud mask algorithms use the entire image ; in this study we present an ensemble of different pixel-based approach to cloud pixel modeling .', 'Based on four training subset with a selection of different input feature , 12 machine learning model were created .', 'We evaluated these model using the cropped LC8-Biome cloud validation dataset .', 'As a comparison , Fmask was also applied to the cropped scene Biome dataset .', 'One goal of this research is to explore a machine learning modeling approach that uses as small a training data sample as possible but still provides an accurate model .', 'Overall , the model trained on the sample subset ( 1.3 % of the total training sample ) that includes unsupervised Self-Organizing Map classification result as an input feature has the best performance .', 'The approach achieves 98.57 % overall accuracy , 1.18 % cloud omission error , and 0.93 % cloud commission error on the 88 cropped test image .', 'By comparison to Fmask 4.0 , this model improves the accuracy by 10.12 % and reduces the cloud omission error by 6.39 % .', 'Furthermore , using an additional eight independent validation image that were not sampled in model training , the model trained on the second largest subset with an additional five feature has the highest overall accuracy at 86.35 % , with 12.48 % cloud omission error and 7.96 % cloud commission error .', 'This model ’ s overall correctness increased by 3.26 % , and the cloud omission error decreased by 1.28 % compared to Fmask 4.0 .', 'The machine learning cloud classification model discussed in this paper could achieve very good performance utilizing only a small portion of the total training pixel available .', 'We showed that a pixel-based cloud classification model , and that as each scene obviously has unique spectral characteristic , and having a small portion of example pixel from each of the sub-regions in a scene can improve the model accuracy significantly .', 'Assessment of combining convolutional neural network and object based image analysis to land cover classification using sentinel 2 satellite imagery ( Tenes Region , Algeria ) .', 'Land cover map can provide valuable information for various application , such as territorial monitoring , environmental protection , urban planning and climate change prevention .', 'In this purpose , remote sensing based on image classification approaches undergoing a high revolution can be dedicated to land cover mapping task .', 'Similarly , deep learning model are considerably applied in remote sensing application ; which can automatically learn feature from large amount of data .', 'Prevalently , the Convolutional Neural Network ( CNN ) , have been increasingly performed in image classification .', 'The aim of this study is to apply a new approach to analyse land cover , and extract its feature .', 'Experiment carried out on a coastal town located in north-western Algeria ( Ténès region ) .', 'The study area is chosen because of its importance as a part of the national strategy to combat natural hazard , specifically flood .', 'As well as , a simple CNN model with two hidden layer was constructed , combined with an Object-Based Image Analysis ( OBIA ) .', 'In this regard , a Sentinel-2 image was used , to perform the classification , using spectral index combination .', 'Furthermore , to compare the performance of the proposed approach , an OBIA based on machine learning algorithms mainly Random Forest ( RF ) and Support Vector Machine ( SVM ) , was provided .', 'Result of accuracy assessment of classification showed good value in term of Overall accuracy and Kappa Index , which reach to 93.1 % and 0.91 , respectively .', 'As a comparison , CNN-OBIA approach outperformed OBIA based on RF algorithm .', 'Therefore , Final land cover map can be used as a support tool in regional and national decision .', 'A refined method of high-resolution remote sensing change detection based on machine learning for newly constructed building area .', 'Automatic detection of newly constructed building area ( NCBAs ) plays an important role in addressing issue of ecological environment monitoring , urban management , and urban planning .', 'Compared with low-and-middle resolution remote sensing image , high-resolution remote sensing image are superior in spatial resolution and display of refined spatial detail .', 'Yet its problem of spectral heterogeneity and complexity have impeded research of change detection for high-resolution remote sensing image .', 'As generalized machine learning ( including deep learning ) technology proceed , the efficiency and accuracy of recognition for ground-object in remote sensing have been substantially improved , providing a new solution for change detection of high-resolution remote sensing image .', 'To this end , this study proposes a refined NCBAs detection method consisting of four part based on generalized machine learning : ( 1 ) pre-processing ; ( 2 ) candidate NCBAs are obtained by mean of bi-temporal building mask acquired by deep learning semantic segmentation , and then registered one by one ; ( 3 ) rule and support vector machine ( SVM ) are jointly adopted for classification of NCBAs with high , medium and low confidence ; and ( 4 ) the final vector of NCBAs are obtained by post-processing .', 'In addition , area-based and pixel-based method are adopted for accuracy assessment .', 'Firstly , the proposed method is applied to three group of GF1 image covering the urban fringe area of Jinan , whose experimental result are divided into three category : high , high-medium , and high-medium-low confidence .', 'The result show that NCBAs of high confidence share the highest F1 score and the best overall effect .', 'Therefore , only NCBAs of high confidence are considered to be the final detection result by this method .', 'Specifically , in NCBAs detection for three group GF1 image in Jinan , the mean Recall of area-based and pixel-based assessment method reach around 77 % and 91 % , respectively , the mean Pixel Accuracy ( PA ) 88 % and 92 % , and the mean F1 82 % and 91 % , confirming the effectiveness of this method on GF1 .', 'Similarly , the proposed method is applied to two group of ZY302 image in Xi ’ an and Kunming .', 'The score of F1 for two group of ZY302 image are also above 90 % respectively , confirming the effectiveness of this method on ZY302 .', 'It can be concluded that adoption of area registration improves registration efficiency , and the joint use of prior rule and SVM classifier with probability feature could avoid over and missing detection for NCBAs .', 'In practical application , this method is contributive to automatic NCBAs detection from high-resolution remote sensing image .', 'Use of deep learning model in street-level image to classify one-story unreinforced masonry building based on roof diaphragms .', 'In this paper , we explore the potential of convolutional neural network to classify street-level imagery of one-story unreinforced masonry building ( MURs ) according to the flexibility of the roof diaphragm ( rigid or flexible ) .', 'This information is critical for vulnerability study , disaster risk assessment , disaster management strategy , etc.', ', and is of great relevance in city where unreinforced masonry is the most common building typology or where the majority of the population resides in such building .', 'Our contribution could be useful for local government of city in developing country seeking to significantly reduce the number of death caused by disaster .', 'Our research result indicate that VGG19 is the convolutional neural network architecture with the best performance , with an accuracy of 0.80 , a precision of 0.88 , and a recall of 0.84 .', 'The result are encouraging and could be used to reduce the amount of resource ( both human and economic ) for the development of detailed exposure model for unreinforced masonry building .', 'Development of a Methodology for Complex Monitoring of the Development of Urban and Suburban Areas Based on the Intellectual Analysis of Earth Remote Sensing Data and Geospatial Technologies .', 'Over the past half century , mankind is increasingly faced with the problem of rational use of the Earth ’ s territory and its resource without negative impact on the environment and the person himself .', 'The organization of human life activity requires solving the issue of urban planning and the correct distribution of zone for the construction of industrial facility , recreation , waste disposal zone , communication , route , etc .', 'Balanced planning is based on monitoring the current state of infrastructure and territory .', 'This article proposes a methodology for integrated monitoring of the development of urban and suburban area .', 'It is proposed to use Earth remote sensing data as a basis for the study .', 'The issue of collection , integration and intelligent processing of satellite image are considered .', 'The definition and segmentation of object in image to create digital map is performed based on machine learning algorithms .', 'Remote sensing and GIS approach for environmental green area planning using Landsat satellite imagery , Dubai-UAE .', 'Over the last decade , Dubai emirate witnessed a vast , rapidly growing population , that doubled since 2008 .', 'Nowadays , Dubai considers as the most populated emirate within the United Arab Emirates ( UAE ) .', "With such an increasing population and new urban development , sustainable urban planning procedure play an essential role in Dubai 's environmental quality such as air quality , and pollution .", "Therefore , this study will utilize the Remote Sensing and Geographic Information system ( GIS ) to investigate Dubai 's environmental quality by addressing and locating green area and pollution percentage within each district .", 'The study methodology is divided into three step .', 'First , Landsat Satellite medium spatial resolution and multi-spectral imagery will be used as an input for segmentation and object-based analysis .', 'Considering the spectral and spatial signature for green area machine learning technique will be adopted to select the most significant feature to classify and extract green area .', 'Second , using environmental relational index , green area percentage will be quantitatively compared to Sentinel air quality data , such as NO2 and SO2 , as well as the population density map .', 'Finally , GIS technique will be used to create Dubai Environmental Critical Map ( DECM ) , to locate district with limited green area and high pollution to improve environmental standard .', 'The study result can be used as a measure for the municipality policymakers to ensure sustainable urban development for a healthy living .', 'Google Earth Engine Cloud Computing Platform for Remote Sensing Big Data Application : A Comprehensive Review .', 'Remote sensing ( RS ) system have been collecting massive volume of datasets for decade , managing and analyzing of which are not practical using common software package and desktop computing resource .', 'In this regard , Google has developed a cloud computing platform , called Google Earth Engine ( GEE ) , to effectively address the challenge of big data analysis .', 'In particular , this platform facilitates processing big geo data over large area and monitoring the environment for long period of time .', 'Although this platform was launched in 2010 and has proved its high potential for different application , it has not been fully investigated and utilized for RS application until recent year .', 'Therefore , this study aims to comprehensively explore different aspect of the GEE platform , including its datasets , function , advantages/limitations , and various application .', 'For this purpose , 450 journal article published in 150 journal between January 2010 and May 2020 were studied .', 'It was observed that Landsat and Sentinel datasets were extensively utilized by GEE user .', 'Moreover , supervised machine learning algorithms , such as Random Forest , were more widely applied to image classification task .', 'GEE has also been employed in a broad range of application , such as Land Cover/land Use classification , hydrology , urban planning , natural disaster , climate analysis , and image processing .', 'It was generally observed that the number of GEE publication have significantly increased during the past few year , and it is expected that GEE will be utilized by more user from different field to resolve their big data processing challenge .', 'A Self-Supervised Learning Framework for Road Centerline Extraction from High-Resolution Remote Sensing Images .', 'Road extraction from the high-resolution remote sensing image is significant for the land planning , vehicle navigation , etc .', 'The existing road extraction method normally need many preprocessing and subsequent optimization step .', 'Therefore , an automatic road centerline extraction method based on the self-supervised learning framework for high-resolution remote sensing image is proposed .', 'This proposed method does not need to manually select training sample and other optimization step , such as the nonroad area removing .', 'First , the positive sample selection method combining the spectral and shape feature is proposed to extract the road sample .', 'Then , the one-class classifier framework is introduced and the random forest positive unlabeled learning classifier is constructed to get the posterior probability of the pixel belonging to road .', 'The shape feature and the posterior probability are combined to form the final road network in the object-oriented way .', 'Finally , the road centerline is obtained through the tensor voting algorithm .', 'In order to verify the effectiveness of the proposed algorithm , high-resolution remote sensing image and benchmark datasets are used to do experiment .', 'The index of the completeness ratio , the correctness ratio , and the detection quality are used for the quantitative accuracy evaluation .', 'Compared with the supervised , the unsupervised , and the one-class classification road extraction algorithms , this proposed algorithm achieves high accuracy and efficiency .', 'For the deep learning method comparison , the deep learning method performs well in most case especially in the complex urban area .', 'However , the deep learning method needs a large number of sample and a long training time , and our self-supervised learning framework does not need the training sample .', 'Mapping Urban Trees Within Cadastral Parcels Using an Object-Based Convolutional Neural Network .', 'Urban tree offer significant benefit for improving the sustainability and liveability of city , but its monitoring is a major challenge for urban planner .', 'Remote-sensing based technology can effectively detect , monitor and quantify urban tree coverage as an alternative to field-based measurement .', 'Automatic extraction of urban land cover features with high accuracy is a challenging task and it demands artificial intelligence workflow for efficiency and thematic quality .', 'In this context , the objective of this research is to map urban tree coverage per cadastral parcel of Sandy Bay , Hobart from very high-resolution aerial orthophoto and LiDAR data using an Object Based Convolution Neural Network ( CNN ) approach .', 'Instead of manual preparation of a large number of required training sample , automatically classified Object based image analysis ( OBIA ) output is used as an input sample to train CNN method .', 'Also , CNN output is further refined and segmented using OBIA to assess the accuracy .', 'The result shows 93.2 % overall accuracy for refined CNN classification .', 'Similarly , the overlay of improved CNN output with cadastral parcel layer shows that 21.5 % of the study area is covered by tree .', 'This research demonstrates that the accuracy of image classification can be improved by using a combination of OBIA and CNN method .', 'Such a combined method can be used where manual preparation of training sample for CNN is not preferred .', 'Also , our result indicate that the technique can be implemented to calculate parcel level statistic for urban tree coverage that provides meaningful metric to guide urban planning and land management practice .', 'Multiscale road centerline extraction from high-resolution aerial imagery .', 'Accurate road extraction from high-resolution aerial imagery has many application such as urban planning and vehicle navigation system .', 'The common road extraction method are based on classification algorithm , which needs to design robust handcrafted feature for road .', 'However , designing such feature is difficult .', 'For the road centerlines extraction problem , the existing algorithms have some limitation , such as spur , time consuming .', 'To address the above issue to some extent , we introduce the feature learning based on deep learning to extract robust feature automatically , and present a method to extract road centerline based on multiscale Gabor filter and multiple directional non-maximum suppression .', 'The proposed algorithm consists of the following four step .', 'Firstly , the aerial imagery is classified by a pixel-wise classifier based on convolutional neural network ( CNN ) .', 'Specifically , CNN is used to learn feature from raw data automatically , especially the structural feature .', 'Then , edge-preserving filtering is conducted on the resulting classification map , with the original imagery serving as the guidance image .', 'It is exploited to preserve the edge and the detail of the road .', 'After that , we do some post-processing based on shape feature to extract more reliable road .', 'Finally , multiscale Gabor filter and multiple directional non-maximum suppression are integrated to get a complete and accurate road network .', 'Experimental result show that the proposed method can achieve comparable or higher quantitative result , as well as more satisfactory visual performance .', 'Ultra-Light aircraft-based hyperspectral and colour-infrared imaging to identify deciduous tree specie in an urban environment .', 'One may consider the application of remote sensing as a trade-off between the imaging platform , sensor , and data gathering and processing technique .', 'This study addresses the potential of hyperspectral imaging using ultra-light aircraft for vegetation specie mapping in an urban environment , exploring both the engineering and scientific aspect related to imaging platform design and image classification method .', 'An imaging system based on simultaneous use of Rikola frame format hyperspectral and Nikon D800E adopted colour infrared camera installed onboard a Bekas X32 manned ultra-light aircraft is introduced .', 'Two test imaging flight mission were conducted in July of 2015 and September of 2016 over a 4000 ha area in Kaunas City , Lithuania .', 'Sixteen and 64 spectral band in 2015 and 2016 , respectively , in a spectral range of 500-900 nm were recorded with colour infrared image .', 'Three research question were explored assessing the identification of six deciduous tree specie : ( 1 ) Pre-treatment of spectral feature for classification , ( 2 ) testing five conventional machine learning classifier , and ( 3 ) fusion of hyperspectral and colour infrared image .', 'Classification performance was assessed by applying leave-one-out cross-validation at the individual crown level and using as a reference at least 100 field inventoried tree for each specie .', 'The best-performing classification algorithm-multilayer perceptron , using all spectral property extracted from the hyperspectral images-resulted in a moderate classification accuracy .', "The overall classification accuracy was 63 % , Cohen 's Kappa was 0.54 , and the species-specific classification accuracy were in the range of 51-72 % .", 'Hyperspectral image resulted in significantly better tree specie classification ability than the colour infrared image and simultaneous use of spectral property extracted from hyperspectral and colour infrared image improved slightly the accuracy over the 2015 image .', 'Even though classification using hyperspectral data cube of 64 band resulted in relatively larger accuracy than with 16 band , classification error matrix were not statistically different .', 'Alternative imaging platform ( like an unmanned aerial vehicle and a Cessna 172 aircraft ) and setting of the flight were discussed using simulated imaging project assuming the same study area and field of application .', 'Ultra-light aircraft-based hyperspectral and colour-infrared imaging was considered to be a technically and economically sound solution for urban green space inventory to facilitate tree mapping , characterization , and monitoring .', 'Road centerline extraction from very-high-resolution aerial image and LiDAR data based on road connectivity .', 'The road network provide key information for a broad range of application such as urban planning , urban management , and navigation .', 'The fast-developing technology of remote sensing that acquires high-resolution observational data of the land surface offers opportunity for automatic extraction of road network .', 'However , the road network extracted from remote sensing image are likely affected by shadow and tree , making the road map irregular and inaccurate .', 'This research aims to improve the extraction of road centerline using both very-high-resolution ( VHR ) aerial image and light detection and ranging ( LiDAR ) by accounting for road connectivity .', 'The proposed method first applies the fractal net evolution approach ( FNEA ) to segment remote sensing image into image object and then classifies image objects using the machine learning classifier , random forest .', 'A post-processing approach based on the minimum area bounding rectangle ( MABR ) is proposed and a structure feature index is adopted to obtain the complete road network .', 'Finally , a multistep approach , that is , morphology thinning , Harris corner detection , and least square fitting ( MHL ) approach , is designed to accurately extract the road centerline from the complex road network .', 'The proposed method is applied to three datasets , including the New York dataset obtained from the object identification dataset , the Vaihingen dataset obtained from the International Society for Photogrammetry and Remote Sensing ( ISPRS ) 2D semantic labelling benchmark and Guangzhou dataset .', 'Compared with two state-of-the-art method , the proposed method can obtain the highest completeness , correctness , and quality for the three datasets .', 'The experiment result show that the proposed method is an efficient solution for extracting road centerline in complex scene from VHR aerial image and light detection and ranging ( LiDAR ) data .', 'Context-Based Filtering of Noisy Labels for Automatic Basemap Updating from UAV Data .', 'Unmanned aerial vehicle ( UAVs ) have the potential to obtain high-resolution aerial imagery at frequent interval , making them a valuable tool for urban planner who require up-to-date basemaps .', 'Supervised classification method can be exploited to translate the UAV data into such basemaps .', 'However , these method require labeled training sample , the collection of which may be complex and time consuming .', 'Existing spatial datasets can be exploited to provide the training label , but these often contain error due to difference in the date or resolution of the dataset from which these outdated label were obtained .', 'In this paper , we propose an approach for updating basemaps using global and local contextual cue to automatically remove unreliable sample from the training set , and thereby , improve the classification accuracy .', 'Using UAV datasets over Kigali , Rwanda , and Dar es Salaam , Tanzania , we demonstrate how the amount of mislabeled training sample can be reduced by 44.1 % and 35.5 % , respectively , leading to a classification accuracy of 92.1 % in Kigali and 91.3 % in Dar es Salaam .', 'To achieve the same accuracy in Dar es Salaam , between 50000 and 60000 manually labeled image segment would be needed .', 'This demonstrates that the proposed approach of using outdated spatial data to provide label and iteratively removing unreliable sample is a viable method for obtaining high classification accuracy while reducing the costly step of acquiring labeled training sample .', 'Application of machine learning in urban greenery land cover extraction .', 'Urban greenery is a critical part of the modern city and the greenery coverage information is essential for land resource management , environmental monitoring and urban planning .', 'It is a challenging work to extract the urban greenery information from remote sensing image as the tree and grassland are mixed with city built-ups .', 'In this paper , we propose a new automatic pixel-based greenery extraction method using multispectral remote sensing image .', 'The method includes three main step .', 'First , a small part of the image is manually interpreted to provide prior knowledge .', 'Secondly , a five-layer neural network is trained and optimised with the manual extraction result , which are divided to serve as training sample , verification sample and testing sample .', 'Lastly , the well-trained neural network will be applied to the unlabelled data to perform the greenery extraction .', 'The GF-2 and GJ-1 high resolution multispectral remote sensing image were used to extract greenery coverage information in the built-up area of city X .', 'It shows a favourable performance in the 619 square kilometer area .', 'Also , when comparing with the traditional NDVI method , the proposed method gives a more accurate delineation of the greenery region .', 'Due to the advantage of low computational load and high accuracy , it has a great potential for large area greenery auto extraction , which saves a lot of manpower and resource .', 'CC BY 4.0 License .', 'Exploring the optimal integration level between SAR and optical data for better urban land cover mapping in the Pearl River Delta .', 'Integrating synthetic aperture radar ( SAR ) and optical data to improve urban land cover classification has been identified as a promising approach .', 'However , which integration level is the most suitable remains unclear but important to many researcher and engineer .', 'This study aimed to compare different integration level for providing a scientific reference for a wide range of study using optical and SAR data .', 'SAR data from TerraSAR-X and ENVISAT ASAR in both WSM and IMP mode were used to be combined with optical data at pixel level , feature level and decision level using four typical machine learning method .', 'The experimental result indicated that : 1 ) feature level that used both the original image and extracted feature achieved a significant improvement of up to 10 % compared to that using optical data alone ; 2 ) different level of fusion required different suitable method depending on the data distribution and data resolution .', 'For instance , support vector machine was the most stable at both the feature and decision level , while random forest was suitable at the pixel level but not suitable at the decision level .', '3 ) By examining the distribution of SAR feature , some feature ( e.g.', ', homogeneity ) exhibited a close-to-normal distribution , explaining the improvement from the maximum likelihood method at the feature and decision level .', 'This indicated the benefit of using texture feature from SAR data when being combined with optical data for land cover classification .', 'Additionally , the research also shown that combining optical and SAR data does not guarantee improvement compared with using single data source for urban land cover classification , depending on the selection of appropriate fusion level and fusion method .', 'Land Classification Using Remotely Sensed Data : Going Multilabel .', 'Obtaining an up-to-date high-resolution description of land cover is a challenging task due to the high cost and labor-intensive process of human annotation through field study .', 'This work introduces a radically novel approach for achieving this goal by exploiting the proliferation of remote sensing satellite imagery , allowing for the up-to-date generation of global-scale land cover map .', 'We propose the application of multilabel classification , a powerful framework in machine learning , for inferring the complex relationship between the acquired satellite image and the spectral profile of different type of surface material .', 'Introducing a drastically different approach compared to unsupervised spectral unmixing , we employ contemporary ground-collected data from the European Environment Agency to generate the label set and multispectral image from the MODIS sensor to generate the spectral feature , under a supervised classification framework .', 'To validate the merit of our approach , we present result using several state-of-the-art multilabel learning classifier and evaluate their predictive performance with respect to the number of annotated training example , as well as their capability to exploit example from neighboring region or different time instance .', 'We also demonstrate the application of our method on hyperspectral data from the Hyperion sensor for the urban land cover estimation of New York City .', 'Experimental result suggest that the proposed framework can achieve excellent prediction accuracy , even from a limited number of diverse training example , surpassing state-of-the-art spectral unmixing method .']

['Evaluating the ability to use contextual feature derived from multi-scale satellite imagery to map spatial pattern of urban attribute and population distribution .', 'With an increasing global population , accurate and timely population count are essential for urban planning and disaster management .', 'Previous research using contextual feature , using mainly very-high-spatial-resolution imagery ( & lt ; 2 m spatial resolution ) at subnational to city scale , has found strong correlation with population and poverty .', 'Contextual feature can be defined as the statistical quantification of edge pattern , pixel group , gap , texture , and the raw spectral sig-natures calculated over group of pixel or neighborhood .', 'While they correlated with population and poverty , which component of the human-modified landscape were captured by the contextual feature have not been investigated .', 'Additionally , previous research has focused on more costly , less frequently acquired very-high-spatial-resolution imagery .', 'Therefore , contextual feature from both very-high-spatial-resolution imagery and lower-spatial-resolution Sentinel-2 ( 10 m pixel ) imagery in Sri Lanka , Belize , and Accra , Ghana were calculated , and those output were correlated with OpenStreetMap building and road metric .', 'These relationship were compared to determine what component of the human-modified landscape the feature capture , and how spatial resolution and location impact the predictive power of these relationship .', 'The result suggest that contextual feature can map urban attribute well , with out-of-sample R2 values up to 93 % .', 'Moreover , the degradation of spatial resolution did not significantly reduce the result , and for some urban attribute , the result actually improved .', 'Based on these result , the ability of the lower resolution Sentinel-2 data to predict the population density of the smallest census unit available was then assessed .', 'The finding indicate that Sentinel-2 contextual feature explained up to 84 % of the out-of-sample variation for population density .', 'Mapping essential urban land use category with open big data : Result for five metropolitan area in the United States of America .', 'Urban land-use map outlining the distribution , pattern , and composition of various land use type are critically important for urban planning , environmental management , disaster control , health protection , and biodiversity conservation .', 'Recent advance in remote sensing and social sensing data and method have shown great potential in mapping urban land use category , but they are still constrained by mixed land us , limited predictor , non-localized model , and often relatively low accuracy .', 'To inform these issue , we proposed a robust and cost-effective framework for mapping urban land use category using openly available multi-source geospatial “ big data ” .', 'With street block generated from OpenStreetMap ( OSM ) data as the minimum classification unit , we integrated an expansive set of multi-scale spatially explicit information on land surface , vertical height , socio-economic attribute , social medium , demography , and topography .', 'We further proposed to apply the automatic ensemble learning that leverages a bunch of machine learning algorithm in deriving optimal urban land use classification map .', 'Result of block-level urban land use classification in five metropolitan area of the United States found the overall accuracy of major-class ( Level-I ) and minor-class ( Level-II ) classification could be high as 91 % and 86 % , respectively .', 'A multi-model comparison revealed that for urban land use classification with high-dimensional feature , the multi-layer stacking ensemble model achieved better performance than base model such as random forest , extremely randomized tree , LightGBM , CatBoost , and neural network .', 'We found without very-high-resolution National Agriculture Imagery Program imagery , the classification result derived from Sentinel-1 , Sentinel-2 , and other open big data based feature could achieve plausible overall accuracy of Level-I and Level-II classification at 88 % and 81 % , respectively .', 'We also found that model transferability depended highly on the heterogeneity in characteristic of different region .', 'The method and finding in this study systematically elucidate the role of data source , classification method , and feature transferability in block-level land use classification , which have important implication for mapping multi-scale essential urban land use category .', 'Assessment of deep learning technique for land use land cover classification in southern new caledonia .', 'Land use ( LU ) and land cover ( LC ) are two complementary piece of cartographic information used for urban planning and environmental monitoring .', 'In the context of New Caledonia , a biodiversity hotspot , the availability of up-to-date LULC maps is essential to monitor the impact of extreme event such as cyclone and human activity on the environment .', 'With the democratization of satellite data and the development of high-performance deep learning technique , it is possible to create these data automatically .', 'This work aims at determining the best current deep learning configuration ( pixel-wise vs. semantic labelling architecture , data augmentation , image prepos-sessing , … ) , to perform LULC mapping in a complex , subtropical environment .', 'For this purpose , a specific data set based on SPOT6 satellite data was created and made available for the scientific community as an LULC benchmark in a tropical , complex environment using five representative area of New Caledonia labelled by a human operator : four used as training set , and the fifth as a test set .', 'Several architecture were trained and the resulting classification was compared with a state-of-the-art machine learning technique : XGboost .', 'We also assessed the relevance of popular neo-channels derived from the raw observation in the context of deep learning .', 'The deep learning approach showed comparable result to XGboost for LC detection and over-performed it on the LU detection task ( 61.45 % vs. 51.56 % of overall accuracy ) .', 'Finally , adding LC classification output of the dedicated deep learning architecture to the raw channel input significantly improved the overall accuracy of the deep learning LU classification task ( 63.61 % of overall accuracy ) .', 'All the data used in this study are available on line for the remote sensing community and for assessing other LULC detection technique .', 'Optimization of a novel urban growth simulation model integrating an artificial fish swarm algorithm and cellular automata for a smart city .', 'As one of the 17 Sustainable Development Goals , it is sensible to analysis historical urban land use characteristic and project the potential of urban sustainable development for a smart city .', 'The cellular automaton ( CA ) model is the widely applied in simulating urban growth , but the optimum parameter of variable driving urban growth in the model remains to be continued to improve .', 'We propose a novel model integrating an artificial fish swarm algorithm ( AFSA ) and CA for optimizing parameter of variable in the urban growth model and make a comparison between AFSA-CA and other five model , which is used to study a 40-year urban land growth of Wuhan .', 'We found that the urban growth type from 1995 to 2015 appeared relatively consistent , mainly including infilling , edge-expansion and distant-leap type in Wuhan , which a certain range of urban land growth on the periphery of the central area .', 'Additionally , although the genetic algorithms ( GA ) -CA model and the AFSA-CA model among the six model due to the distance variable , the parameter value of the GA-CA model is −15.5409 according to the fact that the population ( POP ) variable should be positively .', 'As a result , the AFSA-CA model regardless of the initial parameter setting is superior to the GA-CA model and the GA-CA model is superior to all the other model .', 'Finally , it is projected that the potential of urban growth in Wuhan for 2025 and 2035 under three scenario ( natural urban land growth without any restriction ( NULG ) , sustainable urban land growth with cropland protection and ecological security ( SULG ) , and economic urban land growth with sustainable development and economic development in the core area ( EULG ) ) focus mainly on existing urban land and some new town center based on AFSA-CA urban growth simulation model .', 'An increasingly precise simulation can determine the potential increase area and quantity of urban land , providing a basis to judge the layout of urban land use for urban planner .', 'Transfer Learning Models for Land Cover and Land Use Classification in Remote Sensing Image .', 'Land Cover or Land Use ( LCLU ) classification is an important , challenging problem in remote sensing ( RS ) image .', 'RS image classification is a recent technology used to extract hidden information from remotely sensed image in the observed earth environment .', 'This classification is essential for sustainable development in agricultural decision and urban planning using deep learning ( DL ) method .', 'DL gets more attention for accuracy and performance improvement in large datasets .', 'This paper is aimed to apply one of the DL method called transfer learning ( TL ) .', 'TL is the recent research problem in machine learning and DL approach for image classification .', 'DL consumes much time for training when starting from scratch .', 'This problem could be overcome in the TL modeling technique , which uses pre-trained model to build deep TL model efficiently .', 'We applied the TL model using bottleneck feature extraction from the pre-trained model : InceptionV3 , Resnet50V2 , and VGG19 to LCLU classification in the UC Merced dataset .', 'With these experiment , the TL model has been built the outdate performance of 92.46 , 94.38 , and 99.64 in Resnet50V2 , InceptionV3 , and VGG19 , respectively .', 'Published with license by Taylor & Francis Group , LLC .', 'Estimating Socio-Economic Parameter via Machine Learning Methods Using Luojia1-01 Nighttime Light Remotely Sensed Image at Multiple Scales of China in 2018 .', 'Mapping socio-economic indicator with a raster format is still a great challenge .', 'The nighttime light ( NTL ) datasets have been widely utilized to estimate the socio-economic parameter .', 'However , the precision of the published datasets was too coarse to meet related issue such as flood loss assessment , urban planning , and epidemiological study .', 'The present study calibrated gross domestic product ( GDP ) , population ( POP ) , electric consumption ( EC ) , and urban build-up area ( B-A ) at 100 m resolution for 45 city of China in 2018 using Luojia1-01 NTL datasets via random forest ( RF ) as well as geographically weighted regression ( GWR ) model .', 'The linear regression ( LR ) , back propagation neural network ( BPNN ) , and support vector machine ( SVM ) method were selected for comparison with GWR and RF model .', 'Besides , the Suomi National Polar-Orbiting Partnership-Visible Infrared Imaging Radiometer Suite ( NPP-VIIRS ) was chosen for comparison with Luojia1-01 .', 'The ten-folded cross-validation ( CV ) has been used for evaluating accuracy at county and city scale .', 'Finally , the distribution map of socio-economic parameter were illustrated and some finding were obtained .', 'First , the validation result revealed that the calibration at the city-scale outperformed the county or district scale .', 'Second , the precision of the Luojia1-01 NTL dataset surpassed the NPP-VIIRS NTL dataset on the same administrative scale except for some specific situation .', 'Third , the precision of the simulation for the gross domestic product ( GDP ) is the highest than the others , followed by electric consumption ( EC ) , build-up area ( B-A ) , and population ( POP ) .', 'Fourth , the optimum model varied according to the socio-economic parameter .', 'Fifth , the distribution of socio-economic parameter exhibited obvious spatial heterogeneity .', 'This paper can supply scientific support for calibrating socio-economic parameter in other region .', 'Synthesizing location semantics from street view image to improve urban land-use classification .', 'Land-use map are instrumental to inform urban planning and environmental research .', 'Street view image ( SVIs ) have shown great potential for automated land-use classification for land-use mapping .', 'However , previous study overlooked SVI-derived location contextual information that may help improve land-use classification .', 'This study proposes a novel land-use classification method that synthesizes location semantics from SVIs to account for contextual information from SVIs , land parcel and road around the SVIs .', 'The proposed method first generates land-use scene image ( LUSIs ) by using an SVI-derived straightforward algorithm .', 'The LUSIs are then relocated to land parcel by using a displacement strategy and classified into land-use type by using a deep learning network .', 'This study determines the land-use type of land parcel with classified LUSIs .', 'Two case study , consisting of LUSIs for five land-use type , show that introducing location semantics of SVIs can remarkably improve the classification accuracy of land-use type .', 'Urban population distribution mapping with multisource geospatial data based on zonal strategy .', 'Mapping population distribution at fine resolution with high accuracy is crucial to urban planning and management .', 'This paper takes Guangzhou city as the study area , illustrates the gridded population distribution map by using machine learning method based on zoning strategy with multisource geospatial data such as night light remote sensing data , point of interest data , land use data , and so on .', 'The street-level accuracy evaluation result show that the proposed approach achieved good overall accuracy , with determinant coefficient ( R2 ) being 0.713 and root mean square error ( RMSE ) being 5512.9 .', 'Meanwhile , the goodness of fit for single linear regression ( LR ) model and random forest ( RF ) regression model are 0.0039 and 0.605 , respectively .', 'For dense area , the accuracy of the random forest model is better than the linear regression model , while for sparse area , the accuracy of the linear regression model is better than the random forest model .', 'The result indicated that the proposed method has great potential in fine-scale population mapping .', 'Therefore , it is advised that the zonal modeling strategy should be the primary choice for solving regional difference in the population distribution mapping research .', 'Coupling cellular automaton with area partitioning and spatiotemporal convolution for dynamic land use change simulation .', 'Urbanization process have accelerated over recent decade , prompting effort to model land use change ( LUC ) patterns for decision support and urban planning .', 'Cellular automata ( CA ) are extensively employed given their simplicity , flexibility , and intuitiveness when simulating dynamic LUC .', 'Previous research , however , has ignored the spatial heterogeneity among sub-regions , instead applying the same transition rule across entire region ; moreover , most existing method extract neighborhood effect with only one data time slice , which is inconsistent with the nature of neighborhood interaction as a long-term process exhibiting obvious spatiotemporal dependency .', 'Accordingly , we propose a hybrid cellular automaton model coupling area partitioning and spatiotemporal neighborhood feature learning , named PST-CA .', 'We use a machine-learning-based partitioning strategy , self-organizing map ( SOM ) , to divide entire region into several homogeneous sub-regions , and further apply a spatiotemporal three-dimensional convolutional neural network ( 3D CNN ) to extract the spatiotemporal neighborhood feature .', 'An artificial neural network ( ANN ) is then built to create a conversion probability map for each sub-region using both spatiotemporal neighborhood feature and factor that drive the LUC .', 'Finally , the dynamic simulation result of entire study area are generated by fusing these probability map , constraint and stochastic factor .', 'Land use data collected from 2000 to 2015 in Shanghai were selected to verify our proposed method .', 'Four traditional model were implemented for comparison , including logistic regression ( LR ) -CA , support vector machine ( SVM ) -CA , random forest ( RF ) -CA and conventional ANN-CA .', 'Result illustrate that the proposed PST-CA outperformed four traditional model , with overall accuracy increased by 4.66 % ~6.41 % .', "Moreover , three distinctly different “ coverage rate-growth rate ” composite pattern of built-up area are shown in the SOM partitioning result , which verifies SOM 's ability to address spatial heterogeneity ; while the optimal time step in 3D CNN generally maintained a positive correlation with the growth rate of built-up area , which implies longer temporal dependency should be captured for rapidly developing area .", 'Population spatialization in Beijing city based on machine learning and multisource remote sensing data .', 'Remote sensing data have been widely used in research on population spatialization .', 'Previous study have generally divided study area into several sub-areas with similar feature by artificial or clustering algorithm and then developed model for these sub-areas separately using statistical method .', 'These approach have drawback due to their subjectivity and uncertainty .', 'In this paper , we present a study of population spatialization in Beijing City , China based on multisource remote sensing data and town-level population census data .', 'Six predictive algorithm were compared for estimating population using the spatial variable derived from The National Polar-Orbiting Partnership/ Visible Infrared Imaging Radiometer Suite ( NPP/VIIRS ) night-time light and other remote sensing data .', 'Random forest achieved the highest accuracy and therefore was employed for population spatialization .', 'Feature selection was performed to determine the optimal variable combination for population modeling by random forest .', 'Cross-validation result indicated that the developed model achieved a mean absolute error ( MAE ) of 2129.52 people/km2 and a R2 of 0.63 .', 'The gridded population density in Beijing at a spatial resolution of 500 m produced by the random forest model was also adjusted to be consistent with the census population at the town scale .', 'By comparison with Google Earth high-resolution image , the remotely-sensed population was qualitatively validated at the intra-town scale .', 'Validation result indicated that remotely sensed result can effectively depict the spatial distribution of population within town-level district .', 'This study provides a valuable reference for urban planning , public health and disaster prevention in Beijing , and a reference for population mapping in other city .', 'Regional mapping of essential urban land use category in China : A segmentation-based approach .', 'Understanding distribution of urban land use is of great importance for urban planning , decision support , and resource allocation .', 'The first mapping result of essential urban land use category ( EULUC ) in China for 2018 have been recently released .', 'However , such kind of national map may not sufficiently meet the growing demand for regional analysis .', 'To address this shortcoming , here we proposed a segmentation-based framework named EULUC-seg to improve the mapping result of EULUC at the city scale .', 'An object-based segmentation approach was first applied to generate the basic mapping unit within urban parcel .', 'Multiple feature derived from high-resolution remotely sensed and social sensing data were updated and then recalculated within each unit .', 'Random forest was adopted as the machine learning algorithm for classifying urban land use into five Level I class and twelve Level II class .', 'Finally , an accuracy assessment was carried out based on a collection of manually interpreted sample .', 'Result showed that our derived map achieved an overall accuracy of 87.58 % for Level I , and 73.53 % for Level II .', 'The accurate and refined map of EULUC-seg is expected to better support various application in the future .', 'Land cover classification based on machine learning using UAV multi-spectral image .', 'Land cover classification using UAV multi-spectral image is of great significance in precision agriculture , urban planning , land use and other field .', 'However , traditional remote sensing image classification method can not meet the classification accuracy requirement of UAV multi-spectral image .', 'This paper aims to propose an object-based machine learning classification method to improve the land over classification accuracy of UAV multi-spectral image .', 'The experimental area is a standard test field located in the Jilin Province of China .', 'The experimental data was captured by a UAV equipped with a multi-spectral camera which includes four band from 550 nm to 790 nm .', 'First , the original image were preprocessed and the spectral curve of land cover were analyzed , thus four kind of land cover with large difference were selected as category .', 'Then pixel-based , boosting-based and object-based machine learning method were used for classification .', 'The object-based classification method could make full use of the spatial and spectral information , and eliminate the noise problem caused by the high resolution of the UAV image to a certain extent .', 'Finally , accuracy analysis using the verification image showed that the RF-O method achieved the highest classification accuracy of 92.2419 % , and the kappa coefficient was 0.8904 .', 'All result indicate that the object-based machine learning classification method proposed in this paper is more suitable for the research of land cover classification , comparing with the traditional remote sensing image classification method , and performs well on the land cover classification of UAV multi-spectral image .', 'Simulation of urban expansion via integrating artificial neural network with Markov chain–cellular automata .', 'Accurate simulation and prediction of urban expansion are critical to manage urbanization and explicitly address the spatiotemporal trend and distribution of urban expansion .', 'Cellular Automata integrated Markov Chain ( CA-MC ) is one of the most frequently used model for this purpose .', 'However , the urban suitability index ( USI ) map produced from the conventional CA-MC is either affected by human bias or can not accurately reflect the possible nonlinear relation between driving factor and urban expansion .', 'To overcome these limitation , a machine learning model ( Artificial Neural Network , ANN ) was integrated with CA-MC instead of the commonly used Analytical Hierarchy Process ( AHP ) and Logistic Regression ( LR ) CA-MC model .', 'The ANN was optimized to create the USI map and then integrated with CA-MC to spatially allocate urban expansion cell .', 'The validated result of kappa and fuzzy kappa simulation indicate that ANN-CA-MC outperformed other variously coupled CA-MC modelling approach .', 'Based on the ANN-CA-MC model , the urban area in South Auckland is predicted to expand to 1340.55 ha in 2026 at the expense of non-urban area , mostly grassland and open-bare land .', 'Most of the future expansion will take place within the planned new urban growth zone .', 'Mapping poverty and slum using multiple methodology in Accra , Ghana .', 'Providing housing to slum dweller , protecting them from natural disaster and disease , and connecting them to job and service through improved infrastructure are urgent policy issue in many Sub-Saharan African city .', 'Identifying the location and living condition of slum is a critical step toward designing effective urban policy .', 'By combining household survey data and census data with high spatial resolution satellite imagery and other geospatial data using multiple methodology , including machine learning , we attempt to define slum quantitatively within the city of Accra .', 'Within these defined slum area , the pattern of monetary poverty are assessed .', 'Poverty rate are estimated at the neighborhood level and indicate that living in slum is strongly correlated with higher monetary poverty .', 'Poverty is more prevalent in community in area of lower elevation , which in Accra are generally flood-prone area .', 'However , the result also suggest that not all people living in slum are living in monetary poverty .', 'These result have important policy implication and are crucial to how economic opportunity are generated in slum so that effective urban policy can be designed .', 'Multi-scale correlation-based feature selection and random forest classification for LULC mapping from the integration of SAR and optical Sentinel image .', 'Reliable and accurate land use/land cover ( LULC ) map is a crucial data source for the understanding of coupled human-environment system , monitoring change , timely low-cost planning , and management of natural resource .', 'Improvement in sensor technology and machine learning capability have shifted the attention of remote sensing community to data complementarity through fusion of multi-sensor data for accurate feature extraction and mapping .', 'Amalgamation of optical and synthetic aperture radar ( SAR ) images has shown promising advantage in enhancing the accuracy of extracting LULC as such method allows exploitation of information in sensor .', 'This study investigated the potential of using freely available multisource Sentinel images to extract LULC map in semi-arid environment through multi-scale geographic object-based image analysis ( GEOBIA ) .', 'A multi-scale classification framework that integrates GEOBIA , correlation-based feature selection ( CFS ) , and random forest ( RF ) -supervised classification was adopted to extract LULC from assimilation of Sentinel multi-sensor product .', 'First , Sentinel-1 and-2 image were pre-processed .', 'Second , optimum multi-scale segmentation level were selected using F-score segmentation quality measure .', 'Third , 70 feature of various spectral index and derivative and geometrical feature from optical data and multiple ratio and textural feature from dual-polarization SAR image were computed , and a CFS based on wrapper approach was used to select the most significant feature at multi-scale level .', 'Finally , a single and multi-scale RF classifier was used to extract LULC class using the most relevant feature extracted from Sentinel SAR and optical image .', 'Result of multi-scale image segmentation optimization showed that scale parameter ( SP ) value of 40 , 60 , and 150 were optimal for extraction of LULC class .', 'Result of feature selection showed that 22 , 24 , and 27 feature were selected at scale SP value of 40 , 60 , and 150 , respectively .', 'Half of the feature were common among the three scale .', 'Single RF classification yielded overall accuracy ( OA ) value of 92.10 % , 93 % , and 91 % and kappa coefficient of 0.901 , 0.912 , and 0.89 at scale value of 150 , 60 , and 40 , respectively .', 'Multiscale RF classification from scale value of 150 and 60 produced better LULC classification with OA 96.06 % and kappa coefficient of 0.95 compared with other scale SP value .', 'The integrated approach demonstrated an effective and promising method for high-quality LULC extraction from coupling optical and SAR image .', 'Overall , multi-sensor Sentinel image along with the adopted approach feature a remarkable potential for improving LULC extraction and can effectively be used to update geographic information system layer for various application .', 'Progressively Expanded Neural Network ( PEN Net ) for hyperspectral image classification : A new neural network paradigm for remote sensing image analysis .', 'Hyperspectral image ( HSI ) has been used for a wide range of application including forestry , urban planning , and precision agriculture .', 'In recent year , machine learning based algorithms , such as support vector machine , decision tree , ensemble learning , and their variation have shown promising result in HSI analysis .', 'Such methodology , nevertheless , can lead to insufficient information abstraction in interpreting hyperspectral pixel .', 'In this paper , we propose a novel neural network based classification algorithm , named Progressively Expanded Neural Network ( PEN Net ) , that can effectively interpret hyperspectral pixel in nonlinear feature space and then determine their category .', 'Furthermore , a spectral-spatial HSI classification framework is also introduced to test the generality and robustness of the PEN Net .', 'Experimental result on four standard hyperspectral datasets illustrate that : ( 1 ) PEN Net classifier yield better accuracy and competitive processing speed in HSI classification task compared to the state-of-the-art method ; ( 2 ) Multi-hidden layer based PEN Net generally provides better performance than single hidden layer one ; ( 3 ) Combination of spectral and spatial feature in the PEN Net classifier can significantly improve the classification accuracy by 6–15 % compared to the spectral only based HSI classification .', 'This study implies that the proposed neural network architecture opens a new window for future research and the potential for remote sensing image analysis .', 'Deep highway unit network for land cover type classification with GF-3 SAR imagery .', 'The fully polarized synthetic aperture radar ( SAR ) is an advanced earth observation system with day and night imaging capability , which can obtain rich information of terrain and has a wide range of application in environmental protection , urban planning and resource investigation .', 'As the first selfdeveloped C-band multi-polarized SAR image , the acquisition of massive data and operational operation of Chinese SAR remote sensing has entered the era of big data .', 'Under the era of remote sensing large data , however , SAR image interpretation is a great challenge for scientific application .', 'At present , big data-based intelligent method such as computer vision technology have achieved great success .', 'Deep learning such as deep highway unit network has revolutionized the computer vision area .', 'However , due to the characteristic of SAR microwave band imaging and phase coherence processing , SAR image are very different from ordinary optical image in term of
