band , projection direction , data composition and so on .', 'Therefore , deep learning can not be directly used for quad-pol SAR image classification .', 'In this paper , deep learning is applied to land cover type classification with GF-3 quad-pol SAR imagery .', 'A deep highway unit network is employed to automatically extract a hierarchic feature representation from the data , based on which the land cover type classification can be conducted .', 'Our classification model is trained on limited training data from forest resource inventory and planning data , and tested on a Radarsat-2 quad-pol image , which is the image of the same area acquired at different time .', 'We also employ the machine learning such as SVM , Random Forest on the same sample for comparison .', 'The deep highway unit network trained by the GF-3 image , which can reduce speckle , fully excavate the regularity of SAR image in time and space .', 'Urban land use and land cover classification using remotely sensed sar data through deep belief network .', 'Land use and land cover ( LULC ) mapping in urban area is one of the core application in remote sensing , and it plays an important role in modern urban planning and management .', 'Deep learning is springing up in the field of machine learning recently .', 'By mimicking the hierarchical structure of the human brain , deep learning can gradually extract feature from lower level to higher level .', 'The Deep Belief Networks ( DBN ) model is a widely investigated and deployed deep learning architecture .', 'It combines the advantage of unsupervised and supervised learning and can archive good classification performance .', 'This study proposes a classification approach based on the DBN model for detailed urban mapping using polarimetric synthetic aperture radar ( PolSAR ) data .', 'Through the DBN model , effective contextual mapping feature can be automatically extracted from the PolSAR data to improve the classification performance .', 'Two-date high-resolution RADARSAT-2 PolSAR data over the Great Toronto Area were used for evaluation .', 'Comparison with the support vector machine ( SVM ) , conventional neural network ( NN ) , and stochastic Expectation-Maximization ( SEM ) were conducted to assess the potential of the DBN-based classification approach .', 'Experimental result show that the DBN-based method outperforms three other approach and produces homogenous mapping result with preserved shape detail .']

['Building Roof Superstructures Classification from Imbalanced and Low Density Airborne LiDAR Point Cloud .', 'Light Detection and Ranging ( LiDAR ) , an active remote sensing technology , is becoming an essential tool for geoinformation extraction and urban planning .', 'Airborne Laser Scanning ( ALS ) point clouds segmentation and accurate classification are challenging and crucial to produce different geo-information product like three-dimensional ( 3D ) city design .', 'This paper introduces an effective data-driven approach to build roof superstructure classification for airborne LiDAR point cloud with very low density and imbalanced class , covering an urban area .', "Notably , it focuses on building roof superstructure ( especially dormer and chimney ) and mitigating nonplanar object ' problem .", 'Also , the imbalanced class problem of LiDAR data , to the best of our knowledge , is not yet addressed in the literature ; it is considered in this study .', 'The major advantage of the proposed approach is using only raw data without assumption on the distribution underlying data .', 'The main methodological novelty of this work are summarized in the following key element .', '( i ) At first , an adapted connected component analysis for 3D point cloud is proposed .', '( ii ) Twelve geometry-based feature are extracted for each component .', '( iii ) A Support Vector Machine ( SVM ) -driven procedure is applied to classify the 3D component .', '( iv ) Furthermore , a new component size-based sampling ( CSBS ) method is proposed to treat the imbalanced data problem and has been compared with several existing resampling strategy .', 'In this study , component are classified into five class : shed and gable dormer , chimney , ground , and others .', 'The result of this investigation show the satisfying classification performance of the proposed approach .', 'Result also showed that the proposed approach outperformed machine learning method , including SVM , Random Forest , Decision Tree , and Adaboost .', 'Machine learning approach to extract building footprint from high-resolution image : The case study of Makkah , Saudi Arabia .', 'Extracting and identifying building boundary from high-resolution image have been a hot topic in the field of remote sensing for year .', 'Various method including geometric , radiometric , object based and edge detection were previously deliberated and implemented in different study in the context of building extraction .', 'Nevertheless , the reliability of extraction process is mainly subject to user intervention .', 'The current study proposes a new automatic morphology-based approach for extracting building using high-resolution satellite image of Al-Hudaybiyah region in the city of Makkah as a case study .', 'The proposed technique integrates the support vector machine for extracting building that have bright and dark roofs .', 'The appropriateness of this method has been examined by mean of various indicator for example completeness , correctness and quality .', 'Preliminary finding will illustrate the precision and accuracy of the used machine learning algorithm .', 'Research result can provide a generic indicator to assist the planning authority in achieving better urban planning processes taking into account all potential environmental , social and urban demand and requirement .', 'Published by Oxford University Press .', 'Fusion of airborne lidar point cloud and aerial image for heterogeneous land-use urban mapping .', 'The World Health Organization has reported that the number of worldwide urban resident is expected to reach 70 % of the total world population by 2050 .', 'In the face of challenge brought about by the demographic transition , there is an urgent need to improve the accuracy of urban land-use mapping to more efficiently inform about urban planning process .', 'Decision-makers rely on accurate urban mapping to properly assess current plan and to develop new one .', 'This study investigates the effect of including conventional spectral signature acquired by different sensor on the classification of airborne LiDAR ( Light Detection and Ranging ) point cloud using multiple feature space .', 'The proposed method applied three machine learning algorithms—ML ( Maximum Likelihood ) , SVM ( Support Vector Machines ) , and MLP ( Multilayer Perceptron Neural Network ) —to classify LiDAR point clouds of a residential urban area after being geo-registered to aerial photo .', 'The overall classification accuracy passed 97 % , with height as the only geometric feature in the classifying space .', 'Misclassifications occurred among different class due to independent acquisition of aerial and LiDAR data as well as shadow and orthorectification problem from aerial image .', 'Nevertheless , the outcome are promising as they surpassed those achieved with large geometric feature space and are encouraging since the approach is computationally reasonable and integrates radiometric property from affordable sensor .', 'Assessment of approach for the extraction of building footprint from pléiades image .', 'The Marina area represents an official new gateway of entry to Egypt and the development of infrastructure is proceeding rapidly in this region .', 'The objective of this research is to obtain building data by mean of automated extraction from Pléiades satellite image .', 'This is due to the need for efficient mapping and updating of geodatabases for urban planning and touristic development .', 'It compares the performance of random forest algorithm to other classifier like maximum likelihood , support vector machine , and backpropagation neural network over the well-organized building which appeared in the satellite image .', 'Image were subsequently classified into two class : building and non-buildings .', 'In addition , basic morphological operation such as opening and closing were used to enhance the smoothness and connectedness of the classified imagery .', 'The overall accuracy for random forest , maximum likelihood , support vector machine , and backpropagation were 97 % , 95 % , 93 % and 92 % respectively .', 'It was found that random forest was the best option , followed by maximum likelihood , while the least effective was the backpropagation neural network .', 'The completeness and correctness of the detected building were evaluated .', 'Experiment confirmed that the four classification method can effectively and accurately detect 100 % of building from very high-resolution image .', 'It is encouraged to use machine learning algorithms for object detection and extraction from very high-resolution image .', 'Urban tree specie classification using UAV-based multi-sensor data fusion and machine learning .', 'Urban tree specie classification is a challenging task due to spectral and spatial diversity within an urban environment .', 'Unmanned aerial vehicle ( UAV ) platform and small-sensor technology are rapidly evolving , presenting the opportunity for a comprehensive multi-sensor remote sensing approach for urban tree classification .', 'The objective of this paper were to develop a multi-sensor data fusion technique for urban tree specie classification with limited training sample .', 'To that end , UAV-based multispectral , hyperspectral , LiDAR , and thermal infrared imagery was collected over an urban study area to test the classification of 96 individual tree from seven specie using a data fusion approach .', 'Two supervised machine learning classifier , Random Forest ( RF ) and Support Vector Machine ( SVM ) , were investigated for their capacity to incorporate highly dimensional and diverse datasets from multiple sensor .', 'When using hyperspectral-derived spectral feature with RF , the fusion of all feature extracted from all sensor type ( spectral , LiDAR , thermal ) achieved the highest overall classification accuracy ( OA ) of 83.3 % and kappa of 0.80 .', 'Despite multispectral reflectance band alone producing significantly lower OA of 55.2 % compared to 70.2 % with minimum noise fraction ( MNF ) transformed hyperspectral reflectance band , the full dataset combination ( spectral , LiDAR , thermal ) with multispectral-derived spectral feature achieved an OA of 81.3 % and kappa of 0.77 using RF .', 'Comparison of the feature extracted from individual sensor for each specie highlight the ability for each sensor to identify distinguishable characteristic between specie to aid classification .', 'The result demonstrate the potential for a high-resolution multi-sensor data fusion approach for classifying individual tree by specie in a complex urban environment under limited sampling requirement .', 'A robust segmentation framework for closely packed building from airborne LiDAR point cloud .', 'Urban village ( UVs ) are commonly found in many Asian city .', 'These village contain many closely packed building constructed decade ago without proper urban planning .', 'There is a need for those building to be identified and put into statistic .', 'In this paper , we present a segmentation framework that invokes multiple machine learning technique and point cloud/image processing algorithm to segment individual closely packed building from large urban scene .', 'The presented framework consists of two major segmentation process .', 'The framework first filters out the non-ground object from the point cloud , then it classified them by using the Random Forest classifier to isolate building from the entire scene .', 'After that , the building point clouds will be segmented based on several building attribute analysis method .', 'This is followed by using the Random Sample Consensus ( RANSAC ) plane filtering method to expand the space between two closely packed building , so that the Density-Based Spatial Clustering of Applications with Noise ( DBSCAN ) clustering technique can be used to more accurately segment each individual building from the closely packed building area .', 'Two airborne Light Detection and Ranging ( LiDAR ) datasets collected in two different city with some typical closely packed building were used to verify the proposed framework .', 'The result show that the framework can effectively identify the closely packed building with unified structure from large airborne LiDAR datasets .', 'The overall segmentation accuracy reaches 84 % for the two datasets .', 'The proposed framework can serve as a basis for analysis and segmentation of closely packed building with a more complicated structure .', 'Application of satellite image segmentation for urban planning optimization .', 'This article presents research result of a convolution neural network for building detection on high-resolution aerial image of Planet database .', 'Jaccard index was used for analysis of the quality of machine learning algorithm .', 'This index of similarity compares result of algorithms with real mask .', 'The mask were sliced on smaller part together with image before training of developed model .', 'The convolution neural network was launched on NVIDIA DGX-1 supercomputer , which was provided by AI-center of P.G Demidov Yaroslavl State University .', 'The problem of building detection on satellite image can be put into practice for urban planning , building control , search of the best location for outlet etc .', 'Aerial point cloud classification with deep learning and machine learning algorithms .', 'With recent advance in technology , 3D point cloud are getting more and more frequently requested and used , not only for visualization need but also e.g .', 'by public administration for urban planning and management .', '3D point cloud are also a very frequent source for generating 3D city model which became recently more available for many application , such as urban development plan , energy evaluation , navigation , visibility analysis and numerous other GIS study .', 'While the main data source remained the same ( namely aerial photogrammetry and LiDAR ) , the way these city model are generated have been evolving towards automation with different approach .', 'As most of these approach are based on point cloud with proper semantic class , our aim is to classify aerial point cloud into meaningful semantic class , e.g .', "ground level object ( GLO , including road and pavement ) , vegetation , building ' facade and building ' roofs .", 'In this study we tested and evaluated various machine learning algorithms for classification , including three deep learning algorithms and one machine learning algorithm .', 'In the experiment , several hand-crafted geometric feature depending on the dataset are used and , unconventionally , these geometric feature are used also for deep learning .', 'Machine Learning for Strategic Urban Planning .', 'Data mining is an important part of strategic planning for the development of modern urban settlement with capacity to accommodate population explosion .', 'Developing country are fast becoming urbanized giving the development and opportunity that are lacking in rural area .', 'Data regarding urban development such as satellite image need to be analysed to ascertain the possibility for further development or opening up of new settlement .', 'This work presents a binary sub-pixel and feature based method of classification to detect water body and vegetation in earth observatory image .', 'In this work , the image were subjected data pre-processing , feature extraction , and analysed the data using machine learning classification method to detection region that support urban expansion or development of new settlement .', 'The proposed method achieved 88.93 % accuracy and 0.06 % RMSE .', 'Support Vector Machine accuracy assessment for extracting green urban area in town .', 'The most commonly used model for analyzing satellite imagery is the Support Vector Machine ( SVM ) .', 'Since there are a large number of possible variable for use in SVM , this paper will provide a combination of parameter that fit best for extracting green urban area from Copernicus mission satellite image .', 'This paper aims to provide a combination of parameter to extract green urban area with the highest degree of accuracy , in order to speed up urban planning and ultimately improve town environment .', 'Two different town in Croatia were investigated , and the result provide an optimal combination of parameter for green urban area extraction with an overall kappa index of 0.87 and 0.89 , which demonstrates a very high classification accuracy .', '3D shape descriptor for object recognition .', '3D point cloud classification is an important task in application for many area such as robotics , urban planning and augmented reality .', "3D sensor measure a high amount of point in the 3D scene object ' surface at a high collect rate , so robust technique are needed to process all input data and also deal with some imprecision .", 'A common solution for these task is the use of robust feature extraction technique to gather representative scene information at the lowest computational cost possible .', 'This paper presents a new approach for object recognition in 3D scene , using a novel 3D shape descriptor which is used as input for a supervised machine learning method .', 'Proposed robust 3D feature is invariant to translation and scale and provides a very simplified object representation for pattern recognition input .', 'Experiment were performed using an Artificial Neural Network to recognize six different object shape , and obtained result showed that the proposed method is a promising approach for object recognition in 3D scene .', 'Urban area extraction from multi sensor data based on machine learning and data fusion .', 'Accurate urban area information is important for a variety of application , especially city planning and natural disaster prediction and management .', 'In recent year , extraction of urban structure from remotely sensed image has been extensively explored .', 'The key advantage of this imaging modality are reduction of surveying expense and time .', 'It also elevates restriction on ground survey .', 'Thus far , much research typically extracts these structure from very high resolution satellite imagery , which are unfortunately of relatively poor spectral resolution , resulting in good precision yet moderate accuracy .', 'Therefore , this paper investigates extraction of building from middle and high resolution satellite image by using spectral index ( Normalized Difference Building Index : NDBI , Normalized Difference Vegetation Index : NDVI , Soil Adjustment Vegetation Index : SAVI , Modified Normalized Difference Index : MNDWI , and Global Environment Monitoring Index : GEMI ) by mean of various Machine Learning method ( Artificial Neural Network : ANN , K-Nearest Neighbor : KNN , and Support Vector Machine : SVM ) and Data Fusion ( i.e.', ', Majority Voting ) .', 'Herein empirical result suggested that suitable learning method for urban area extraction are in preferring order Data Fusion , SVM , KNN , and ANN .', 'Their accuracy were 85.46 , 84.86 , 84.66 , and 84.91 % , respectively .', 'A support vector machine approach on object based image analysis for feature extraction from high resolution image .', 'Satellite image are the most important available data source for generation and updating of available map .', 'They have highly improved in term of spatial , spectral and temporal resolution and by the sheer volume of collected image , the necessity of simplification of automation in feature extraction .', 'Road data play a key role in urban planning , traffic management , military application , and vehicle navigation as well as for decision making in numerous application .', 'The faster updation of road infrastructure is a need because the technology has brought map in the hand of people in the form of mobile phone and tablet .', 'Road detection is one of the major issue of the road infrastructure extraction .', 'Its accuracy depends on the type of methodology used .', 'An attempt is made here to analyse the first order , the co-occurrence texture feature and image transforms useful for discriminating road from other feature specially the building .', 'The identified dataset form high dimension feature space and the Support Vector Machine is a theoretically superior machine learning methodology with great result in classification of high dimensional datasets .', 'In the past , SVMs have been tested and evaluated only as pixel-based image classifier .', 'Moving from pixel-based technique towards object-based representation , the dimension of remote sensing imagery feature space increases significantly .', 'An SVM approach for classification was followed , based on primitive image object produces by a multi-resolution segmentation algorithm .', 'The SVM procedure produced the final object classification result which were compared to the Nearest Neighbor classifier result and were found to give better result in OBIA domain .', 'A supervoxel-based spectro-spatial approach for 3D urban point cloud labelling .', 'Abstract : Three-dimensional ( 3D ) point cloud labelling of airborne lidar ( light detection and ranging ) data has promising application in urban city modelling .', 'Automatic and efficient method for semantic labelling of airborne urban point cloud data with multiple class still remains a challenge .', 'We propose a novel 3D object-based classification framework for labelling urban lidar point cloud using a computer vision technique , supervoxels .', 'The supervoxel approach is promising for representing dense lidar point cloud in a compact manner for 3D segmentation and for improving the computational efficiency .', 'Initially , supervoxels are generated by over-segmenting the coloured point cloud using the voxel-based cloud connectivity algorithm in the geometric space .', 'The local connectivity established between supervoxels has been used to produce meaningful and realistic object ( segment ) .', 'The segment are classified by different machine learning technique based on several spectral and geometric feature extracted from the segment .', 'All the point within a labelled segment are assigned the same segment label .', 'Furthermore , the effect of different feature vector and varying point density on the classification accuracy has been studied .', 'Result indicate an accurate labelling of point in realistic 3D space conforming to the boundary of object .', 'An overall classification accuracy of 90 % is achieved by the proposed method .', 'The labelled 3D point can be used directly for the reconstruction of building and other man-made object .', 'Combining Pixel-and Object-Based Machine Learning for Identification of Water-Body Types from Urban High-Resolution Remote-Sensing Imagery .', 'Water is one of the vital component for the ecological environment , which plays an important role in human survival and socioeconomic development .', 'Water resource in urban area are gradually decreasing due to the rapid urbanization , especially in developing country .', 'Therefore , the precise extraction and automatic identification of water body are of great significance and urgently required for urban planning .', 'It should be noted that although some study have been reported regarding the water-area extraction , to our knowledge , few paper concern the identification of urban water type ( e.g.', ', river , lake , canal , and pond ) .', 'In this paper , a novel two-level machine-learning framework is proposed for identifying the water type from urban high-resolution remote-sensing image .', 'The framework consists of two interpretation level : 1 ) water body are extracted at the pixel level , where the water/shadow/vegetation index are considered and 2 ) water type are further identified at the object level , where a set of geometrical and textural feature are used .', 'Both level employ machine learning for the image interpretation .', 'The proposed framework is validated using the GeoEye-1 and WorldView-2 image , over two mega city in China , i.e.', ', Wuhan and Shenzhen , respectively .', 'The experimental result show that the proposed method achieved satisfactory accuracy for both water extraction [ 95.4 % ( Shenzhen ) , 96.2 % ( Wuhan ) ] , and water type classification [ 94.1 % ( Shenzhen ) , 95.9 % ( Wuhan ) ] in complex urban area .', 'Comparison of different machine learning classifier for building extraction in LiDAR-derived datasets .', 'Building extraction in remotely sensed imagery is an important problem that needs solving .', 'It can be used to aid in urban planning , hazard assessment and disaster risk management among others .', 'Light Detection and Ranging or LiDAR , is one of the most powerful remote sensing technology nowadays .', 'Many study have used the fusion of LiDAR data and multispectral image in detecting building .', 'This study seeks to maximize the power of LiDAR imagery to be able to classify building without the aid of multispectral imagery .', 'This work follows the Object Based Image Analysis ( OBIA ) approach .', 'Instead of the traditional pixel-based classification method , pixel are segmented into logical group called object .', 'From these object , feature for building extraction are calculated .', 'These feature are : the number of return , difference of return , and the mean and standard deviation of positive surface openness .', 'These object are then classified using different machine learning classifier such as Support Vector Machines , K-Nearest Neighbors , Naïve Bayes Classifier , Decision Trees , and Random Forests .', 'A comparative assessment was done on the performance of these different machine learning classifier .', 'The classifier performed similarly with the Random Forest Classifier slightly outperforming the others .', 'Ensemble method for binary classification of airborne LIDAR data .', 'This paper presents a framework that is aimed at improving the performance of two existing ensemble method ( namely , AdaBoost and Bagging ) for airborne light detection and ranging ( LIDAR ) classification .', 'LIDAR is one of the fastest growing technology to support a multitude of civil engineering application , such as transportation , urban planning , flood control , and city 3D reconstruction .', 'For the above application , LIDAR data need to be classified into binary class ( i.e.', ', terrain and nonterrain ) or multiple class ( e.g.', ', ground , vegetation , and building ) .', 'The proposed framework is designed to enhance the generalization performance of binary classification approach by minimizing type II error .', 'The author developed and tested the framework on different LIDAR data set representing geographic site in Germany and the United States .', 'The result showed that the proposed ensemble framework performed better compared to the existing method .', 'In addition , the AdaBoost method outperformed the Bagging method on all the terrain type .', 'However , the framework has some limitation in term of dealing with rough terrain and discontinuous surface .', 'Conditional random field for 3D point cloud with adaptive data reduction .', 'We proposed using Conditional Random Fields with adaptive data reduction for the classification of 3D point cloud acquired from a Riegl Terrestrial laser scanner .', 'The training and inference of the acquired large outdoor urban data can be time consuming .', 'We approach the problem by computing an adaptive support region for each data point using 3D scale theory .', 'For training and inference of the discriminative Conditional Random Fields , smaller set of data sample that contains relevant information within the support region is selected instead of using all point cloud data .', 'We tested the algorithm on synthetically generated data and urban point cloud data acquired from the laser scanner .', 'The computed support region is also used in feature extraction for urban point cloud data .', 'The result showed improvement in the training and inference rate while maintaining comparable classification accuracy .']

['SPATIAL CLASSIFICATION of URBAN LAND by SPECULATIVE LAND VALUE and MSI SATELLITE IMAGERY USING K-MEANS , in HUANCAYO , PERU [ CLASIFICACIÓN ESPACIAL DEL SUELO URBANO POR EL VALOR ESPECULATIVO DEL SUELO E IMÁGENES MSI SATELITALES USANDO K-MEANS , HUANCAYO , PERÚ ] .', 'The city of Huancayo , like other intermediate city in Latin America , faces problem of poorly planned land-use change and a rapid dynamic of the urban land market .', 'The scarce and outdated information on the urban territory impedes the adequate classification of urban area , limiting the form of its intervention .', 'The purpose of this research was the adoption of unassisted and mixed method for the spatial classification of urban area , considering the speculative land value , the proportion of urbanized land , and other geospatial variable .', 'Among the data collection medium , Multi-Spectral Imagery ( MSI ) from the Sentinel-2 satellite , the primary road system , and a sample of direct observation point , were used .', 'The processed data were incorporated into georeferenced map , to which urban limit and official slope were added .', 'During data processing , the K-Means algorithm was used , together with other machine learning and assisted judgment method .', 'As a result , an objective classification of urban area was obtained , which differs from the existing planning .', 'All right reserved .', 'Identifying different type of urban land use dynamic using Point-of-interest ( POI ) and Random Forest algorithm : The case of Huizhou , China .', 'The significant economic development witnessed in China in recent decade has been accompanied by the increasing expansion of urban area .', 'Although a growing literature has analyzed the characteristic and driving force of urban land expansion , less attention has been paid to examining the different expansion determinant driving fine-scale urban land use ( residential land , administration and public service land , commercial land , and industrial land ) change .', 'This paper aims to identify the difference of multi-mechanisms driving fine-scale urban land use expansion based on big data and machine learning , in the Huizhou downtown area in 2000–2015 .', 'The Random Forest ( RF ) algorithm is used to identify the natural , transportation , location , social , and POI factor driving land expansion by considering different urban land-use category .', 'Our RF estimation showed that enormous difference existed between various urban land-use type in term of the role they played in this expansion and their relation to potential determinant , during the different urban development stage studied .', 'Transportation , location , and the distribution of actual land use were found to exert a greater influence on urban land expansion than other factor .', 'All the finding above provide detailed spatiotemporal knowledge and targeted information that can aid in understanding fine-scale urban land use dynamic .', 'In this way , sound planning strategy for different fine-scale land us can be formulated more scientifically .', 'The strength of association between these factor and urban land expansion differed greatly depending on the different land-use type involved as well as the urban development stage that it occurred within .', 'These result cast a new light on the importance of investigating the potential driving force in the expansion of different urban land-use type .', 'Predicting stream water quality under different urban development pattern scenario with an interpretable machine learning approach .', 'Urban development pattern significantly impacts stream water quality by influencing pollutant generation , build-up , and wash-off process .', 'It is thus necessary to understand and predict stream water quality in accordance with different urban development pattern to effectively advise urban growth planning and policy .', 'To do so , we collected pollutant concentration data on nitrate ( NO3−-N ) , total phosphate ( TP ) , and Escherichia coli ( E. coli ) from 1047 sampling station in the Texas Gulf Region .', 'We utilized a Random Forest ( RF ) machine learning model to predict stream water quality under four planning scenario with different urban density and configuration .', 'SHapley Additive explanation ( SHAP ) was used to prove the importance of urban development pattern in influencing stream water quality .', 'The spatial variation of the impact of these pattern were explored with Geographically Weighted Regression ( GWR ) .', 'SHAP result indicated that Largest Patch Index ( LPI ) , Patch Cohesion Index ( COHESION ) , Splitting Index ( SPLIT ) , and Landscape Division Index ( DIVISION ) were the most important urban development pattern metric affecting stream water quality .', 'The spatial variation of such pattern were shown to impact stream water quality depending on pollutant , seasonality , climate , and urbanization level .', 'RF prediction result suggested that high density aggregated development was more effective in reducing TP and NO3−-N concentration than the current sprawl development , but had the potential risk of increasing E. coli pollution in the wet season .', 'The result of this study provide empirical evidence and a potential mechanistic explanation that stream water quality degradation is a consequence of urban sprawl .', 'Lastly , machine learning is a powerful tool for scenario prediction in land use planning to forecast environmental impact under different urban development pattern scenario .', 'Using satellite data to analyse raw material consumption in Hanoi , Vietnam .', 'In this work , we provide an innovative route for analysing urban expansion and population growth and their link to the consumption of construction material by combining satellite data with material consumption analysis within the Hanoi Province ( Vietnam ) .', 'Urban expansion is investigated with the use of landcover map for the period 1975–2020 derived from satellite .', 'During this period , artificial surface and agricultural area have increased by 11.6 % and 15.5 % , re-spectively , while forest have decreased by 26.7 % .', 'We have used publicly available datasets to calculate and forecast the construction material consumption and measure its statistical correla-tion with urban expansion between 2007 and 2018 .', 'Our result show that official figure for sand consumption are currently underestimated , and that by 2030 , steel and sand and gravel consumption will increase even further by three and two time , respectively .', 'Our analysis uses a new method to assess urban development and associated impact by combining socio-economic and Earth Observation datasets .', 'The analysis can provide evidence , underpin decision-making by au-thorities , policymakers , urban planner and sustainability expert , as well as support the development of informed strategy for resource consumption .', 'It can also provide important information for identifying area of land conservation and ecological greenway during urban planning .', 'Urban Water Demand Modeling Using Machine Learning Technique : Case Study of Fortaleza , Brazil .', 'Despite recent effort to apply machine learning ( ML ) for water demand modeling , overcoming the black-box nature of these technique to extract practical information remains a challenge , especially in developing country .', 'This study integrated random forest ( RF ) , self-organizing map ( SOM ) , and artificial neural network ( ANN ) techniques to assess water demand pattern and to develop a predictive model for the city of Fortaleza , Brazil .', 'We performed the analysis at two spatial scale , with different level of information : census tract ( CTs ) at the fine scale , and census block ( CBs ) at the coarse scale .', 'At the CB scale , demand was modeled with socioeconomic , demographic , and household characteristic .', 'The RF technique was applied to rank these variable , and the most relevant were used to cluster census block with SOMs .', 'RFs and ANNs were used in an iterative approach to define the input variable for the predictive model with minimum redundancy .', 'At the CT scale , demand was modeled using HDI and per capita income .', 'Variable which assess the education level and economic aspect of household demonstrated a direct relationship with water demand .', 'The analysis at the coarse scale provided more insight into the relationship between the variable ; however , the predictive model performed better at the fine scale .', 'This study demonstrates how data-driven model can be helpful for water management , especially in environment with strong socioeconomic inequality , where urban planning decision should be integrated and inclusive .', 'Assessing urban growth in Ghana using machine learning and intensity analysis : A case study of the New Juaben Municipality .', 'Population growth coupled with economic , housing and environmental factor have significantly contributed into accelerated land use change in the New Juaben Municipality of Ghana .', 'These factor have caused destruction of natural habitat and increased natural hazard such as flooding in the Municipality .', 'Monitoring land use/land cover change is essential in respect to the dynamic of both human and natural factor that affect the biophysical and biochemical property of the land surface .', 'This research investigates the transition among the major land use/land cover category in the Municipality as a highly populated urban region that is facing some environmental challenge such as deforestation and degradation of the environment .', 'Random Forest was adopted for the classification of 1985 , 1991 , 2002 and 2015 land cover map while the analysis of the dynamic was conducted using intensity analysis .', 'The unique contribution of this article is the combine usage of machine learning algorithm and intensity analysis to assess the change in land use/land cover .', 'The result showed that 1985–1991 and 2002–2015 period experience fast change and the land use transformation has been accelerating over the whole period .', 'The major change were caused by the Built-up and Agricultural activity constituting 21.24 % and 13.19 % respectively in the category level .', 'It is recommended that , authority should consider several structural transformation measure within Ghana , including inter-sectoral land use harmonization policy ( e.g .', 'the Land Use and Spatial Planning Act 2016 ) , land use planning and legal reform to help address the underlying driver of urban led deforestation .', 'Analysing urban development pattern in a conflict zone : A case study of kabul .', 'A large part of the population in low-income country ( LICs ) lives in fragile and conflict-affected state .', 'Many city in these state show high growth dynamic , but little is known about the relation of conflict and urban growth .', 'In Afghanistan , the Taliban regime , which lasted from 1996 to 2001 , caused large scale displacement of the population .', 'People from Afghanistan migrated to neighboring country like Iran and Pakistan , and all development came to a halt .', 'After the US invasion in October 2001 , all the major city in Afghanistan experienced significant population growth , in particular , driven by the influx of internally displaced person .', 'Maximum pressure of this influx was felt by the capital city , Kabul .', 'This rapid urbanization , combined with very limited capacity of local authority to deal with this growth , led to unplanned urbanization and challenge for urban planning and management .', 'This study analyses the pattern of growth between 2001 and 2017 , and the factor influencing the growth in the city of Kabul with the help of high-resolution Earth Observation-based data ( EO ) and spatial logistic regression modelling .', 'We analyze settlement pattern by extracting image feature from high-resolution image ( aerial photographs of 2017 ) and terrain feature as input to a random forest classifier .', 'The urban growth is analyzed using an available built-up map ( extracted from IKONOS image for the year 2001 ) .', 'Result indicate that unplanned settlement have grown 4.5 time during this period , whereas planned settlement have grown only 1.25 time .', 'The unplanned settlement expanded mostly towards the west and north west part of the city , and the growth of planned settlement happened mainly in the central and eastern part of the city .', 'Population density and the location of military base are the most important factor that influence the growth , of both planned and unplanned settlement .', 'The growth of unplanned settlement occurs predominantly in area of steeper slope on the hillside , while planned settlement are on gentle slope and closer to the institutional area ( central and eastern part of the city ) .', 'We conclude that security and availability of infrastructure were the main driver of growth for planned settlement , whereas unplanned growth , mainly on hillside , was driven by the availability of land with poor infrastructure .', 'Improving land-use change modeling by integrating ANN with Cellular Automata-Markov Chain model .', 'Urban growth and land-use change are a few of many puzzling factor affecting our future city .', 'Creating a precise simulation for future land change is a challenging process that requires temporal and spatial modeling .', 'Many recent study developed and trained model to predict urban expansion pattern using Artificial Intelligence ( AI ) .', 'This study aims to enhance the simulation capability of Cellular Automata Markov Chain ( CA-MC ) model in predicting change in land-use .', 'This study integrates the Artificial Neural Network ( ANN ) into CA-MC to incorporate several driving force that highly impact land-use change .', 'The research utilizes different socio-economic , spatial , and environmental variable ( slope , distance to road , distance to urban center , distance to commercial , density , elevation , and land fertility ) to generate potential transition map using ANN Data-driven model .', 'The generated map are fed to CA-MC as additional input .', 'We calibrated the original CA-MC and our model for 2015 cross-comparing simulated map and actual map obtained for Irbid city , Jordan in 2015 .', 'Validation of our model was assessed and compared to the CA-MC model using Kappa index including the agreement in term of quantity and location .', 'The result elucidated that our model with an accuracy of 90.04 % substantially outperforms CA-MC ( 86.29 % ) model .', 'The improvement we obtained from integrating ANN with CA-MC suggested that the influence imposed by the driving force was necessary to be taken into account for more accurate prediction .', 'In addition to the improved model prediction , the predicted map of Irbid for the year 2021 and 2027 will guide local authority in the development of management strategy that balance urban expansion and protect agricultural region .', "This will play a vital role in sustaining Jordan 's food security .", 'Sensing Mixed Urban Land-Use Patterns Using Municipal Water Consumption Time Series .', 'The biased population coverage and short temporal length of newly emerged data set ( e.g.', ', data set of social medium , mobile phone , and smart card ) obstruct the effective analysis of long-term dynamic of landuse pattern , particularly in small and developing city .', 'This study proposed a framework to delineate and analyze mixed land-use pattern and their evolution using municipal water consumption data .', 'A two-step classification strategy was designed based on the rotation forest scheme to differentiate the socioeconomic type of customer ( e.g.', ', residence , commerce , public facility , manufacturing , and recreation ) using multiple feature extracted from the various form of water consumption time series .', 'The spatial distribution of the socioeconomic function were then derived , and the mixed land use was measured using a diversity index based on information entropy .', 'Such an approach was applied to Changshu , a typical developing county-level city in China , for the period 2004 to 2013 .', 'The result showed that the urbanization of Changshu experienced both spatial expansion and intensification , with a slightly declining rate of growth in recent year .', 'Apart from the city center , two subcenters have emerged for industrial development .', 'The degree of land-use mixture has increased with urban growth , indicating a maturing of urbanization .', 'This study explored the approach of identifying individual socioeconomic function by the consumption pattern of municipal service and demonstrated that municipal service data set can reveal land-use pattern and dynamic at a fine spatial resolution to evaluate urban planning and management , with the advantage of large population coverage and long-term temporal length .', 'Mapping Urban Slum Settlements Using Very High-Resolution Imagery and Land Boundary Data .', 'Accurate mapping of slum is crucial for urban planning and management .', 'This article proposes a machine learning , hierarchical object-based method to map slum settlement using very high-resolution ( VHR ) imagery and land boundary data to support slum upgrading .', 'The proposed method is tested in Kingston Metropolitan Area , Jamaica .', 'First , the VHR imagery is classified into major land cover class ( i.e.', ', the initial land cover map ) .', 'Second , the VHR imagery and land boundary layer are used to obtain homogenous neighborhood ( HNs ) .', 'Third , the initial land cover map is used to derive multiple context , spectral , and texture image features according to the local physical characteristic of slum settlement .', 'Fourth , a machine-learning classifier , classification and regression tree , is used to classify HNs into slum and nonslum settlement using only the effective image feature .', 'Finally , reference data collected manually are used to assess the accuracy of the classification .', 'In the training site , an overall accuracy of 0.935 is achieved .', 'The effective image indicator for slum mapping include the building layout , building density , building roof characteristic , and distance from building to gully .', 'The classifier and those feature selected from the training site are further used to map slum in two validating site to assess the transferability of our approach .', 'Overall accuracy of the two validating site reached 0.928 and 0.929 , respectively , suggesting that the feature and classification model obtained from one site has the potential to be transferred to other area in Jamaica and possibly other developing Caribbean country with similar situation and data availability .', 'Comparison of performance of artificial neural network ( ANN ) and random forest ( RF ) in the classification of land cover zone of urban slum region .', 'India is one of the world ’ s largest economy and economic growth has remained continuous .', 'This has led to accelerating urbanization which requires proper planning and monitoring .', 'As the urban area are expanding , urban slum area are also increasing along with it .', 'These growing urban slum area require proper observation so that existing resource can be employed to provide these region with the best possible livelihood condition .', 'For this purpose , urban slum area as well as surrounding land resource should be well identified and classified so that the existing land resource can be appropriately utilized for future implementation of development activity .', 'Machine learning classification algorithm are found to be very suitable for the identification and classification of remotely sensed image .', 'Their efficiency in feature identification and extraction has established these algorithm as important tool in decision making .', 'In this study , our major objective is to identify and classify different land cover zone in the urban slum area of Chingrajpara area of Chhattisgarh using remotely-sensed image .', 'For this purpose , high-resolution image , collected using unmanned aerial vehicle ( UAVs ) , are used and these image are classified into different land cover features using two different machine learning algorithms Artificial Neural Network ( ANN ) and Random Forest ( RF ) .', 'The result obtained show that the overall accuracy achieved by ANN and RF are 72.6 % and 84.35 % respectively .', 'The study highlights the role and importance of landcover classification for future planning and management .', 'Integrating activity-based geographic information and long-term remote sensing to characterize urban land use change .', 'The land use structure is a key component to understand the complexity of urban system because it provides a snapshot of urban dynamic and how people use space .', 'This paper integrates socially sensed activity data with a remotely sensed land cover product in order to infer urban land use and its change over time .', 'We conducted a case study in theWashington D.C.-Baltimore metropolitan area to identify the pattern of land use change from undeveloped to developed land , including residential and non-residential us for a period covering 1986-2008 .', 'The proposed approach modeled physical and behavioral feature of land parcel from a satellite-based impervious surface cover change product and georeferenced Tweet , respectively .', 'A model assessment with random forest classifier showed that the proposed classification workflow could classify residential and non-residential land uses at an accuracy of 81 % , 4 % better than modeling the same land us from physical feature alone .', 'Using the timestamps of the impervious surface cover change product , the study also reconstructed the timeline of the identified land us .', 'The result indicated that the proposed approach was capable of mapping detailed land use and change in an urban region , and represents a new and viable way forward for urban land use surveying that could be especially useful for surveying and tracking change in city where traditional approach and mapping product ( i.e.', ', from remote sensing product ) may have a limited capacity to capture change .', 'Spatiotemporal dynamic of urbanization and cropland in the Nile Delta of Egypt using machine learning and satellite big data : implication for sustainable development .', 'The Nile Delta of Egypt is increasingly facing sustainability threat , due to a combination of nature- and human-induced change in land cover and land use .', 'In this paper , an analysis of big time series data from remotely sensed satellite image and the random forest classifier was undertaken to assess the spatial and temporal dynamic of urbanization and cropland in the Nile Delta between 2007 and 2017 .', 'Out of thirteen variable , five spectral index were chosen to build 500 decision tree , with a resulting overall accuracy average of 91.9 ± 1.5 % .', 'The result revealed that the urban extent in the Nile Delta has increased , between 2007 and 2017 , by 592.4 km2 ( 1.92 % ) .', 'Particularly , the result indicated that the year 2011 and 2012 , which coincided the 2011 political uprising in Egypt , so-called the Arab Spring , were associated with significant land-use change in the Nile Delta , both in rate and scale .', 'As a result , the cropland area in the region decreased between 2010 and 2011 by 1.63 % ( 502.21 km2 ) .', 'Moreover , the result showed that during the period 2012–2017 , the mean annual urbanization rate in the region stood at 60 km2/year .', 'In contrast , croplands decreased during the same period at an average annual rate of 2 km2/year .', 'At the governorates ’ level , the result suggested that top agricultural producing governorates in the Nile Delta , such as Elmonoufia , Elkalubia , Elbouhyra , and Elghrbia , witnessed the highest rate of decrease in cropland area during the period 2012–2017 .', 'Over the same period , urban area increased the most in Elkalubia , Domiate , and Elmonoufia by 1.98 % , 1.72 % , and 1.34 % , respectively .', 'The f indings from this analysis are discussed along with their implication for sustainable land-use and urban planning policy .', 'Investigating adoption pattern of residential low impact development ( LID ) using classification tree .', 'Local government are under pressure to improve storm water management and often time must comply with consent decree with the Federal Government .', 'Decentralizing a portion of the storm water management by integrating private landowner into localized retention and infiltration effort , that is , low impact development ( LID ) or green infrastructure project , is becoming increasingly popular .', 'Some wastewater system have considered incentivizing private land owner to make improvement aimed at retaining storm water or slowing the conveyance to grey infrastructure .', 'This study examines potential opportunity for incentivizing private residential land owner in Washington DC to install LID project .', 'This study maps LID configuration to a set of adoption strategy and category .', 'The C4.5 algorithm is then applied to identify a high performance decision tree for classifying parcel by adoption strategy or adoption category based on property-level attribute .', 'Understanding the spatial distribution of urban forest in China using Sentinel-2 image with Google Earth Engine .', 'Urban forest are vitally important for sustainable urban development and the well-being of urban resident .', 'However , there is , as yet , no country-level urban forest spatial dataset of sufficient quality for the scientific management of , and correlative study on , urban forest in China .', 'At present , China attaches great importance to the construction of urban forest , and it is necessary to map a high-resolution and high-accuracy dataset of urban forest in China .', 'The open-access Sentinel image and the Google Earth Engine platform provide a significant opportunity for the realization of this work .', 'This study used eight band ( B2-B8 , B11 ) and three index of Sentinel-2 in 2016 to map the urban forest of China using the Random Forest machine learning algorithms at the pixel scale with the support of Google Earth Engine ( GEE ) .', 'The 7317 sample point for training and testing were collected from field visit and very high resolution image from Google Earth .', "The overall accuracy , producer 's accuracy of urban forest , and user 's accuracy of urban forest assessed by independent validation sample in this study were 92.30 % , 92.27 % , and 92.18 % , respectively .", 'In 2016 , the percentage of urban forest cover was 19.2 % .', 'Nearly half of the city had an urban forest cover between 10 % and 20 % , and the average percentage of large city whose urban population were over 5 million was 24.8 % .', 'City with less than half of the average were mainly distributed in northern and western part of China , which should be focused on in urban greening planning .', 'Modeling Urban Land Use Changes Using Support Vector Machines .', 'Support Vector Machines ( SVM ) is a machine learning ( ML ) algorithm commonly applied to the classification of remotely sensing data and more recently for modeling land use change .', 'However , in most geospatial application the current literature does not elaborate on specification of the SVM method with respect to data sampling , attribute selection and optimal parameter choice .', 'Therefore the main objective of this study is to present and investigate the SVM technique for modeling urban land use change .', 'The SVM model building procedure is presented together with the detailed evaluation of the output result with respect to the choice of datasets , attribute and the change of SVM parameter .', 'Geospatial datasets containing nine land use class and spatial attribute for the Municipality of Zemun , Republic of Serbia were used for year 2001 , 2003 , 2007 and 2011 .', 'The Correlation-based Feature Subset method , kappa coefficient , Area Under Receiver Operating Characteristic Curve ( AUC ) and kappa simulation were used to perform the model evaluation and compare the model outputs with the real land use datasets .', 'The obtained result indicate that the SVM-based model perform better when implementing balanced data sampling , reduced data set to informative subset of attribute and properly identify the optimal learning parameter .', 'A comparative analysis of the urban web of the greater athens agglomeration for the last 20-years period on the basis of landsat imagery .', "Athens , like most of the world 's capital city , is facing a continuous increase in both population and extent .", 'Although the urban growth in Athens can be mostly attributed to the expansion of the residential area , the total coverage by impervious surface in the city has been significantly increased during the last decade due to construction and new development project that took place during the preparation period of the 2004 Olympic Games .', 'In this study , a 20-year Landsat imagery archive ( 1988-2007 ) was used to map the dynamic of urban growth in greater Athens area , based on the urbanization rate .', 'The characterization and quantification of urban land-cover change was performed by applying urban feature extraction technique based on machine learning classifier .', 'Such classifier use inductive learning algorithms to generate production rule from training data .', 'For result validation , remote sensing data of higher spatial resolution than Landsat were used , i.e .', 'Ikonosand ASTER ( Advanced Specaborn Thermal Emission and Reflection Radiometer ) image of the greater Athens agglomeration acquired between 2001 and 2007 .', 'The validation procedure involved a set of randomly selected point and overall accuracy of 94.8 , 93.3 and 95.9 % for the year 2007 , 2004 and 2001 , respectively , was observed .', 'Analysis of the result revealed continuing growth of urban feature in the study area , particularly in the Messogia plain , where the new international airport of El .', 'Venizelos is located , as well as in the western part of greater Athens , across the Thriassion industrial area .', 'Growth rate of urban area was found to be variable in time , obtaining its maximum between 2000 and 2004 , as expected .', 'The overall increase of the urban area during the 20-year period was estimated to be about 30 % .', 'Land-use-change modeling using unbalanced support-vector machine .', 'Modeling land-use change is a prerequisite to understanding the complexity of land-use-change pattern .', 'This paper presents a novel method to model urban land-use change using support-vector machine ( SVMs ) , a new generation of machine learning algorithm used in classification and regression domain .', 'An SVM modeling framework has been developed to analyze land-use change in relation to various factor such as population , distance to road and facility , and surrounding land use .', 'As land-use data are generally unbalanced , in the sense that the unchanged data overwhelm the changed data , traditional method are incapable of classifying relatively minor land-use change with high accuracy .', 'To circumvent this problem , an unbalanced SVM has been adopted by enhancing the standard SVMs .', 'A case study of Calgary land-use change demonstrates that the unbalanced SVMs can achieve high and reliable performance for land-use-change modeling .']

['Generative Adversarial Network Approach to Future Sermonizing of Housing Dispersal in Emerging Cities .', 'This study aims to visualize the future housing dispersal of expatriate , based on the predicted urban growth in emerging city .', 'Generalized adversarial network ( GANs ) will be utilized to predict the future urban growth of Doha Metropolitan emerging city .', "The housing dispersal of expatriate will be visualized on the predicted urban growth map to investigate housing preference , which will be based on Gordon 's theory .", 'This study will prove the feasibility of a process approach when practicing the management of urban growth in emerging city worldwide .', 'It could be a robust solution for the worsening imbalance in the urban morphology of metropolitan city .', 'The finding of the broad-spectrum housing dispersal guideline could benefit the policymakers and planner for the reality of spatial pattern and future urban growth .', 'Regional population forecast and analysis based on machine learning strategy .', 'Regional population forecast and analysis is of essence to urban and regional planning , and a well-designed plan can effectively construct a sound national infrastructure and stabilize positive population growth .', 'Traditionally , either urban or regional planning relies on the opinion of demographer in term of how the population of a city or a region will grow .', 'Multi-regional population forecast is currently possible , carried out mainly on the basis of the Interregional Cohort-Component model .', 'While this model has its unique advantage , several demographic rate are determined based on the decision made by primary planner .', 'Hence , the only drawback for cohort-component type population forecasting is allowing the analyst to specify the demographic rate of the future , and it goes without saying that this tends to introduce a biased result in forecasting accuracy .', 'To effectively avoid this problem , this work proposes a machine learning-based method to forecast multi-regional population growth objectively .', 'Thus , this work , drawing upon the newly developed machine learning technology , attempt to analyze and forecast the population growth of major city in Taiwan .', 'By effectively using the advantage of the XGBoost algorithm , the evaluation of feature importance and the forecast of multi-regional population growth between the present and the near future can be observed objectively , and it can further provide an objective reference to the urban planning of regional population .', 'Modeling fine-scale residential land price distribution : An experimental study using open data and machine learning .', 'Modeling the fine-scale spatiotemporal distribution of residential land price ( RLPs ) is the basis for scientifically allocating land resource , managing the residential market and improving urban planning .', 'The accurate mapping of the RLP dynamic require reliable land price prediction model and data with fine spatial and temporal resolution .', 'With the aid of point of interest ( POI ) data and nighttime light ( NTL ) images , this paper attempts to explore the ability of machine learning algorithms ( MLAs ) to model grid-level RLPs using the case of Wuhan in China .', 'Several land price prediction model were built using five MLAs and various geographic variable .', 'The experimental result show that the extra-trees regression algorithm and the radial basis function-based support vector regression algorithm perform best in Period Ⅰ ( 2010–2014 ) and Period Ⅱ ( 2015–2019 ) , respectively ; therefore , they were selected to estimate the RLPs of the grid without observation in the corresponding period .', 'Based on the estimated result , we found that the spatial pattern of the RLP in Wuhan transitioned from monocentric to polycentric between the two period , and RLPs grew rapidly near newly formed urban subcenters and waterscape .', 'The relative importance of the predictor variables shows that commercial and educational facility are important determinant of the RLP distribution in Wuhan ; moreover , the relative importance of natural amenity and education facility increased over time , while that of commercial facility and public transportation decreased slightly .', 'The case of Wuhan confirms the feasibility of MLAs and openly accessible urban data in modeling fine-scale RLP distribution .', 'Our proposed framework provides a new approach to monitor the urban land price dynamic accurately and closely , which is beneficial for improving the infrastructure layout and achieve smart city growth .', 'Analysis of built-up area of small polish city with the use of deep learning and geographically weighted regression .', 'Small city are an important part of the settlement system , a link between rural area and large city .', 'Although they perform important function , research focuses on large city and metropolis while marginalizing small city , the study of which is of great importance to progress in social science , geography , and urban planning .', 'The main goal of this paper was to verify the impact of selected socio-economic factor on the share of built-up area in 665 small Polish city in 2019 .', 'Data from the Database of Topographic Objects ( BDOT ) , Sentinel-2 satellite imagery from 2015 and 2019 , and Local Data Bank by Statistics Poland form 2019 were used in the research .', 'A machine learning segmentation procedure was used to obtain the data on the occurrence of built-up area .', 'Hot Spot ( Getis-Ord Gi * ) analysis and geographically weighted regression ( GWR ) was applied to explain spatially varying impact of factor related to population , spatial and economic development , and living standard on the share of built-up area in the area of small city .', 'Significant association was found between the population density and the share of built-up area in the area of the city studied .', 'The influence of the other socio-economic factor examined , related to the spatial and economic development of the city and the quality of life of the inhabitant , showed great regional variation .', 'The result also indicated that the share of built-up area in the area of the city under study is a result of the condition under which they were established and developed throughout their existence , and not only of the socio-economic factor affecting them at present .', 'Analyzing the spatiotemporal uncertainty in urbanization prediction .', 'With the availability of computational resource , geographical information system , and remote sensing data , urban growth modeling has become a viable tool for predicting urbanization of city and town , region , and nation around the world .', 'This information allows policy maker , urban planner , environmental and civil organization to make investment , design infrastructure , extend public utility network , plan housing solution , and mitigate adverse environmental impact .', 'Despite its importance , urban growth model often discard the spatiotemporal uncertainty in their prediction estimate .', 'In this paper , we analyzed the uncertainty in the urban land prediction by comparing the outcome of two different growth model , one based on a widely applied cellular automaton model known as the SLEUTH CA and the other one based on a previously published machine learning framework .', 'We selected these two model because they are complementary , the first is based on human knowledge and pre-defined and understandable policy while the second is more data-driven and might be less influenced by any a priori knowledge or bias .', 'To test our methodology , we chose the city of Jiaxing and Lishui in China because they are representative of new town planning policy and have different characteristic in term of land extension , geographical condition , growth rate , and economic driver .', 'We focused on the spatiotemporal uncertainty , understood as the inherent doubt in the prediction of where and when will a piece of land become urban , using the concept of certainty area in space and certainty area in time .', 'The proposed analysis in this paper aim to contribute to better urban planning exercise , and they can be extended to other city worldwide .', 'An agent-based learning-embedded model ( ABM-learning ) for urban land use planning : A case study of residential land growth simulation in Shenzhen , China .', "A forward-looking urban land use plan is crucial to a city 's sustainability , which requires a deep understanding of human-environment interaction between different domain , and modelling them soundly .", 'One of the key challenge of modelling these interaction is to understand and model how human individual make and develop their location decision by learning that then shape urban land-use pattern .', 'To investigate this issue , we have constructed an extended experience-weighted attraction learning model to represent the human agent ’ learning when they make location decision .', 'Consequently , we propose and have developed an agent-based learning-embedded model ( ABM-learning ) for residential land growth simulation that incorporates a learning model , a decision-making model , a land use conversion model and the constraint of urban land use master plan .', 'The proposed model was used for a simulation of the residential land growth in Shenzhen city , China .', 'By validating the model against empirical data , the result showed that the site-specific accuracy of the model has been improved when embedding learning model .', "The analysis on the simulation accuracy has proved the argument that modelling individual-level learning matter in the agent 's decision model and the agent-based model .", 'We also applied the model to predict residential land growth in Shenzhen from 2015 to 2035 , and the result can be a reference for land-use allocation in detailed planning of Shenzhen .', 'The ABM-learning is applicable to studying the past urban growth trajectory , aiding in the formulation of detailed residential land and public service facility planning and assessing the land use planning effectiveness .', 'A Machine Learning-Based Method for Predicting Urban Land Use .', 'Land use is one of the most basic element of urban management .', 'In urban planning and design , land use is often determined by experience and case study .', 'However , the development of urbanization has led to a combinatory trend for land use , and the land use of a plot is always impacted by the surrounding environment .', 'In such a complex situation , it is difficult to find hidden relationship among type of land use by human alone .', 'Within artificial intelligence , machine learning can help find correlation among data .', 'This paper presents a new method for learning the rule relating the known land use data and predicting the land use of a target plot by constructing an artificial neural network .', 'We take Nanjing as a specific case and study the logic of its land use .', 'The result not only demonstrate association between the surroundings and the target but also show the feasibility of a combinatory land use index in urban planning and design .', 'Spatiotemporal modeling of urban growth using machine learning .', 'This paper presents a general framework for modeling the growth of three important variable for city : population distribution , binary urban footprint , and urban footprint in color .', 'The framework model the population distribution as a spatiotemporal regression problem using machine learning , and it obtains the binary urban footprint from the population distribution through a binary classifier plus a temporal correction for existing urban region .', 'The framework estimates the urban footprint in color from its previous value , as well as from past and current value of the binary urban footprint using a semantic inpainting algorithm .', 'By combining this framework with free data from the Landsat archive and the Global Human Settlement Layer framework , interested user can get approximate growth prediction of any city in the world .', 'These prediction can be improved with the inclusion in the framework of additional spatially distributed input variable over time subject to availability .', 'Unlike widely used growth model based on cellular automata , there are two main advantage of using the proposed machine learning-based framework .', 'Firstly , it does not require to define rule a priori because the model learns the dynamic of growth directly from the historical data .', 'Secondly , it is very easy to train new machine learning model using different explanatory input variable to assess their impact .', "As a proof of concept , we tested the framework in Valledupar and Rionegro , two Latin American city located in Colombia with different geomorphological characteristic , and found that the model prediction were in close agreement with the ground-truth based on performance metric , such as the root-mean-square error , zero-mean normalized cross-correlation , Pearson 's correlation coefficient for continuous variable , and a few others for discrete variable such as the intersection over union , accuracy , and the f1 metric .", 'In summary , our framework for modeling urban growth is flexible , allows sensitivity analysis , and can help policymakers worldwide to assess different what-if scenario during the planning cycle of sustainable and resilient city .', 'Analyzing the spatial factor related to the distribution of building height in urban area : A comparative case study in Guangzhou and Shenzhen .', 'Rapid urbanization has become an increasingly serious issue worldwide .', 'While most previous study focused on two-dimensional urban development , the spatial characteristic of building height are rarely explored .', 'Such information could provide valuable implication for smart urban planning and management .', 'However , previous attempt did not systematically investigate the spatial factor that influence building height and their association with urban development .', 'Therefore , this study developed a machine learning-based method to compare the distribution of building height in Guangzhou and Shenzhen , two city with different development pattern .', 'First , we collected detailed information on the building , such as the location and land value .', 'Second , the height of each building was simulated based on the above information using the well-known random forest , k-nearest neighbor algorithm , and artificial neural network .', 'The random forests algorithm outperformed the other two in both city .', 'We also found that the commercial land value is the most important factor associated with building height .', 'Moreover , the building height in Guangzhou are more sensitive to the distance to administrative center , while the distance to transportation network exert stronger influence on the building height in Shenzhen .', 'Overall , these finding could support urban planning and management .', 'More importantly , the proposed method can be used to predict the height of new building and investigate the distribution of building height in other region .', 'Machine learning-assisted evaluation of land use policy and plan in a rapidly urbanizing district in Chongqing , China .', 'Analysis of annual land use change is crucial to timely assessment of the impact of land use policy , especially in rapidly urbanizing area such as the Liangjiang New District of Chongqing , China .', 'This research aims to assess the impact of multi-level land use policy and plan and their effectiveness in protecting farmland , and to recommend policy to remedy defective one .', 'Markov Chain–Cellular Automata modelling was integrated with machine learning to predict future urbanization .', 'The result show that prior to the establishment of the District in late 2010 , the urban area grew at 13 % annually because local policy promoted profit-motivated development .', 'This rate declined drastically to 4 % during 2011–2012 in direct response to the changed local land use policy and strict enforcement of national policy .', 'These policy stabilized the urbanization rate at 7 % over the subsequent year .', 'The safeguard of previous farmland was possible only when the national policy were aligned closely with the local policy in their aim , provided both were rigorously enforced through a land management agency .', 'Urban land in 2020 is predicted to growth by at least 464 km2 with some difference between two scenario .', 'In the baseline scenario ( no change in policy ) , almost 70 % of new growth will take place inside three industry zone and the duty-free port .', 'However , in the national overall plan scenario , a significant amount of marginal farmland will be changed into greenfields within the planned urban zone .', 'It is recommended that a hierarchical farmland protection policy be implemented .', 'It should incorporate the national policy that must be adapted to the local setting to achieve sustainable urbanization and to minimize farmland loss .', 'Investigation of the likelihood of green infrastructure ( GI ) enhancement along linear waterway or on derelict site ( DS ) using machine learning .', 'Study evaluating the potential for green infrastructure ( GI ) development using traditional Boolean logic-based multi-criteria analysis method are not capable of predicting future GI development in dynamic urbanscapes .', 'This study evaluated both artificial neural network ( ANN ) and adaptive , network-based fuzzy inference system ( ANFIS ) algorithms in conjunction with statistical modelling to predict green or grey transformation likelihood for derelict site ( DS ) and vacant site along waterway corridor ( WWC ) in Manchester based on ecological , environmental , and social criterion .', 'The soft-computing algorithms had better predictive capacity at 72 % accuracy versus the 65 % of logistic model .', 'Site size , population coverage , and air pollution were identified as the main influencers in the potential for site transformation .', 'In Manchester , the likelihood of GI transformation was higher for WWC than derelict site at 80 % versus 60 % likelihood , respectively .', 'Furthermore , DS were more likely to transform into grey development based on current trend and urban planning practice .', 'Accelerated exploration for long-term urban water infrastructure planning through machine learning .', 'In this study , the neural network method ( Multi-Layer Perceptron , MLP ) was integrated with an explorative model , to study the feasibility of using machine learning to reduce the exploration time but providing the same support in long-term water system adaptation planning .', 'The specific network structure and training pattern were determined through a comprehensive statistical trial-and-error ( considering the distribution of error ) .', "The network was applied to the case study in Scotchman 's Creek , Melbourne .", 'The network was trained with the first 10 % of the exploration data , validated with the following 5 % and tested on the rest .', 'The overall root-mean-square-error between the entire observed data and the predicted data is 10.5722 , slightly higher than the validation result ( 9.7961 ) , suggesting that the proposed trial-and-error method is reliable .', 'The designed MLP showed good performance dealing with spatial randomness from decentralized strategy .', 'The adoption of MLP-supported planning may
