overestimate the performance of candidate urban water system .', 'By adopting the safety coefficient , a multiplicator or exponent calculated by observed data and predicted data in the validation process , the overestimation problem can be controlled in an acceptable range and have few impact on final decision making .', 'Predicting multiple land use transition under rapid urbanization and implication for land management and urban planning : The case of Zhanggong District in central China .', 'Numerous machine learning-based land change model have been presented by researcher over the last two decade .', 'To date , however , far less have simulated multiple land use class and specific land use subclasses at the same time .', 'In some area of the world , it is important to simulate both of these dynamic to understand fully the driver and consequence of land change .', 'One important example is the process of urbanization in China , as urban policy have been developed that guide urban expansion , rural protection , and urban subclass development .', 'This paper presents a new model integrating geographic information system ( GIS ) with artificial neural network ( ANNs ) to predict multiple transition among land use type and urban subclass in the Zhanggong District of Ganzhou city in China .', 'We show that the model produces satisfactory goodness of fit values-based on location , quantity and spatial configuration-between simulated and observed land use map for 2015 .', 'Our simulated future map produced by the model for 2020 and 2025 demonstrate that transition from farmland and forest to urban will remain the main pathway of urbanization although we predict that the rate will slow after 2025 .', 'The goal of urban planning should be aligned with land use planning according to “ Combining multiple law and regulation ” in China .', 'Taking into account the current and future land use transition will enhance the accuracy and timeliness of land use policy making and urban land planning .', 'For the sustainable land use in Zhanggong District , we argue for a strengthened regulation of the land market by government and believe that planning official should guide the spatial distribution of land supply actively .', 'Furthermore , improving the production , living and ecological function of land resource are the key point to optimize urban land use function and the allocation of land resource .', 'We discuss how our model can be adapted to other area to benefit land use management and urban planning in China .', 'Mining transition rule of cellular automaton for simulating urban expansion by using the deep learning technique .', 'Along with the gradually accelerated urbanization process , simulating and predicting the future pattern of the city is of great importance to the prediction and prevention of some environmental , economic and urban issue .', 'Previous study have generally integrated traditional machine learning with cellular automaton ( CA ) model to simulate urban development .', 'Nevertheless , difficulty still exist in the process of obtaining more accurate result with CA model ; such difficulty are mainly due to the insufficient consideration of neighborhood effect during urban transition rule mining .', 'In this paper , we used an effective deep learning method , named convolution neural network for united mining ( UMCNN ) , to solve the problem .', 'UMCNN has substantial potential to get neighborhood information from its receptive field .', 'Thus , a novel CA model coupled with UMCNN and Markov chain was designed to improve the performance of simulating urban expansion process .', 'Choosing the Pearl River Delta of China as the study area , we excavate the driving factor and the transformational relation revealed by the urban land-use pattern in 2000 , 2005 and 2010 and further simulate the urban expansion status in 2020 and 2030 .', 'Additionally , three traditional machine-learning-based CA model ( LR , ANN and RFA ) are built to attest the practicality of the proposed model .', 'In the comparison , the proposed method reaches the highest simulation accuracy and landscape index similarity .', 'The predicted urban expansion result reveal that the economy will continue to be the primary factor in the study area from 2010 to 2030 .', 'The proposed model can serve as guidance in urban planning and government decision-making .', 'Urban sprawl modeling of Lahore , Pakistan using machine learning technique .', 'Population is the fundamental concentration because population is related with all resource and urban sprawl , an effect of socioeconomic improvement in specific condition , has progressively turned into a noteworthy issue confronting numerous metropolitan zone .', 'This is very essential to understand the significant factor affecting the population .', 'This research analyzed the spatial and temporal characteristic of metropolitan city Lahore , Pakistan .', 'Supervised classification method is applied to examine the urban expansion and to evaluate signature of Lahore city into four category ( urban , vegetation , bare land and water body ) .', 'For the land cover change analysis and to predict the urban sprawl in future different technique and method can be used and out of numerous , geospatial technique like ( MOLUSCE ) QGIS plug-in , GIS along with remote sensing is used .', 'In this study , Landsat V and VIII satellite image of 1998 , 2008 and 2017 were used to classify the urban expansion .', 'The precision appraisal was completed for characterized map .', 'Distinctive image Transition probability matrix and region change were acquired by utilizing plug-in created in QGIS and future year 2036 urban expansion was obtained .', 'In this study , an attempt was made to develop a relationship between urban sprawl and population of Lahore .', 'In light of accessible informational index , from 2017 to 2036 the change in urban area is 40 % while a 367.02 sq.km loss in vegetation is chronicled .', 'The majority of the urban sprawl occurred along primary roadway .', 'The outcome demonstrates that urban region is relied upon to develop substantially higher in the year 2036 when contrasted with 2017 .', 'This analysis gives awareness of urban development and support in macro and micro level urban planning , policy making in metropolitan city .', 'Integrating the multi-label land-use concept and cellular automata with the artificial neural network-based Land Transformation Model : an integrated ML-CA-LTM modeling framework .', 'Cellular automata ( CA ) and artificial neural network ( ANNs ) have been used by researcher over the last three decade to simulate land-use change ( LUC ) .', 'While conventional CA and ANN model assign a cell to only one land-use class , in reality , a cell may belong to several land-use class simultaneously .', 'The recently developed multi-label ( ML ) concept overcomes this limitation in land change science .', 'Although the ML concept is a new paradigm with nonexclusive class and has shown considerable merit in several application , few study in land change science have applied it .', 'In addition , determining transition rule in conventional CA is difficult when the number of driver is large .', 'Since CA has been shown as a potential model to consider neighborhood effect and ANN has been shown effective in determining CA transition rule , we integrated both CA with an ANN model to overcome limitation of each tool .', 'In this study , we specifically extended the ANN-based Land Transformation Model ( LTM ) with both a CA-based model and the ML concept to create an integrated ML-CA-LTM modeling framework .', 'We also compared , using standard evaluation measure , difference between the proposed integrated model with a conventional CA-based LTM model ( called the ml-CA-LTM ) .', 'Parameterization was made using a learning and testing procedure common in machine learning .', 'Result showed that the modified LUC model , ML-CA-LTM , produced consistently better goodness of fit calibration value compared to the ml-CA-LTM .', 'The outcome of this modified model can be used by manager and decision maker for improved urban planning .', 'Urban inefficient industrial land recognition system based on augmented learning model .', 'From a salient point of view , urban planning has a significant impact on the expansion of the residential , industrial and commercial land .', 'Land planning has a positive impact on the development of residential land but negatively affects the expansion of industrial , commercial and mining land , that is to say , the plot planned for construction land has a lower probability of transforming into construction land , which is not in line with common sense , indicating that the compilation of the land planning is far from the expansion of actual construction land .', 'Therefore , this paper presents the urban inefficient industrial land recognition system based on augmented learning model .', 'We adopt endogenous optimization method to determine the weight of each input factor , do not need to estimate parameter in advance , no correlation requirement to input and output variable , avoiding the input-output relationship of the expression and the index weight to determine the specific functional form of subjectivity .', 'With this model , the urban planning model is then optimized to satisfy the general requirement .', 'Performance analysis of radial basis function network and multi-layer perceptron network in modeling urban change : a case study .', 'The majority of city are rapidly growing .', 'This makes the monitoring and modeling of urban change ’ s spatial pattern critical to urban planner , decision maker , and environment protection activist .', 'Although a wide range of method exists for modeling and simulating urban growth , machine learning ( ML ) technique have received less attention despite their potential for producing highly accurate prediction of future urban extent .', 'The aim of this study is to investigate two ML technique , namely radial basis function network ( RBFN ) and multi-layer perceptron ( MLP ) network , for modeling urban change .', 'By predicting urban change for 2010 , the model ’ performance is evaluated by comparing result with a reference map and by using a set of pertinent statistical measure , such as average spatial distance deviation and figure of merit .', 'The application of these technique employs the case study area of Mumbai , India .', 'The result show that both model , which were tested using the same explanatory variable , produced promising result in term of predicting the size and extent of future urban area .', 'Although a close match between RBFN and MLP is observed , RBFN demonstrates higher spatial accuracy of prediction .', 'Accordingly , RBFN was utilized to simulate urban change for 2020 and 2030 .', 'Overall , the study provides evidence that RBFN is a robust and efficient ML technique and can therefore be recommended for land use change modeling .', 'Systematic data mining into land consumption in Germany .', 'This paper presents a systematic approach for discovering comprehensible , valid , potentially innovative and useful structure in multivariate municipality data .', 'Technique from statistic , machine learning and data mining are applied in logical consecutive step .', 'This allows the validation after each step and the generation of important result during the investigation .', 'In particular , the approach does not end with a clustering of the data .', 'If a structure has been identified , then the question is posed : what does the cluster mean ?', 'Symbolic machine learning method are used to produce an understandable description of the cluster in form of classification rule .', 'The approach is demonstrated on a data set of nine variable concerning land consumption of all municipality in Germany .', 'Selected result demonstrate the capacity of the method .', 'Driving force analysis of urban expansion based on boosted regression tree and Logistic regression .', 'The rapid relentless urban area expansion has led to a series of problem in China .', 'Many research focused on this issue in recent year .', 'Driving force are the core topic in urban expansion , as well as the basic component of modeling and predicting .', 'It is very useful and meaningful to analyze the driving force of urban expansion , which may provide us with a scientific basis to rationally utilize land resource , determining the law of urban development , researching the evolution process , predicting the urban expansion trend , and also providing guidance for the development of rational control policy .', 'The Shenyang city was chosen as study area .', 'Eight category of land use type were extracted from remote sensing image ( 1997 and 2010 ) with ArcGIS software .', 'Ten driving force were chosen , including three natural factor , three distance factor , four social and economic factor .', 'which were calculated based on the land use map , DEM , topographic map , zoning map and the statistical yearbook .', 'The dependent variable was the change of built-up area of Shenyang from 1997 to 2010 .', 'Boosted regression tree ( BRT ) is an ensemble method and is a combination of technique between statistical and machine learning tradition that has shown to be effective to identify relationship between result and influencing factor .', 'Logistic regression is a method to discover the empirical relationship between a binary dependent and several independent categorical and continuous variable .', 'Boosted Regression Trees and Logistic regression were used to analyze the main driving force of urban expansion synthetically .', 'The result illustrated the relative influence of driving factor was followed by distance from urban area of 1997 , distance from river , DEM , distance from highway and railway , land use type , development plan , GDP , population density , aspect , and slope based on BRT analysis .', 'According to Logistic regression analysis , the relative influence of important factor was followed by development zone , distance from urban land of 1997 , DEM , distance from highway and railway , population density , distance from river , rural residential area and slope .', 'The most important driving force affecting the expansion of Shenyang are distance from urban area of 1997 , DEM , distance from highway and railway .', 'Meanwhile , they were all located in the top four of the main factor .', 'The result revealed that the distance factor were the most important factor , and the total contribution rate of relative influence was up to 61.4 % .', 'It is demonstrated distance factor are the main driving force of urban expansion .', 'Natural factorswere less important , but the relative influence of DEM was important , and the contribution rate was 12.5 % .', 'Development zone and rural settlement are the only two factor have much influence in the socio-economic factor .', 'On the whole , location factor , which refer to the distance from urban land in this study , were the leading factor of urban expansion .', 'Natural factor , such as DEM , river and so on , are the basis of urban development , determining the overall urban spatial form .', 'The construction of infrastructure , such as road and railway , are the frame of the city .', 'The social and economic factor decided the speed of urban expansion .', 'Urban planning and development zone construction provided the direction of urban expansion .', 'Mining urban land-use pattern from volunteered geographic information by mean of genetic algorithm and artificial neural network .', 'In the context of OpenStreetMap ( OSM ) , spatial data quality , in particular completeness , is an essential aspect of its fitness for use in specific application , such as planning task .', 'To mitigate the effect of completeness error in OSM , this study proposes a methodological framework for predicting by mean of OSM urban area in Europe that are currently not mapped or only partially mapped .', 'For this purpose , a machine learning approach consisting of artificial neural network and genetic algorithms is applied .', 'Under the premise of existing OSM data , the model estimates missing urban area with an overall squared correlation coefficient ( R 2 ) of 0.589 .', 'Interregional comparison of European region confirm spatial heterogeneity in the model performance , whereas the R 2 range from 0.129 up to 0.789 .', 'These result show that the delineation of urban area by mean of the presented methodology depends strongly on location .', 'Developing methodology of knowledge discovery and data mining to investigate metropolitan land use evolution .', 'In the urban/territorial planning process , the quality of the evaluation procedure is crucial .', 'It is necessary to select and implement innovative tool able to handle the huge amount of available data concerning territorial system in order to extract useful information from them to enhance the quality of evaluation procedure for urban/territorial planning .', 'This paper selects some tool derived from Artificial Intelligence , and incorporated GIS through the elaboration of various type of available data , to extract and build knowledge directly from experimental data and also to represent the extracted knowledge very effectively and communicatively , in the form of set of spatial transformation rule .', 'It describes the structure of the data mining tool which are most suitable for application in the field of urban planning , aimed at discovering the transformation rule driving the evolution of city in special of metropolitan in analysis .', 'Comparing machine learning classification scheme - A GIS approach .', 'This project examines the effectiveness of two classification schema : Support Vector Machines ( SVM ) , and Artificial Neural Networks ( NN ) when applied to geographic ( i.e .', 'spatial ) data .', 'The context for this study is to examine pattern of urbanization in Mahoning County , OH in relation to several independent driving variable of urban development .', 'These independent variable were constructed using Geographic Information Systems ( CIS ) and were compared to the dependent variable of the spatial location of urban area in Mahoning County .', 'The classification technique were used in conjunction with the GIS-created variable to predict the location of urban area within Mahoning County .', 'A comparison of the accuracy of the technique is presented and conclusion drawn concerning which of the variable are the most influential on urban pattern in the region .', 'Lastly , a spatial analysis of the prediction error is performed for each method .']

['Urban Catchment-Scale Blue-Green-Gray Infrastructure Classification with Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Images and Machine Learning Algorithms .', 'Green infrastructure ( GI ) , such as green roofs , is now widely used in sustainable urban development .', 'An accurate mapping of GI is important to provide surface parameterization for model development .', 'However , the accuracy and precision of mapping GI is still a challenge in identifying GI at the small catchment scale .', 'We proposed a framework for blue-green-gray infrastructure classification using machine learning algorithm and unmanned aerial vehicle ( UAV ) images that contained digital surface model ( DSM ) information .', 'We used the campus of the Southern University of Science and Technology in Shenzhen , China , as a study case for our classification method .', 'The UAV was a DJI Phantom 4 Multispectral , which measures the blue , green , red , red-edge , and near-infrared band and DSM information .', 'Six machine learning algorithm , i.e.', ', fuzzy classifier , k-nearest neighbor classifier , Bayes classifier , classification and regression tree , support vector machine ( SVM ) , and random forest ( RF ) , were used to classify blue ( including water ) , green ( including green roofs , grass , tree ( shrubs ) , bare land ) , and gray ( including building , road ) infrastructure .', 'The highest kappa coefficient was observed for RF and the lowest was observed for SVM , with coefficient of 0.807 and 0.381 , respectively .', 'We optimized the sampling method based on a chessboard grid and got the optimal sampling interval of 11.6 m to increase the classification efficiency .', 'We also analyzed the effect of weather condition , season , and different image layer , and found that image in overcast day or winter day could improve the classification accuracy .', 'In particular , the DSM layer was crucial for distinguishing green roofs and grass , and building and road .', 'Our study demonstrates the feasibility of using UAV image in urban blue-green-gray infrastructure classification , and our infrastructure classification framework based on machine learning algorithms is effective .', 'Our result could provide the basis for the future urban stormwater management model development and aid sustainable urban planning .', 'A novel approach for change detection analysis of land cover from multispectral FCC optical image using machine learning .', 'Land covers refers to the physical land type such as vegetation , water , urban area , road , and many more according to the geographical region .', 'With the rapid change in land-use pattern , the land cover are varying drastically which requires immediate attention to have an eye at the impact of the land use planning and environmental change is on the right track , or it needs to be modified .', 'Hence utilizing the advancement in remote sensing technology for analyzing Land Use Land Cover ( L ULC ) classification map using satellite image of the geographical region plays an important role in analyzing the present scenario of land cover .', 'This paper proposes a novel approach for change detection analysis using the classification map generated using Machine Learning ( ML ) classification technique on a particular geographical region surrounding Nirma University , Ahmedabad , India .', 'The highest classification accuracy of 98.48 % was achieved using Support Vector Machine ( SVM ) for Near Infrared ( NIR ) band False Colour Composite ( FCC ) image obtained from Sentinel 2 .', 'Using satellite image fusion to evaluate the impact of land use change on ecosystem service and their economic value .', 'Accelerated land use change is a current challenge for environmental management world-wide .', 'Given the urgent need to incorporate economic and ecological goal in landscape planning , cost-effective conservation strategy are required .', 'In this study , we validated the benefit of fusing imagery from multiple sensor to assess the impact of landscape change on ecosystem service ( ES ) and their economic value in the Long County , Shaanxi Province , China .', 'We applied several landscape metric to assess the local spatial configuration over 15 year ( 2004–2019 ) from fused image-ries .', 'Using Landsat-7 Enhanced Thematic Mapper Plus ( ETM+ ) , Landsat-8 Operational Land Im-ager ( OLI ) and Indian Remote Sensing Satellite System Linear Imaging Self Scanning Sensor 3 ( IRS LISS 3 ) imagery fused for 2004 , 2009 , 2014 and 2019 , we reclassified land use/land cover ( LULC ) change , through the rotation forest ( RF ) machine-learning algorithm .', 'We proposed an equivalent monetary metric for estimating the ES value , which also could be used in the whole China .', 'Result showed that agriculture farmland and unused land decreased their spatial distribution over time , with an observed increase on woodland , grassland , water body and built-up area .', 'Our finding suggested that the pattern of landscape uniformity and connectivity improved , while the distribution of landscape type stabilized , while the landscape diversity had a slight improvement .', 'The overall ES value increased ( 4.34 % ) under a benefit transfer approach , mainly concerning woodland and grassland .', 'A sensitivity analysis showed the selected economic value ( EV ) was relevant and suitable for the study area associated with our ES for LULC change .', 'We suggested that change in landscape pattern affected the ESV trend , while the increase on some LULC class slightly improved the landscape diversity .', 'Using an interdisciplinary approach , we recommend that local au-thorities and environmental practitioner should balance the economic benefit and ecological gain in different landscape to achieve a sustainable development from local to regional scale .', 'Detection of Urban Built-Up Area Change from Sentinel-2 Images Using Multiband Temporal Texture and One-Class Random Forest .', 'Detection of urban land expansion is important for understanding the urbanization process and improving urban planning .', 'Spatio-temporal contextual information derived from multitemporal high-resolution imagery is useful for highlighting urban land cover change .', 'This article proposes a new method for detecting urban built-up area change from multitemporal high spatial resolution imagery by combining spectral and spatio-temporal feature .', 'A multiband temporal texture measured using pseudo cross multivariate variogram ( PCMV ) is adopted to quantify the local spatio-temporal dependence between bitemporal multispectral image .', 'The PCMV texture at multiple scale , bitemporal spectral feature , and normalized difference vegetation index are together input to an improved one-class random forest classifier for urban built-up area change mapping .', 'The proposed method is evaluated in urban built-up area change detection using multitemporal Sentinel-2 image of Tianjin area acquired from 2015 to 2019 .', 'It is also compared with three feature combination and an existing postclassification comparison method based on one-class support vector machine .', 'Experimental result demonstrate that the proposed method outperformed the traditional one , with increase of 2.15 % -7.38 % , 2.07 % -5.45 % , 1.93 % -6.76 % , and 5.98 % -13.11 % in overall accuracy .', 'Moreover , the proposed method also achieves the best performance using the bitemporal Sentinel-2 image over the east of Beijing area .', 'The proposed method is promising as a simple and reliable way to detect urban built-up area change with multitemporal Sentinel-2 imagery .', 'Object-Oriented Approach for Urbanization Growth by Using Remote Sensing and GIS Techniques : A Case Study in Hilla City , Babylon Governorate , Iraq .', 'High rate of urbanization coupled with population growth has led to unexpected land use and land cover change in Hilla city , which is located in the Babylon governorate of Iraq .', 'Understanding and quantifying the spatiotemporal dynamic of the urban land use and land cover change , as well as the driving factor behind them , are therefore vital in order to design appropriate policy and monitoring mechanism to govern urban growth .', 'This study analyzes land use and land cover change over Hilla city through remote sensing and GIS ( Geographical Information System ) technique .', 'IKONOS satellite imagery from year 2000 , 2005 , and 2011 was collected and pre-processed using ENVI and ArcGIS , which then goes through an object-based supervised image classification stage to generate land use and land cover map .', 'The classification is performed using the statistical machine learning algorithm , SVM ( Support Vector Machine ) .', 'The confusion matrix and kappa coefficient are used to evaluate the overall accuracy of the result .', 'The statistical result obtained enable assessment of class change from year 2000 to 2011 and also identify the gain and loss of the built-up area in relation to other land cover class .', 'The result also allow assessment of the spatial trend of these built-up area .', 'Ultimately , forecast can be made to predict expected future class change in 2026 and 2036 .', 'Generally , the result of this study show increased expansion of built-up area , i.e.', ', from 8.14 % in 2000 to 14.53 % in 2005 and up to 18.36 % in 2011 .', 'All this was at the expense of bare land area .', 'Simultaneously , there was an increased expansion of vegetation/agricultural land area , specifically from 36.14 % in 2000 to 41.71 % in 2005 and 45.13 % in 2011 .', 'The spatial trend also shows that the growth of built-up area is focused in the southwestern part of Hilla city .', 'In all , we foresee that the finding of this study can provide a good visual resource for decision-makers to perform more efficient urban planning .', 'On the development of a novel approach for identifying perennial drainage in Southern Brazil : A study case integrating sentinel-2 and high-resolution digital elevation model with machine learning technique .', 'Riparian vegetation plays a key role in maintaining water quality and preserving the ecosystem along riverine system , as they prevent soil erosion , retain water by increased infiltration , and act as a buffer zone between river and their surroundings .', 'Within urban space , these area have also an important role in preventing illegal occupation in area of hydrologic risk , such as in floodplain .', 'The goal of this research is to propose a framework for identifying area of permanent protection associated with perennial drainage , utilizing satellite imagery and digital elevation model ( DEM ) in association with machine learning technique .', "The specific objective include the development of a decision tree to retrieve perennial drainage over high resolution , 1-meter DEM 's , and the development of digital image processing workflow to retrieve surface water body from Sentinel-2 imagery .", 'In-situ information on perennial and ephemeral condition of stream and river were obtained to validate our result , that happened in the first trimester of 2020 .', 'We propose a minimum of 7 day without precipitation prior to in-situ validation , for more accurate assessment of streamflow condition , in order to minimize impact of surface water runoff in flow regime .', 'The proposed method will benefit decision maker by providing them with reliable information on drainage network and their buffer zone , as well as yield detailed mapping of the area of permanent protection that are key to urban planning and management .', 'Comparative assessment of machine learning method for urban vegetation mapping using multitemporal Sentinel-1 imagery .', 'Mapping of green vegetation in urban area using remote sensing technique can be used as a tool for integrated spatial planning to deal with urban challenge .', 'In this context , multitemporal ( MT ) synthetic aperture radar ( SAR ) data have not been equally investigated , as compared to optical satellite data .', 'This research compared various machine learning method using single-date and MT Sentinel-1 ( S1 ) imagery .', 'The research was focused on vegetation mapping in urban area across Europe .', 'Urban vegetation was classified using six classifiers-random forest ( RF ) , support vector machine ( SVM ) , extreme gradient boosting ( XGB ) , multi-layer perceptron ( MLP ) , AdaBoost .', 'M1 ( AB ) , and extreme learning machine ( ELM ) .', 'Whereas , SVM showed the best performance in the single-date image analysis , the MLP classifier yielded the highest overall accuracy in the MT classification scenario .', 'Mean overall accuracy ( OA ) value for all machine learning method increased from 57 % to 77 % with speckle filtering .', 'Using MT SAR data , i.e.', ', three and five S1 imagery , an additional increase in the OA of 8.59 % and 13.66 % occurred , respectively .', 'Additionally , using three and five S1 imagery for classification , the F1 measure for forest and low vegetation land-cover class exceeded 90 % .', 'This research allowed us to confirm the possibility of MT C-band SAR imagery for urban vegetation mapping .', 'Evaluation and comparison of eight machine learning model in land use/land cover mapping using Landsat 8 OLI : a case study of the northern region of Iran .', 'Land use land cover change mapping has been used for monitoring environmental change as an essential factor to study on the earth ’ s surface land cover in the field of climate change phenomenon such as flood and drought .', 'Remote sensing image have been suggested to present inexpensive and fine-scale data offering multi-temporal coverage .', 'This tool is useful in the field of environmental monitoring , land-cover mapping , and urban planning .', 'This study aims to evaluate eight machine learning algorithms for image classification implemented in WEKA and R programming language .', 'Firstly , Landsat 8 OLI/TIRS Level-2 image based on eight machine learning technique including Random Forest , Decision Table , DTNB , J48 , Lazy IBK , Multilayer Perceptron , Non-Nested Generalized Exemplars ( NN ge ) , and Simple Logistic are classified .', 'Then , obtained result are compared in term of Overall Accuracy ( OA ) , Mean Absolute Error ( MAE ) , and Root Mean Squared Error ( RMSE ) for land use land cover mapping .', 'Among the eight machine learning algorithm used for image classification based on the training and test dataset , NN ge classifier is ranked first with value of 100 , 0 , and 0 for Overall Accuracy , Mean Absolute Error and Root Mean Squared Error respectively .', 'All machine learning algorithms had an Overall Accuracy of more than 99 % for the training dataset .', 'On the other hand , for the test dataset , J48 and DTNB algorithms had the worst performance with value of 88.1188 and 76.9802 respectively for the Overall Accuracy .', 'EVALUATION of ADVANCED DATA MINING ALGORITHMS in LAND USE/LAND COVER MAPPING .', 'For environmental monitoring , land-cover mapping , and urban planning , remote sensing is an effective method .', 'In this paper , firstly , for land use land cover mapping , Landsat 8 OLI image classification based on six advanced mathematical algorithms of machine learning including Random Forest , Decision Table , DTNB , Multilayer Perceptron , Non-Nested Generalized Exemplars ( NN ge ) and Simple Logistic is used .', 'Then , result are compared in the term of Overall Accuracy ( OA ) , Mean Absolute Error ( MAE ) and Root Mean Squared Error ( RMSE ) for land use land cover ( LULC ) mapping .', 'Based on the training and test datasets , Simple Logistic had the best performance in term of OA , MAE and RMSE value of 99.9293 , 0.0006 and 0.016 for training dataset and value of 99.9467 , 0.0005 and 0.0153 for the test dataset .', 'Geographic object based image analysis of world view-3 imagery for urban hydrologic modelling at the catchment scale .', "China 's Sponge City initiative will involve widespread installation of new stormwater infrastructure including green roofs , permeable pavement and rain garden in at least 30 city .", 'Hydrologic modelling can support the planning of Sponge Cities at the catchment scale , however , highly detailed spatial data for model input can be challenging to compile from the various authority , or , if available , may not be sufficiently detailed or updated .', 'Remote sensing method show great promise for mitigating this challenge due to their ability to efficiently classify satellite image into category relevant to a specific application .', 'In this study Geographic Object Based Image Analysis ( GEOBIA ) was applied to WorldView-3 satellite imagery ( 2017 ) to create a detailed land cover map of an urban catchment area in Beijing .', 'While land cover classification result based on a Bayesian machine learning classifier alone provided an overall land cover classification accuracy of 63 % , the subsequent inclusion of a series of refining rule in combination with supplementary data ( including elevation and parcel delineation ) , yielded the significantly improved overall accuracy of 76 % .', 'Result of the land cover classification highlight the limitation of automated classification based on satellite imagery alone and the value of supplementary data and additional rule to refine classification result .', 'Catchment scale hydrologic modelling based on the generated land cover result indicated that 61 to 82 % of rainfall volume could be captured for a range of 24 h design storm under varying degree of Sponge City implementation .', 'Spatiotemporal detection of land use/land cover change in the large basin using integrated approach of remote sensing and GIS in the Upper Awash basin , Ethiopia .', 'Assessment of the changing environmental condition is essential for planning the wise use of natural resource .', 'The main objective of this paper is to analyze the historical and future modeled LULC change using multi-temporal Landsat image in the Upper Awash basin , Ethiopia .', 'The supervised image classification method was used to determine the historical LULC change based on Landsat 1 MSS 1972 , Landsat 5 TM 1984 , Landsat 7 ETM + 2000 , and Landsat 8 OLI TIRS 2014 .', 'The future LULC change was predicted using the machine-learning approach of Land Change Modeler ( LCM ) .', 'The LULC change detection analysis exhibited significant increment in the areal extent of the cropland and urban area , and decreasing trend in the pasture , forest and shrubland coverage .', 'Mainly , the LULC change matrix indicated that larger conversion rate was observed from shrubland to cropland area .', 'The urban area found to increase by 606.2 % from the year 1972 to 2014 and cropland has also increased by 47.3 % .', 'Whereas , a decreasing trend was obtained in the forest by − 25.1 % , pasture − 87.4 % , shrubland − 28.8 % and water − 21.0 % in the same period .', 'The modeled future LULC change scenario of the year 2025 and 2035 have exhibited significant expansion of cropland and urban area at the expense of forest , pasture and shrubland area .', 'The study has revealed the extent and the rate of LULC change at larger basin and subbasin level which can be useful for knowledge-based future land management practice in the Upper Awash basin .', 'Land cover classification and change detection analysis of multispectral satellite image using machine learning .', 'Land cover classification and change detection analysis based on remote sensing image using machine learning algorithm has become one of the important factor for environmental management and urban planning .', 'We select Yangon as the study area because the government faces many problem in urban planning sector due to the population growth and urban sprawl .', 'Therefore , the proposed method aims to perform the land cover classification in Yangon using Random Forest ( RF ) classifier in Google Earth Engine ( GEE ) and post-classification change detection between 1987 and 2017 with 5 year interval period are evaluated .', 'Despite land cover classification using satellite imagery have been executed in the past decade , the classification of remotely sensed data integrating with multiple spectral , temporal and textural feature and processing time for classification using time series data still have limitation .', 'To overcome these limitation , feature extracted from Sentinel-2 , Landsat-8 , Landsat-7 , Landsat-5 and Open Street Map ( OSM ) are executed for classification and cloud-based GEE platform is used to reduce the processing time .', 'Some spectral index such as NDVI , NDBI and slope from SRTM are calculated to achieve better classification .', "Land cover classification is performed by using the RF classifier with the different band ' combination .", 'Land cover classification map with 7 class ( Shrub Land , Bare Land , Forest , Vegetation , Urban Area , Lake and River ) is obtained with the overall accuracy of 96.73 % and kappa statistic of 0.95 for 2017 .', 'Finally , change detection analysis over 30 year is performed and the significant change in build-up , bare land , and agriculture have been resulted .', 'A Random Forests classification method for urban land-use mapping integrating spatial metric and texture analysis .', 'Rapid urban growth in developing country is causing a great number of urban planning problem .', 'To control and analyse this growth , new and better method for urban land use mapping are needed .', 'This article proposes a new method for urban land-use mapping , which integrates spatial metric and texture analysis in an object-based image analysis classification .', 'A high-resolution satellite image was used to generate spatial and texture metric from the machine learning algorithm of Random Forests landcover classification .', 'The most meaningful spatial index were selected by visual inspection and then combined with the image and texture value to generate the classification .', 'The proposed method for land-use mapping was tested using a 10-fold crossvalidation scheme , achieving an overall accuracy of 92.3 % and a kappa coefficient of 0.896 .', 'These step produced an accurate model of urban land use , without the use of any census or ancillary data , and suggest that the combined use of spatial metric and texture is promising for urban land-use mapping in developing country .', 'The map produced can provide the landuse data needed by urban planner for effective planning in developing country .', 'Analyzing land cover change and urban growth trajectory of the mega-urban region of Dhaka using remotely sensed data and an ensemble classifier .', 'Accurate information on , and human interpretation of , urban land cover using satellite-derived sensor imagery is critical given the intricate nature and niche of socioeconomic , demographic , and environmental factor occurring at multiple temporal and spatial scale .', 'Detailed knowledge of urban land and their changing pattern over time period associated with ecological risk is , however , required for the best use of critical land and its environmental resource .', 'Interest in this topic has increased recently , driven by a surge in the use of open-source computing software , satellite-derived imagery , and improved classification algorithms .', 'Using the machine learning algorithm Random Forest , combined with multi-date Landsat imagery , we classified eight period of land cover map with up-to-date spatial and temporal information of urban land between the period of 1972 and 2015 for the mega-urban region of greater Dhaka in Bangladesh .', 'Random Forest-a non-parametric ensemble classifier-has shown a quantum increase in satellite-derived image classification accuracy due to its outperformance over traditional approach , e.g.', ', Maximum Likelihood .', 'Employing Random Forest as an image classification approach for this study with independent cross-validation technique , we obtained high classification accuracy , user and producer accuracy .', 'Our overall classification accuracy ranges were between 85 % and 97 % with kappa value between 0.81 and 0.94 .', 'The area statistic derived from the thematic land cover map show that the built-up area in the 43-year study period expanded quickly , from 35 km2 in 1972 to 378 km2 in 2015 , with a net increase rate of approximately 980 % and an average annual growth rate of 6 % .', 'This growth rate , however , was higher in peripheral area , with a 2903 % increase and an annual expansion rate of 8 % , compared to a 460 % increase with an annual growth rate of 4 % in the core city area ( Dhaka City Corporation ) .', 'This huge urban expansion took place in the north , northwest , and southwest region of Dhaka , transforming area that were previously agricultural land , vegetation cover , wetland , and water body .', 'The main factor driving the city towards northern corridor include flood-free higher land , the availability of a transportation network , and the agglomeration of manufacturing-based employment center .', 'The resulting thematic map and spatial information produced from this study therefore serve to facilitate a detailed understanding of urban growth dynamic and land cover change pattern in the mega-urban region of Dhaka , Bangladesh .', 'Land-cover classification and analysis of change using machine-learning classifier and multi-temporal remote sensing imagery .', 'Frequent human activity and rapid urbanization have led to an assortment of environmental issue .', 'Monitoring land-cover change is critical to efficient environmental management and urban planning .', 'The current study had two objective .', 'The first was to compare pixel-based random forest ( RF ) and decision tree ( DT ) classifier method and a support vector machine ( SVM ) algorithm both in pixel-based and object-based approach for classification of land-cover in a heterogeneous landscape for 2010 .', 'The second was to examine spatio-temporal land-cover change over the last two decade ( 1990–2010 ) using Landsat data .', 'This study found that the object-based SVM classifier is the most accurate with an overall classification accuracy of 93.54 % and a kappa value of 0.88 .', 'A post-classification change detection algorithm was used to determine the trend of change between land-cover class .', 'The most significant change from 1990 to 2010 was caused by the expansion of built-up area .', 'In addition to the net change , the rate of annual change for each phenomenon was calculated to obtain a better understanding of the process of change .', 'Between 1990 and 2010 , an average of 4.53 % of land turned to the built-up annually and there was an annual decrease of about 0.81 % in natural land .', 'If the current trend of change continues , regardless of the action of sustainable development , drastic decline in natural area will ensue .', 'The result of this study can be a valuable baseline for land-cover manager in the region to better understand the current situation and adopt appropriate strategy for management of land-cover .', 'Algorithm for modeling agricultural land cover classification and land surface temperature .', 'The rampant and unintended spread of urban area resulted to the increase artificial component in the land cover type of the countryside bringing forth urban heat island ( UHI ) .', 'This paved the way to wide range of negative influence on the human health and environment which commonly relates to air pollution , drought , higher energy demand , and water shortage .', 'The land cover also plays a relevant role in the process of understanding the interaction between ground surface with the local temperature .', 'At the moment , depiction of the land surface temperature ( LST ) at city/municipality scale particularly in certain area of Misamis Oriental , Philippines is inadequate as support to efficient mitigation and adaptation of the surface urban heat island ( SUHI ) .', 'Thus , this study purposely attempts to provide application on the Landsat 8 satellite data and low density Light Detection and Ranging ( LiDAR ) product in mapping out quality semi-Automated LST model and crop-level land cover classification in a local scale through theoretical and algorithm base approach utilizing the principle of data analysis subjected to object based model .', 'The paper also aims to explore the relationship between the derived LST and land cover classification .', 'The result of the presented model showed the ability of comprehensive data analysis , GIS functionality and object based image analysis ( OBIA ) approach with the integration of machine learning intelligence on automating complex map production processes with considerable efficiency and high accuracy .', 'The finding may potentially lead to expanded investigation of temporal dynamic of land surface UHI .', 'It is worthwhile to note that the environmental significance of these interaction can provide microclimate perception , awareness and improved decision making for land use planning and characterization at local and neighborhood scale .', 'As a result , it can aid in facilitating problem identification , support mitigation and adaptation more efficiently .', 'Automatic classification of high resolution land cover using a new data weighting procedure : The combination of k-means clustering algorithm and central tendency measure ( KMC-CTM ) .', 'Information on a well-scale urban land cover is important for a number of urban planning practice involving tree shade mapping , green space analysis , urban hydrologic modeling and urban land use mapping .', 'In this study , an urban land cover dataset received from the database of UCI ( University of California at Irvine ) machine learning was used as the urban land cover data .', 'This dataset is the urban area located in Deerfield Beach , FL , USA .', 'Separately , this dataset is a high definition atmospheric image consisting of 9 different urban land cover .', 'The characteristic of a multi-scale spectral , magnitude and formal tectology were used to sort out and classify these different image .', 'The dataset comprises a total of 147 feature and land cover of 9 different area involving tree , grass , soil , concrete , asphalt , building , car , pool and shadow .', 'A new data weighting method was recommended to classify these 9 different pattern automatically .', 'This recommended data weighting method is based on the combination of the measure of central tendency composed of mean value , harmonic value , mode and median along with the k-means clustering method .', 'In the data weighting method , the data set belonging to each class within the dataset are first calculated by using k-means clustering method , after which the measure of central tendency belonging to each class are calculated , as well .', 'The measure of central tendency belonging to each class is divided by the set central value belonging to the class in question , as the result of which the data weight coefficient of that class has already been calculated .', 'This calculation process is performed separately for 9 different land cover , and afterwards , these data weighting coefficient found are multiplied by the dataset , and thus , the dataset has been weighted .', 'In the second stage , on the other hand , 3 different classification algorithms containing k-NN ( k-nearest neighbor ) , extreme learning machine ( ELM ) and support vector machine ( SVM ) were used to classify 9 different urban land cover after the data weighting method .', 'In determining the educational and test data set , the 10-fold cross validation was used .', 'When classification through raw data was performed along with k-NN ( for k = 1 ) , ELM and SVM classification algorithms , the overall classification accuracy obtained was 77.15 % , 84.70 % and 84.79 % , respectively .', 'When classification through data weighting method ( the combination of k-means clustering and mode measure ) along with k-NN ( for k = 1 ) , ELM and SVM classification algorithms was made , the overall classification accuracy obtained proved to be 98.58 % , 98.62 % and 98.77 % , respectively .', 'The obtained result suggest that the urban land cover in an atmospheric image via the recommended data weighting method was classified as 9 different area with a high classification success rate .', 'From land cover-graphs to urban structure type .', 'Urban structure type ( UST ) are an initial interest and basic instrument for monitoring , controlling and modeling task of urban planner and decision maker during ongoing urbanization process .', 'This study focuses on a method to classify UST from land cover ( LC ) object , which were derived from high resolution satellite image .', 'The topology of urban LC object is analyzed by implementing neighborhood LC-graphs .', 'Various graph measure are examined by their potential to distinguish between different UST , using the machine learning classifier random forest .', 'Additionally the influence of different parameter setting of the random forest model , the reduction of training sample , and the graph measure importance is analyzed .', 'An independent test set is classified and validated , achieving an overall accuracy of 87 % .', 'It was found that the height of the building with the highest node degree has a strong impact on the classification result .', 'Analysis of land use and land cover change in a coastal area of Rio de Janeiro using high-resolution remotely sensed data .', 'Coastal area offer great recreational and economic opportunity , but require intensive resource management and environmental protection .', 'Land use and land cover information provides a rapid and cost-effective mean for monitoring and planning coastal area development .', 'This study quantitatively describes spatiotemporal change of land use and land cover over the last four decade in a coastal area of the state of Rio de Janeiro , Brazil .', 'Historical aerial photographs from 1976 and satellite image from 1990 and 2012 were classified and analyzed .', 'We used supervised classification and machine learning technique to classify the image .', 'An accuracy assessment of result was performed .', 'Land use change statistic for the period indicate that urban area have increased to the detriment of dense vegetation , saline , and bare soil .', 'The analysis provides a basis for better control of anthropogenic impact and geoconservation activity in this coastal area of Rio de Janeiro .', 'Accuracy comparison of land cover mapping using the object-oriented image classification with machine learning algorithm .', 'Land cover mapping provides basic information for advanced science such as ecological management , biodiversity conservation , forest planning and so on .', 'In remote sensing research , the process of creating an accurate land cover map is an important subject .', 'Recently , there has been growing research interest in the object-oriented image classification technique .', 'The object-oriented image classification consists of multidimensional feature including object feature and thus requires multi-dimensional image classification approach .', 'For example , a linear model such as the maximum likelihood method of pixel-based classification can not characterize the pattern or relation of multi-dimensional data .', 'In multi-dimensional image classification , data mining and ensemble learning have been shown to increase accuracy and flexibility .', 'This study examined the use of the object-oriented image classification by the multiple machine learning algorithms for land cover mapping .', 'We applied four classifier : Classification and regression tree ( CART ) , Decision tree with Boosting , Decision tree with Bagging , and Random Forest .', 'The study area was Sado Island in Niigata Prefecture , Japan .', 'Pan-sharpened SPOT/HRG imagery ( June 2007 ) was used and classified into the following eight class : broad-leaved deciduous forest , Japanese cedar , Japanese red pine , bamboo forest , paddy field , urban area , road , and bare land .', 'We prepared four data set with the object based feature including textural information .', 'The number of feature is increased from data set I through IV .', 'As the result , CART was unsuitable for multi-dimensional classification .', 'Random Forest and Decision tree with Boosting showed high classification accuracy .', 'Furthermore , in the data set with the limited feature , Decision tree with Boosting was the accurate classifier .', 'Finally , we propose two machine learning algorithm to every datasets .', 'Random Forest is effective in the case of the multi-dimensional image classification such as data set II , III , and IV .', 'Decision tree with Boosting is effective in the case of the image classification with the limited feature such as data set I .', 'Monitoring land cover change in urban and peri-urban area using dense time stack of Landsat satellite data and a data mining approach .', 'Given the pace and scale of urban expansion in many part of the globe , urban environment are playing an increasingly important role in daily quality-of-life issue , ecological process , climate , material flow , and land transformation .', 'Remote sensing has emerged as a powerful tool to monitor rate and pattern of urban expansion , but many early challenge - such as distinguishing new urban land from bare ground - remain unsolved .', 'To deal with the high temporal and spatial variability as well as complex , multi-signature class within settlement , this paper presents a new approach that exploits multi-seasonal information in dense time stack of Landsat imagery using a multi-date composite change detection technique .', 'The central premise of the approach is that land within/near urban area have distinct temporal trajectory both before and after change occurs , and that these lead to characteristic temporal signature in several spectral region .', "The method relies on a supervised classification that exploits training data of stable/changed area interpreted from Google Earth image , and a 'brute force ' approach of providing all available Landsat data as input , including scene with data gap due to the Scan Line Corrector ( SLC ) problem .", 'Three classification algorithms ( maximum likelihood , boosted decision tree , and support vector machine ) were tested for their ability to monitor expansion across five time period ( 1988-1995 , 1996-2000 , 2001-2003 , 2004-2006 , 2007-2009 ) in three study area that differ in size , eco-climatic condition , and rates/patterns of development .', 'Both the decision tree and support vector machine outperformed the maximum likelihood classifier ( overall accuracy of 90-93 % , compared to 65 % ) , but the decision tree were superior at handling missing data .', 'Adding transformed feature such as band metric to the Landsat data stack increased accuracy 1-4 % , while experiment with a reduced number of feature ( designed to mimic noisy or missing data ) led to a drop in accuracy of 1-9 % .', 'The methodology also proved particularly effective for monitoring peri-urbanization outside the urban core , capturing > 98 % of village settlement .', 'Urban land cover and land use classification of an informal settlement area using the open-source knowledge-based system InterIMAGE .', 'This study uses the InterIMAGE system and imagery from the Quick Bird sensor for land cover and land use classification at two test site with informal settlement in the metropolis of São Paulo , Brazil .', 'InterIMAGE is an open source and free access system for knowledge-based image classification .', 'Within InterIMAGE human knowledge is represented as a semantic net and by user-defined rule based on the paradigms of object-oriented image analysis .', 'In the land cover classification step , a genetic algorithm was used for determining appropriate segmentation parameter .', 'For the description of the land cover classes in term of feature and threshold , a strategy combining machine learning algorithm and a semantic net was elaborated .', 'Based on the land cover classification , the land use classification were carried out considering the urban block of the test sites as the analysis unit .', 'Customized feature related to the composition and geometrical structure of the land cover object within these block were used for the description of the land use class .', 'The proposed methodology has been shown to be efficient for the automatic mapping of the land cover and land use in complex urban area .', 'The land cover classification achieved overall accuracy above 70 percent and Kappa index above 0.65 .', 'Referring to the land use classification , overall accuracy above 87 percent and Kappa index above 0.71 were obtained .', 'This study has explored the main functionality of the InterIMAGE system , presenting its potential for object-based and knowledge-based image classification .', 'Land-cover change and environmental impact analysis in the Greater Mankato area of Minnesota using remote sensing and GIS modelling .', 'Land use and land-cover ( LULC ) data provide essential information for environmental management and planning .', 'This research evaluates the land-cover change dynamic and their effect for the Greater Mankato Area of Minnesota using image classification and Geographic Information Systems ( GIS ) modelling in high-resolution aerial photography and QuickBird imagery .', 'Result show that from 1971 to 2003 , urban impervious surface increased from 18.3 % to 32.6 % , while cropland and grassland decreased from 54.2 % to 39.1 % .', 'The dramatic urbanization caused evident environmental impact in term of runoff and water quality , whereas the annual air pollution removal rate and carbon storage/sequestration remained consistent since urban forest were steady over the 32-year span .', 'The result also indicate that highly accurate land-cover feature can be extracted effectively from high-resolution imagery by incorporating both spectral and spatial information , applying an image-fusion technique , and utilizing the hierarchical machine-learning Feature Analyst classifier .', 'This research fills the high-resolution LULC data gap for the Greater Mankato Area .', 'The finding of the study also provide valuable input for local decision-makers and urban planner .']

['Supervised Machine Learning Approaches to Modeling Residential Infill Development in the City of Los Angeles .', 'While infill development is widely accepted by city as an alternative to urban sprawl , a very dearth of research has attempted to measure infill development and identify contributing factor to infill development .', 'Filling this research gap , this paper model residential infill development in the City of Los Angeles by employing five machine learning ( ML ) algorithms .', 'This paper attempts to identify the best-performing ML algorithms by comparing the performance of the ML algorithms .', 'Of the five ML algorithms tested , the random forest ( RF ) and k-nearest neighbor ( kNN ) algorithms are selected as the best-performing algorithms .', 'The RF algorithm rank independent variable from most to least important .', 'Overall , the rank suggested that residential infill development in the City of Los Angeles is significantly influenced by the physical condition of property and neighborhood rather than socioeconomic characteristic .', 'Diverse land us , good housing mix , and rail transit accessibility also , importantly , contributed to the infill development .', "This finding suggests that the city 's planning effort , such as the promotion of accessory dwelling unit ( ADU ) development and the expansion of rail transit , can create a virtuous circle for sustainable urban development .", 'Automatic identification of address : A systematic literature review .', 'Address matching continues to play a central role at various level , through geocoding and data integration from different source , with a view to promote activity such as urban planning , location-based service , and the construction of database like those used in census operation .', 'However , the task of address matching continues to face several challenge , such as non-standard or incomplete address record or address written in more complex language .', 'In order to better understand how current limitation can be overcome , this paper conducted a systematic literature review focused on automated approach to address matching and their evolution across time .', 'The Preferred Reporting Items for Systematic Reviews and Meta-Analyses ( PRISMA ) guideline were followed , resulting in a final set of 41 paper published between 2002 and 2021 , the great majority of which are after 2017 , with Chinese author leading the way .', 'The main finding revealed a consistent move from more traditional approach to deep learning method based on semantics , encoder-decoder architecture , and attention mechanism , as well as the very recent adoption of hybrid approach making an increased use of spatial constraint and entity .', 'The adoption of evolutionary-based approach and privacy preserving method stand as some of the research gaps to address in future study .', 'Identifying urban built environment factor in pregnancy care and maternal mental health outcome .', 'Background : Risk factor related to the built environment have been associated with woman ’ s mental health and preventive care .', 'This study sought to identify built environment factor that are associated with variation in prenatal care and subsequent pregnancy-related outcome in an urban setting .', 'Method : In a retrospective observational study , we characterized the type and frequency of prenatal care event that are associated with the various built environment factor of the patient ’ residing neighborhood .', 'In comparison to woman living in higher-quality built environment , we hypothesize that woman who reside in lower-quality built environment experience different pattern of clinical event that may increase the risk for adverse outcome .', 'Using machine learning , we performed pattern detection to characterize the variability in prenatal care concerning encounter type , clinical problem , and medication prescription .', 'Structural equation modeling was used to test the association among built environment , prenatal care variation , and pregnancy outcome .', 'The main outcome is postpartum depression ( PPD ) diagnosis within 1 year following childbirth .', 'The exposure were the quality of the built environment in the patient ’ residing neighborhood .', 'Electronic health record ( EHR ) data of pregnant woman ( n = 8,949 ) who had live delivery at an urban academic medical center from 2015 to 2017 were included in the study .', 'Result : We discovered prenatal care pattern that were summarized into three common type .', 'Woman who experienced the prenatal care pattern with the highest rate of PPD were more likely to reside in neighborhood with homogeneous land use , lower walkability , lower air pollutant concentration , and lower retail floor ratio after adjusting for age , neighborhood average education level , marital status , and income inequality .', 'Conclusion : In an urban setting , multi-purpose and walkable community were found to be associated with a lower risk of PPD .', 'Finding may inform urban design policy and provide awareness for care provider on the association of patient ’ residing neighborhood and healthy pregnancy .', 'An end-to-end point of interest ( Poi ) conflation framework .', 'Point of interest ( POI ) data serf as a valuable source of semantic information for place of interest and has many geospatial application in real estate , transportation , and urban planning .', 'With the availability of different data source , POI conflation serves as a valuable technique for enriching data quality and coverage by merging the POI data from multiple source .', 'This study proposes a novel end-to-end POI conflation framework consisting of six step , starting with data procurement , schema standardisation , taxonomy mapping , POI matching , POI unification , and data verification .', 'The feasibility of the proposed framework was demonstrated in a case study conducted in the eastern region of Singapore , where the POI data from five data source was conflated to form a unified POI dataset .', 'Based on the evaluation conducted , the resulting unified dataset was found to be more comprehensive and complete than any of the five POI data source alone .', 'Furthermore , the proposed approach for identifying POI match between different data source outperformed all baseline approaches with a matching accuracy of 97.6 % with an average run time below 3 min when matching over 12,000 POIs to result in 8699 unique POIs , thereby demonstrating the framework ’ s scalability for large scale implementation in dense urban contexts .', 'Urban morphological feature extraction and multi-dimensional similarity analysis based on deep learning approach .', 'The study of urban morphology contributes to the evolution of city and sustainable development .', 'Urban morphological feature extraction and similarity analysis represents a practical framework in many study to interpret and introduce the current built environment to aid in proposing novel design .', 'In conventional method , morphological feature are represented based on qualitative description , symbolical interpretation , or manually selected indicator .', 'However , these method could cause subjective bias and limit the generalizability .', 'This study proposes a hybrid data-driven approach to support quantitative morphological description and multi-dimensional similarity analysis for urban design decision-making and to further morphology-related study using information abundance via a deep-learning approach .', 'We constructed a dataset of 3817 residential plot with geometrical and related infrastructure information .', 'A deep convolutional neural network , GoogLeNet , was implemented with the plot ’ figure–ground image , by quantifying the morphological feature into 2048-dimensional feature vector .', 'We conducted a similarity analysis of the plot by calculating the Euclidean distance between the high-dimensional feature vector .', 'Then , a comparison study was performed by retrieving case based on the plot shape and plot with building separately .', 'The proposed method considers the overall characteristic of the urban morphology and social infrastructure situation for similarity analysis .', 'This method is flexible and effective .', 'The proposed framework indicates the feasibility and potential of integrating task-oriented information to introduce custom and adequate reference via deep learning method , which could support decision making and association study on morphology with urban consequence .', 'This work could serve as a basis for further typo-morphology study and other morphology-related ecological , social , and economic study for sustainable built environment .', 'Identifying urban poverty using high-resolution satellite imagery and machine learning approach : Implication for housing inequality .', 'Enriching Asian perspective on the rapid identification of urban poverty and its implication for housing inequality , this paper contributes empirical evidence about the utility of image feature derived from high-resolution satellite imagery and machine learning approach for identifying urban poverty in China at the community level .', 'For the case of the Jiangxia District and Huangpi District of Wuhan , image feature , including perimeter , line segment detector ( LSD ) , Hough transform , gray-level cooccurrence matrix ( GLCM ) , histogram of oriented gradient ( HoG ) , and local binary pattern ( LBP ) , are calculated , and four machine learning approach and 25 variable are applied to identify urban poverty and relatively important variable .', 'The result show that image feature and machine learning approach can be used to identify urban poverty with the best model performance with a coefficient of determination , R2 , of 0.5341 and 0.5324 for Jiangxia and Huangpi , respectively , although some difference exist among the approach and study area .', 'The importance of each variable differs for each approach and study area ; however , the relatively important variable are similar .', 'In particular , four variable achieved relatively satisfactory prediction result for all model and presented obvious difference in varying community with different poverty level .', 'Housing inequality within low-income neighborhood , which is a response to gap in wealth , income , and housing affordability among social group , is an important manifestation of urban poverty .', 'Policy maker can implement these finding to rapidly identify urban poverty , and the finding have potential application for addressing housing inequality and proving the rationality of urban planning for building a sustainable society .', 'Geosilhouettes : Geographical measure of cluster fit .', 'Regionalization , under various guise and description , is a longstanding and pervasive interest of urban study .', 'With an increasingly large number of study on urban place detection in language , behavior , pricing , and demography , recent critique of longstanding regional science perspective on place detection have focused on the arbitrariness and non-geographical nature of measure of best fit .', 'In this paper , we develop new explicitly geographical measure of cluster fit .', 'These hybrid spatial–social measure , called geosilhouettes , are demonstrated to capture the “ core ” of geographical cluster in racial data on census block in Brooklyn neighborhood .', 'These new geosilhouettes are also useful in a variety of boundary analysis and outlier detection problem .', 'In this paper , the thinking behind geosilhouettes is presented , their mathematical form is defined , they are demonstrated , and new direction of research are discussed .', 'Research on Urban Renewal Public Space Design Based on Convolutional Neural Network Model .', 'By establishing a database of urban space case , machine learning algorithms and deep learning algorithm can be used to train computer to learn how to design urban space .', 'Based on the basic concept of machine learning and deep learning and their procedural logic , this paper explores the generation mode of traffic road network , neighborhood space form , and building function layout of urban space and uses the northern extension of the central green axis of the city as an application case to confirm its feasibility in order to seek a set of artificial intelligence-based urban space generation design method and provide a new idea for the innovative development of urban design method .', 'Reviewing the application of machine learning method to model urban form indicator in planning decision support system : Potential , issue and challenge .', 'Modern city dynamically face several challenge including digitalization , sustainability , resilience and economic development .', 'Urban planner and designer must develop urban form that address these challenge .', 'With the integration of new communication and information technology ( Smartphone , GIS , Drones , IoT , Sensors , etc . )', ', urban activity have generated large volume of urban data .', 'The rapid growth in term of collection and big data storage capacity combined with the ever-increasing computational power of modern machine have made possible their efficient treatment using machine ( ML ) and deep learning ( DL ) algorithms .', 'The emergence of such groundbreaking method has in turn helped to address the challenge of modern-day city in several domain ( health , security , mobility , etc ) .', "ML algorithm have been proposed to model the urban form 's indicator for intelligent urban planning decision making .", 'They have been proven to perform better than the traditional method .', 'However , the potential of ML has not yet been fully explored in research for urban planning decision support .', 'This paper presents a comprehensive review of ML application for mitigating the challenge of modern city planning .', 'First and foremost , an overview of the urban form , source of urban data , the ML and DL technique as well as their potential in solving the aforementioned challenge .', 'For each ML method , we will highlight it working principle , advantage , disadvantage and potential application using comparative table .', "Finally , we will discuss the issue and challenge of ML method in urban form 's modeling while ultimately advocating some future research direction .", 'Transfer learning-based city similarity measurement : A case study on urban hotel .', 'With the development of modern city , multiple type and wide distribution of urban data has been gradually collected .', 'Effectively using urban data to solve city development and planning issue has become a research hot-spot .', 'Currently , the data scale in modern city is quite different , and the fitting degree of machine learning algorithm based on single city is not mature yet .', 'This paper study the problem with transfer learning technique , and trains the prediction model of urban hotel development scale using multi-source city data .', 'Based on the location data and related information of 15 different city , the relevant knowledge is transferred , and a city feature extraction and similarity measurement framework is proposed .', 'Machine Learning Predictors for Sustainable Urban Planning .', 'While essential for economic reason , rapid urbanization has had many negative impact on the environment and the social wellbeing of humanity .', 'Heavy traffic , unexpected geohazards are some of the effect of uncontrollable development .', 'This situation points its fingerto urban planning and design ; there are numerous automation tool to help urban planner assess and forecast , yet unplanned development still occurs , impeding sustainability .', 'Automation tool use machine learning classification model to analyze spatial data and various trend view before planning a new urban development .', 'Although there are many sophisticated tool and massive datasets , big city with colossal migration still witness traffic jam , pollution , and environmental degradation affecting urban dweller ’ quality .', 'This study will analyze the current predictor in urban planning machine learning model and identify the suitable predictor to support sustainable urban planning .', 'A correct set of predictor could improve the efficiency of the urban development classification model and help urban planner .', 'With the development of polarized SAR in the direction of high resolution , a single feature often can not fully express the detailed information of ground object , resulting in poor job-housing pattern to inform city planning and development .', 'Remote measurement of building usable floor area – Algorithms fusion .', 'Rapid change that are taking place in the urban environment the semantic similarity between address record .', 'First , we train the word2vec model to transform the address record into their corresponding vector representation .', 'Next , we apply the enhanced sequential inference model ( ESIM ) , a deep text-matching model , to make local and global inference to determine if two address match .', 'To evaluate the accuracy of the proposed method , we fine-tune the model with real-world address data from the Shenzhen Address Database and compare the output with those of several popular address matching method .', 'The result indicate that the emerging research tool such as machine learning/deep learning have also been used in the study of urban morphology .', 'On this basis , this paper reports on a potential application of deep clustering to automatically predict this new information .', 'Uncertainty of human perception in visual image interpretation in complex urban environment .', 'Today satellite image are mostly exploited
