the 21st century urban agenda .', 'This study model the spatial variation in the concentration and distribution of some macronutrients , micronutrient , and trace nutrient in the soil of a high-altitude city in the Andes .', 'Meanwhile , machine learning method were employed to study some interaction between the different dimension that constitute an urban socio-ecosystem that caused these variation .', 'We proposed a methodology that considered two phase : a ) field work to collect data on 300 soil sample ; laboratory analysis to measure the concentration of 24 macronutrients , micronutrient , and trace nutrient ; and the design of geophysical , spectral , and urban co-variables ; b ) statistical and geo-informatics analysis , where multivariate analysis grouped the element into factor ; and , machine learning integrated with co-variables was applied to derive the intensity of each factor across the city .', 'Multivariate statistic described the variation in soil co-concentrations with a moderate percentage ( 42 % ) .', 'Four factor were determined that grouped some of the analyzed element , as follows : F1 ( Zn , S , Cu , Pb , Ni , and Cr ) , F2 ( Ba , Ag , K , In , and Mg ) , F3 ( B , V , Li , and Sr ) , and F4 ( Si and Mn ) .', 'The percentage R2 out-of-bag of the spatial model were : F1 = 20 % , F2 = 8 % , F3 = 14 % , and F4 = 10 % .', 'Our output show that the enrichment and contamination by anthropogenic factor , such as the increase in population density , land use , road network , and traffic generated by fossil fuel vehicle , should be prioritized in urban planning decision .', 'Uncovering the nature of urban land use composition using multi-source open big data with ensemble learning .', 'Detailed information on urban land uses has been an essential requirement for urban land management and policymaking .', 'Recent advance in remote sensing and machine learning technology have contributed to the mapping and monitoring of multi-scale urban land us , yet there lacks a holistic mapping framework that is compatible with different end user ’ demand .', 'Moreover , land use mix has evolved to be a key component in modern urban setting , but few have explicitly measured the spatial complexity of land use or quantitively uncovered its driving force .', 'Addressing these challenge , here we developed a novel two-stage bottom-up scheme for mapping essential urban land use category .', 'In the first stage , we conducted object-based land use classification using crowdsourcing feature derived from multi-source open big data and an automated ensemble learning approach .', 'In the second stage , we identified parcel-based land use attribute , including the dominant type and mixture mode , by spatially correlating land parcel with the object-based result .', 'Furthermore , we investigated the potential influencing factor of land use mix using principal component analysis and multiple linear regression .', 'Experimental result in Ningbo , a coastal city in China , showed that the proposed framework could accurately depict the distribution and composition of urban land us .', 'At the object scale , the highest classification accuracy was as high as 86 % and 78 % for the major ( Level I ) and minor ( Level II ) category , respectively .', 'At the parcel scale , the generated land use map were spatially consistent with the object-based map .', 'We found larger parcel were more likely to be mixed in land use , and industrial land were characterized as the most complicated category .', 'We also identified multiple factor that had a collective impact on land use mix , including geography , socioeconomy , accessibility , and landscape metric .', 'Altogether , our proposed framework offered an alternative to investigating urban land use composition , which could be applied in a broad range of implication in future urban study .', 'Disentangling the comparative role of multilevel built environment on body mass index : Evidence from China .', 'One common goal of urban planning is to promote health , where the built environment ( BE ) is believed to play an essential role .', 'This study provides new evidence for the link between body mass index ( BMI ) and the BE at different geographic scale in a unified framework .', 'Based on a sample of 10,962 individual across 95 city in China , this study explores the collective effect of the BE attributes at neighborhood and city level on BMI using a gradient boosting decision tree ( GBDT ) approach .', 'Moreover , whether the relationship between the city-level BE attribute and BMI vary across social group is revealed .', 'The result indicate that the city-level BE attribute have larger collective effect on BMI than the neighborhood-level BE attributes .', 'Specifically , population size is the greatest contributor to predicting BMI , with a relative importance of 13.92 % among all influential factor .', 'Moreover , it is found that the effect of city-level BE attributes vary across different social group .', 'These finding suggest it is of vital importance for urban planner to coordinate both neighborhood- and city-level BE planning to deter the risk of obesity , and urban planning can be more effective if it is implemented considering local socio-demographic characteristic .', 'Modeling Urban Future : Data-Driven Scenario of Climate Change and Vulnerability in Cities .', 'City are complex system where social , ecological , and technological process are deeply coupled .', 'This coupling complicates urban planning and land use development , as changing one facet of the urban fabric will likely impact the others .', 'As city grapple with climate change , there is a growing need to envision urban future that not only address more frequent and intense severe weather event but also improve day-to-day livability .', 'Here we examine climate risk as function of the local land use with numerical model .', 'These model leverage a wide array of data source , from satellite imagery to tax assessment and land cover .', 'We then present a machine-learning cellular automaton approach to combine historical land use change with local coproduced urban future scenario .', 'The cellular automata model uses historical and ancillary data like existing road system and natural feature to develop a set of probabilistic land use change rule , which are then modified according to stakeholder priority .', 'The resulting land use scenario are evaluated against historical flood hazard , showcasing how they perform against stakeholder expectation .', 'Our work shows that coproduced scenario , when grounded with historical and emerging data , can provide path that increase resilience to weather hazard as well as enhancing ecosystem service provided to citizen .', 'Estimating quality of life dimension from urban spatial pattern metric .', 'The spatial structure of urban area plays a major role in the daily life of dweller .', 'The current policy framework to ensure the quality of life of inhabitant leaving no one behind , leads decision-makers to seek better-informed choice for the sustainable planning of urban area .', 'Thus , a better understanding between the spatial structure of city and their socio-economic level is of crucial relevance .', 'Accordingly , the purpose of this paper is to quantify this two-way relationship .', 'Therefore , we measured spatial pattern of 31 city in North Rhine-Westphalia , Germany .', 'We rely on spatial pattern metric derived from a Local Climate Zone classification obtained by fusing remote sensing and open GIS data with a machine learning approach .', 'Based upon the data , we quantified the relationship between spatial pattern metric and socio-economic variable related to ‘ education ’ , ‘ health ’ , ‘ living condition ’ , ‘ labor ’ , and ‘ transport ’ by mean of multiple linear regression model , explaining the variability of the socio-economic variable from 43 % up to 82 % .', 'Additionally , we grouped city according to their level of ‘ quality of life ’ using the socio-economic variable , and found that the spatial pattern of low-dense built-up type was different among socio-economic group .', 'The proposed methodology described in this paper is transferable to other datasets , level , and region .', 'This is of great potential , due to the growing availability of open statistical and satellite data and derived product .', 'Moreover , we discuss the limitation and needed consideration when conducting such study .', 'GIS-enabled digital twin system for sustainable evaluation of carbon emission : A case study of Jeonju city , south Korea .', 'Despite the growing interest in digital twin ( DTs ) in geospatial technology , the scientific literature is still at the early stage , and concept of DTs vary .', 'In common perspective , the primary goal of DTs are to reduce the uncertainty of the physical system in real-world project to reduce cost .', 'Thus , this study is aimed at developing a structural schematic of a geographic information system ( GIS ) -enabled DT system and exploring geospatial technology that can aid in deploying a DT system for a real-world project—in particular , for the sustainable evaluation of carbon emission .', 'The schematic includes three major phase : ( 1 ) data collection and visualization , ( 2 ) analytics , and ( 3 ) deployment .', 'Three step are designed to propose an optimal strategy to reduce carbon emission in an urban area .', 'In the analytics phase , mapping , machine learning algorithms , and spatial statistic are applied , mapping an ideal counterpart to physical asset .', 'Furthermore , not only are GIS map able to analyze geographic data that represent the counterpart of physical asset but can also display and analyze spatial relationship between physical asset .', 'In the first step of the analytics phase , a GIS map spatially represented the most vulnerable area based on the value of carbon emission computed according to the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change ( IPCC ) guideline .', 'Next , the radial basis function ( RBF ) kernel algorithm , a machine learning technique , was used to forecast spatial trend of carbon emission .', 'A backpropagation neural network ( BPNN ) was used to quantitatively determine which factor was the most influential among the four data source : electricity , city gas , household waste , and vehicle .', 'Then , a hot spot analysis was used to assess where high value of carbon emission clustered in the study area .', 'This study on the development of DTs contributes the following .', 'First , with DTs , sustainable urban management system will be improved and new insight developed more publicly .', 'Ultimately , such improvement can reduce the failure of project associated with urban planning and management .', 'Second , the structural schematic proposed here is a data-driven approach ; consequently , its output are more reliable and feasible .', 'Ultimately , innovative approach become available and service are transformed .', 'Consequently , urban planner or policy maker can apply the system to scenario-based approach .', 'Systematizing and upscaling urban climate change mitigation .', 'The question of what city can contribute to mitigation and adapting to climate change is gaining traction among researcher and policy maker alike .', 'However , while the field is rich with case study , method that provide rich data across municipality and potentially at global scale remain underdeveloped , and comparative insight remain scarce .', "Here we summarize contribution to the focus issue on 'Systematizing and Upscaling Urban Climate Solutions ' , also drawing from presentation given at an accompanying conference in 2018 .", 'We highlight four core area for systematizing and upscaling urban climate mitigation solution .', 'First , with more and better ( big ) data and associated machine learning method , there is increasing potential to compare type of city and leverage collective understanding .', 'Second , while urban climate assessment have mostly emphasized urban planning , demand-side action as related to both behavioral change and modified social practice relevant to urban space deserve more academic attention and integration across a diverse set of social science .', 'Third , climate mitigation would be intangible as a single objective at the urban scale , and measure and solution that coordinate mitigation coherently with adaptation and broader sustainable development goal require explicit conceptualization and systematization .', 'Forth , all insight should come together to develop governance framework that translate scientific exercise into concrete , realistic and organized action plan on the ground , for all city .', 'Published by IOP Publishing Ltd .', 'Water Distribution-Transportation Interface Connectivity Responding to Urban Geospatial Morphology .', 'Water distribution and transportation system are geospatially colocated , forming a network of connection .', 'This network of connection is referred to as an interface network .', 'Investigation of interface network connectivity can help understand and minimize failure propagation from water to transportation system .', 'Water distribution-transportation interface network consist of node , which can be either pipes or roads , and edge , which represent the geospatial colocation of a pipe and road .', 'The purpose of this study is twofold : to topologically represent geospatial colocation by characterizing the connectivity of water distribution-transportation interface network for multiple city , and to identify the nodal attributes that are most predictive of a given connectivity profile .', 'A total of forty interface network from eight city of varying geospatial morphology are extracted and analyzed using network analysis and machine learning .', 'Using network analysis , we investigate whether the topological connectivity between water and transportation is consistent across different city .', 'Then we use a random forest model to ascertain which nodal attribute may have predictive power to identify the connectivity cluster of the city to which a node belongs .', "The result indicate that city of different geospatial morphology may vary in their interface network connectivity , and the average shortest path length of a given node is the major nodal feature contributing to a given city 's interface network connectivity .", 'These finding hold implication for urban planning and water distribution design to mitigate potential cascading failure .', 'Exploring the relationship between ride-sourcing service and vehicle ownership , using both inferential and machine learning approach .', 'Ride-sourcing service are getting more popular each year , and their market are growing .', 'Much has been speculated , but not much has been tested regarding the impact of ride-sourcing service on the transportation system .', 'In this study , we examine the relationship between ride-sourcing service and vehicle ownership of household , by using the most up-to-date ( 2017 ) national household travel survey data .', 'To better capture the effect of ride-sourcing service on vehicle ownership , we controlled for the effect of socioeconomic characteristic of household and built environment variable , i.e.', ', density , diversity , design , and distance to transit .', 'Two approach were used to model vehicle ownership : a probabilistic or inferential model ( i.e.', ', multilevel Poisson ) , and a machine learning method ( i.e.', ', random forest ) .', 'This is the first study to utilize such advanced method to model vehicle ownership and capture non-linear relationship , using the largest sample of household travel record ever assembled for such a study .', 'The result suggest that there is a negative correlation between using ride-sourcing service and vehicle ownership .', 'Vehicle ownership is also negatively associated with the number of year Uber , as the biggest ride-sourcing service , has operated in a county .', 'The relative contribution of ride-sourcing variable , however , are very limited compared to other variable controlled in this study which makes intuitive sense .', 'For urban planning and design practice , this study suggests that the probability of car shedding will increase if the usage of ride-sourcing service becomes a habit , these service become more available , and built environment become more dense , connected , and transit-served .', 'Quantitative relationship model of express service network and service facility in Beijing .', 'This paper intends to propose a quantitative relationship model in the layout between express service network and other life service facility .', 'Through big data mining technology , we collected GPS location of express service point , residential area , grocery store and transportation station in Beijing .', 'Then , using Multiple linear regression , SVM and random forest machine learning model the quantitative relationship between the number of express service point and other data in urban area , as well as the approach of model stacking get an integration machine learning model .', 'Finally , the model and research idea of this paper provide decision-making basis for the rational construction and planning of logistics service network in first-tier city in China .', 'Identification of low-carbon travel block based on GIS hotspot analysis using spatial distribution learning algorithm .', 'In the future , big data will become an efficient and useful mean for improving urban planning , and machine learning can take city as a simplified and efficient system .', 'We take full advantage of the benefit of new technology , but also clarify that city is not a machine , also can not fully mechanically control the urban development .', 'This study presents a methodology for identifying low-carbon travel block , which can be used to identify the built environment conducive to resident ’ low-carbon travel .', 'We chose the four element of traffic survey—travel mode , travel time , travel purpose and travel frequency—as the framework to evaluate travel carbon emission .', 'Using the index data collected from “ WeChat , ” a popular social-media platform in China and questionnaire survey , we conducted hotspot analysis of the spatial distribution of travel carbon emission in GIS .', 'We obtained a comprehensive carbon emission and its spatial distribution through the superposition of hotspot density surface of different index .', 'The result show that E block within the research area has the lowest travel carbon emission .', 'These result suggest some planning implication from three aspects—land use mode , road network and public service facility : In the old urban district of Pucheng , the ratio of residential building area and other type ’ building area should be “ 4:1–3:1 ” ; and we should develop the travel model of bicycle , and the interval of bicycle lane should be 350–450 m ; The ratio of walking road to total road area should be 15–20 % , and the width of road should be restricted .', 'Coverage of transit site buffered for the radius of 150 m is 40–50 % , coverage of shopping service buffered for the radius of 50 m is 45–60 % , and coverage of recreational facility buffered for the radius of 100 m is 50–70 % .', 'The result confirm that “ functional mixing ” and “ dense road network ” are beneficial to resident ’ low-carbon travel proposed by the predecessor .', 'At the same time , we found that not the higher volume rate is , the more favorable for low-carbon travel .', 'Small city have limited number of population and scattered distribution of professional post , which are not suitable for the traditional mode of improving the volume ratio and the bus system .', 'It is not that the higher the bus station coverage is , the better for resident to travel as low-carbon , and the high popularity of public transportation in small city will increase the carbon emission of resident .', 'The study provides a new way to evaluate the carbon emission assessment of block and provides a basis for block planning with low-carbon concept .', 'Learning task-specific city region partition .', 'The proliferation of publicly accessible urban data provide new insight on various urban task .', 'A frequently used approach is to treat each region as a data sample and build a model over all the region to observe the correlation between urban feature ( e.g.', ', demographic ) and the target variable ( e.g.', ', crime count ) .', 'To define region , most existing study use fixed grid or pre-defined administrative boundary ( e.g.', ', census tract or community area ) .', 'In reality , however , definition of region should be different depending on task ( e.g.', ', regional crime count prediction vs. real estate price estimation ) .', 'In this paper , we propose a new problem of task-specific city region partitioning , aiming to find the best partition in a city w.r.t .', 'a given task .', 'We prove this is an NP-hard search problem with no trivial solution .', 'To learn the partition , we first study two variant of Markov Chain Monte Carlo ( MCMC ) .', 'We further propose a reinforcement learning scheme for effective sampling the search space .', 'We conduct experiment on two real datasets in Chicago ( i.e.', ', crime count and real estate price ) to demonstrate the effectiveness of our proposed method .', 'Upscaling urban data science for global climate solution .', 'Non-technical summary Manhattan , Berlin and New Delhi all need to take action to adapt to climate change and to reduce greenhouse gas emission .', 'While case study on these city provide valuable insight , comparability and scalability remain sidelined .', 'It is therefore timely to review the state-of-the-art in data infrastructure , including earth observation , social medium data , and how they could be better integrated to advance climate change science in city and urban area .', 'We present three route for expanding knowledge on global urban area : mainstreaming data collection , amplifying the use of big data and taking further advantage of computational method to analyse qualitative data to gain new insight .', 'These data-based approach have the potential to upscale urban climate solution and effect change at the global scale .', 'Technical summary City have an increasingly integral role in addressing climate change .', 'To gain a common understanding of solution , we require adequate and representative data of urban area , including data on related greenhouse gas emission , climate threat and of socio-economic contexts .', 'Here , we review the current state of urban data science in the context of climate change , investigating the contribution of urban metabolism study , remote sensing , big data approach , urban economics , urban climate and weather study .', 'We outline three route for upscaling urban data science for global climate solution : 1 ) Mainstreaming and harmonizing data collection in city worldwide ; 2 ) Exploiting big data and machine learning to scale solution while maintaining privacy ; 3 ) Applying computational technique and data science method to analyse published qualitative information for the systematization and understanding of first-order climate effect and solution .', 'Collaborative effort towards a joint data platform and integrated urban service would provide the quantitative foundation of the emerging global urban sustainability science .', 'Analysis of relationship between road traffic noise and urban form indicator through machine learning method .', 'As the urban area overcrowded , volume of urban road traffic is increasing .', "It could affect adverse effect on the urban resident 's life quality and health .", 'However , road traffic noise is being managed after it has affected urban resident , because it could not managed at urban planning stage .', 'Therefore , reactive-management of road traffic noise , such as noise barrier is chosen as noise control plan , but it is costly than proactive-management .', 'When road traffic noise could be considered as urban planning factor , the cost will be reduced .', 'Machine learning method , such as regression analysis , decision tree and artificial neural network , could be used to analyze the relationship between variable .', 'This method was used to analyze relationship between road traffic noise and urban form indicator .', 'Predicted noise level of road traffic noise at building facade was used as output variable , and urban form indicator are used as input variable .', 'Applicable urban form indicator could be divided into population-related , building-related , traffic-related and land-use-related .', 'Building-related indicator include building coverage ratio , floor area ratio , and traffic-related indicator include traffic volume , speed and percentage of heavy vehicle .', 'Explanation power of the prediction model derived through machine learning method could verified through correlation , coefficient of determination and k-fold cross validation .', 'Impact of land use and amenity on public transport use , urban planning and design .', 'Various land-use configuration are known to have wide-ranging effect on the dynamic of and within other city component including the transportation system .', 'In this work , we particularly focus on the complex relationship between land-use and transport offering an innovative approach to the problem by using land-use feature at two differing level of granularity ( the more general land-use sector type and the more granular amenity structure ) to evaluate their impact on public transit ridership in both time and space .', "To quantify the interdependency , we explored three machine learning model and demonstrate that the decision tree model performs best in term of overall performance-good predictive accuracy , generality , computational efficiency , and `` interpretability '' .", 'Result also reveal that amenity-related feature are better predictor than the more general one , which suggests that high-resolution geo-information can provide more insight into the dependence of transit ridership on land-use .', "We then demonstrate how the developed framework can be applied to urban planning for transit-oriented development by exploring practicable scenario based on Singapore 's urban plan toward 2030 , which includes the development of `` regional center '' ( RCs ) across the city-state .", 'Results show an initial increase in transit ridership as the amount of amenity is increased .', 'This trend , on the other hand , eventually reverses ( particularly during peak hour ) with continued strategic increase in amenity ; a tipping point at 55 % increase is identified where ridership begins to decline and at 110 % , the predicted ridership begins to fall below current level .', 'Our in-silico experiment support one of the medium-term land-use transport goal of stakeholders-to alleviate future strain in the transportation system of Singapore through the development of RCs .', 'The model put forward can serve as a good foundation in building decision-support tool that can assist planner in better strategizing and planning land-use configuration , in particular the amenity resource distribution , to influence and shape public transportation demand .', '15th International Conference on Database and Expert Systems Applications , DEXA 2004 .', 'The proceeding contain 92 paper .', 'The special focus in this conference is on Deductive DB Aspects , Applications and Multidimensional Indexing .', 'The topic include : Supporting contract execution through recommended workflow ; ensuring task dependency during workflow recovery ; web service based architecture for workflow management system ; feasibility condition and preference criterion in querying and repairing inconsistent database ; optimal deployment of trigger for detecting event ; a new approach for checking schema validation property ; on evolution of xml workflow schemata ; a framework for selecting workflow tool in the context of composite information system ; evaluation strategy for bitmap index with binning ; on the automation of similarity information maintenance in flexible query answering system ; an efficient neighbor searching scheme of distributed collaborative filtering on p2p overlay network ; partially ordered preference applied to the site location problem in urban planning ; a flexible fuzzy expert system for fuzzy duplicate elimination in data cleaning ; an intelligent tool for database administration ; interacting with electronic institution ; growing node policy of a main memory index structure for moving object databases ; an enhanced cache conscious multi-dimensional index structure ; classification decision combination for text categorization ; information extraction via automatic pattern discovery in identified region ; an approach for automatically populating semantic web from unstructured text collection ; text categorization by a machine-learning-based term selection ; update conscious inverted index for xml query in relational database and a selective key-oriented xml index for the index selection problem in XDBMS .', 'Nested logit model and artificial neural network for predicting household automobile choice : Comparison of performance .', 'Over the past few year , machine-learning technique have expanded enormously .', 'These approach are increasingly being applied to traffic and transportation problem formerly reserved for formal statistical approach such as discrete choice model .', 'Part of the reason for this has to do with research trend , but there are some potential advantage associated with such technique , including the ability to model nonlinear system ; the ease with which symbolic , nominal , or categorical variable can be included ; and the ability of these method to deal with noisy data .', 'The use of two modeling technique , the nested logit model and the multilayer perceptron artificial neural network , was investigated in term of their applicability to the household vehicle choice problem .', 'Both method generated strong result , although the multilayer perceptron artificial neural network yielded better predictive potential .']

['Data-based wildfire risk model for Mediterranean ecosystems-case study of the Concepción metropolitan area in central Chile .', 'Wildfire risk is latent in Chilean metropolitan area characterized by the strong presence of wildland-urban interface ( WUIs ) .', 'The Concepción metropolitan area ( CMA ) constitutes one of the most representative sample of that dynamic .', 'The wildfire risk in the CMA was addressed by establishing a model of five category ( near zero , low , moderate , high , and very high ) that represent discernible threshold in fire occurrence , using geospatial data and satellite image describing anthropic-biophysical factor that trigger fire .', 'Those were used to deliver a model of fire hazard using machine learning algorithm , including principal component analysis and Kohonen self-organizing map in two experimental scenario : Only native forest and only forestry plantation .', 'The model was validated using fire hotspot obtained from the forestry government organization .', "The result indicated that 12.3 % of the CMA 's surface area has a high and very high risk of a forest fire , 29.4 % has a moderate risk , and 58.3 % has a low and very low risk .", 'Lastly , the observed main driver that have deepened this risk were discussed : First , the evident proximity between the increasing urban area with exotic forestry plantation and , second , climate change that threatens triggering more severe and large wildfire because of human activity .', 'Landslide susceptibility mapping using artificial neural network tuned by metaheuristic algorithms .', 'As a frequent natural disaster , landslides incur significant economic and human loss worldwide .', 'The main idea of this paper is to propose novel integrative model for landslide susceptibility evaluation in a prone area of Chaharmahal va Bakhtiari Province in Iran .', 'To do this , four metaheuristic technique , namely chimp optimization algorithm ( ChOA ) , crow search algorithm ( CSA ) , satin bowerbird optimization ( SBO ) , and water cycle algorithm ( WCA ) are used to supervise the training of an artificial neural network ( ANN ) .', 'A spatial database is created by 170 historical landslide and 14 most common conditioning factor .', 'The model are optimized in term of hyper-parameters and elite one are then used to produce the susceptibility map .', 'During the training phase , all model could acquire a reliable understanding of the landslide pattern .', 'The obtained accuracy index of area under the receiving operating characteristic curve ( AUROC ) showed that the map produced by the WCA-ANN ( AUROC = 0.925 ) and SBO-ANN ( AUROC = 0.900 ) are more accurate than those of the ChOA-ANN ( AUROC = 0.851 ) and CSA-ANN ( AUROC = 0.855 ) .', 'Considering this assessment , the suggested hybrid model are reliable enough for landslide susceptibility modeling .', 'Accordingly , the generated susceptibility map can be used for urban planning and generating alert system over the studied area .', 'GIS-based comparative study of Bayes network , Hoeffding tree and logistic model tree for landslide susceptibility modeling .', 'Landslide , one of the most common hazard around the world , have brought about severe damage to life and property of human .', 'To prevent and mitigate landslide , various model have been introduced to assess landslide susceptibility .', 'In this paper , Hoeffding Tree ( HT ) , a prevailing data stream mining algorithm , was employed to predict landslide susceptibility in Muchuan County , China for the first time .', 'Meanwhile , Logistic Model Tree ( LMT ) and Bayes Network ( BN ) were applied to produce landslide susceptibility map for comparison .', 'The model performance were evaluated by Receiver Operating Characteristic ( ROC ) curve and area under the curve ( AUC ) .', 'To obtain landslide inventory map , 279 landslide data was collected , and training and validation datasets were randomly divided with a proportion of 70 % to 30 % .', 'Furthermore , twelve conditioning factor ( altitude , slope angle , profile curvature , plan curvature , slope aspect , distance to roads , distance to river , TWI , NDVI , soil , land use and lithology ) were selected to construct landslide susceptibility model .', 'Moreover , correlation between conditioning factor and landslide were analyzed using Frequency Ratio ( FR ) .', 'The result showed landslide are prone to occur in area where human activity concentrate , and all three model exhibited satisfying performance .', 'Concretely , for training dataset , LMT model showed the highest AUC ( 0.854 ) , followed by HT ( 0.726 ) and BN ( 0.709 ) .', 'However , for validation dataset , LMT and BN model generated similar AUC value ( 0.761 and 0.764 respectively ) , and the highest AUC value belonged to HT ( 0.802 ) .', 'The distribution of landslide susceptibility zone revealed that the interior of county town is mainly seated in low and very low susceptibility zone , whereas region close to the border suffer high and very high landslide risk .', 'The result acquired in this paper are significant to landslide prevention and urban planning in Muchuan , China .', 'Additionally , this study proved that HT model is a promising classifier for landslide susceptibility modeling .', 'Rainfall-induced shallow landslide detachment , transit and runout susceptibility mapping by integrating machine learning technique and gis-based approach .', 'Rainfall-induced shallow landslide represent a serious threat in hilly and mountain area around the world .', 'The mountainous landscape of the Cinque Terre ( eastern Liguria , Italy ) is increasingly popular for both Italian and foreign tourist , most of which visit this outstanding terraced coastal landscape to enjoy a beach holiday and to practice hiking .', 'However , this area is characterized by a high level of landslide hazard due to intense rainfall that periodically affect its rugged and steep territory .', 'One of the most severe event occurred on 25 October 2011 , causing several fatality and damage for million of euros .', 'To adequately address the issue related to shallow landslide risk , it is essential to develop landslide susceptibility model as reliable as possible .', 'Regrettably , most of the current land-use and urban planning approach only consider the susceptibility to landslide detachment , neglecting transit and runout process .', 'In this study , the adoption of a combined approach allowed to estimate shallow landslide susceptibility to both detachment and potential runout .', 'At first , landslide triggering susceptibility was assessed using Machine Learning technique and applying the Ensemble approach .', 'Nine predisposing factor were chosen , while a database of about 300 rainfall-induced shallow landslide was used as input .', 'Then , a Geographical Information System ( GIS ) -based procedure was applied to estimate the potential landslide runout using the “ reach angle ” method .', 'Information from such analysis was combined to obtain a susceptibility map describing detachment , transit , and runout .', 'The obtained susceptibility map will be helpful for land planning , as well as for decision maker and stakeholder , to predict area where rainfall-induced shallow landslide are likely to occur in the future and to identify area where hazard mitigation measure are needed .', 'Predicting susceptibility to landslides under climate change impact in metropolitan area of South Korea using machine learning .', 'Landslide cause considerable damage to life and property worldwide .', 'In order to prevent and respond to landslide , it is necessary to identify vulnerable area .', 'This study identified area that are likely to be damaged by landslide and aimed to predict future landslide .', 'We compared and analyzed area using machine learning ( ML ) algorithms , and conducted susceptibility mapping and landslide prediction using an algorithm that produced excellent result .', 'For landslide prediction , the probability distribution of precipitation in the representative concentration pathway scenario 8.5 was used .', 'We accounted for future uncertainty by using several regional climate model scenario .', 'Comparing the performance of different ML algorithms , the overall prediction accuracy of the random forest ( 0.932 ) was excellent .', 'Susceptibility to landslide in the future determined using the random forest and five other regional climate model exhibited minor difference , but the average susceptibility increased over time .', 'In addition , many urban area are distributed around forest area that have high landslide vulnerability , which provide important perspective for urban and environmental planning .', 'Published by Informa UK Limited , trading as Taylor & Francis Group .', 'Development of a novel hybrid multi-boosting neural network model for spatial prediction of urban flood .', 'In this study , a new hybridized machine learning algorithm for urban flood susceptibility mapping , named MultiB-MLPNN , was developed using a multi-boosting technique and MLPNN .', 'The model was tested in Amol City , Iran , a data-scarce city in an ungauged area which is prone to severe flood inundation event and currently lacks flood prevention infrastructure .', 'Performance of the hybridized model was compared with that of a standalone MLPNN model , random forest and boosted regression tree .', 'Area under the curve , efficiency , true skill statistic , Matthews correlation coefficient , misclassification rate , sensitivity and specificity were used to evaluate model performance .', 'In validation , the MultiB-MLPNN model showed the best predictive performance .', 'The hybridized MultiB-MLPNN model is thus useful for generating realistic flood susceptibility map for data-scarce urban area .', 'The map can be used to develop risk-reduction measure to protect urban area from devastating flood , particularly where available data are insufficient to support physically based hydrological or hydraulic model .', 'Published by Informa UK Limited , trading as Taylor & Francis Group .', 'Urban pluvial flooding prediction by machine learning approach – a case study of Shenzhen city , China .', 'Urban pluvial flooding is a threatening natural hazard in urban area all over the world , especially in recent year given its increasing frequency of occurrence .', 'In order to prevent flood occurrence and mitigate the subsequent aftermath , urban water manager aim to predict precipitation characteristic , including peak intensity , arrival time and duration , so that they can further warn inhabitant in risky area and take emergency action when forecasting a pluvial flood .', 'Previous study that dealt with the prediction of urban pluvial flooding are mainly based on hydrological or hydraulic model , requiring a large volume of data for simulation accuracy .', 'These method are computationally expensive .', 'Using a rainfall threshold to predict flooding based on a data-driven approach can decrease the computational complexity to a great extent .', 'In order to prepare city for frequent pluvial flood event – especially in the future climate – this paper uses a rainfall threshold for classifying flood vs. non-flood event , based on machine learning ( ML ) approaches , applied to a case study of Shenzhen city in China .', 'In doing so , ML model can determine several rainfall threshold line projected in a plane spanned by two principal component , which provides a binary result ( flood or no flood ) .', 'Compared to the conventional critical rainfall curve , the proposed model , especially the subspace discriminant analysis , can classify flooding and non-flooding by different combination of multiple-resolution rainfall intensity , greatly raising the accuracy to 96.5 % and lowering the false alert rate to 25 % .', 'Compared to the conventional model , the critical index of accuracy and true positive rate ( TPR ) were 5 % -15 % higher in ML model .', 'Such model are applicable to other urban catchment as well .', 'The result are expected to be used to assist early warning system and provide rational information for contingency and emergency planning .', 'Landslide susceptibility assessment of wildfire burnt area through earth-observation technique and a machine learning-based approach .', 'Climate change has increased the likelihood of the occurrence of disaster like wildfire , flood , storm , and landslide worldwide in the last year .', 'Weather condition change continuously and rapidly , and wildfire are occurring repeatedly and diffusing with higher intensity .', 'The burnt catchment are known , in many part of the world , as one of the main sensitive area to debris flow characterized by different trigger mechanism ( runoff-initiated and debris slide-initiated debris flow ) .', 'The large number of study produced in recent decade has shown how the response of a watershed to precipitation can be extremely variable , depending on several on-site condition , as well as the characteristic of precipitation duration and intensity .', 'Moreover , the availability of satellite data has significantly improved the ability to identify the area affected by wildfire , and , even more importantly , to carry out post-fire assessment of burnt area .', 'Many difficulty have to be faced in attempting to assess landslide risk in burnt area , which present a higher likelihood of occurrence ; in densely populated neighbourhood , human activity can be the cause of the origin of the fire .', 'The latter is , in fact , one of the main operation used by man to remove vegetation along slope in an attempt to claim new land for pasture or construction purpose .', 'Regarding the study area , the Camaldoli and Agnano hill ( Naples , Italy ) fires seem to act as a predisposing factor , while the triggering factor is usually represented by precipitation .', 'Eleven predisposing factor were chosen and estimated according to previous knowledge of the territory and a database consisting of 400 landslide was adopted .', 'The present work aimed to expand the knowledge of the relationship existing between the triggering of landslide and burnt area through the following phase : ( 1 ) Processing of the thematic map of the burnt area through band composition of satellite image ; and ( 2 ) landslide susceptibility assessment through the application of a new statistical approach ( machine learning technique ) .', 'The analysis has the scope to support decision maker and local agency in urban planning and safety monitoring of the environment .', 'Comparison of random forest model and frequency ratio model for landslide susceptibility mapping ( LSM ) in Yunyang county ( Chongqing , China ) .', 'To compare the random forest ( RF ) model and the frequency ratio ( FR ) model for landslide susceptibility mapping ( LSM ) , this research selected Yunyang Country as the study area for its frequent natural disaster ; especially landslides .', 'A landslide inventory was built by historical record ; satellite image ; and extensive field survey .', 'Subsequently ; a geospatial database was established based on 987 historical landslide in the study area .', 'Then ; all the landslide were randomly divided into two datasets : 70 % of them were used as the training dataset and 30 % as the test dataset .', 'Furthermore ; under five primary conditioning factor ( i.e.', ', topography factor ; geological factor ; environmental factor ; human engineering activity ; and triggering factor ) , 22 secondary conditioning factor were selected to form an evaluation factor library for analyzing the landslide susceptibility .', 'On this basis ; the RF model training and the FR model mathematical analysis were performed ; and the established model were used for the landslide susceptibility simulation in the entire area of Yunyang County .', 'Next ; based on the analysis result ; the susceptibility map were divided into five class : very low ; low ; medium ; high ; and very high .', 'In addition ; the importance of conditioning factor was ranked and the influence of landslide was explored by using the RF model .', 'The area under the curve ( AUC ) value of receiver operating characteristic ( ROC ) curve ; precision ; accuracy ; and recall ratio were used to analyze the predictive ability of the above two LSM model .', 'The result indicated a difference in the performance between the two model .', 'The RF model ( AUC = 0.988 ) performed better than the FR model ( AUC = 0.716 ) .', 'Moreover ; compared with the FR model ; the RF model showed a higher coincidence degree between the area in the high and the very low susceptibility class ; on the one hand ; and the geographical spatial distribution of historical landslide ; on the other hand .', 'Therefore ; it was concluded that the RF model was more suitable for landslide susceptibility evaluation in Yunyang County ; because of its significant model performance ; reliability ; and stability .', 'The outcome also provided a theoretical basis for application of machine learning technique ( e.g.', ', RF ) in landslide prevention ; mitigation ; and urban planning ; so as to deliver an adequate response to the increasing demand for effective and low-cost tool in landslide susceptibility assessment .', 'Machine learning-based and 3d kinematic model for rockfall hazard assessment using LiDAR Data and GIS .', 'Rockfall is one of the most hazardous phenomenon in mountainous and hilly region with high and steep terrain .', 'Such incident can cause massive damage to people , property , and infrastructure .', 'Therefore , proper rockfall hazard assessment method are required to save life and provide a guide for the development of an area .', 'The aim of this research is to develop a method for rockfall hazard assessment at two different scale ( regional and local ) .', 'A high-resolution airborne laser scanning ( ALS ) technique was utilized to derive an accurate digital terrain model ( DTM ) ; next , a terrestrial laser scanner ( TLS ) was used to capture the topography of the two most critical area within the study area .', 'A staking machine-learning model based on different classifier , namely logistic regression ( LR ) , random forest ( RF ) , artificial neural network ( ANN ) , support vector machine ( SVM ) , and k-nearest neighbor ( KNN ) , was optimized and employed to determine rockfall probability by utilizing various rockfall conditioning factor .', 'A developed 3D rockfall kinematic model was used to obtain rockfall trajectory , velocity , frequency , bouncing height , kinetic energy , and impact location .', 'Next , a spatial model combined with a fuzzy analytical hierarchy process ( fuzzy-AHP ) integrated in the Geographic Information System ( GIS ) was developed to assess rockfall hazard in two different area in Ipoh , Malaysia .', 'Additionally , mitigation process were suggested and assessed to provide a comprehensive information for urban planning management .', 'The result show that , the stacking random forest-k-nearest neighbor ( RF-KNN ) model is the best hybrid model compared to other tested model with an accuracy of 89 % , 86 % , and 87 % based on training , validation , and cross-validation datasets , respectively .', 'The three-dimension rockfall kinematic model was calibrated with an accuracy of 93 % and 95 % for the two study area and subsequently the rockfall trajectory and their characteristic were derived .', 'The assessment of the suggested mitigation processes proves that the proposed method can reduce or eliminate rockfall hazard in these area .', 'According to the result , the proposed method can be generalized and applied in other geographical place to provide decision-makers with a comprehensive rockfall hazard assessment .', 'Spatial prediction of landslide susceptibility using GIS-based statistical and machine learning model in Wanzhou County , Three Gorges Reservoir , China .', 'Landslide susceptibility mapping is vital for landslide risk management and urban planning .', 'In this study , we used three statistical model [ frequency ratio , certainty factor and index of entropy ( IOE ) ] and a machine learning model [ random forest ( RF ) ] for landslide susceptibility mapping in Wanzhou County , China .', 'First , a landslide inventory map was prepared using earlier geotechnical investigation report , aerial image , and field survey .', 'Then , the redundant factor were excluded from the initial fourteen landslide causal factor via factor correlation analysis .', 'To determine the most effective causal factor , landslide susceptibility evaluation were performed based on four case with different combination of factor ( “ case ” ) .', 'In the analysis , 465 ( 70 % ) landslide location were randomly selected for model training , and 200 ( 30 % ) landslide location were selected for verification .', 'The result showed that case 3 produced the best performance for the statistical model and that case 2 produced the best performance for the RF model .', 'Finally , the receiver operating characteristic ( ROC ) curve was used to verify the accuracy of each model ’ s result for its respective optimal case .', 'The ROC curve analysis showed that the machine learning model performed better than the other three model , and among the three statistical model , the IOE model with weight coefficient was superior .', 'Allocation of emergency response centre in response to pluvial flooding-prone demand point using integrated multiple layer perceptron and maximum coverage location problem model .', 'The increase in the frequency and intensity of rainfall event due to global climate change and the development of additional pavement , road and water storage site due to population growth have enhanced the probability of pluvial flooding ( PF ) in urban area .', 'The estimation of urban pluvial flood vulnerability and prompt emergency response are crucial step towards urban planning and risk mitigation .', 'However , uncertainty exist in the optimal allocation of emergency response centre ( ERCs ) .', 'This study assessed the current situation of ERCs in term of PF-prone demand point .', 'In this study , fire and police station , hospital and military camp were defined as ERCs , and residential building , where people spend most of their time , were considered demand point .', 'Our study area was Damansara City in Peninsular Malaysia , which is frequently affected by PF .', 'We combined an optimised PF probability model with ideal location allocation method on a geographic information system platform to construct the proposed model for achieving accurate ERC spatial planning .', 'Firstly , PF-prone urban area were identified using a recent machine learning multiple layer perceptron ( MLP ) model .', 'Then , a Taguchi method was used to calibrate the MLP variable , namely , seed , momentum , learning rate , hidden layer attribute and class .', 'Fourteen important PF contributing parameter were weighted on the basis of historical flood event .', 'The predicted PF-prone area were validated by comparing the prediction with the data from meteorological station and observed inventory event .', 'In addition , the current location of ERCs were utilised in the location allocation model to assess the ideal time for providing essential service to element at risk .', 'Minimum impedance and maximum coverage location problem model were implemented to assess the current allocated location of ERCs and multiple scenario .', 'The coverage of existing ERCs was calculated , and their suitable and optimal location were projected for vulnerable inhabitant with either redundant or late emergency response .', 'Result showed that area near downtown have high PF probability but are not covered by ERCs within the standard 5 km radius .', 'The proposed model can conserve time , reduce cost and save human life by ensuring that vulnerable people in the Damansara River basin are covered by the nearest ERC .', 'Urban flood risk mapping using the GARP and QUEST model : A comparative study of machine learning technique .', 'Flood risk mapping and modeling is important to prevent urban flood damage .', 'In this study , a flood risk map was produced with limited hydrological and hydraulic data using two state-of-the-art machine learning model : Genetic Algorithm Rule-Set Production ( GARP ) and Quick Unbiased Efficient Statistical Tree ( QUEST ) .', 'The flood conditioning factor used in modeling were : precipitation , slope , curve number , distance to river , distance to channel , depth to groundwater , land use , and elevation .', 'Based on available report and field survey for Sari city ( Iran ) , 113 point were identified as flooded area ( with each flooded zone assigned a value of 1 ) .', 'Different conditioning factor , including urban density , quality of building , age of building , population density , and socio-economic condition , were taken into account to analyze flood vulnerability .', 'In addition , the weight of these conditioning factor was determined based on expert knowledge and Fuzzy Analytical Network Process ( FANP ) .', 'An urban flood risk map was then produced using flood hazard and flood vulnerability map .', 'The area under the receiver-operator characteristic curve ( AUC-ROC ) and Kappa statistic were applied to evaluate model performance .', 'The result demonstrated that the GARP model ( AUC-ROC = 93.5 % , Kappa = 0.86 ) had higher performance accuracy than the QUEST model ( AUC-ROC = 89.2 % , Kappa = 0.79 ) .', 'The result also indicated that distance to channel , land use , and elevation played major role in flood hazard determination , whereas population density , quality of building , and urban density were the most important factor in term of vulnerability .', 'These finding demonstrate that machine learning model can help in flood risk mapping , especially in area where detailed hydraulic and hydrological data are not available .', 'Structural health monitoring installation scheme using utility computing model .', 'In view of intensified disaster and fatality caused by natural phenomenon , there is a pressing need for an efficient environment logging that provides structural information to administrator for a better management and urban planning .', 'This paper proposes a novel utility model for structural health monitoring that would enable early detection of risk factor and mitigation of loss .', "The proposed utility computing model takes the input data in term of 'number of occupant ' in a building ( i.e .", 'MAC , International Mobile Equipment Identifier address and biometric attendance system installed ) and SHM system data ( i.e .', 'sensor reading ) .', 'It give visual representation of all the data for utility manager and expert to decide better location of SHM and number of SHM needed per zone depending on high disturbance created due to higher occupancy and number of structure per zone .', 'Denser area with higher structure and higher population will require more precise and accurate SHM system compared to rural area .', "It also analyzes the data from SHM system and using simple machine learning algorithm give expert ' suggestion for type of SHM needed at an area .", 'It make it possible for the data of each and every device of SHM system over several zone to be accessible by specific authority that can be used to predict as well as forecast any natural disaster .', 'The Structural Health Monitoring utility model is unique in term of its heterogeneity of resource management in realizing the utility processes .', 'Finally , a case study of Qatar University is looked at where node are distributed in zone along with occupant measuring is used over each building .', 'The data was taken over simulated occupation model and mathematical model from literature for occupation and zone calculation using ideal SHM system data .', 'It can be inferred from the data that real-time analysis data will act similar to simulated and proposed Utility Computing System will give visual data and analyze the zone as can be seen in the result .', 'Therefore , SHM Utility Computing model is efficient and most effective system that save cost as well as prepare authority for maintenance of a structure or crisis management due to external surroundings .', 'Applicability of support vector machine in landslide susceptibility mapping .', 'Landslide in Slovakia are followed by great economic loss and threat to human life .', 'Therefore , implementation of landslide susceptibility model is essential in urban planning .', 'The main purpose of this study is to investigate the possible applicability of Support Vector Machines ( SVMs ) in landslides susceptibility prediction .', 'We have built a classification problem with two class , landslide and stable area , and applied SVMs algorithms in the district Bytča , Kysucké Nové Mesto and Žilina .', 'A spatial database of landslide area and geologically stable area from the State Geological Institute of Dionýz Štúr were used to fit SVMs model .', 'Four environmental input parameter , land use , lithology , aspect and slope were used to train support vector machine model .', 'During the training phase , the primal objective was to find optimal set of kernel parameter by grid search .', 'The linear , polynomial and radial basis function kernel were computed .', 'Together 534 model were trained and tested with LIBLINEAR and LIBSVM library .', 'Model were evaluated by Accuracy parameter .', 'Then the Receiver Operating Characteristic ( ROC ) and landslides susceptibility map were produced for the best model for every kernel .', 'The best predictive performance was gained by radial basis function kernel .', 'This kernel has also the best generalization ability .', 'The result showed that SVMs employed in the presented study gave promising result with more than 0.90 ( the area under the ROC curve ( AUC ) prediction performance .']

['Cultivating historical heritage area vitality using urban morphology approach based on big data and machine learning .', 'The conservation of historical heritage can bring social benefit to city by promoting community economic development and societal creativity .', 'In the early stage of historical heritage conservation , the focus was on the museum-style concept for individual structure .', 'At present , heritage area vitality is often adopted as a general conservation method to increase the vibrancy of such area .', 'However , it remains unclear whether urban morphological element suitable for urban area can be applied to heritage area .', 'This study uses ridge regression and LightGBM with multi-source big geospatial data to explore whether urban morphological element that affect the vitality of heritage and urban area are consistent or have different spatial distribution and daily variation .', 'From a sample of 12 Chinese city , our analysis shows the following result .', 'First , factor affecting urban vitality differ from those influencing heritage area .', "Second , factor influencing urban and heritage area ' vitality have diurnal variation and differ across city .", 'The overarching contribution of this study is to propose a quantitative and replicable framework for heritage adaptation , combining urban morphology and vitality measure derived from big geospatial data .', 'This study also extends the understanding of form of heritage area and provides theoretical support for heritage conservation , urban construction , and economic development .', 'Effective task scheduling algorithm with deep learning for Internet of Health Things ( IoHT ) in sustainable smart city .', 'In the recent year , important key factor for urban planning is to analyze the sustainability and its functionality towards smart city .', 'Presently , many researcher employ the conservative machine learning based analysis but those are not appropriate for IoT based health data analysis because of their physical feature extraction and low accuracy .', 'In this paper , we propose remote health monitoring and data analysis by integrating IoT and deep learning concept .', 'We proposed novel IoT based FoG assisted cloud network architecture that accumulates real-time health care data from patient via several medical IoT sensor network , these data are analyzed using a deep learning algorithm deployed at Fog based Healthcare Platform .', 'Furthermore , the proposed methodology is applied to the sustainable smart city to evaluate the process for real-time .', 'The proposed framework not only analyses the healthcare data but also provides immediate relief measure to the patient facing critical condition and need immediate consultancy of doctor .', 'Performance is measure in term of accuracy , precision and sensitivity of the proposed DHNN with task scheduling algorithm and it is obtained 97.6 % , 97.9 % , and 94.9 % .', 'While accuracy , precision and sensitivity for deep CNN is 96.5 % , 97.5 % and 94 % and for Deep auto-encoder is 92 % , 91 % , and 82.5 % .', 'An ensemble energy consumption forecasting model based on spatial-temporal clustering analysis in residential building .', 'Due to the availability of smart metering infrastructure , high-resolution electric consumption data is readily available to study the dynamic of residential electric consumption at finely resolved spatial and temporal scale .', 'Analyzing the electric consumption data enables the policymak-ers and building owner to understand consumer ’ s demand-consumption behavior .', 'Furthermore , analysis and accurate forecasting of electric consumption are substantial for consumer involvement in time-of-use tariff , critical peak pricing , and consumer-specific demand response initiative .', 'Along-side its vast economic and sustainability implication , such as energy wastage and decarbonization of the energy sector , accurate consumption forecasting facilitates power system planning and stable grid operation .', 'Energy consumption forecasting is an active research area ; despite the abundance of devised model , electric consumption forecasting in residential building remains challenging due to high occupant energy use behavior variability .', 'Hence the search for an appropriate model for accurate electric consumption forecasting is ever continuing .', 'To this aim , this paper presents a spatial and temporal ensemble forecasting model for short-term electric consumption forecasting .', 'The proposed work involves exploring electric consumption profile at the apartment level through cluster analysis based on the k-means algorithm .', 'The ensemble forecasting model consists of two deep learning model ; Long Short-Term Memory Unit ( LSTM ) and Gated Recurrent Unit ( GRU ) .', 'First , the apartment-level historical electric consumption data is clustered .', 'Later the cluster are aggregated based on consumption profile of consumer .', 'At the building and floor level , the ensemble model are trained using aggregated electric consumption data .', 'The proposed ensemble model forecasts the electric consumption at three spatial scale apartment , building , and floor level for hourly , daily , and weekly forecasting horizon .', 'Furthermore , the impact of spatial-temporal granularity and cluster analysis on the prediction accuracy is analyzed .', 'The dataset used in this study comprises high-resolution electric consumption data acquired through smart meter recorded on an hourly basis over the period of one year .', 'The consumption data belongs to four multifamily residential building situated in an urban area of South Korea .', 'To prove the effectiveness of our proposed forecasting model , we compared our model with widely known machine learning model and deep learning variant .', 'The result achieved by our proposed ensemble scheme verify that model has learned the sequential behavior of electric consumption by producing superior performance with the lowest MAPE of 4.182 and 4.54 at building and floor level prediction , respectively .', 'The experimental finding suggest that the model has efficiently captured the dynamic electric consumption characteristic to exploit ensemble model diversity and achieved lower forecasting error .', 'The proposed ensemble forecasting scheme is well suited for predictive modeling and short-term load forecasting .', 'Machine learning for geographically differentiated climate change mitigation in urban area .', 'Artificial intelligence and machine learning are transforming scientific discipline , but their full potential for climate change mitigation remains elusive .', 'Here , we conduct a systematic review of applied machine learning study that are of relevance for climate change mitigation , focusing specifically on the field of remote sensing , urban transportation , and building .', 'The relevant body of literature span twenty year and is growing exponentially .', 'We show that the emergence of big data and machine learning method enables climate solution research to overcome generic recommendation and provide policy solution at urban , street , building and household scale , adapted to specific contexts , but scalable to global mitigation potential .', 'We suggest a meta-algorithmic architecture and framework for using machine learning to optimize urban planning for accelerating , improving and transforming urban infrastructure provision .', 'Modelling urban-scale occupant behaviour , mobility , and energy in building : A survey .', 'The proliferation of urban sensing , IoT , and big data in city provides unprecedented opportunity for a deeper understanding of occupant behaviour and energy usage pattern at the urban scale .', 'This enables data-driven building and energy model to capture the urban dynamic , specifically the intrinsic occupant and energy use behavioural profile that are not usually considered in traditional model .', 'Although there are related review , none investigated urban data for use in modelling occupant behaviour and energy use at multiple scale , from building to neighbourhood to city .', 'This survey paper aims to fill this gap by providing a critical summary and analysis of the work reported in the literature .', 'We present the different source of occupant-centric urban data that are useful for data-driven modelling and categorise the range of application and recent data-driven modelling technique for urban behaviour and energy modelling , along with the traditional stochastic and simulation-based approach .', 'Finally , we present a set of recommendation for future direction in data-driven modelling of occupant behaviour and energy in building at the urban scale .', 'Simulating urban land use change by integrating a convolutional neural network with vector-based cellular automata .', 'Vector-based cellular automata ( VCA ) model have been applied in land use change simulation at fine scale .', 'However , the neighborhood effect of the driving factor are rarely considered in the exploration of the transition suitability of cell , leading to lower simulation accuracy .', 'This study proposes a convolutional neural network ( CNN ) -VCA model that adopts the CNN to extract the high-level feature of the driving factor within a neighborhood of an irregularly shaped cell and discover the relationship between multiple land use change and driving factor at the neighborhood level .', 'The proposed model was applied to simulate urban land use change in Shenzhen , China .', 'Compared with several VCA model using other machine learning method , the proposed CNN-VCA model obtained the highest simulation accuracy ( figure-of-merit = 0.361 ) .', 'The result indicated that the CNN-VCA model can effectively uncover the neighborhood effect of multiple driving factor on the developmental potential of land parcel and obtain more detail on the morphological characteristic of land parcel .', 'Moreover , the land use pattern of 2020 and 2025 under an ecological control strategy were simulated to provide decision support for urban planning .', '2nd Ibero-American Congress of Smart Cities , ICSC-CITIES 2019 .', 'The proceeding contain 22 paper .', 'The special focus in this conference is on Smart Cities .', 'The topic include : Control of a Bidirectional Single-Phase Grid Interface for Electric Vehicles ; multiobjective Household Energy Planning Using Evolutionary Algorithms ; noise and Ozone Continuous Monitoring in an Industrial Urban Area of Northeastern Portugal ; energy Storage Systems for Power Supply of Ultrahigh Speed Hyperloop Trains ; designing a Backbone Trunk for the Public Transportation Network in Montevideo , Uruguay ; bus Stops as a Tool for Increasing Social Inclusiveness in Smart Cities ; urban Data Analysis for the Public Transportation System of Montevideo , Uruguay ; Monthly Characterization of the Generation of Photovoltaic Arrays .', 'Microgrid Case CEDER , Soria , Spain ; Electric Microgrid in Smart Cities : CEDER-CIEMAT a Case Study ; potential for Thermal Water Desalination Using Microgrid and Solar Thermal Field Energy Surpluses in an Isolated Community ; short Term Load Forecasting of Industrial Electricity Using Machine Learning ; implementation of a Smart Microgrid in a Small Museum : The Silk House ; general Purpose I-V Tester Developed to Measure a Wide Range of Photovoltaic Systems ; segmentation of Thermography Image of Solar Cells and Panels ; preface ; assessing the Environmental Impact of Car Restrictions Policies : Madrid Central Case ; IPN Sustainability Program : Solar Photovoltaic Electricity Generation and Consumption Reduction ; sustainable Mobility in the Public Transportation of Montevideo , Uruguay ; loRa-Based IoT Data Monitoring and Collecting Platform ; a Hybrid Energy Storage System for Renewable-Based Power Plant .', 'Data-driven model for cross ventilation potential in high-density city based on coupled CFD simulation and machine learning .', 'Effective urban ventilation through decent urban planning and building design can alleviate the deterioration of the urban built environment .', 'However , natural ventilation requirement and guideline in current building code and standard are either qualitative or quantitative but subject to an absolute indoor airspeed threshold without considering the outdoor wind environment .', 'To fill this gap , this paper develops an urban-scale coupled indoor and outdoor computational fluid dynamic ( CFD ) model and defines a novel ventilation index to assess natural ventilation potential .', 'The index considers wind environment of both indoor and outdoor space .', 'First , the coupled CFD model is developed to study wind-driven cross ventilation in high-density city .', 'A 3D isothermal CFD simulation is solved using the RNG k-ε turbulent model .', 'The simulation result are compared with wind tunnel experiment data from literature .', 'Second , six key design variable are used to generate 3840 parametric design variation for natural ventilation assessment .', 'Third , a novel integrated index CIOIv ( coupled indoor and outdoor interaction ) is proposed to evaluate the wind speed ratio between the indoor area and outdoor reference area .', 'For demonstration , CIOIv , F1 is used to represent CIOIv on the ground level .', 'Data-driven CIOIv , F1 model are developed to predict indoor building ventilation potential for quick early design support .', 'Compared with multivariate linear regression model , the Gradient Boosting non-linear model display much higher prediction accuracy ( mean absolute percentage error = 0.16 with R2 = 0.8 ) .', 'In early design stage , designer and engineer can skip the computational expensive CFD simulation and use this data-drive model to quickly check the building natural ventilation potential of different design option in an urban environment .', 'Multivariate relationship between campus design parameter and energy performance using reinforcement learning and parametric modeling .', 'For the past two decade , extensive research has been conducted to evaluate the performance of urban form scenario such as sky view factor , solar radiation , or energy performance .', 'The relationship between urban design parameter and multiple performance should be stipulated to evaluate scenario for supporting timely and reliable design decision .', 'However , there are three major challenge : ( 1 ) only a few design alternative are devised , ( 2 ) the multiple performance has not been provided synthetically , and ( 3 ) the relationship between design parameter and performance are difficult to be determined because they are multivariate relationship .', 'This research proposes a new methodology applying a generative design approach using a reinforcement learning algorithm , a parametric performance modeling , and a multivariate adaptive regression spline approach to identify relationship between design parameter and urban performance .', 'This research aims to support decision-making of urban design to achieve an energy efficient and visually qualified urban environment .', 'A data-driven urban design approach is proposed to generate possible design alternative using reinforcement learning , and a design-driven analysis is conducted to evaluate multiple performance of urban building using parametric modeling .', 'The multivariate analysis presented relationship between urban geometric form and performance criterion by using 30 sample .', 'The finding show that to maintain optimal solar potential , the building coverage ratio is recommended to be bigger than 0.17 .', 'To maintain the optimal energy balance , the threshold for sky view factor is recommended as 54.17 % .', 'These relationship contribute to deriving design strategy and guideline for designing a sustainable campus .', '18th International Conference on Computer-Aided Architectural Design Futures , CAAD Futures 2019 .', 'The proceeding contain 34 paper .', 'The special focus in this conference is on Computer-Aided Architectural Design Futures .', 'The topic include : Oriole : A Parametric Solution for Animation-Based Robotic Motion Design ; a Method of Mesh Simplification for Drone 3D Modeling with Architectural Feature Extraction ; citizen Visual Search Engine : Detection and Curation of Urban Objects ; computing and Visualizing Taxi Cab Dynamics as Proxies for Autonomous Mobility on Demand Systems : The Case of the Chicago Taxi Cab System ; an Ecology of Conflicts : Using Network Analytics to Explore the Data of Building Design ; high-Rise Building Group Morphology Generation Approach Based on Wind Environmental Performance ; encoding Design Process Using Interactive Data Visualization ; Examining Potential Socio-economic Factor that Affect Machine Learning Research in the AEC Industry ; investigating the Social Impacts of High-Density Neighbourhoods Through Spatial Analysis ; environmental Performance-Driven Urban Design : Parametric Design Method for the Integration of Daylight and Urban Comfort Analysis in Cold Climates ; joint Parametric Modeling of Buildings and Crowds for Human-Centric Simulation and Analysis ; the Social Life of Small Urban Spaces 2.0 : Three Experiment in Computational Urban Studies ; visualization of Occupant Behavior in an Open Academic Space Through Image Analysis ; pneumatic Origami Joint : A 3D Printed Flexible Joint ; robot-Aided Fabrication of Light-Weight Structures with Sheet Metal Expansion ; soft Additive Fabrication Processes : Material Indeterminacy in 3D Printing ; the Effect of Hygroscopic Design Parameters on the Programmability of Laminated Wood Composites for Adaptive Façades ; tooling Cardboard for Smart Reuse : A Digital and Analog Workflow for Upcycling Waste Corrugated Cardboard as a Building Material .', 'Generative design and performance modeling for relationship between urban built form , sky opening , solar radiation and energy .', 'For the past two decade , extensive research has been conducted to evaluate the performance of urban form scenario such as sky view factor , solar radiation , or energy performance .', 'Simulation-based performance analysis has been applied for optimizing urban design using multiple performance criterion of energy demand , daylighting , or radiance .', 'Two major limitation exist in the performance evaluation method of urban design : 1 ) the number of urban design alternative or scenario has been limited , and 2 ) various performance criterion and metric have not been assessed synthetically .', 'In this respect , we aim to generate all possible alternative under constraint such as a city policy or development requirement .', 'This paper addresses the integration of generative design and multi-criteria performance analysis for urban design decision making .', 'The relationship between geometric urban form and multiple performance criterion are identified .', 'The proposed methodology incorporates the reinforcement learning algorithm , an advanced machine learning technique , along with parametric modeling technique , to enhance urban design decision based on various performance criterion .', 'This methodology was tested on the design of an international campus of the Georgia Institute of Technology , located in Shenzhen , China .', 'An algorithm generates numerous geometrical alternative of campus design under site constraint and development requirement of the campus .', 'Those alternative are then evaluated based on performance
