criterion of sky opening , solar radiation , or energy consumption synthetically .', 'The method enables an integrated performance analysis for all possible design under constraint .', 'The paper proposes a data driven urban design approach that connect generative design and multi-criteria performance analysis .', 'The relationship between urban geometric form and performance criterion function derive guideline for a sustainable and green campus .', 'In future conduct multivariate analysis to examine the relationship between geometric element and performance measurement metric .', 'Published by Elsevier Ltd .', 'This is an open access article under the CC BY-NC-ND license ( http : //creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/ ) Peer-review under responsibility of the scientific committee of ICAE2018 - The 10th International Conference on Applied Energy .', 'Data-driven Urban Energy Simulation ( DUE-S ) : A framework for integrating engineering simulation and machine learning method in a multi-scale urban energy modeling workflow .', "The world is rapidly urbanizing , and the energy intensive built environment is becoming increasingly responsible for the world 's energy consumption and associated environmental emission .", 'As a result , significant effort have been put forth to develop method that can accurately model and characterize building energy consumption in city .', 'These model aim to utilize physics-based building energy simulation , reduced-order calculation and statistical learning method to assess the energy performance of building within a dense urban area .', 'However , current urban building energy model are limited in their ability to account for the inter-building energy dynamic and urban microclimate factor that can have a substantial impact on building energy use .', 'To overcome these limitation , this paper proposes a novel Data-driven Urban Energy Simulation ( DUE-S ) framework that integrates a network-based machine learning algorithm ( ResNet ) with engineering simulation to better understand how building consume energy on multiple temporal ( hourly , daily , monthly ) and spatial scale in a city ( single building , block , urban ) .', 'We validate the proposed DUE-S framework on a proof of concept case study of 22 densely located university building in California , USA .', 'Our result indicate that the DUE-S framework is able to accurately predict urban scale energy consumption at hourly , daily and monthly interval .', 'Moreover , our result also demonstrate that the integration of data-driven and engineering simulation approach can partially capture the inter-building energy dynamic and impact of the urban context and merit future work to explore how they can be improved to predict sub-urban scale energy prediction ( single building , block ) .', 'In the end , successfully predicting and modeling the energy performance of urban building has the potential to inform the decision-making of a wide variety of urban sustainability stakeholder including architect , engineer and policymakers .', 'Artificial Neural Networks as an Architectural Design Tool-Generating New Detail Forms Based on the Roman Corinthian Order Capital .', 'The following paper presents the result of the research in the field of the machine learning , investigating the scope of application of the artificial neural network algorithms as a tool in architectural design .', 'The computational experiment was held using the backward propagation of error method of training the artificial neural network , which was trained based on the geometry of the detail of the Roman Corinthian order capital .', 'During the experiment , as an input training data set , five local geometry parameter combined has given the best result : Theta , Pi , Rho in spherical coordinate system based on the capital volume centroid , followed by Z value of the Cartesian coordinate system and a distance from vertical plane created based on the capital symmetry .', 'Additionally during the experiment , artificial neural network hidden layer optimal count and structure was found , giving result of the error below 0.2 % for the mentioned before input parameter .', 'Once successfully trained artificial network , was able to mimic the detail composition on any other geometry type given .', 'Despite of calculating the transformed geometry locally and separately for each of the thousand of surface point , system could create visually attractive and diverse , complex pattern .', "Designed tool , based on the supervised learning method of machine learning , gives possibility of generating new architectural forms- free of the designer 's imagination bound .", 'Implementing the infinitely broad computational method of machine learning , or Artificial Intelligence in general , not only could accelerate and simplify the design process , but give an opportunity to explore never seen before , unpredictable form or everyday architectural practice solution .', 'A data-driven predictive model of city-scale energy use in building .', 'Many city across the United States have turned to building energy disclosure ( or benchmarking ) law to encourage transparency in energy efficiency market and to support sustainability and carbon reduction plan .', 'In addition to direct peer-to-peer comparison , the benchmarking data published under these law have been used as a tool by researcher and policy-makers to study the distribution and determinant of energy use in large building .', 'However , these policy only cover a small subset of the building stock in a given city , and thus capture only a fraction of energy use at the urban scale .', 'To overcome this limitation , we develop a predictive model of energy use at the building , district , and city scale using training data from energy disclosure policy and predictor from widely-available property and zoning information .', 'We use statistical model to predict the energy use of 1.1 million building in New York City using the physical , spatial , and energy use attribute of a subset derived from 23,000 building required to report energy use data each year .', "Linear regression ( OLS ) , random forest , and support vector regression ( SVM ) algorithms are fit to the city 's energy benchmarking data and then used to predict electricity and natural gas use for every property in the city .", 'Model accuracy is assessed and validated at the building level and zip code level using actual consumption data from calendar year 2014 .', 'We find the OLS model performs best when generalizing to the City as a whole , and SVM result in the lowest mean absolute error for predicting energy use within the LL84 sample .', 'Our median predicted electric energy use intensity for office building is 71.2 kbtu/sf and for residential building is 31.2 kbtu/sf with mean absolute log accuracy ratio of 0.17 .', 'Building age is found to be a significant predictor of energy use , with newer building ( particularly those built since 1991 ) found to have higher consumption level than those constructed before 1930 .', 'We also find higher electric consumption in office and retail building , although the sign is reversed for natural gas .', 'In general , larger building use less energy per square foot , while taller building with more story , controlling for floor area , use more energy per square foot .', 'Attached building – those with adjacent building and a shared party wall – are found to have lower natural gas use intensity .', 'The result demonstrate that electricity consumption can be reliably predicted using actual data from a relatively small subset of building , while natural gas use presents a more complicated problem given the bimodal distribution of consumption and infrastructure availability .']

['Improving GPS Code Phase Positioning Accuracy in Urban Environment Using Machine Learning .', 'The accuracy of location information , mainly provided by the global positioning system ( GPS ) sensor , is critical for Internet-of-Things application in smart city .', 'However , built environment attenuate GPS signal by reflecting or blocking them resulting in some case multipath and non-line-of-sight ( NLOS ) reception .', 'These effect cause range error that degrade GPS positioning accuracy .', 'Enhancement in the design of antennae and receiver deliver a level of reduction of multipath .', 'However , NLOS signal reception and residual effect of multipath are still to be mitigated sufficiently for improvement in range error and positioning accuracy .', 'Recent machine learning-based method have shown promise in improving pseudorange-based position solution by considering multiple variable from raw GPS measurement .', 'However , positioning accuracy is limited by low accuracy signal reception classification .', 'Unlike the existing method , which use machine learning to directly predict the signal reception classification , we use a gradient boosting decision tree ( GBDT ) -based method to predict the pseudorange error by considering the signal strength , satellite elevation angle and pseudorange residual .', 'With the predicted pseudorange error , two variation of the algorithm are proposed to improve positioning accuracy .', 'The first corrects pseudorange error and the other either corrects or excludes the signal determined to contain the effect of multipath and NLOS signal .', 'The result for a challenging urban environment characterized by high-rise building on one side , show that the 3-D positioning accuracy of the pseudorange error correction-based positioning measured in term of the root mean square error is 23.3 m , an improvement of more than 70 % over the conventional method .', 'Autonomous 3-D UAV Localization Using Cellular Network : Deep Supervised Learning Versus Reinforcement Learning Approaches .', 'Unmanned aerial vehicle ( UAVs ) are becoming an integral part of numerous commercial and military application .', 'In many of these application , the UAV is required to self-navigate in highly dynamic urban environment .', 'This means that the UAV must have the ability to determine its location in an autonomous and real time manner .', 'Existing localization technique rely mainly on the Global Positioning System ( GPS ) and do not provide a reliable real time localization solution , particularly in dense urban environment .', 'Our objective is to propose an effective alternative solution to enable the UAV to autonomously determine its location independent of the GPS and without message exchange .', 'We therefore propose utilizing the existing 5G cellular infrastructure to enable the UAV to determine its 3-D location without the need to interact with the cellular network .', 'We formulate the UAV localization problem to minimize the error of the RSSI measurement from the surrounding cellular base station .', 'While exact optimization technique can be applied to accurately solve such a problem , they can not provide the real time calculation that is needed in such dynamic application .', 'Machine learning based technique are strong candidate to provide an attractive alternative to provide a near-optimal localization solution with the needed practical real-time calculation .', 'Accordingly , we propose two machine learning-based approach , namely , deep neural network and reinforcement learning based approach , to solve the formulated UAV localization problem in real time .', 'We then provide a detailed comparative analysis for each of the proposed localization technique along with a comparison with the optimization-based technique as well as other technique from the literature .', 'Machine learning-based method for path loss prediction in urban environment for LTE network .', 'This paper presents prediction path loss model in an urban environment for cellular network with the help of machine learning method .', 'For this goal , Support Vector Regression ( SVR ) , Random Forest ( RF ) and K-Nearest Neighbor ( KNN ) algorithms are exploited and assessed .', 'The training and testing procedure is carried out with the help of a path loss dataset generated by simulated result considering a Long Term Evolution ( LTE ) network utilizing a digital terrain model .', 'The simulation takes into account an urban environment for both line-of-sight ( LOS ) and non-LOS ( NLOS ) propagation condition .', 'The result reveal that all the evaluated algorithms forecast path loss with a remarkable accuracy , providing root-mean-square error on the order of 2 .', '1-2.2dB for LOS and 3 .', '4-4.1dB for NLOS location , respectively .', 'Among the examined algorithms , KNN shows the best performance , thus being an appealing option to predict path loss in urban area .', 'For comparison purpose , the COST231 Walfisch-Ikegami empirical model was applied , which presents the worst performance , providing the highest error under-predicting path loss , especially in NLOS location .', 'NLOS multipath detection using convolutional neural network .', 'In global navigation satellite system ( GNSS ) positioning , GNSS satellite are often obstructed by building , leading to reflected and diffracted signal , which are known as non-line-of-sight ( NLOS ) signal .', 'Such signal cause major GNSS positioning ( also known as “ NLOS multipath ” ) error .', 'In this paper , a novel NLOS multipath detection technique using a machine-learning approach to improve the positioning accuracy in urban environment is proposed .', 'The key idea behind this technique is to construct a classifier that discriminates NLOS multipath signal from the output of the multiple GNSS signal correlators of a software GNSS receiver .', 'In the case of an NLOS signal , there are no direct signal ; the first reflected signal has low power compared to a direct signal .', 'Hence , the correlation function is expected to be more distorted in the case of an NLOS signal correlation .', 'We use this phenomenon to detect NLOS signal .', 'To consider the change in shape of the correlation value of NLOS signal and their temporal variation , we propose a method for constructing a convolutional neural network ( CNN ) -based NLOS discriminator .', 'Furthermore , we propose a method for applying the NLOS probability , which is the output of the CNN , to the positioning calculation .', 'To evaluate the proposed technique , we conducted NLOS classification experiment using signal correlation data acquired at different location in the Shinjuku area of Japan .', 'We compared the proposed method with a method using a simple NN .', 'As the experiment result indicate , the proposed method can correctly discriminate approximately 98 % of NLOS multipath signal , and the discrimination rate of the proposed CNN-based method is higher than that of the simple NN-based approach .', 'Furthermore , we improved the positioning accuracy from 34.1 to 1.6 m using the proposed method and concluded that the proposed approach can increase the positioning accuracy in urban environment .', 'A new method for non-line-of-sight GNSS signal detection for positioning accuracy improvement in urban environment .', 'The classification of the line-of-sight ( LOS ) and non-line-of-sight ( NLOS ) signal is one of the major problem for robust GNSS positioning and the shadow matching in urban environment .', 'The existing technique include the multi-sensor integration , 3D map aid , using a dual-polarized antenna , an omnidirectional camera aid are proposed to solve the classification problem .', 'However , they all require external hardware or up-to-date map , which is expensive or impractical for mass-market application .', 'Consistency checking with the receiver autonomous integrity monitoring ( RAIM ) is widely used for the detection of NLOS signal , but it is efficient only when the majority of the received signal are LOS signal .', 'Machine learning method , including the decision tree , the support vector machine ( SVM ) have been explored to classify LOS and NLOS with good accuracy .', 'However , all current machine learning based method only utilize information within one epoch , all the inter-epoch information and data feature in time series are lost , and the information of signal propagation in the complex urban environment is not fully manifested in the Rinex level observation and NMEA level observation in one single epoch .', 'In this paper , a multivariate Long Short Term Memory Fully Convolutional Network ( MLSTM-FCN ) based signal classification method is proposed .', 'With the aid of the convolution layer and long short term memory block , this method handles the data feature in both time domain and value domain .', 'Six time series feature of GNSS signal , including differenced C/N0 , time differenced ambiguity , double difference phase and pseudorange , phase and pseudorange consistency are analyzed and used as the input of the MLSTM-FCN .', 'Datasets from two location in the urban Calgary are collected , each of which is used for training and testing purpose respectively .', 'The result reveal that , compared to the SVM classification method , the overall testing accuracy of the newly proposed classifier is improved from 93.00 % to 95.97 % for the Rinex level observation , and from 92.99 % to 93.83 for the NMEA level observation .', 'This improved classification accuracy brought by the proposed classifier is encouraging since it will enhance the robustness of the conventional GNSS positioning and the shadow matching based navigation system by reducing unbounded NLOS signal error in urban environment and result in significant improvement in positioning accuracy .', 'Compared to the SVM classifier aided single point positioning ( SPP ) test , the accuracy in the form of RMS of the MLSTM-FCN aided SPP test can be improved by 24.3 % , 17.8 % and 24.4 % in the East , North and Up direction respectively , and the rate of the valid solution can be increased from 99.02 % to 99.94 % .', 'The new method has the potential to be widely applied by various receiver type with the output of the raw observation or only with the NMEA observation output .', 'Support Vector Machine for Path Loss Predictions in Urban Environment .', 'Path Loss ( PL ) propagation model are important for accurate radio network design and planning .', 'In this paper , we propose a new radio propagation model for PL prediction in urban environment using Support Vector Machine ( SVM ) .', 'Field measurement campaign are conducted in urban environment to obtain mobile network and path loss information of radio signal transmitted at 900 , 1800 and 2100 MHz frequency .', 'SVM model is trained with field measurement data to predict path loss in urban propagation environment .', 'Performance of SVM model is evaluated using Mean Absolute Error ( MAE ) , Mean Square Error ( MSE ) , Root Mean Square Error ( RMSE ) and Standard Error Deviation ( SED ) .', 'Result show that SVM achieve MAE , MSE , RMSE and SED of 7.953 dB , 99.966 dB , 9.998 dB and 9.940 dB respectively .', 'SVM model outperforms existing empirical model ( Okumura-Hata , COST 231 , ECC-33 and Egli ) with relatively low prediction error .', 'Intelligent GPS L1 LOS/multipath/NLOS classifier based on correlator- , RINEX- and NMEA-level measurement .', 'This paper proposes to use a correlator-level global positioning system ( GPS ) line-of-sight/multipath/non-line-of-sight ( LOS/MP/NLOS ) signal reception classifier to improve positioning performance in an urban environment .', 'Conventional LOS/MP/NLOS classifier , referred to as national marine electronics association ( NMEA ) -level and receiver independent exchange format ( RINEX ) -level classifier , are usually performed using attribute extracted from basic observables or measurement such as received signal strength , satellite elevation angle , code pseudorange , etc .', 'The NMEA/RINEX-level classification rate is limited because the complex signal propagation in urban environment is not fully manifested in these end attributes .', 'In this paper , LOS/MP/NLOS feature were extracted at the baseband signal processing stage .', 'Multicorrelator is implemented in a GPS software-defined receiver ( SDR ) and exploited to generate feature from the autocorrelation function ( ACF ) .', 'A robust LOS/MP/NLOS classifier using a supervised machine learning algorithm , support vector machine ( SVM ) , is then trained .', 'It is also proposed that the Skymask and code pseudorange double difference observable are used to label the real signal type .', 'Raw GPS intermediate frequency data were collected in urban area in Hong Kong and were postprocessed using a self-developed SDR , which can easily output correlator-level LOS/MP/NLOS feature .', 'The SDR measurement were saved in the file with the format of NMEA and RINEX .', 'A fair comparison among NMEA- , RINEX- , and correlator-level classifier was then carried out on a common ground .', 'Result show that the correlator-level classifier improves the metric of F1 score by about 25 % over the conventional NMEA- and RINEX-level classifier for testing data collected at different place to that of training data .', 'In addition to this finding , correlator-level classifier is found to be more feasible in practical application due to its less dependency on surrounding scenario compared with theNMEA/RINEX-level classifier .', 'Field Experiment of Localization Based on Machine Learning in LTE Network .', 'In mobile communication network , if we can estimate the location of each user equipment ( UE ) with high accuracy , efficient cell planning and network optimization become possible .', 'However , it is difficult for operator to estimate the location of most commercial UEs because they can not feedback their location information directly to their serving base station with the exception of UEs with Minimization of Drive Test ( MDT ) function specified in LTE Release 10 .', 'Radio Frequency ( RF ) fingerprint method is known as an effective localization method , with which we can estimate the location of UEs with only RF signature and location information beforehand .', 'In LTE , RF fingerprint database can be collected by conducting drive test or using measurement data from UEs compatible with MDT .', 'Although the estimation accuracy can be better with more RF signature , the increase in the amount of RF signatures causes the increase in the feedback , which consumes the uplink capacity and UE battery .', 'Furthermore , keeping all RF signature in database is inefficient because some RF signature do not have effect on improving estimation accuracy .', 'Hence , it is important to clarify the effect of each RF signature and use only effective one in the localization .', 'In this paper , we conducted a field experiment to create an RF fingerprint database in dense urban area , and evaluated the effectiveness of each RF signature by making several localization model based on machine learning .', 'Eventually , we clarified minimum RF signature required to operate RF fingerprint localization in LTE network .', 'A machine learning approach for localization in cellular environment .', 'A machine learning approach is developed for localization based on received signal strength ( RSS ) from cellular tower .', 'The proposed approach only assumes knowledge of RSS fingerprint of the environment , and does not require knowledge of the cellular base transceiver station ( BTS ) location , nor uses any RSS mathematical model .', 'The proposed localization scheme integrates a weighted K-nearest neighbor ( WKNN ) and a multilayer neural network .', 'The integration takes advantage of the robust clustering ability of WKNN and implements a neural network that could estimate the position within each cluster .', 'Experimental result are presented to demonstrate the proposed approach in two urban environment and one rural environment , achieving a mean distance localization error of 5.9 m and 5.1 m in the urban environment and 8.7 m in the rural environment .', 'This constitutes an improvement of 41 % , 45 % , and 16 % , respectively , over the WKNN-only algorithm .', 'Air-to-Air Path Loss Prediction Based on Machine Learning Methods in Urban Environments .', 'Recently , unmanned aerial vehicle ( UAV ) plays an important role in many application because of its high flexibility and low cost .', 'To realize reliable UAV communication , a fundamental work is to investigate the propagation characteristic of the channel .', 'In this paper , we propose path loss model for the UAV air-to-air ( AA ) scenario based on machine learning .', 'A ray-tracing software is employed to generate sample for multiple route in a typical urban environment , and different altitude of Tx and Rx UAVs are taken into consideration .', 'Two machine-learning algorithm , Random Forest and KNN , are exploited to build prediction model on the basis of the training data .', 'The prediction performance of trained model is assessed on the test set according to the metric including the mean absolute error ( MAE ) and root mean square error ( RMSE ) .', 'Meanwhile , two empirical model are presented for comparison .', 'It is shown that the machine-learning-based model are able to provide high prediction accuracy and acceptable computational efficiency in the AA scenario .', 'Moreover , Random Forest outperforms other model and has the smallest prediction error .', 'Further investigation is made to evaluate the impact of five different parameter on the path loss .', 'It is demonstrated that the path visibility is crucial for the path loss .', 'NLOS multipath detection by using machine learning in urban environment .', 'In global navigation satellite system ( GNSS ) positioning , GNSS satellite are often obstructed by building , leading to reflected and diffracted signal , which are known as non-line-of-sight ( NLOS ) signal .', "These cause major positioning ( also known as `` NLOS multipath '' ) error in GNSS positioning .", 'This paper proposes a novel NLOS multipath detection technique that uses a machine-learning technique to improve positioning accuracy in urban environment .', 'The key idea behind this technique is to construct a classifier that discriminates NLOS multipath signal from the output of the multiple GNSS signal correlators of a software GNSS receiver .', 'In the code-tracking process within GNSS receiver , the code correlation peak is determined and tracked using the output of the signal correlators .', 'In the case of an NLOS signal , there are no direct signal ; the first reflected signal has low power compared to the direct signal .', 'Hence , the correlation function is expected to be more distorted in the case of NLOS signal correlation .', 'We use this phenomenon to detect NLOS signal .', 'For realizing machine learning , we extract the feature of the NLOS signal from the shape of the NLOS correlation function , using an actual dataset , to construct an NLOS classifier .', 'To evaluate the proposed technique , we conduct NLOS classification experiment using signal correlation data acquired at different location in the Shinjuku area of Japan .', 'We propose to construct an NLOS classifier based on a support vector machine .', 'From the experiment , 87 % of the LOS signal and 99 % of the NLOS signal are correctly discriminated .', 'Machine learning for source localization in urban environment .', 'This paper investigates source localization in urban environment using machine learning method .', 'Both classification and regression scheme are examined using the random forest algorithm .', 'In both approach , the localization performance depends mostly on arrival time information of received signal .', 'It is shown that the use of a relative arrival time difference rather than the direct time of arrival ( TOA ) also provide good performance , which is beneficial for practical application .', 'It is found that with enough number of receiver , the signal power parameter can be omitted , which eliminates frequency dependency of developed model .', 'It is also found that at least three receiver should be used to achieve acceptable prediction performance .', 'Additionally , the number of training example needed depends on the approach used as well as the desired level of accuracy .', 'This factor is more important in the classification approach , as the amount of training data required closely relates to the number of sector created by the localization problem .', 'A regression scheme is more natural for predicting spatial coordinate value , and achieved higher localization accuracy with fewer training example as compared to classification .', 'Ultimately , the regression based localization scheme using the time difference of arrival ( TDOA ) parameter at three receiver location achieved an average localization accuracy of 2.8m .']

['Reconciling data-driven crime analysis with human-centered algorithms .', 'This study combines traditional statistical method with machine learning to better understand locally relevant , contextual model for analyzing crime in two urban American city .', 'Using census tract as the unit of analysis and controlling for several structural characteristic associated with crime , we find that in Milwaukee , Wisconsin , violent crime is associated with concentrated disadvantage , residential stability , ethnic heterogeneity , total population , and spatial lag of violent crime .', 'Yet , the most important variable is the spatial lag of violent crime , followed by residential stability , ethnic heterogeneity , total population , and concentrated disadvantage .', 'In addition , we find that in Chicago , Illinois , violent crime is associated with immigration , owner-occupied housing , proportion in professional occupation , and proportion population with college degree or higher , as well as ethnic heterogeneity , total population , and the spatial lag for violent crime .', "Machine learning model suggest that for Chicago 's violent crime , the most important variable is the spatial lag term for violent crime , followed by total population , immigration , college education or beyond , owner occupancy , ethnic heterogeneity , and employment in professional occupation .", 'The finding for property crime are similar : in Milwaukee , we find that disadvantage , residential stability , ethnic heterogeneity , total population and spatial lag for property crime are significant predictor in the traditional regression model .', 'However , the most important variable for property crime in Milwaukee is the spatial lag term , followed by total population , ethnic heterogeneity , residential stability and disadvantage .', 'The statistically significant predictor of property crime in Chicago include immigration , owner-occupied housing unit , living in the same house , proportion of workforce in professional occupation , college education and beyond , total population , and the spatial lag for property crime .', 'In Chicago , the most important variable for property crime is the spatial lag term , then the total population , the proportion of individual in professional occupation , concentrated immigration , college education and beyond , living in the same house , and the proportion of owner-occupied housing unit .', 'Urban planner must consider policy that can effectively reduce nearby crime and violence in all city that experience high crime level , but also design locally responsive policy that make sense within a local context : in Milwaukee , residential stability matter more for violent crime than for property crime , while in Chicago , total population is similarly important for both violent crime and property crime .', 'In Milwaukee , ethnic heterogeneity is similarly important for violent and property crime , while in Chicago , ethnic heterogeneity is not a very important variable for violent crime and it is not a significant predictor of property crime .', 'Therefore , urban policy must differently approach social disorganization indicator and support the nuance of the local context for urban planning and policy .', 'Investigation of Airflow around Buildings using Large-Eddy Simulation for Unmanned Aircraft Systems Applications .', 'The ever-increasing demand for Unmanned Aircraft Systems ( UAS ) has led to the desire for integrating them into space in close proximity of human like dense urban space , a reality previously thought of as inconceivable .', 'One of the main concern to be addressed before its widespread adoption is safety , especially in area of operation adjacent to structure like building .', 'This work investigates the effect of building geometry on the flow field in a simplified urban setup consisting of an isolated building to predict their potential impact on UAS operation .', 'Unanticipated wind gust or turbulent flow condition prevalent around various structure constitute a significant challenge for UAS operation in urban environment .', 'We use Large-Eddy Simulation to better understand the unsteady and highly coherent turbulent flow structure produced by building in neutral atmospheric boundary layer flow .', 'Furthermore , we also demonstrate a non-intrusive machine learning methodology to predict flow field to augment safe wind-aware navigation system for Unmanned Aerial Vehicles as a first step towards safely integrating UAS into existing aerial infrastructure .', 'Do land policy make a difference ?', 'A data-driven approach to trace effect on urban form in France and Germany .', 'Against the backdrop of rapidly expanding urban structure , land policy in many country have been adapted to contain and redirect growth to existing urban structure .', 'However , obstacle remain to measure the effect of policy .', 'In the meantime , geoinformation technology have given rise to a wide range of approach to measure and describe urban form .', 'Nevertheless , its application for the assessment of land policy has a high , but not yet fully exploited , potential .', 'It is thus the aim of this research to address and investigate the option of spatial analysis and machine learning in particular to analyse urban form from a land policy perspective .', 'To do so , we develop urban metric informed by urban planning and land readjustment policy of two country describing urban form on different spatial level .', 'We therefore formulate hypothesis on causal relation between policy and form .', 'Based on the metric , we apply the random forest algorithm to classify the building stock of the region .', 'We then extract the residential area , those with single-family house , as this is where the effect of the policy are considered most visible .', 'In a next step , we use random forest to predict the nationality of a building .', 'Through variable importance measure , we identify and discuss urban morphological difference between the two country and test the hypothesis on effect of land policy .', 'We develop and test the approach for the French-German city-region of Strasbourg using OpenStreetMap data .', 'We identify significant difference in the building coverage ratio , which tend to be higher in Germany .', 'This can be linked to difference in planning regulation .', 'Furthermore , German residential area appear to be more diverse in urban form .', 'Difference in land readjustment policy have proven to be plausible here , as French policy favour strong actor that develop residential area more uniformly .', 'In Germany , policy favour fragmented ownership-oriented development of residential area .', 'The metric and the applied algorithm for building classification have proven to be robust in term of data heterogeneity and have shown high level of accuracy .', 'They could also be successfully used for tracing causal relation .', 'The influence of urban visuospatial configuration on older adult ’ stress : A wearable physiological-perceived stress sensing and data mining based-approach .', 'Population ageing raise many fundamental question , including how the urban environment can be configured to promote active ageing .', "The perceived element for older adult ' involvement in the environment differs from the average person .", "Despite this difference , there is little to no research into understanding how the perceived element ( specifically , the visuospatial configuration ) of the environment influence older adult ' involvement—most study focused on younger adult .", "The focus here is stress , which occurs when environmental demand exceeds a person 's capability .", "As stress impacts a person 's involvement in the environment and older adult are more likely to feel stress due to their decline in functional capability , it is important to understand how the visuospatial configuration of urban environment influence stress .", 'Older adult were recruited to participate in an urban environment walk while their physiological response ( Photoplethysmogram ) were monitored using wearable sensor .', 'Their perceived stress response were also collected .', 'Spatial clustering and hot spot analysis were conducted to detect location with cluster of physiological response caused by spatial factor .', "These location were subsequently labelled as stress or non-stress based on participant ' perceived stress .", 'The perceived visual element of the urban environment were extracted using isovist analysis .', 'Principal component analysis , self-organising map and machine learning algorithms were used to understand the relationship .', "The result demonstrate that isovist minimum visibility , occlusivity , and isovist area are the most influential determinant of older adult ' physiological stress .", 'Older adult prefer urban configuration where they can be seen .', 'This study can be used to inform urban design and planning .', 'Origin-Destination Matrix Estimation and Prediction from Socioeconomic Variables Using Automatic Feature Selection Procedure-Based Machine Learning Model .', 'The origin-destination ( OD ) demand matrix plays an essential role in travel modeling and transport planning .', 'Traditional OD matrix are estimated from expensive and laborious traffic count and survey .', 'Accordingly , this study proposes a new combined methodology to estimate or update OD matrix ( urban mobility ) directly from easy-to-obtain and free-of-charge socioeconomic variable .', 'The Málaga region , Spain , was used as a case study .', 'The proposed methodology involves two stage .', 'First , an automatic feature selection procedure was developed to determine the most relevant socioeconomic variable , discarding the irrelevant one .', 'Several feature selection technique were studied and combined .', 'Second , machine learning ( ML ) model were used to estimate mobility between predefined zone .', 'Artificial neural network ( ANNs ) and support vector regression ( SVR ) were tested and compared using the most relevant variable as input .', 'The experimental result show that the proposed combined model can be more accurate than traditional method and ML model without the feature selection procedure .', 'In particular , SVR with feature selection slightly outperformed the combined model using ANNs .', 'The proposed methodology can be a promising and affordable alternative method for estimating OD matrix , reducing cost and lead time significantly , and assisting and improving urban transport planning .', 'Automated classification of building structure for urban built environment identification using machine learning .', 'The urban environment , especially building with different structure type , is difficult to identify automatically due to variation in urban function and form and to building ’ relatively tacit structural attribute .', 'To enable automated classification of building structure in complex urban environment , this study developed a machine learning ( ML ) -based method .', 'Twenty-nine ML feature were defined , and twelve popular ML algorithms were tested .', 'The method was tested by classifying over 3700 building in Beijing , China into five common structure .', 'Of the 12 ML algorithms , the Gradient Boosted Decision Tree delivered the highest overall performance , and its classification was verified as effective , i.e.', ', achieving approximately 91.7 % , 90.6 % , and 91.1 % of average recall , precision and F1 , respectively , on testing data .', "This study 's classification method helps establish a nexus among urban form , building structure , and material and resource requirement , thus contributing to the advance of sustainable urban study , such as urban metabolism and ecological planning .", 'Dengue disease dynamic are modulated by the combined influence of precipitation and landscape : A machine learning approach .', 'Background : Dengue is an endemic vector-borne disease influenced by environmental factor such as landscape and climate .', 'Previous study separately assessed the effect of landscape and climate factor on mosquito occurrence and dengue incidence .', 'However , both factor concurrently coexist in time and space and can interact , affecting mosquito development and dengue disease transmission .', 'For example , egg laid in a suitable environment can hatch after being submerged in rain water .', 'It has been difficult for conventional statistical modeling approach to demonstrate these combined influence due to mathematical constraint .', 'Objective : To investigate the combined influence of landscape and climate factor on mosquito occurrence and dengue incidence .', 'Method : Entomological , epidemiological , and landscape data from the rainy season ( July–December ) were obtained from respective government agency in Metropolitan Manila , Philippines , from 2012 to 2014 .', 'Temperature , precipitation and vegetation data were obtained through remote sensing .', 'A random forest algorithm was used to select the landscape and climate variable .', 'Afterward , using the identified key variable , a model-based ( MOB ) recursive partitioning was implemented to test the combined influence of landscape and climate factor on ovitrap index ( vector mosquito occurrence ) and dengue incidence .', 'Result : The MOB recursive partitioning for ovitrap index indicated a high sensitivity of vector mosquito occurrence on environmental condition generated by a combination of high residential density area with low precipitation .', 'Moreover , the MOB recursive partitioning indicated high sensitivity of dengue incidence to the effect of precipitation in area with high proportion of residential density and commercial area .', 'Conclusion : Dengue dynamic are not solely influenced by individual effect of either climate or landscape , but rather by their synergistic or combined effect .', 'The presented finding have the potential to target vector surveillance in area identified as suitable for mosquito occurrence under specific climatic condition and may be relevant as part of urban planning strategy to control dengue .', 'Exploring the latent manifold of city pattern .', 'Understanding how city evolve through time and how human interact with their surroundings is a complex but essential task that is necessary for designing better urban environment .', 'Recent development in artificial intelligence can give researcher and city developer powerful tool , and through their usage , new insight can be gained on this issue .', 'Discovering a high-level structure in a set of observation within a low-dimensional manifold is a common strategy used when applying machine learning technique to tackle several problem while finding a projection from and onto the underlying data distribution .', 'This so-called latent manifold can be used in many application such as clustering , data visualization , sampling , density estimation , and unsupervised learning .', 'Moreover , data of city pattern has some particularity , such as having superimposed or natural pattern that correspond to those of the depicted location .', 'In this research , multiple manifold are explored and derived from city pattern image .', 'A set of quantitative and qualitative test are proposed to examine the quality of these manifold .', 'In addition , to demonstrate these test , a novel specialized dataset of city pattern of multiple location is created , with the dataset capturing a set of recognizable superimposed pattern .', 'Smart environment design planning for smart city based on deep learning .', 'Machine Learning ( ML ) and Deep Learning ( DL ) method have contributed to the progression of model in the different aspect of planning , prediction , and uncertainty analysis of urban and smart city development in the current scenario .', 'Most developed city have suffered from severe air quality as population growth and industrialization grow rapidly .', 'Government agency and citizen are increasingly concerned about air quality , which has an impact on various area of the human environment and human advancement .', 'Conventional method of air pollution forecasting primarily use low-level simulation , and these model generate disappointing result that have led us to factor that influence air pollution measurement based on a thorough design of the structure .', 'Furthermore , in this paper , Long Short- Term Memory ( LSTM ) assisted Staked Auto-Encoder ( SAE ) ( LSTM-SAE ) model has been proposed for predicting the air quality in smart environment design planning in the smart city .', 'Long Short- Term Memory is used to evaluate air pollution quality prediction in smart city .', 'Staked Auto-Encoder ( SAE ) is modeled and prepared gently to extract the intrinsic component that occur due to air pollution .', 'Furthermore , the finding indicate that classification accuracy of 91.22 % and the overall Error rate of 0.46 has been validated , and LSTM-SAE addresses the different aspect of smart city and effective method when compared to other existing method .', 'Big data analytics for identifying electricity theft using machine learning approach in microgrids for smart community .', 'Electricity theft ( ET ) causes major revenue loss in power utility .', 'It reduces the quality of supply , raises production cost , causes legal consumer to pay the higher cost , and impacts the economy as a whole .', 'In this article , we use the State Grid Corporation of China ( SGCC ) dataset , which contains electricity consumption data of 1035 day for two class : normal and fraudulent .', 'In this work , ET detection model is proposed that consists of four step : interpolation , data balancing , feature extraction , and classification .', 'First , missing value of the dataset are recovered using the interpolation method .', 'Second , resampling technique is implemented .', 'ET consumer are 9 % in the SGCC dataset that make the model inefficient to correctly classify both class ( normal and theft ) .', 'A hybrid resampling technique is proposed , named synthetic minority oversampling technique with near miss .', 'Third , residual network extracts the latent features from the SGCC dataset .', 'Fourth , three tree based classifier , such as decision tree ( DT ) , random forest ( RF ) , and adaptive boosting ( AdaBoost ) are applied to train the encoded feature vector for classification .', 'Besides , search for good hyperparameters is a challenging task , which is usually done manually and takes a considerable amount of time .', 'To resolve this problem , Bayesian optimizer is used to simplify the tuning process of DT , RF , and AdaBoost .', 'Finally , the result indicate that RF outperforms DT and AdaBoost .', 'Geospatial simulation of urban neighbourhood densification potential .', 'Although densification of urban area is being proposed as a sustainable urbanisation strategy , framework for detailed large-scale analysis of densification potential and their evaluation are lacking .', 'A geospatial simulation framework is presented to assess and evaluate densification potential at the neighbourhood level of already built-up residential area .', 'The focus is on post-war neighbourhood , which are particularly promising for sustainable densification .', 'Neighbourhood are localised using geospatial analysis and based on literature and architectural design , potential are estimated for different neighbourhood archetype and densification strategy .', 'Potential are simulated at a national scale using supervised archetype classification .', 'The embeddedness into current mobility infrastructure is used as a proxy for evaluating the sustainability of neighbourhood densification .', 'The developed framework is tested for Switzerland .', 'Depending on the densification strategy , the simulated additional inhabitant for populating post-war urban neighbourhood range between 4–15 % of the current population .', 'More than half of this potential is located in central area and is well connected by public transportation .', 'The presented approach is suitable for assessing spatially explicit densification potential and for prioritising densification location .', 'We show that in country with a high number of post-war neighbourhood in well-connected location , considerable densification opportunity could be realised in already built-up residential area .', 'Improving intelligent decision making in urban planning : Using machine learning algorithm .', 'Generally , decision making in urban planning has progressively become difficult due to the uncertain , convoluted , and multi-criteria nature of urban issue .', 'Even though there has been a growing interest to this domain , traditional decision support system are no longer able to effectively support the decision process .', 'This paper aims to elaborate an intelligent decision support system ( IDSS ) that provides relevant assistance to urban planner in urban project .', 'This research addresses the use of new technique that contribute to intelligent decision making : machine learning classifier , naïve Bayes classifier , and agglomerative clustering .', 'Finally , a prototype is being developed to concretize the proposition .', 'Copying or distributing in print or electronic form without written permission of IGI Global is prohibited .', 'A machine learning approach to the simulation of intercity corporate network in mainland China .', 'This paper explores the potential of machine learning algorithms ( MLAs ) for the simulation of intercity network .', 'To this end , we implement the random forest MLA to simulate the intercity corporate network created by Fortune China 500 firm in mainland China .', 'The random forest MLA does not require a predefined model but detects patterns directly from the data to automatically build model .', 'The city-dyad connectivity were computed using an interlocking network model and treated as target variable .', 'City factor and geographical factor were treated as feature .', 'The model was trained using a 2010 training set and subsequently validated using 2010 and 2017 test set .', 'The result are promising , with the pseudo R2 of the model coupled with different test data ranging from 0.861 to 0.940 .', 'Nonetheless , the random forest MLA also faces some challenge in the context of the simulation of intercity network .', 'We conclude that MLAs are potentially useful for specific application such as the analysis of network big data , scenario simulation in regional planning , and the detection of driving force in exploratory research .', 'Online urban-waterlogging monitoring based on a recurrent neural network for classification of microblogging text .', 'With the global climate change and rapid urbanization , urban flood disaster spread and become increasingly serious in China .', 'Urban rainstorm and waterlogging have become an urgent challenge that needs to be monitored in real time and further predicted for the improvement of urbanization construction .', 'We trained a recurrent neural network ( RNN ) model to classify microblogging post related to urban waterlogging and establish an online monitoring system of urban waterlogging caused by flood disaster .', 'We manually curated more than 4400 waterlogging post to train the RNN model so that it can precisely identify waterlogging-related post of Sina Weibo to timely determine urban waterlogging .', 'The RNN model has been thoroughly evaluated , and our experimental result showed that it achieved higher accuracy than traditional machine learning method , such as the support vector machine ( SVM ) and gradient boosting decision tree ( GBDT ) .', 'Furthermore , we build a nationwide map of urban waterlogging based on recent 2-year microblogging data .', 'Review of machine learning technique for mosquito control in urban environment .', 'Machine learning ( ML ) techniques excel at forecasting , clustering , and classification task , making them valuable for various aspect of mosquito control .', 'In this literature review , we selected 120 paper relevant to the current state of ML for mosquito control in urban setting .', 'The reviewed work covers several different methodology , objective , and evaluation criterion from various environmental contexts .', 'We first divided the existing paper into geospatial , visual , or audio category .', 'For each category , we analyzed the machine learning pipeline , from dataset creation to model performance .', 'We conclude with a discussion of the challenge and opportunity for further research .', 'While the reviewed ML method in mosquito control are promising , we recommend a ) increased use of crowdsourced and citizen science data , b ) a standardized and open ML pipeline for reproducible result , and c ) research that incorporates advance in ML .', 'With these suggestion , ML technique could lead to effective mosquito control in urban environment .', 'Software Frameworks that Improve HCI Focused on Cognitive Cities .', 'A Systematic Literature Review .', 'Due to the technological advance , the reference framework to carry out web and mobile application primarily focus on improving Human-Computer Interaction ( HCI ) .', 'This document compiles a series of current trend both in framework and in developing system that enhance HCI in the new paradigm of cognitive city .', 'For this , a Systematics Literature Review ( SLR ) methodology has been applied , based on an exhaustive search in Scientific library of the Informatics field .', 'This research presents new framework that improve HCI in medicine , education , and urban planning ; based on the development of Cognitive City .', 'Environmentally sustainable urban development and internet of thing connected sensor in cognitive smart city .', 'Based on an in-depth survey of the literature , the purpose of the paper is to explore environmentally sustainable urban development and Internet of Things connected sensor in cognitive smart city .', 'Using and replicating data from Capgemini , EIU , ESI ThoughtLab , JLL , KPMG , ICMA , SCC , and UKTI , I performed analysis and made estimate regarding how networked and integrated sustainable urban technology optimize interconnected sensor network through digital urban governance in smart and environmentally sustainable city .', 'Data-driven planning technology can upgrade the standard of living by gathering massive volume of data from Internet of Things sensing infrastructure .', 'Data-driven Internet of Things system integrate computationally networked urbanism and sustainable governance network across Internet of Things sensing infrastructure by harnessing machine learning-based analytics .', 'Smart and environmentally sustainable city leverage datadriven planning technology and machine learning-based analytics .', 'Networked and integrated sustainable urban technology develop on data-driven Internet of Things system and machine learning-based analytics .', 'Smart sustainable city governance and management can be enhanced by harnessing Internet of Things sensor , urban big data analytics , data-driven Internet of Things system , and sensor-based big data application .', 'Descriptive statistic of compiled data from the completed survey were calculated when appropriate .', 'Planning Support Systems for Long-Term Climate Resilience : A Critical Review .', 'As climate change is becoming a reality , there is an increasing demand to improve urban resilience .', 'Planning Support Systems ( PSS ) enable climate-informed planning .', 'However , previous research confirms difficulty in the uptake of PSS due to their resource-intensive nature and lack of awareness of their usefulness .', 'This chapter aims to make a headway in understanding research priority and gap that need to be addressed for PSS to address climate resilience in the long run .', 'To this end , we review the emerging body of knowledge in academia and practice , by conducting a text-mining analysis of academic ( n = 36,405 ) and non-academic ( practice ) ( n = 86 ) literature on urban planning and climate resilience .', 'We extract trend on climate pressure , infrastructure driver , and planning response .', 'A key finding from academic literature is that long-term planning continues to be limited to a few fixed scenario and places a strong focus on single sector strategy .', 'Practice document continue to be designed to inform high-level policy , but not spatial plan that require integrated thinking .', 'Our analysis concludes with a research agenda for improving PSS to ( 1 ) identify and integrate the full range of variable in the long-term ; ( 2 ) support selection of appropriate planning response across multiple infrastructure system ; and ( 3 ) improve flexibility in planning by a deeper understanding of temporal aspect such as planning timeframes .', 'Frontier topic in italian regional science in its forty : The increasing role of heterogeneity in theory , policy and planning .', 'This paper introduces the second volume of the special issue edited to celebrate the 40th Anniversary of AISRe .', 'It presents different contribution ranging from the analysis of knowledge spillover , the use of microdata in the spatial context , the application of machine learning tool for regional policy evaluation study , the assessment of smart specialization and inner area strategy , the role of the evolutionary approach in regional planning and that of urban planning instrument in land rent measurement .', 'The common denominator of the different essay may be found in the increasing diffusion of approach dealing with heterogeneity of firm , geographical space and territory in modern regional science .', 'The conceptual basis of water-energy-food nexus governance : systematic literature review using network and discourse analysis .', 'In the last decade , the debate on the governance of water , energy , and food ( WEF ) has intensified , spurring the emergence of the term “ nexus governance.', '” In general , the reduction of trade-off and construction of synergy between WEF have been placed on the scientific , political , and economic agenda .', 'However , although increasingly used , it is difficult to find a clear meaning and definition of what the term represents .', 'Based on a systematic literature review ( SLR ) , using text-mining and machine learning algorithms , this article investigates what are the conceptual basis of the nexus governance debate , and attempt to clarify the main theme , network , and gap within this literature .', 'The analysis is based on quantitative and qualitative method , combining social network analysis ( SNA ) and discourse analysis ( DA ) .', 'The result highlighted that twenty-four governance-related concept support this literature , breaking down into eight group : water and basin governance ; environmental and system governance ; risk and resource security governance ; economic governance ; global governance ; urban governance ; integrative and cooperative governance ; and “ epistemic ” and transdisciplinary governance .', 'Published by Informa UK Limited , trading as Taylor & Francis Group .', 'A data-informed analytical approach to human-scale greenway planning : Integrating multi-sourced urban data with machine learning algorithm .', 'Urban greenway have been recognized as an important strategy to improve human-scale quality in high-density built environment .', 'Nevertheless , current greenway suitability analysis mainly focuses on geographical and natural issue , failing to account for human-scale urban design factor .', 'Accordingly , this study proposes a data-informed approach to planning urban greenway network using a combination of classical urban design theory , multi-sourced urban data , and machine learning algorithms .', 'Maoming City in China was used as a case study .', "Per classical urban design theory , specifically , Cervero and Ewing 's 5D variable , density , diversity , design , dimension of destination accessibility , and distance-to-transit , were selected as key factor .", 'A series of new urban data , including point of interest ( PoIs ) , location-based service ( LBS ) positioning data , and street view image , were applied in conjunction with machine learning algorithm and geographical information system ( GIS ) tools to measure these key factor at a human-scale resolution and generate an optimized greenway suitability analysis .', 'This analytical approach is an attempt to take human-scale concern into account on a city-wide scale regarding greenway network generation .', 'It also pushes the methodological boundary of greenway planning by combining classical urban design thinking with new urban data and new technique .', 'Analysis of BeiDou/Galileo combined pseudo-range positioning performance in urban environment .', 'The observation condition have a significant influence on the positioning performance .', 'GNSS signal are easily blocked in urban environment , which leads to discontinuity and instability of position solution .', 'With the construction of BeiDou and Galileo satellite navigation system in the final stage , multi-satellite fusion will be the future development trend of GNSSs .', 'This paper introduces the mathematical fusion model of Galileo and BeiDou satellite navigation system , typical urban coverage condition are simulated , and a detailed in the aspect of number of visible satellite , positioning error and PDOP value are analysed .', 'The result show that the positioning accuracy of the integrated navigation system in the horizontal is within 3 m , the elevation is within 5 m , and the PDOP value are less than 1.5 in the open sky condition .', 'In any coverage condition , Galileo stand-alone system can not guarantee the positioning continuity in the whole day , and positioning performance is the worst in the north coverage condition , unable to obtain the position solution for more than 40 % time in the whole day .', 'In the north coverage condition , BeiDou has the best positioning performance , with a minimum of 4 visible satellite and 99 % of PDOP value are less than 10 .', 'Design of machine learning model for Urban planning and management improvement .', 'With the aid of artificial intelligence , this paper builds a machine learning model with the KNN algorithm to optimize the traditional method of urban planning and management ( UPM ) .', 'The optimization is realized through two step .', 'First , the relevant theory of the updated UPM of livelihood oriented UPM ( LOUPM ) are explored for the later machine learning architecture design .', "People 's livelihood has a great influence on UPM .", 'Livelihood orientation makes the complex UPM even more complicated due to diverse living need of citizen .', "This paper analyzes the deeper relationship between the people 's livelihood and UPM , systematically study the function and connotation of the people 's livelihood behavior , and profoundly discusses current contradiction and restraining factor .", 'Second , based on a better understanding of LOUPM , this paper further proposes an artificial intelligence approach to select most related factor to optimize UPM from database .', 'In the first paper of this series , in the analysis of the relevant UPM theory , three scope of LOUPM are concluded to be the evaluation of data set : authority , time , and space .', 'Then , this paper continues to design a software model with the KNN algorithm to evaluate the urban plan and generates optimization advice for the user .', 'Based on this research , it is possible to explore LOUPM .', "In order to make every effort to seek way and method to meet the challenge of the LOUPM in the new period , and by introducing a creative computing approach of government management and social governance , this article can contribute to the growing demand of China 's urbanization process .", 'Intrusion Detection System as Audit in IoT Infrastructure using Ensemble Learning and SMOTE Method .', 'With the industrial revolution 4.0 , the use of IoT-based system is increasing , both in the field of health manufacturing , urban planning , housing , and even automotive .', 'Therefore , the security of the IoT system needs to be considered , this is related to data integrity , privacy , service stability .', 'Through intrusion detection , activity on the IoT system will be able to be analyzed whether there are suspicious activity that can interfere with or threaten IoT service .', 'In several previous study in the literature , the approach used to detect intrusion in the IoT system has a high false alarm rate .', 'This research proposes an approach through machine learning , specifically the ensemble learning approach and the synthetic minority over-sampling technique ( SMOTE ) method as a method of detecting intrusion in the IoT system which is expected to produce better performance .', 'The result of this study indicate that the proposed approach is able to detect intrusion and classify into five type of intrusion including normal intrusion , probe , dos , r2l , u2r .', 'Based on the evaluation result , the proposed approach can improve the performance of intrusion detection in term of accuracy to 97.02 % , detection rate of 97 % , false alarm rate 0.16 % , compared to base learning and approach in previous study used as intrusion detection method , but in processing time performance have not shown satisfying result .', 'Predicting safe parking space : A machine learning approach to geospatial urban and crime data .', 'This research aims to identify spatial and time pattern of theft in Manhattan , NY , to reveal urban factor that contribute to theft from motor vehicle and to build a prediction model for theft .', 'Method include time series and hot spot analysis , linear regression , elastic-net , Support vector machine SVM with radial and linear kernel , decision tree , bagged CART , random forest , and stochastic gradient boosting .', 'Machine learning method reveal that linear model perform better on our data ( linear regression , elastic-net ) , specifying that a higher number of subway entrance , graffiti , and restaurant on street contribute to higher theft rate from motor vehicle .', 'Although the prediction model for theft meet almost all assumption ( five of six ) , its accuracy is 77 % , suggesting that there are other undiscovered factor making a contribution to the generation of theft .', 'As an output demonstrating final result , the application prototype for searching safer parking in Manhattan , NY based on the prediction model , has been developed .', 'A reduced order model for turbulent flow in the urban environment using machine learning .', 'To help create a comfortable and healthy indoor and outdoor environment in which to live , there is a need to understand turbulent air flows within the urban environment .', 'To this end , building on a previously reported method [ 1 ] , we develop a fast-running Non-Intrusive Reduced Order Model ( NIROM ) for predicting the turbulent air flows found within an urban environment .', 'To resolve larger scale turbulent fluctuation , we employ a Large Eddy Simulation ( LES ) model and solve the resulting computational model on unstructured mesh .', 'The objective is to construct a rapid-running NIROM from these result that will have ‘ similar ’ dynamic to the original LES model .', 'Based on Proper Orthogonal Decomposition ( POD ) and machine learning technique , this Reduced Order Model ( ROM ) is six order of magnitude faster than the high-fidelity LES model and we demonstrate how ‘ similar ’ it can be to the high-fidelity model by comparing statistical quantity such as the mean flows , Reynolds stress and probability density of the velocity .', 'We also include validation of the high-fidelity model against data from wind tunnel experiment .', 'This paper represents a key step towards the use of reduced order modelling for operational purpose with the tantalising possibility of it being used in place of Gaussian plume model , and the potential for greatly improved model fidelity and confidence .', 'Intelligence augmentation for urban warfare operation planning using deep reinforcement learning .', 'The density , diversity , connectedness and scale of urban environment make military operation challenging .', 'This paper shows that different artificial intelligence technique can be combined to provide the commander with various form of intelligence augmentation and to support the decision making process .', 'A warfare model has been developed where an AI system , representing a red unit , learns how to select the position for a target and for several improvised explosive device ( IEDs ) in order to prevent the blue unit to locate the target .', 'The blue unit is trained to reach the target by using deep reinforcement learning , while an evolutionary algorithm is used to train the red unit .', 'These technique do not rely on large amount of historical data .', 'Different approach have been used and discussed to optimise the co-learning of the two agent , showing that optimal behaviour can be learned in an urban environment .', 'Information about the most likely position of the target and the IEDs can be extracted from the policy learned by the system , and used by the commander to provide intelligence augmentation while planning an operation and evaluating different possible course of action .', 'The reliability of this information depends on the realism of the AI system simulating the red unit , that is strictly dependent on the model used for the blue unit during the training .', 'Downloading of the abstract is permitted for personal use only .', 'Automating layout synthesis with constructive preference elicitation .', 'Layout synthesis refers to the problem of arranging object subject to design preference and structural constraint .', 'Application include furniture arrangement , space partitioning ( e.g .', 'subdividing a house into room ) , urban planning , and other design task .', 'Computer-aided support system are essential tool for architect and designer to produce custom , functional layout .', 'Existing system , however , do not learn the designer ’ s preference , and therefore fail to generalize across session or instance .', 'We propose addressing layout synthesis by casting it as a constructive preference elicitation task .', 'Our solution employs a coactive interaction protocol , whereby the system and the designer interact by mutually improving each other ’ s proposal .', 'The system iteratively recommends layout to the user , and learns the user ’ s preference by observing her improvement to the recommendation .', 'We apply our system to two design task , furniture arrangement and space partitioning , and report promising quantitative and qualitative result on both .', 'Code related to this paper is available at : https : //github.com/unitn-sml/constructive-layout-synthesis/tree/master/ecml18 .', 'Automatic sound recognition of urban environment event .', 'The audio analysis of speaker ’ s surroundings has been a first step for several processing system that enable speaker ’ s mobility though his daily life .', 'These algorithm usually operate in a short-time analysis decomposing the incoming event in time and frequency domain .', 'In this paper , an automatic sound recognizer is studied , which investigates audio event of interest from urban environment .', 'Our experiment were conducted using a close set of audio event from which well known and commonly used audio descriptor were extracted and model were training using powerful machine learning algorithm .', 'The best urban sound recognition performance was achieved by SVMs with accuracy equal to approximately 93 % .', 'A tool for urban soundscape evaluation applying Support Vector Machines for developing a soundscape classification model .', 'To ensure appropriate soundscape management in urban environment , the urban-planning authority need a range of tool that enable such a task to be performed .', 'An essential step during the management of urban area from a sound standpoint should be the evaluation of the soundscape in such an area .', "In this sense , it has been widely acknowledged that a subjective and acoustical categorization of a soundscape is the first step to evaluate it , providing a basis for designing or adapting it to match people 's expectation as well .", 'In this sense , this work proposes a model for automatic classification of urban soundscapes .', 'This model is intended for the automatic classification of urban soundscapes based on underlying acoustical and perceptual criterion .', 'Thus , this classification model is proposed to be used as a tool for a comprehensive urban soundscape evaluation .', 'Because of the great complexity associated with the problem , two machine learning technique , Support Vector Machines ( SVM ) and Support Vector Machines trained with Sequential Minimal Optimization ( SMO ) , are implemented in developing model classification .', 'The result indicate that the SMO model outperforms the SVM model in the specific task of soundscape classification .', 'With the implementation of the SMO algorithm , the classification model achieves an outstanding performance ( 91.3 % of instance correctly classified ) .', 'Using data mining technique to detect the personality of player in an educational game .', 'One of the goal of Educational Data Mining is to develop the method for student modeling based on educational data , such as ; chat conversation , class discussion , etc .', 'On the other hand , individual behavior and personality play a major role in Intelligent Tutoring Systems ( ITS ) and Educational Data Mining ( EDM ) .', "Thus , to develop a user adaptable system , the student 's behavior that occurring during interaction has huge impact EDM and ITS .", "In this chapter , we introduce a novel data mining technique and natural language processing approach for automated detection student 's personality and behavior in an educational game ( Land Science ) where student act as intern in an urban planning firm and discuss in group their idea .", 'In order to apply this framework , input excerpt must be classified into one of six possible personality class .', 'We applied this personality classification method using machine learning algorithm , such as : Naive Bayes , Support Vector Machine ( SVM ) and Decision Tree .', 'People counting with image retrieval using compressed sensing .', 'The estimation of the number of people present in an image has many application such as intelligent transportation , urban planning and crowd surveillance .', 'Rather than conventional counting by detection or regression/machine-learning method , we propose an image retrieval approach , which uses an image descriptor to estimate the people count .', 'We review the performance of several image descriptor .', 'In addition , we propose a straightforward global image descriptor for image retrieval based on compressed sensing theory .', 'Extensive evaluation on existing crowd analysis benchmark datasets demonstrate the effectiveness of our image retrieval-based approach compared to state-of-the-art regression-based people counting method .', 'Detecting player personality behavior with any effort of concealment .', 'We introduce a novel natural language processing component using machine learning technique for prediction of personality behavior of player in a serious game , Land Science , where player act as intern in an urban planning firm and discuss in group their idea about urban planning and environmental science in written natural language .', 'Our model learns vector space representation for various feature extraction .', 'In order to apply this framework , input excerpt must be classified into one of six possible personality class .', 'We applied this personality classification task using several machine learning algorithm , such as : Naïve Bayes , Support Vector Machines , and Decision Tree .', 'Training is performed on a relatively dataset of manually annotated excerpt .', 'By combining these feature space from psychology and computational linguistics , we perform and evaluate our approach to detecting personality , and eventually develop a classifier that is nearly 83 % accurate on our dataset .', "Based on the feature analysis of our model , we add several theoretical contribution , including revealing a relationship between different personality behavior in player ' writing .", 'Automated detection of mentor and player in an educational game .', 'Automatically identifying the various role ( e.g.', ', mentor , player ) in multi-party collaborative chat is a challenging task .', 'To better understand the conversational demand of mentor and player , this paper investigates the dynamic and linguistic feature of multi-party chat in the context of an online educational game .', 'In this paper we introduce a novel computational linguistics method using a machine learning algorithm to automatically classify utterance of player and mentor in a serious game , where player act as intern in an urban planning firm and discuss their idea about urban planning and environmental science in written natural language .', 'Our result are promising and our model can be extended to any multi-party environment that leader ( Mentors ) are needed to be distinguished based on their conversation .']

['Prediction of crime rate in urban neighborhood based on machine learning .', 'As the impact of crime on the life of resident has increased , there are a number of method for predicting where crime will occur .', 'They tend to explore only the association established between a single factor and the distribution of crime .', 'In order to more accurately and quickly visualize and predict crime distribution in different neighborhood , and to provide a basis for security planning and design by planning designer , this paper uses GAN neural network to build a prediction model of city floor plan and corresponding crime distribution map .', 'We take Philadelphia as the research sample , use more than 2 million crime information of Philadelphia from 2006 to 2018 to draw the crime hotspot distribution map , and collect the corresponding map of Philadelphia , and train the model for predicting the crime rate of the city with more than two thousand set of one-to-one corresponding image as the training set .', 'When the training is complete , a floor plan can be fed directly to the model , and the model will immediately feed back a hotspot map reflecting the crime distribution .', 'Using the untrained Philadelphia data as the test set , the model can accurately predict crime concentration area and the predicted crime concentration area are similar to the concentration area
