considered in previous study .', 'With the feedback from the model , the city layout can be adjusted and the crime rate can be greatly reduced when the simulated city planner tune into the city plan .', 'In addition the idea in this paper can be applied as a set of methodology to predict other relevant urban characteristic parameter and visualize them .', 'A data-driven agent-based simulation to predict crime pattern in an urban environment .', 'Spatial crime simulation contribute to our understanding of the mechanism that drive crime and can support decision-makers in developing effective crime reduction strategy .', 'Agent-based model that integrate geographical environment to generate crime pattern have emerged in recent year , although data-driven crime simulation are scarce .', 'This article ( 1 ) identifies numerous important driver of crime pattern , ( 2 ) collect relevant , openly available data source to build a GIS-layer with static and dynamic geographical , as well as temporal feature relevant to crime , ( 3 ) builds a virtual urban environment with these layer , in which individual offender agent navigate , ( 4 ) proposes a data-driven decision-making process using machine-learning for the agent to decide whether to engage in criminal activity based on their perception of the environment and , finally , ( 5 ) generates fine-grained crime pattern in a simulated urban environment .', 'The novelty of this work lies in the various large-scale data layer , the integration of machine learning at individual agent level to process the data layer , and the high resolution of the resulting prediction .', 'The result show that the spatial , temporal , and interaction layer are all required to predict the top street segment with the highest number of crime .', 'In addition , the spatial layer is the most informative , which means that spatial data contributes most to predictive performance .', 'Thus , these finding highlight the importance of the inclusion of various open data source and the potential of theory-informed , data-driven simulation for the purpose of crime prediction .', 'The resulting model is applicable as a predictive tool and as a test platform to support crime reduction .', 'Ai augmented approach to identify shared idea from large format public consultation .', 'Public data , contributed by citizen , stakeholder and other potentially affected party , are becoming increasingly used to collect the shared idea of a wider community .', 'Having collected large quantity of text data from public consultation , the challenge is often how to interpret the dataset without resorting to lengthy time-consuming manual analysis .', 'One approach gaining ground is the use of Natural Language Processing ( NLP ) technology .', 'Based on machine learning technology applied to analysis of human natural language , NLP provides the opportunity to automate data analysis for large volume of texts at a scale that would be virtually impossible to analyse manually .', 'Using NLP toolkits , this paper presents a novel approach for identifying and visualising shared idea from large format public consultation .', 'The approach analyses grammatical structure of public texts to discover shared idea from sentence comprising subject + verb + object and verb + object that express public option .', 'In particular , the shared idea are identified by extracting noun , verb , adjective phrase and clause from subject and object , which are then categorised by urban infrastructure category and term .', 'The result are visualised in a hierarchy chart and a word tree using cascade and tree view .', 'The approach is illustrated using data collected from a public consultation exercise called “ Share an Idea ” undertaken in Christchurch , New Zealand , after the 2011 earthquake .', 'The approach has the potential to upscale public participation to identify shared design value and associated quality for a wide range of public initiative including urban planning .', 'IoT for smart city : Machine learning approach in smart healthcare—A review .', 'Smart city is a collective term for technology and concept that are directed toward making city efficient , technologically more advanced , greener and more socially inclusive .', 'These concept include technical , economic and social innovation .', 'This term has been tossed around by various actor in politics , business , administration and urban planning since the 2000s to establish tech-based change and innovation in urban area .', 'The idea of the smart city is used in conjunction with the utilization of digital technology and at the same time represents a reaction to the economic , social and political challenge that post-industrial society are confronted with at the start of the new millennium .', 'The key focus is on dealing with challenge faced by urban society , such as environ-mental pollution , demographic change , population growth , healthcare , the financial crisis or scarcity of resource .', 'In a broader sense , the term also includes non-technical innovation that make urban life more sustainable .', 'So far , the idea of using IoT-based sensor network for healthcare application is a promising one with the potential of minimizing inefficiency in the existing infrastructure .', 'A machine learning approach is key to successful implementation of the IoT-powered wireless sensor network for this purpose since there is large amount of data to be handled intelligently .', 'Throughout this paper , it will be discussed in detail how AI-powered IoT and WSNs are applied in the healthcare sector .', 'This research will be a baseline study for understanding the role of the IoT in smart city , in particular in the healthcare sector , for future research work .', 'Automatic Recognition of Playful Physical Activity Opportunities of the Urban Environment .', 'We investigate deep neural network in recognizing playful physical activity opportunity of the urban environment .', 'Using transfer learning with a pre-trained Faster R-CNN network , we are able to train a parkour training spot detector with only a few thousand street level photographs .', 'We utilize a simple and efficient annotation scheme that only required a few day of annotation work by parkour hobbyist , and should be easily applicable in other contexts , e.g .', 'skateboarding .', 'The technology is tested through parkour spot exploration and visualization experiment .', 'To inform and motivate the technology development , we also conducted an interview study about what makes an interesting parkour spot and how parkour hobbyist find spot .', 'Our work should be valuable for researcher and practitioner of field like urban design and exercise video game , e.g.', ', by providing data for a location-based game akin to Pokémon Go , but with parkour-themed gameplay and challenge .', 'Learning with self-attention for rental market spatial dynamic in the Atlanta metropolitan area .', 'The rental housing market plays a critical role in the United States real estate market .', 'Prior study have used various approach to model housing rent , such as interpolation , hedonic modeling , and machine learning .', 'However , only a few study have modeled rental price based on textual data , which provides rich and contextual information about rental property .', 'In addition , many model , especially deep learning model , use an end-to-end black box for prediction , which hides the decision process .', 'Such model are difficult to interpret and explain the driving factor .', 'This study builds on our previous work , aiming to develop and evaluate rental market spatial dynamic model combining Long Short-Term Memory ( LSTM ) network and self-attention mechanism .', 'We compare the performance of the proposed model with our previous model on predicting rental price in Atlanta , Georgia , USA .', 'We also use technique from saliency map to explain the generated model .', 'Result show that the self-attention-based model outperforms our previous model .', 'The saliency map technique reveal how the model attends to a different part of the textual information .', 'The predicted result reflect the spatial variation of textual information .', 'Such a model offers practical pricing reference for homeowner and renter , and spatial pattern for urban planner and stakeholder .', 'Evaluation of a Concept for Classification of Micromobility Vehicles Based on Thermal-Infrared Imaging and Neuromorphic Processing .', 'Current trend of environmental awareness combined with a focus on personal fitness and health , motivates many people to switch from car and public transport to micromobility solution , namely bicycle , electric bicycle , cargo bike , or scooter .', 'To accommodate urban planning for these change , city , and community need to know how many ( micromobility ) vehicle are on the road .', 'In this work , we design a concept for a compact , mobile , and energy-efficient system to classify and count micromobility vehicle .', 'We aim for a battery-powered system , which can be installed in a short time by a single person and is non-invasive for the ground or traffic .', 'For this purpose , we investigate a system architecture consisting of uncooled long-wave infrared ( LWIR ) imaging sensor and a neuromorphic co-processor .', 'This processor can perform classification in a fixed time of 16,2μs without requiring additional hardware for learning .', 'It can adapt its knowledge base to new environment without external update .', 'Our system is aimed to achieve adequate accuracy only using a low-resolution sensor and moderate processing power .', 'We will show that an object representation of only 256 Bytes is sufficient to achieve a four-class classification accuracy higher than 80 % , with an overall power consumption of less than 7mW .', 'We estimate a total operating time of at least two week using a common 12V 17Ah lead battery .', 'Sustainable urban governance network , data-driven internet of thing system , and wireless sensor-based application in smart city logistics .', 'Employing recent research result covering sustainable urban governance network , data-driven Internet of Things system , and wireless sensor-based application in smart city logistics , and building our argument by drawing on data collected from City of Sydney , OAV , PwC , RICS , Siemens , UNESCAP , UNHSP , Volkswagen Group China , and The World Bank , we performed analysis and made estimate regarding how data-driven Internet of Things system and machine learning-based analytics can gather and share massive volume of data by harnessing networked and integrated sustainable urban technology .', 'Internet of Things sensing infrastructure are pivotal in configuring networked and integrated sustainable urban technology by use of machine learning-based analytics and urban Internet of Things system .', 'Descriptive statistic of compiled data from the completed survey were calculated when appropriate .', 'Internet of thing sensor and digital urban governance in data-driven smart sustainable city .', 'We draw on a substantial body of theoretical and empirical research on Internet of Things sensor and digital urban governance in data-driven smart sustainable city , and to explore this , we inspected , used , and replicated survey data from BDO , Bentley , ESI ThoughtLab , ICMA , KPMG , RICS , SSC , and World Economic Forum , performing analysis and making estimate regarding how Internet of Things-enabled smart city harness interconnected sensor network and machine learning-based analytics .', 'Data-driven planning technology and machine learningbased analytics articulate networked and integrated sustainable urban technology .', 'Smart and environmentally sustainable city leverage Internet of Things sensing infrastructure .', 'Integrating Internet of Things sensing infrastructure furthers the advancement of groundbreaking service and sensor-based big data application across Internet of Things-enabled smart city .', 'Networked and integrated sustainable urban technology can be pivotal in the development of sustainable urban governance network .', 'Deep learning can assist Internet of Things sensing infrastructure in smart sustainable city governance and management .', 'Descriptive statistic of compiled data from the completed survey were calculated when appropriate .', 'Equitensors : Learning Fair Integrations of Heterogeneous Urban Data .', 'Neural method are state-of-the-art for urban prediction problem such as transportation resource demand , accident risk , crowd mobility , and public safety .', 'Model performance can be improved by integrating exogenous feature from open data repository ( e.g.', ', weather , housing price , traffic , etc . )', ', but these uncurated source are often too noisy , incomplete , and biased to use directly .', 'We propose to learn integrated representation , called Equitensors , from heterogeneous datasets that can be reused across a variety of task .', 'We align datasets to a consistent spatio-temporal domain , then describe an unsupervised model based on convolutional denoising autoencoders to learn shared representation .', 'We extend this core integrative model with adaptive weighting to prevent certain datasets from dominating the signal .', 'To combat discriminatory bias , we use adversarial learning to remove correlation with a sensitive attribute ( e.g.', ', race or income ) .', 'Experiment with 23 input datasets and 4 real application show that Equitensors could help mitigate the effect of the sensitive information embodied in the biased data .', "Meanwhile , application using Equitensors outperform model that ignore exogenous feature and are competitive with `` oracle '' model that use hand-selected datasets .", 'Theoretical design and experimental study for urban data management using energy-saved IoT big data .', 'In this study , an experimental study ( ESIF ) is presented for urban data management and smart city application using energy-saved IoT big data analytics .', 'This study is also used to manage the energy consumption in urban planning and smart city application .', 'The previous researcher demonstrate that the big data analysis process is more complex .', 'We use different kind of sensor such as traffic congestion , weather , smart home , water , and vehicular sensor to collect the resource data .', 'The framework is divided into three phase .', 'The first phase is responsible for collecting the data using IoT device and interconnects with elasticity ( energy-saving ) manager .', 'The second phase is data handling operation using MapReduce framework .', 'Third phase deal with decision-making which is an important step to classify the event and produce the decision accurately .', 'To do this , machine learning concept of deep learning algorithms is used and it produces the decision more effectively .', 'The Hadoop is to provide offline service as well as online service with the help of spark .', 'Therefore , the effectiveness of the model is illustrated in the case of processing time and throughput .', 'A Survey of Recent Advances in Crowd Density Estimation using Image Processing .', 'Crowd analysis is an essential topic of research in artificial intelligence .', 'There are several application on crowd analysis , such as , environmental management , urban planning and public safety .', 'This paper presents review of different methodology those have been implemented for estimating crowd .', 'This paper covers several method of crowd density estimation , such as , image processing technique , machine learning and deep learning based technique , and smartphone based technique .', 'Comparison of ANN Classifier to the Neuro-Fuzzy System for Collusion Detection in the Tender Procedures of Road Construction Sector .', 'As the contract in the road construction sector in Poland are usually of extremely high value and financed from the state budget , the tender procedure should not allow for the non-concurrent behaviours of tender participant .', "Otherwise , the client ' loss will be of high value too .", 'A database comprising hundred of bidding procedure in the road construction industry in Poland has been developed .', "It includes the tender 's participant , the location of the road section , bid ' value , the winner , and the type of road .", 'Every procedure has been evaluated and assigned to the set with a given level of collusion occurrence probability .', 'The evaluation has required the analysis and the transformation of-described in the literature-collusive type of behaviours to the parameter of procedure that can be shown as number or rank .', 'Four criterion of a collusion threatened contract have been chosen and applied for evaluation .', 'Then , two method of machine learning were applied .', 'The first method was to train an artificial neural network ( ANN ) to classify the procedure to the aforementioned set .', 'The other method was to utilize artificial neural network predictive capability enriched by the fuzzy set theory .', 'The multiple output from ANN was defined as membership function value .', 'The use of the fuzzy set theory-the process of defuzzification-helps to classify the tender procedure to the set of different level of risk ( of collusion appearance ) .', 'The result achieved in these two separate process are compared and discussed .', 'The created tool can be applied for the future tender procedure as a pre-test of a collusion appearance .', "Machine learning approach to understand the influence of urban environment on human 's physiological response .", 'This research proposes a framework for signal processing and information fusion of spatial-temporal multi-sensor data pertaining to understanding pattern of human physiological change in an urban environment .', 'The framework includes signal frequency unification , signal pairing , signal filtering , signal quantification , and data labeling .', 'Furthermore , this paper contributes to human-environment interaction research , where a field study to understand the influence of environmental feature such as varying sound level , illuminance , field-of-view , or environmental condition on human ’ perception was proposed .', 'In the study , participant of various demographic background walked through an urban environment in Zürich , Switzerland while wearing physiological and environmental sensor .', 'Apart from signal processing , four machine learning technique , classification , fuzzy rule-based inference , feature selection , and clustering , were applied to discover relevant pattern and relationship between the participant ’ physiological response and environmental condition .', 'The predictive model with high accuracy indicate that the change in the field-of-view corresponds to increased participant arousal .', 'Among all feature , the participant ’ physiological response were primarily affected by the change in environmental condition and field-of-view .', 'Object Counting on Low Quality Images : A Case Study of Near Real-Time Traffic Monitoring .', 'The installation and management of traffic monitoring device can be costly from both a financial and human resource point of view .', 'It is therefore important to take advantage of available infrastructure to maximize the information extraction for each technology .', 'Here we show how low-quality urban road traffic image from camera , already installed in many city such as Montreal , Vancouver and Toronto can be used as a non-intrusive traffic monitoring .', 'To this end , we use a pre-trained object detection neural network to count vehicle within image .', 'We then compare the result with human annotation gathered through crowdsourcing campaign .', 'We use this comparison to assess performance and calibrate the neural network annotation .', 'The performance of our system allows us to consider application which can monitor the traffic condition in near real-time , making the counting usable for traffic-related service .', 'Furthermore , the resulting annotation pave the way for building a historical vehicle counting dataset to be used for analysing the impact of road traffic on many city-related issue such as urban planning , security , and pollution .', 'Variational beauty of space : Machine intuition and non-linear neural aggregation .', 'Spatial network have long been known for their internal spatial order or beauty ( Hillier , 2007 ) and in the field spatial computation and analytics we employ a number of graph based methodology in order to understand or extract intrinsic attribute of the urban fabric around us .', 'In this research we take a complete different approach by looking at urban structure through the use of deep convolutional variational autoencoders with interesting result .', 'Autoencoders are an unsupervised learning technique in which we employ neural network for the task of representation learning .', 'Specifically , a neural network architecture imposes a bottleneck in the network which forces a compressed and generalization of the knowledge representation of the structure of space .', 'This non-linear compression and subsequent reconstruction creates a unique set of feature that are inherent of urban space .', 'Our network is multiple layer deep in order to be able to encode basic spatial complexity and is build based on a convolutional network architecture which is inspired by biological process similar to the connectivity pattern between neuron that resembles the organization of the animal visual cortex .', 'Artificial neuron respond to real urban network of London in a restricted region of the visual field , which partially overlap such that they cover the entire convolutional visual field .', 'Convolutional layer apply a convolution operation to the input , passing the result to the next layer .', 'Each convolutional neuron processes data only for its receptive field but the cascading nature of our network build a knowledge of more complex spatial relation as data move deeper .', 'While convolutional neural network are extensively used in supervised image classification the work presented in this paper is completely unsupervised .', 'In this paper we present the complete architecture of the deep convolutional network that was trained for month using data from the city of London , concluding with two significant outcome extracted from the variational encoding and decoding process .', 'A non-linear clustering , or neural aggregation , of urban space based on the learned feature and a generative urban network output based on the variational synthesis we call machine intuition .', 'An information system for judicial and public administration using artificial intelligence and geospatial data .', 'The adoption of information technology in judicial and public administration has become a major need nowadays with the rapid growth of information regarding managerial issue .', 'This paper presents an advanced methodology developed by using Information and Communication Technologies ( ICT ) and artificial intelligence to support decision making in public and judicial administration .', 'A prototype Management Information System for public administration ( MISPA ) was developed to provide a computerized way of managing geospatial urban , environmental and crime data of an urban area .', 'This system was developed by using several programming language , a Database Management System ( DBMS ) and other technology and programming tool .', 'The proposed system was developed aiming at the systemization and modernization of public , judicial and police authority that are associated with issue that have to be dealt by studying urban data regarding crime and environmental data and support decision making based on crime forecasting .', 'Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems - Proceeding .', 'The proceeding contain 10 paper .', "The topic discussed include : SEACHI 2016 : smart city for a better living with HCI and UX ; re-imagining public interactive learning space to support Singaporean child 's wellbeing ; concept of interactive machine learning in urban design problem ; using smartphones in city to crowdsource dangerous road section and give effective in-car warning ; the quest of defining smart digital city in Medini ; crowdsourcing : tackling challenge in the engagement of citizen with smart city initiative ; sharing economy in smart city transportation service ; free UX testing tool : the LudoVico UX machine for physiological sensor data recording , analysis , and visualization for user experience design experiment ; and being heroically lost , being heroically found .", 'Optimization and evaluation of the human fall detection system .', 'Fall are the most critical health problem for elderly people , which are often , cause significant injury .', 'To tackle a serious risk that made by the fall , we develop an automatic wearable fall detection system utilizing two device ( mobile phone and wireless sensor ) based on three ax accelerometer signal .', 'The goal of this study is to find an effective machine learning method that distinguish fall from activity of daily living ( ADL ) using only a single triaxial accelerometer .', 'In addition , comparing the performance result for wearable sensor and mobile device data.the proposed model detects the fall by using seven different classifier and the significant performance is demonstrated using accuracy , recall , precision and F-measure .', 'Our model obtained accuracy over 99 % on wearable device data and over 97 % on mobile phone data .', 'Comparison of machine learning technique for the automatic recognition of soundscapes .', 'Rather than recognising single environmental sound source , research on soundscape recognition aims at identifying general unstructured auditory scene composed of multiple simultaneous sound source .', 'Nowadays , soundscape recognition has multiple application , such as : i ) contextawareness for mobile robot and portable device , so as to provide information about the surrounding acoustic environment , enabling the automatic reaction of the device without human intervention ; ii ) background noise identification for speech recognition system , so as to improve the robustness of such system by facilitating their adaptability to any indoor or outdoor environment ; iii ) support tool in urban planning and noise annoyance assessment .', 'In this paper , pattern recognition technique specially designed to automatically recognise soundscapes are implemented .', 'Specifically , the study focuses on finding the most appropriated learning paradigm .', 'A set of machine learning technique , commonly employed in similar sound recognition task , are considered : decision tree , K-Nearest Neighbours algorithm , Gaussian Mixture Models and Neural Networks .', 'Extensive experiment are carried out so as to empirically test and compare the performance attained by the different learning technique .', 'The experiment are performed employing an audio data corpus composed of 15 different soundscenes , such as park , traffic street , restaurant or stadium .']

['A machine-learning model for the prediction of aggregated building heating demand from pan-European land-use map .', 'Aggregated building energy demand is a useful indicator for urban energy planning .', 'It can be used by planner and decision-makers to identify cluster of high energy demand in a given urban area and efficiently plan , for example , district heating network .', 'Various data source exist at the pan-European level describing land use and built area .', 'Combined with statistical data , such map have been used in previous research for estimating building energy performance aggregated at the hectare level , using engineering assumption .', 'In this paper , we show that large-scale land-use map alone can be used for predicting annual building energy demand with an accuracy comparable to the one of previous engineering model .', 'We hence present a preliminary method based on Convolutional Neural Networks at different spatial resolution .', 'The resulting model was trained and tested in an area of about 170 km2 in Geneva ( Switzerland ) using a local annual heating demand dataset comprising 16239 building .', 'On a 300-m aggregation tile , the obtained mean error ( 14.3 % ) is significantly reduced compared to the one of a simple linear model ( 37.2 % ) .', 'Using solely land-use data , we also achieve similar result for a 100-m tile as those of an engineering model from the literature .', 'A generative architectural and urban design method through artificial neural network .', 'Machine learning , as a computational tool for finding mapping between the input and output data , has been widely used in engineering field .', 'Researcher have applied machine learning model to generate 2D drawing with pixel or 3D model with voxels , but the pixelization reduces the precision of the geometry .', 'Therefore , in order to learn and generate 3D geometry as vectorized model with higher precision and faster computation speed , we develop a specific artificial neural network , learning and generating design feature for the form of building .', 'A customized data structure with feature parameter is constructed , meeting the requirement of the neural network by rebuilding surface with controlling point and appending additional input neuron as quantified vector to describe the property of the design .', 'The neural network is first trained with generated design data and then tested by adjusting the feature parameter .', 'The prediction of the generated data shows the basic generative ability of the neural network .', 'Furthermore , trained with design data collected from existing building , the neural network learns and infers the geometric design feature of architectural design with different feature parameter , providing a data-driven method for designer to generate and analyze architectural form .', 'Meta-regression framework for energy consumption prediction in a smart city : A case study of Songdo in South Korea .', 'Nowadays the concept of smart city has gained in popularity in urban study .', 'A smart city collects diverse information to monitor and analyze urban system , such as energy management .', 'It is crucial for smart city to monitor energy efficiency to be sustainable .', 'In this study , we search to expose the possibility offered by the energy data of Songdo , a South Korean smart city .', 'First , we have highlighted the ability of Songdo to generate energy data .', 'Second , we used those data to predict its evolution .', 'As a result , we develop a short-term stacking ensemble model for energy consumption in Songdo , focusing on a three-months-ahead prediction problem .', 'To obtain this result , first we design a baseline regressors for the prediction , second , we apply a three-combination of each best model of the base regressors , and finally , a weighted meta-regression model was applied using meta-XGBoost .', 'We call the resulting model stacking ensemble model .', 'The proposed stacking ensemble model combines the best ensemble network to improve performance prediction , yielding an R2 value of 97.89 % .', 'The result support the effectiveness of the ensemble network , which use Artificial Neural Networks ( ANN ) , CatBoost and Gradient Boosting .', 'This study also shows that the weighted meta model outperforms several machine learning model in term of R2 , MAE and RSME .', 'Investigation of urban climate and built environment relation by using machine learning .', 'Climate change can cause a cascade of effect from the individual organism to ecosystem-scale where in nature , all specie are element of complex network of interaction .', 'Hence , every impact on every scale has a significant role .', 'Those property of the network are decisive on the global ecosystem , so how they will be modified by climate change needs serious study .', 'The vast population of the urban area exerts significant effect on climate change even though they cover a small proportion of the surface of the Earth ; however , impact of urbanization on climate and ecosystems remain inadequately understood .', 'In the meantime , urbanization continues to increase and in 2030 , two-thirds of the population is expected to be living in urban area with an increasing rate in time .', 'It is of great importance to elaborate on the relation between urbanization and climate .', 'In this respect , the use of information technology with an extensive computational capacity is one of the cornerstone of climate and urban study .', 'Machine learning is a branch of computer science that deal with the automated recognition of pattern from data .', 'The use of machine learning algorithm can bring significant advantage to both understanding and predicting the climate .', 'The computational power with big data , their ability to capture nonlinear behavior , and learn as new data arrive make machine learning a useful tool for understanding climate and developing urban planning .', 'In this sense , the purpose of this study is to show the advantage of machine learning algorithm by developing a recurrent neural network algorithm to make climate prediction and stating possible effect of machine learning on design and its contribution to understanding the climate .', '4D building reconstruction with machine learning and historical map .', 'The increasing importance of three-dimensional ( 3D ) city modelling is linked to these data ’ s different application and advantage in many domain .', 'Image and Light Detection and Ranging ( LiDAR ) data availability are now an evident and unavoidable prerequisite , not always verified for past scenario .', 'Indeed , historical map are often the only source of information when dealing with historical scenario or multi-temporal ( 4D ) digital representation .', 'The paper presents a methodology to derive 4D building model in the level of detail 1 ( LoD1 ) , inferring missing height information through machine learning technique .', 'The aim is to realise 4D LoD1 building for geospatial analysis and visualisation , valorising historical data , and urban study .', 'Several machine learning regression technique are analysed and employed for deriving missing height data from digitised multi-temporal map .', 'The implemented method relies on geometric , neighbour , and categorical attribute for height prediction .', 'Derived elevation data are then used for 4D building reconstruction , offering multitemporal version of the considered urban scenario .', 'Various evaluation metric are also presented for tackling the common issue of lack of ground-truth information within historical data .', 'Measuring sustainability and urban data operationalization : An integrated computational framework to evaluate and interpret the performance of the urban form .', 'With rapid urbanization , the necessity for sustainable development has skyrocketed , and sustainable urban development is a must .', 'Recent advance in computing performance of urban layout in real-time allow for new paradigms of performance-driven design .', 'As beneficial as utilizing multiple layer of urban data may be , it can also create a challenge in interpreting and operationalizing data .', "This paper presents an integrated computational framework to measure sustainability , operationalize and interpret the urban form 's performance data using generative design method , novel performance simulation , and machine learning prediction .", 'The performance data is clustered into three pillar of sustainability : social , environmental , and economical , and it is followed with the performance space exploration , which assists in extracting knowledge and actionable rule of thumb .', 'A significant advantage of the framework is that it can be used as a discussion table in participatory planning processes since it could be easily adapted to interactive environment .', 'A data-driven approach for multi-scale GIS-based building energy modeling for analysis , planning and support decision making .', 'Urban planner , local authority , and energy policymakers often develop strategic sustainable energy plan for the urban building stock in order to minimize overall energy consumption and emission .', 'Planning at such scale could be informed by building stock modeling using existing building data and Geographic Information System-based mapping .', 'However , implementing these process involves several issue , namely , data availability , data inconsistency , data scalability , data integration , geocoding , and data privacy .', 'This research addresses the aforementioned information challenge by proposing a generalized integrated methodology that implements bottom-up , data-driven , and spatial modeling approach for multi-scale Geographic Information System mapping of building energy modeling .', 'This study uses the Irish building stock to map building energy performance at multiple scale .', 'The generalized data-driven methodology uses approximately 650,000 Irish Energy Performance Certificates building data to predict more than 2 million building ’ energy performance .', 'In this case , the approach delivers a prediction accuracy of 88 % using deep learning algorithms .', 'These prediction result are then used for spatial modeling at multiple scale from the individual building level to a national level .', 'Furthermore , these map are coupled with available spatial resource ( social , economic , or environmental data ) for energy planning , analysis , and support decision-making .', 'The modeling result identify cluster of building that have a significant potential for energy saving within any specific region .', 'Geographic Information System-based modeling aid stakeholder in identifying priority area for implementing energy efficiency measure .', 'Furthermore , the stakeholder could target local community for retrofit campaign , which would enhance the implementation of sustainable energy policy decision .', 'Resilient structural system created by research .', 'Research is essential for developing new idea creating resilient structure that have extended and predicted life cycle .', 'Through creative use of material , construction technique , and building performance , this research can address broad issue related to the life of structure starting with urban planning and ending with health monitoring .', 'Awareness is key to solving complex issue and the collaboration between academic study , research , and practice is critical .', 'This paper will focus on how research has manifested new approach to design .', 'Example include the use of mechanized approach to design , optimization theory and machine learning .', 'Idea range from component in building to entire city and the work includes project from various place around the world .', 'Intelligent Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Technology in Urban Environments .', 'Sustainable development of megacities requires a transition to the new management method and technology , based on the wide use of a large amount of heterogeneous data .', 'Managing the urban economy needs to consider environmental restriction , environmental monitoring task , engineering facility , and transport .', 'Operational control over the urban environment and the surrounding area can be produced using unmanned aerial vehicle ( UAVs ) , and the collected data can be processed using a wide range of software and hardware technology related to the field of artificial intelligence .', 'However , along with any fairly new technology , intelligent unmanned technology have both advantage and disadvantage .', 'Strength are mobility and efficiency , relative cheapness , the possibility of a high degree of automation , whereas weakness are short flight time , dependence on weather condition , the certain outstanding task of data management and processing .', 'This paper considers the possibility of using intelligent unmanned technology based on UAVs for solving the problem of monitoring the urban environment of the Kazakhstan megalopolis .', 'Consideration is also being given to the scope for extending possibility of applying these technology to the field of environmental monitoring , monitoring of hazardous geological process , technical construction and vehicle .', 'Furthermore , technological and economic issue , as well as necessary data processing technology , are discussed .', 'The economic effect of the use of IUVAT is estimated at $ 70-200 million , but it requires solving a set of data processing , control and technical problem .', 'Building Energy Information : Demand and Consumption Prediction with Machine Learning Models for Sustainable and Smart Cities .', 'Building energy consumption plays an essential role in urban sustainability .', 'The prediction of the energy demand is also of particular importance for developing smart city and urban planning .', 'Machine learning has recently contributed to the advancement of method and technology to predict demand and consumption for building energy system .', 'This paper presents a state of the art of machine learning model and evaluates the performance of these model .', 'Through a systematic review and a comprehensive taxonomy , the advance of machine learning are carefully investigated and promising model are introduced .', 'Rapid and automated urban modeling technique for UAS application .', 'Urban model for testing UAV path-planning algorithms commonly apply simple representation using cuboid or cylinderical shape which may not capture the characteristic of a urban environment .', 'To address this limitation of existing urban model , this paper presents two urban modeling technique for an unmanned aircraft flight simulation in an urban environment .', 'The first proposed urban modeling technique is an airborne LiDAR source-based approach that incorporates machine learning algorithm to identify the number of building and characterize them from the LiDAR information .', 'The second proposed urban modeling technique is an artificial urban modeling technique without any airborne LiDAR resource that applies an adaptive spacing method , an iterative algorithm to define an artificial urban environment .', 'Unlike the LiDAR source-based approach that creates an approximated urban model , the adaptive spacing-based urban modeling algorithm generates an artificial urban environment that is visually different from a reference city , but has similar the characteristic to it .', 'To demonstrate the two proposed urban modeling technique , numerical simulation are conducted using open-source datasets to construct several realistic urban model .', 'A multiscale clustering of the urban morphology for use in quantitative model .', 'Geo-spatial data available to researcher and practitioner has increased substantially over the last decade , offering new opportunity for analyzing and characterizing location and their spatial environment in an objective way .', 'Various study in the field of urban planning and design have given recommendation on “ good urban form ” , suggesting that especially characteristic of the urban morphology inform the quality of location and additionally influence spatial behavior .', 'While we find a growing number of quantitative spatial model such as hedonic price model , location choice model , or applied machine learning algorithm , characteristic describing the urban morphology are still rarely reported in these .', 'One reason can be found in the limited knowledge on how to characterize the urban morphology best .', 'In this chapter , we address this deficit and define attribute that are suitable to characterize the urban morphology in quantitative mean at different scale .', 'We show how these can be processed from a data model that is simple enough to allow for reproducibility in most study area and process them for the case study of Switzerland .', 'Finally , we use the attribute to define urban typology through clustering method .', 'These are compared on their outcome , their consistency , and interpretation .', 'Comparison of Regression Tools for Regional Electric Load Forecasting .', 'Urban area electrical load forecasting is important for power generation capacity planning and also to integrate environment friendly energy source at district level .', 'Load prediction will help in developing demand side management in coordination with renewable power generation .', 'Urban area load is influenced by meteorological condition therefore it is important to include weather parameter for load prediction .', 'Machine Learning algorithm can effectively contribute for electrical load prediction .', 'The most commonly used algorithm for load prediction is Artificial Neural Network ( ANN ) , which is a complex predictor that utilizes a big amount of training data .', 'k-Nearest Neighbour ( kNN ) has proven to be efficient by the introduction of binary dummy variable for categorisation and it can be used for short term ( 30 min ) and long term ( 24 hour ) load forecasting .', 'This paper explores the use of regression tool for regional electric load forecasting by correlating lower distinctive categorical level ( season and day of the week ) and weather parameter .', 'The historical electrical load datasets with meteorological parameter are available for the Sydney region and they have been used to test the regression tool .', 'Data correlation over seasonal change have been argued by mean of improving Mean Absolute Percentage Error ( MAPE ) .', 'By examining the structure of various regressors they are compared for the lowest MAPE .', 'The regressors show good MAPE for short term ( 30 min ) prediction and Random Forest Regressor scores best in the range of 1-2 % MAPE .']
